rows.Title: Phone hang up often and restart automatically stop working
rows.Problem: Device freezes and hangs despite software update and service center visit; issue persists after job sheet creation and software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone frequently freezes and restarts, preventing normal operation after software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly hangs and restarts, making it unusable and indicating a major functional failure in power or system stability.
rows.R&D Comment: No specific problem found in logs. Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Back Gesture stop working while watching video in Youtube app
rows.Problem: Going Back Gesture stop working and also unable to close the app. Then I need to Restart my device every time when this happen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The back gesture fails while watching videos in the YouTube app, preventing users from closing the app and requiring a device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The back gesture is a core navigation function; its failure prevents app closure and forces device restarts, making the device unusable during the issue.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs at 17:03 during video playback; video and logs are required to reproduce and diagnose the scenario.

rows.Title: Rear Camera keeps closing
rows.Problem: Camera keeps closing as soon as it's opened or within couple of seconds. This happens only with rear camera not with front camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera closes unexpectedly shortly after being opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The rear camera fails to function properly upon opening, which prevents normal use of the camera feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Black screen while using Facebook
rows.Problem: Black screen pops up while using Facebook
rows.Summarized Problem: A black screen appears when using the Facebook app, disrupting user interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The black screen prevents the user from viewing content, making the app unusable during active use.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Call popup window removed from notification panel when pressing Home button
rows.Problem: When a phone call arrives and the user has opened other apps, pressing the Home button causes the call popup to be removed from the notification panel, requiring the call app to be minimized to receive the call
rows.Summarized Problem: Call popup is removed from the notification panel when the Home button is pressed, preventing users from receiving calls promptly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from receiving calls immediately after opening other apps, leading to potential missed calls and device usability failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue stems from a system-level app (com.android.bips) not being handled by Samsung, and no proof of concept exists to report or resolve it.

rows.Title: Face unlock security issue
rows.Problem: Device unlocks with any person's face, including strangers, despite being set to biometric face unlock. This is a serious privacy concern.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device incorrectly unlocks with strangers' faces, compromising user privacy.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue allows unauthorized access to the device, making it unusable for secure authentication and posing a serious privacy risk.
rows.R&D Comment: No required logs to solve the issue; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to open file/photo browser
rows.Problem: Unable to open file/photo browser and app crashes when uploading files to Gmail or other apps. Photos and videos stop loading or display errors in dialogs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The file/photo browser fails to open and crashes when attempting to upload files to apps like Gmail.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during file uploads, preventing users from accessing or sharing files, making the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs in the mediaProvider module of Google's mainline software; reported to Google with issue tracking link.

rows.Title: Unable to Login Samsung Wallet App
rows.Problem: Trying to log in Samsung wallet but it shows error every time
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to the Samsung Wallet app due to a version compatibility error.
rows.Severity Reason: The login function is completely failing, preventing access to a core payment feature.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by an unsupported test version of the Samsung Wallet PF; users must perform a factory reset to resolve it.

rows.Title: Internet Not Working
rows.Problem: The device keeps loading when trying to scan and pay at a roadside merchant using PhonePe, Amazon Pay UPI. NR only mode sometimes fails and no internet is available on the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to establish internet connectivity, resulting in prolonged loading during payment attempts and NR only mode failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish network connectivity, preventing essential functions like payments and internet access, making it unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate root cause and validate network registration failure.

rows.Title: Device getting Hanged while Using 3rd Party Apps
rows.Problem: Device is hanging when using third-party apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs when using third-party apps, causing system instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during app usage, which renders it unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a network resolution failure in CronetUrlRequest, leading to app crashes; countermeasure involves clearing Netflix app cache to resolve the network exception.

rows.Title: Device consumes too much battery
rows.Problem: Device consumes too much battery. It barely gives 6 hours of SOT on a full charge with moderate use only. Battery software optimization is poor.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device consumes excessive battery power under moderate use, resulting in only 6 hours of battery life on a full charge.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain usable battery life under normal conditions, making it unusable for daily tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: High battery consumption during video calls via WhatsApp is caused by camera usage; countermeasure is to optimize background camera power consumption during video calls.

rows.Title: Unable to add debit card in Wallet
rows.Problem: Samsung Wallet unable to add debit card; error says card not supported. Card is SBI debit card with NFC, known to be supported per website. NFC enabled. User has been using card since 2022. Log file sent, no screenshot possible in Wallet app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add SBI debit card to Samsung Wallet due to error indicating card not supported, despite card having NFC and being officially supported.
rows.Severity Reason: The card addition function fails completely for a supported card type, preventing users from using a standard debit card in the Wallet feature, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Card BIN (652294) is not enabled for tokenization in Mastercard's system, causing the addition failure; this is a configuration issue requiring update in tokenization rules.

rows.Title: network disconnection
rows.Problem: Network disconnection occurs every 15 to 30 minutes, causing payments, form fills, and video calls to get stuck and preventing communication with others.
rows.Summarized Problem: Frequent network disconnections prevent users from making calls, sending payments, and using applications during video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device functionality to fail repeatedly, making the device unusable for essential tasks like calls and payments.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by insufficient network registration and requires CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Mobile data not working
rows.Problem: Mobile data is not working after keeping Wi-Fi turned on for a long time. Every time, a mobile data restart is required to fix the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data fails to function after prolonged Wi-Fi usage and requires a restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a core network function but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Galaxy kids app moved to end of apps when power saving mode on
rows.Problem: Galaxy kids app is automatically moved to the end of all apps when power saving mode is turned on
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Kids app is automatically moved to the end of the app list when power saving mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The app reordering affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue fixed in latest OneUI home; verify with latest binary update

rows.Title: Force Close Occurs while Open Now Brief
rows.Problem: Now brief is not working. Personal Data Intelligence keeps stopping popup when trying to open it
rows.Summarized Problem: Now Brief crashes or stops working when attempted to be opened, causing personal data intelligence popups to fail.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when opened, preventing users from accessing core functionality and resulting in a device usability issue.
rows.R&D Comment: App version v7.0.3.2 has been modified to fix errors on the onboarding screen of Now Brief and will be distributed sequentially (~2/21).

rows.Title: Unable to Download Package in Bixby
rows.Problem: Bixby on device processing - unable to download package ie software when turned on. Getting server error though internet working well
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby fails to download software packages when turned on, showing server errors despite internet connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot download essential software packages, which prevents Bixby from functioning properly upon startup, leading to a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to browse or open any content in apps
rows.Problem: Though it shows 5g, it wont browse or open any content in apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows 5G connectivity but fails to browse or open content in apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to access app content despite showing 5G connectivity, indicating a critical failure in network-based application functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Frequent frame drops when using Instagram and YouTube
rows.Problem: Frequent frame drops occur when using Instagram and YouTube, with video pausing but no audio pause. Issue is more common on Instagram, but also noticeable on YouTube. Cleared cache and restarted phone; problem persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent frame drops and video pauses during playback on Instagram and YouTube, with no audio interruption.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable interruptions in video playback but does not result in device crash or data loss, and functionality remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to outdated app versions; retesting with latest app versions is recommended.

rows.Title: Data Icon Not Changing in Quick Panel
rows.Problem: The light of the data icon is not responding when mobile data is turned on or off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The data icon light does not respond properly when mobile data is toggled in the quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The icon fails to reflect data state changes, leading to user confusion but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: capture image looks like an oil painting with no detailing
rows.Problem: My Samsung s25 is very poor at processing images. It looks like an oil painting with no detailing. Is that the software issue or any thing else ?
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera on the Samsung S25 fails to process images with proper detail, resulting in blurry or low-quality outputs that resemble oil paintings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure; it is a partial malfunction in image processing.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Phone crashing and restarting
rows.Problem: Phone just crashed and restarted. There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs. It seems to be a hardware issue involving the AP or UFS component. Signal and power integrity should be checked. User needs to visit customer service center for hardware inspection.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone crashes and restarts due to UFS link layer errors, indicating a potential hardware issue with the AP or UFS component.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes and restarts, making it unusable, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by UFS link layer errors and requires hardware inspection; the countermeasure is to guide users to visit customer service for hardware checks.

rows.Title: Device stutters at 90 Hz refresh rate
rows.Problem: Device stutters at 90 Hz refresh rate, but not at 60 Hz. The stutters are noticeable and affect performance, suggesting a frame drop issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences noticeable stutters at 90 Hz refresh rate, but not at 60 Hz, indicating a frame drop issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The stutters at 90 Hz make the device feel unresponsive and disrupt smooth visual performance, rendering high-refresh-rate functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a change in SF phase leading to frame drops, and has been resolved by adjusting the SF phase for V OS.

rows.Title: Samsung store and themes not opening
rows.Problem: Samsung Store and themes keep loading and show error; Galaxy Store shows network error, themes show connect to network. Network is fine, other apps work normally. Clearing cache and data did not help. Factory reset caused additional issue with wallpaper.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Store and themes fail to open, showing network errors despite a stable network connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure of the Galaxy Store and themes, which are not fully operational but do not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The network used by the user is unstable; recommend changing network environment to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to access locked samsung notes
rows.Problem: After syncing from old phone to new phone via Smart Switch, user changed Samsung account location from UAE to India. Now unable to access locked Samsung Notes on both devices. Error message: 'Can't open a note locked by another account'.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access locked Samsung Notes on both old and new devices after changing their Samsung account location, due to account mismatch during syncing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing critical notes on both devices, rendering the functionality unusable and impacting core productivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Locked notes are tied to the Samsung account at the time of locking; users must reset to the original account to access locked notes, and account changes during setup can cause this issue.

rows.Title: wallpaper keeps restoring to original stock wallpaper
rows.Problem: wallpaper keeps restoring to original stock wallpaper when i change to new wallpapers
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restores the wallpaper to the original stock setting after a user changes it.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the wallpaper setting, preventing user customization, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung Finance app forcibly changes home and lock screen wallpapers; users should disable or remove the app to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Camera flicker while zoom IN/Out
rows.Problem: My camera is flickering and I am getting some kind of vibration while zooming out
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera flickers and vibrates when zooming in or out.
rows.Severity Reason: The flickering and vibration during zooming severely impact camera usability, making it difficult or impossible to use the feature effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module is defective; service center guidance for replacement is recommended.

rows.Title: Battery drops too much
rows.Problem: Battery drops too much even when no apps are opened and device is idle, despite battery stats not matching actual drain.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain even when no apps are running and the device is idle.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion under normal usage conditions, indicating a major system-level power issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by background apps; countermeasure is to request app owner for details, as no source is available.

rows.Title: YouTube no video playing goes to Pip mode
rows.Problem: YouTube goes to PiP mode when no video is playing
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube enters PiP mode when no video is playing, causing incorrect behavior during video playback absence.
rows.Severity Reason: The device enters an unintended PiP mode when no video is playing, which disrupts user experience and may lead to confusion or incorrect interface states.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Add filter in photo icon
rows.Problem: Add filter in photo icon
rows.Summarized Problem: The filter option is not showing in the photo editor.
rows.Severity Reason: The filter option is missing, preventing users from applying filters, which is a partial malfunction of a core feature.
rows.R&D Comment: As checking the attached log, KNOX DOP is enabled on this device. In this case, we don't support creating My Filter or downloading filter in KNOX mode for security policy.

rows.Title: Internet Not Working
rows.Problem: Sending video of problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet connectivity is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish network registration, which prevents internet access, making the device fundamentally unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Photos and Video stop responding
rows.Problem: When updating profile pictures on apps like Pinterest, the app closes with 'Photos and Video stop responding'. This issue occurs regularly and affects multiple apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's photo and video upload functionality crashes when updating profile pictures across multiple apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly during profile picture updates, causing a complete failure of media upload functionality across multiple apps.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is in the mediaProvider module of Google's mainline software and will be resolved in the February mainline update; users are advised to use gallery picker or document picker as alternatives.

rows.Title: Automatically restarted
rows.Problem: Automatically restarted
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically restarts without user intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly, which renders the device unusable and indicates a critical system-level failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause is a SysMMU READ fault due to buffer size inconsistency in NALQ settings; additional debug logs and a ramdump are required for confirmation.

rows.Title: Data stops working frequently in Full NW area
rows.Problem: Data stops working frequently despite full signal, affecting call and meeting connectivity, while other phones work fine with Jio 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: Data connection drops frequently despite strong signal, disrupting call and online meeting usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Data loss and network instability prevent device usability during calls and meetings.
rows.R&D Comment: Multiple SMS on SIM2 block RF on SIM1 due to DSDS configuration; data failure occurs because only one SIM can have active RF resources.

rows.Title: Server error during offline processing in Bixby app
rows.Problem: Bixby app shows server error when offline processing is initiated for download
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby app displays a server error when attempting to initiate offline processing for downloads
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents the user from downloading content, rendering a key feature of the Bixby app non-functional
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Spam call setting crashes
rows.Problem: Disabling spam call setting causes app to crash
rows.Summarized Problem: Disabling spam call settings causes the phone app to crash.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when a user disables spam call settings, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient logs to analyze the problem; recommend capturing logs upon recurrence.

rows.Title: Face unlock not working in low light
rows.Problem: Face unlock not working in low light. Device frequently crashes. Face was not detected or out of camera view in dark environment. Recognition was successful in case of detect faces.
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock fails in low light conditions due to insufficient illumination and camera detection issues.
rows.Severity Reason: Face unlock is a core biometric function required for device access, and failure in low light renders the device unusable without a working alternative.
rows.R&D Comment: Face was not detected or out of camera view in dark environment. For better recognition in low illumination, please provide following guide: set bright wallpaper on lock screen and lift phone toward face in dark environment.

rows.Title: Notifications in Edge Style Mode appear to be jittering when received on Always On Display
rows.Problem: Notifications in Edge Style Mode appear to be jittering when received on Always On Display. The transition between the down and up states seems particularly unstable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications on the Always On Display in Edge Style Mode jitter and exhibit unstable transitions between states.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes instability in the display transition but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Patch has been applied; users need to update their software to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Bad performance and poor quality photos
rows.Problem: very bad performance and poor quality photos
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos have poor quality due to shaking, moving subjects, or lens contamination and direct light exposure.
rows.Severity Reason: Poor photo quality caused by motion and environmental factors leads to unusable image output, impacting core camera functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate that lens contamination and external light exposure cause blurry or noisy photos; recommend user guidance on proper photo conditions and lens cleaning.

rows.Title: Ultra wide camera shakes vigorously while shifting from 10x or 5x zoom to 0.6x
rows.Problem: The ultra wide camera shakes vigorously while shifting from 10x or
rows.Summarized Problem: The ultra wide camera shakes violently when transitioning from 10x or 5x zoom to 0.6x.
rows.Severity Reason: The shaking during zoom transition causes instability and potential failure in image capture, making the camera function unreliable under normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: UV damper peeling and improper alignment cause AF oscillation; improved jig and stroke measurement will address root cause.

rows.Title: WhatsApp call audio not heard by receiver
rows.Problem: Receiver cannot hear voice during WhatsApp calls when phone screen locks or app is in background, despite proper permissions and app reinstall.
rows.Summarized Problem: The receiver cannot hear audio during WhatsApp calls when the phone screen is locked or the app is in the background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the receiver from hearing the call, making communication ineffective and potentially leading to missed interactions.
rows.R&D Comment: Whatsapp version is outdated; retest with latest version and provide logs if issue persists.

rows.Title: Face unlock not working
rows.Problem: Face unlock not working at times. Sending logs after an unsuccessful unlock and successful unlock at same lighting conditions and 5sec gap.
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock fails intermittently under certain lighting conditions due to poor image quality.
rows.Severity Reason: Face unlock is a core authentication function; failure causes device unavailability and user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Face recognition fails under backlight due to blurry images; users should clean camera surface and adjust lighting or position to improve visibility.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass not activating
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass not activating
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass is not activating on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to activate, preventing user from using Samsung Pass functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue occurs due to PPP information being overwritten with zero during registration with KnoxMatrix EscrowVault; further investigation needed for logs.

rows.Title: camera continues to perform poorly
rows.Problem: The camera continues to perform poorly, with blurry photos, lagging performance, and grainy night videos, not focusing the subject. These issues are worse than previous devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces blurry photos and struggles to focus, especially in low-light conditions, with performance lag and poor subject recognition.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to deliver clear images and fails to focus on subjects, which significantly impacts usability and user experience, especially in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by limited depth of field in the sensor and difficulty in autofocus under specific conditions; users are advised to use pro modes or expert raw settings for better results.

rows.Title: Notification History disappears before 24hrs
rows.Problem: Notification history does not stay for 24 hours and disappears before completion. The history shows 6 dismissed WhatsApp notifications in recent dismissed section but only 4 appear in the last 24 hours section, despite having about 30 notifications.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification history fails to retain records for the full 24-hour period, showing missing entries despite being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue results in loss of critical notification data, preventing users from accessing a complete history of recent dismissals, which is essential for user trust and functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a software setting bug that has been patched; users are advised to update their device to resolve it.

rows.Title: Airplane Mode toggle causes mobile network not to restore
rows.Problem: When airplane mode is toggled, the mobile network does not restore. Even after turning airplane mode off, the network remains unavailable. A restart is required to regain network connectivity.
rows.Summarized Problem: Toggling airplane mode prevents mobile network restoration, requiring a restart to recover connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to restore network connectivity after airplane mode toggling, making the phone unusable for calls or data during normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely caused by a faulty SIM that fails to communicate with the device; recommend checking and updating the SIM with the operator.

rows.Title: OTP Not Receive In Galaxy App
rows.Problem: Unable to receive OTP
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to receive OTPs in the Galaxy app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in authentication flow, preventing OTP reception but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Studio App is not working
rows.Problem: I am unable to edit videos in my gallery app
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot edit videos in the Studio App due to a crash or freeze during video editing.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to allow video editing, which is a core functionality, making the device unusable for content creation.
rows.R&D Comment: The ANR issue in the MyFilter is caused by GPU model loading from SNAP; the issue can be resolved by closing and reopening the camera app, and will be fixed in MR1.

rows.Title: Wallpaper automatically switched to default
rows.Problem: Wallpaper disappears from both lockscreen and homscreen and automatically switches to default wallpaper every morning at 7:43 am, only when changing wallpaper during daytime or night time does not trigger this issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically switches to default wallpaper on the lock screen every morning at 7:43 am, despite user-set images.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and only at a specific time, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Frame skipped while zooming
rows.Problem: After zooming to 3x, a frame is skipped in the camera feed.
rows.Summarized Problem: A frame is skipped when zooming to 3x in the camera feed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during zoom operation, where frame skipping occurs only under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The frame skipping is due to camera switching between tele and wide modes during focus; no immediate countermeasure is implemented.

rows.Title: average resting HR and the graph for it is not showing in Samsung Health app
rows.Problem: can't see the average resting HR and the graph for it in Samsung Health app
rows.Summarized Problem: The average resting heart rate and its graph are not displaying in the Samsung Health app on Galaxy Fit3.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot see vital health data, which is essential for monitoring fitness and wellness, leading to a significant gap in functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: No resting HR data is being calculated or stored from the Galaxy Fit3 device, and the data is not being entered into the database.

rows.Title: Calendar delete option not there
rows.Problem: Calendar delete option not there
rows.Summarized Problem: The delete option is missing in the calendar when attempting to delete an event.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during a critical action (deleting events), but does not cause device crash or data loss, only a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is expected to be fixed in OneUI 7.0 update.

rows.Title: KNOX NOT ABLE CREAT WORK PROFILE
rows.Problem: KNOX NOT ABLE CREAT WORK PROFILE SOFTWARE UPDATE NOT WORKING. SERVICE CENTER PEOPLE COULD NOT DO ANYTHING. THEY MENTIONED IT IS BEYOND THEIR UNDERSTANDING.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot create a work profile using Knox, and the software update fails to apply, indicating a missing security key (SAK) in the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a basic security feature (work profile), rendering the device unusable for enterprise or secure use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is a missing SAK in the device; the countermeasure is to inject new security keys during troubleshooting.

rows.Title: low light photography experience has degraded significantly
rows.Problem: weird halo forms after post processing in skies in pictures taken during night. also, weird lens flare forms around outdoor street lights in night time pictures. i tried cleaning the lenses, changing the lenses too, but the problem still persisted. i also tried changing the angle from which i was shooting but still the problems which i have already mentioned, still persisted. this wasn't the case when i first bought the phone. with each and every software update the phone's low light photography has degraded
rows.Summarized Problem: Night mode in the camera produces unwanted halos and lens flares in low-light photos, especially under strong light sources, and the issue has worsened with software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality in specific conditions but does not prevent core functionality or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens flares and halos are within the range of normal operation under strong light sources in night mode; no action is required beyond user awareness.

rows.Title: Analog Accessory detected but not compatible popup occurs while connect earphone
rows.Problem: Analog Accessory detected but not compatible notification keeps popping up, though earphones are working properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: A persistent notification appears indicating 'Analog Accessory detected but not compatible' when connecting earphones, despite the earphones functioning normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification is persistent but does not affect device functionality or performance, only causing user annoyance.
rows.R&D Comment: The notification is considered normal due to lack of information about the connected accessory; analog audio compatibility alerts can be treated as standard behavior.

rows.Title: Volume automatically decrease and not show silent symbol
rows.Problem: Volume automatically decreases and does not show silent symbol
rows.Summarized Problem: The device volume automatically decreases and the silent symbol is not displayed.
rows.Severity Reason: The volume function is completely disabled, leading to an unusable audio experience and lack of user feedback.
rows.R&D Comment: Truecaller app is setting volume to zero; recommend checking or disabling app volume settings or removing the app.

rows.Title: Grey overlay appears in gallery while scrolling using keyboard
rows.Problem: Grey overlay appears in gallery while scrolling using keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: A grey overlay appears when scrolling through the gallery using a keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects scrolling functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is limited to keyboard navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working properly
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not working properly due to poor image quality caused by thick protective film, dry fingers, or improper finger placement.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a biometric function under specific conditions, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor image quality from fingerprint sensor due to thick protective film, dry fingers, or improper finger placement. Countermeasure: Recommend removing thick protective film and using the center part of the fingerprint for enrollment and verification.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint not working on S25 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication fails on the S25 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: Fingerprint authentication is a core security feature; failure prevents device unlocking and renders the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor overlap and similarity with registered fingerprint parts. Countermeasure: Enroll frequently used central parts of fingerprint and keep sensor area clean.

rows.Title: Google Pixel Watch identified as headphones in BT List
rows.Problem: Google Pixel Watch identified as headphones
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Pixel Watch is incorrectly identified as headphones in the Bluetooth device list.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is misidentified in the Bluetooth list, causing confusion but not preventing core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by missing value in the field for device icon on Google Pixel Watch; the solution is to correct the icon display to show a watch.

rows.Title: Phone freezes and restarts
rows.Problem: Phone restarts unexpectedly and randomly, freezing for a few seconds before restarting. Device behavior is erratic and inconsistent, making it difficult to use. User feels cheated by premium device and requests video proof, which is impractical.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone randomly freezes and restarts, causing erratic behavior and making the device unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone restarts unexpectedly, leading to device instability and potential loss of data or usability during operation.
rows.R&D Comment: We could not find abnormal reset in log files; last reset was user-requested. Need detailed reproduction steps and new dump file when issue occurs.

rows.Title: Separate app sound not working
rows.Problem: Separate app sound is not working on my phone. Before I was using s20fe 5g there it was working fine.
rows.Summarized Problem: Separate app sound setting is not functioning correctly on the device, despite being visible in the UI.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning as it appears in the UI but does not work in practice, indicating a functional inconsistency rather than complete failure or device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: We tried reproducing the issue but it is not reproducing; logs show no app selected in separate app sound setting but UI shows selection. User needs to mention preconditions and reset settings to verify the issue.

rows.Title: Internet gets disconnected
rows.Problem: Internet gets disconnected. Sending logs and screen recording. Sending another screen recording and log of network disconnection in Jio5G in Kolkata, Bhawanipore. 700020. This is pathetic with such a premium model from samsung. Exchange my phone with a new functional device. My device is not usable.
rows.Summarized Problem: The internet connection frequently disconnects, making the device unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent internet disconnections, preventing basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to share files via quick share
rows.Problem: Samsung shows file sharing display on one device but not on other Android mobiles
rows.Summarized Problem: Quick Share fails to display on other Android devices after working on Samsung phone
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure across devices, not full device unusability or crash
rows.R&D Comment: Issue likely stems from device-side configuration; both sender and receiver logs needed for full analysis

rows.Title: clock and notification icons are overlapping on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: The clock and notification icons are overlapping i can no longer view anything on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock and notification icons are overlapping, making it impossible to view content on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot view any content on the lock screen, rendering the interface unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Note keep Crashing
rows.Problem: These types issue coming again and again
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app is crashing repeatedly due to a missing permission during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during operation, leading to device instability and loss of functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: SecurityException caused by missing permission has been fixed in version 4.4.20.93; review user-side creation of user modes to prevent recurrence.

rows.Title: Unable to remove App from App time List
rows.Problem: Once app timer is set, there is no way to undo it
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove or undo an app timer once set.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot remove an app timer after setting it, which creates a partial malfunction in the Digital Wellbeing feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Users can delete app timers by long-pressing or selecting 'Delete' on the timer list; no functional gap in the interface, but deletion flow is not clearly highlighted.

rows.Title: Animation flicker while scroll recent app list
rows.Problem: Noticeable graphical glitches while navigating through the UI, including screen tearing, color shifts, and frame drops. The phone feels sluggish with delays in animations and app switching, leading to poor responsiveness.
rows.Summarized Problem: Animations flicker and exhibit graphical glitches during navigation of the recent apps list, causing visual distortion and sluggish performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves graphical glitches and lag that impair core user experience and responsiveness, making the device feel unresponsive and unstable.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is insufficient; the issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher, suggesting it may be resolved by updating to the latest OS.

rows.Title: Heating issue while playing game
rows.Problem: Device overheats significantly while playing BGMI, leading to high temperature and FPS drop, making gameplay almost impossible and severely damaging the experience, especially during hot seasons.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats severely during gameplay, causing FPS drops and making game play nearly impossible.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during gameplay causes device to become unusable and severely impacts performance, leading to crashes or poor gameplay experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Studio App crash popup
rows.Problem: App crashes most of the time
rows.Summarized Problem: The Video Editor app crashes frequently during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes most of the time, making it unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: ANR occurred while updating item thumbnails in AndroidX library. Countermeasure: Fixed AndroidX library will be available with next Android OS upgrade; users advised to reduce number of imported video items.

rows.Title: turn off the app timer on digital well-being
rows.Problem: I cant turn off the app timer on digital well-being there is no option to turn off the timer please fix this issue i am frustrate.. video of screen record attached...
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn off app timers in Digital Wellbeing due to lack of a clear delete option.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing functionality to delete app timers, which prevents users from managing timers, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Users can delete app timers by long-pressing or selecting 'Delete' on the timer list in Digital Wellbeing; the current UI guidance is available and consistent.

rows.Title: Unable to OK Credit App
rows.Problem: App cannot install after update. App crashes occasionally.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to install apps after updates and experiences crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: App crashes and fails to install, preventing users from using essential applications.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue originates from Google Quick Search Box app; ANR occurs due to improper resource delivery, leading to internal service failure and app crash.

rows.Title: Jio Network not Latching In device
rows.Problem: Jio Network not latching in
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is failing to establish a stable connection with the Jio network.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot register with the network, which prevents basic connectivity and renders the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Share photo, video or GIF from gallery on Instagram or other apps shows unsupported
rows.Problem: On Samsung S24, sharing any photo, video or GIF from gallery on Instagram or other apps shows 'unsupported' and fails to share. On WhatsApp, an error occurs with the file not opening and showing 'unsupported'. This happens across all formats: MP4, JPEG, JPG, MOV, GIF, PNG. Tried restarting, checking permissions, and the issue persists across apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot share photos, videos, or GIFs from the gallery on apps like Instagram or WhatsApp due to 'unsupported file' errors across all formats.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from sharing media across apps, rendering a core functionality of the camera/gallery unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Media URI is passed during share; receiving apps fail to process, and no proper feedback is shown—further investigation needed

rows.Title: Video freezing while watching Instagram reels
rows.Problem: Video keeps freezing sometimes while watching Instagram reels
rows.Summarized Problem: Video freezes intermittently during playback of Instagram reels.
rows.Severity Reason: The video freezing disrupts continuous viewing and can cause user frustration, making the experience unusable during content consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: automatically restarts more than 10 times in an hour
rows.Problem: Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Lite is experiencing freezing and hanging issues, automatically restarting more than 10 times in an hour. During incoming calls, the screen turns black and missed calls are not visible in call logs. Device runs on Android 13 UI 5.1.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly restarts within an hour due to system freezing and hanging, causing loss of call visibility and missed call data.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly restarting, leading to complete loss of functionality during calls and data loss in call logs, making it unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Several app not responding errors occurring continuously. Complete dumpstate logs and background ANR/crash logs are required to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Unable to connect SMB folder from Network storage
rows.Problem: Whenever I try to connect the SMB shared folders it throws an exception Unexpected value 17
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect to SMB shared folders due to an exception when attempting to access network storage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing shared folders, which is a core functionality for file sharing in network storage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the SMB library not supporting SMBv1; countermeasure is to set minimum SMB protocol to SMB2 and maximum to SMB3.

rows.Title: Recent App flicker while open and scroll
rows.Problem: Phone is malfunctioning
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps flicker when open and scrolling on the display.
rows.Severity Reason: The app interface flickers during interaction, making the device unusable during operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is insufficient; update to latest OS to resolve issue.

rows.Title: Voice not being recorded clearly during video recording
rows.Problem: The voice is not being recorded clearly while recording the video
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice is not being recorded clearly during video recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects voice recording functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause a crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs.

rows.Title: Unable to Open Profiles in Prime Video App
rows.Problem: Profiles do not open when clicked in the Prime Video app. The issue persists despite clearing data and cache, reinstalling both Amazon and Prime Video apps. A screen recording is attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Profiles in the Prime Video app fail to open when clicked.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to load profiles, which is a functional issue preventing user access to profile-specific content, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a 3rd party app defect; the root cause is image loading failure due to missing image file or URL, and the issue should be addressed by the app owner.

rows.Title: Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Lock screen and wallpaper not accessible. App crashes
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen and wallpaper feature is inaccessible and causes app crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when accessing the lock screen and wallpaper, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a missing string resource; the fix has been released and users are advised to update.

rows.Title: Camera app not working
rows.Problem: Camera app not working. It displays camera initialization fails while opening rear camera. Front camera works normal.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera fails to initialize when opened, while the front camera functions normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The rear camera fails to initialize, preventing proper use of the camera function, which is essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Monomer problem, camera module not properly fastened or broken. Countermeasure: Replace the rear camera module.

rows.Title: Samsung wallet app not connecting
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet app is showing error and not connecting
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Wallet app is showing an error and failing to connect.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to connect, which is a partial malfunction preventing full functionality but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a force update for India users and is resolved via server configuration; users are advised to retry.

rows.Title: Screen pixels jitter during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Screen pixels washed off during WhatsApp video call, request to improve in next update
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen pixels wash off during WhatsApp video calls, causing visual distortion.
rows.Severity Reason: The display shows visible visual distortion during a core functionality (video call), impairing user experience and potentially causing confusion or errors during use.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is in WhatsApp app source code; Samsung has no control or access to the source, and cannot debug or fix the root cause.

rows.Title: Display flickering while using multitouch
rows.Problem: Display is flickering while using multitouch. Flickering occurs when zooming a picture and holding it with one finger, or when playing BGMI and Call of Duty Warzone using the in-game joystick for movement while another finger is used for aiming or firing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display flickers during multitouch interactions, especially when zooming or using in-game joysticks with multiple fingers.
rows.Severity Reason: The flickering occurs during active multitouch operations and interferes with core device functionality during gameplay, making it unusable in critical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Customer is using a noisy charger; recommend using a grounded charger and proper grip to mitigate flickering; further investigation needed for root cause.

rows.Title: YouTube PIP Mode Not Working
rows.Problem: After minimizing YouTube video, unable to pause or cut it. When paused, the pause button is stuck and does not transition to play. Cannot resume using on-screen button; only headphone buttons work. Once in PIP, the pause button remains stuck until returning to full screen and back to PIP mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube PIP mode fails to resume after pause, with the pause button permanently stuck and unable to be used for further control.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot control video playback in PIP mode, making it unusable for basic functionality like pausing and resuming.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is known and reported to Google (b/388937020); Google is under investigation.

rows.Title: Unable to load PDF file in Notes
rows.Problem: The Notes app cannot load a PDF file properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Notes app fails to load PDF files, preventing users from viewing or using PDF content within the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The app cannot load PDF files, which is a core functionality for users, making the app unusable for basic document viewing.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by PDF data analysis for AI translation; a new algorithm has been implemented and will be released in version 4.4.29.13.

rows.Title: Home screen not responding
rows.Problem: Home screen not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen is not responding to user input.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen is unresponsive, making the device unusable for basic navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: No ANR found in logs; issue may be due to UI thread blocking; recommend testing on latest version.

rows.Title: App icons vanishing after clicking
rows.Problem: App icons vanish after clicking; software lags during navigation using swipe gestures
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons disappear after being clicked, accompanied by software lag during navigation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction during UI navigation, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Tried to reproduce the issue; logs do not match video, suggesting a transient or environment-specific cause. Recommend restart and verification on latest software version.

rows.Title: Human skin shows an orange shade in 50MP camera photos
rows.Problem: Human skin shows an orange shade when taking photos using the 50MP camera, which is very irritating and has not been resolved despite repeated reports.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 50MP camera incorrectly renders human skin with an orange tint in photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality but does not cause device failure or data loss, and is consistent across use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: One UI Home isn't responding
rows.Problem: One UI Home isn't responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The One UI Home interface is not responding, causing a freeze or unresponsiveness in the launcher.
rows.Severity Reason: The launcher is unresponsive, leading to a complete failure of the home screen interface, which is essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may stem from concurrent draw operations or GPU wait issues; further investigation needed due to missing logs.

rows.Title: Contact getting deleted automatically
rows.Problem: Contacts are being deleted automatically, and there is a deletion history visible on WhatsApp that appears to be synchronized with Google account contact deletions. Users can restore contacts from the trash in the contacts app or recover them from Google.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts are being deleted automatically and synchronized with Google account deletions, making them recoverable only through the contacts app trash or Google.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of contact management, as contacts can be recovered but are not retained in the expected state after deletion.
rows.R&D Comment: Contact deletion is synchronized with Google account; recovery possible via contacts app trash or Google.

rows.Title: Enable to download images and PDF and files in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Enable to download images and PDF and files in WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot download images, PDFs, and files in WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the app, preventing users from downloading media, but the app is not completely non-functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Photo editing
rows.Problem: Photo editing not working on s25 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo editing functionality is not working on the S25 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: The photo editing feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from performing a basic core function.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Recent Apps showing floating in the air
rows.Problem: While closing the recent apps, one of them is floating in the air
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent Apps display a floating app when closing, causing UI glitches.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI element during app switching, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to clear translationY when entering recents has been applied since OneUIHome 16.0.5.17 version and will be updated through regular MR.

rows.Title: Quick Panel quick button Icon Not working
rows.Problem: Icons like mobile data, location, extra dim do not highlight when pressed, only highlight after unlocking or after some time
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons on the Quick Panel do not highlight when pressed, only highlighting after the phone is unlocked or after some time.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of icon responsiveness, affecting user interaction but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: double tap to lock the screen
rows.Problem: The double tap to lock the screen function is not working when enabled, but works after toggling the option.
rows.Summarized Problem: The double tap to lock screen feature fails to work consistently when enabled, despite working after toggling the setting.
rows.Severity Reason: The function intermittently fails but works after toggling, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera Focus not working after Update
rows.Problem: Focus issue after update Also Camera hdr balance problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera focus is not working properly after the software update, with additional issues in HDR balance.
rows.Severity Reason: The focus function is partially malfunctioning, affecting usability but not rendering the device completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Server error when linking OneDrive to Gallery App
rows.Problem: Error message 'server error occur, try again later' appears when linking OneDrive to Samsung Gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter a server error when attempting to link OneDrive to the Gallery app.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from connecting OneDrive, which is essential for photo syncing functionality, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue symptom appears resolved as the customer is now using the sync service successfully; further investigation needed to confirm root cause and recurrence.

rows.Title: Lock screen clock style changing to default
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock style keeps changing to default after customization, requiring repeated reconfiguration. The custom pink wallpaper clock style is overridden by the default clock style.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen clock repeatedly resets to its default style after user customization, requiring frequent reconfiguration.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the lock screen customization feature, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to investigate the root cause.

rows.Title: Frequently hang and slow continuously contact updating
rows.Problem: Frequently hang and slow continuously contact updating
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently hangs and slows down during contact updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs and slows down during contact updates, which significantly impairs core functionality and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage by multiple processes, including android.process.acore and WhatsApp, is contributing to device sluggishness during contact sync; requires optimization of background processes.

rows.Title: Quick Panel
rows.Problem: Icons in the new notification panel are not working, especially for mobile data. This issue appears after the first update, while the old panel worked fine.
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons in the notification panel, particularly for mobile data, are not responding after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function entirely, rendering a key usability element inoperable after an update.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lock Screen screen is not turning on after getting notifications
rows.Problem: Lock screen is not turning on after getting notifications from any app, despite sound and vibration working and settings being configured correctly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen fails to turn on after receiving notifications from any app, even though sound and vibration are functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to respond to notifications by waking the lock screen, which is essential for user interaction and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Check Power Management Settings and Do Not Disturb configurations to ensure they are not suppressing screen wake behavior.

rows.Title: Galaxy one drive black option not working
rows.Problem: Galaxy one drive black option not working, how to enable backup folder
rows.Summarized Problem: The backup folder option in the Galaxy one drive is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning as users cannot enable the backup folder, but the overall device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: It is assumed that the user attempted to Unlink and then Relink. Currently, the issue appears to be resolved as it is in a Linked state.

rows.Title: Delay response while tap on Mode button on Quick Panel
rows.Problem: Turning on modes such as sleep, theater etc taking longer than expected
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes longer than expected to respond when tapping the Mode button on the Quick Panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in system response time, affecting the usability of specific settings but not causing device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Contact app keep closing automatically
rows.Problem: Contact app keeps closing automatically when tapping on move contacts
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact app crashes when users tap to move contacts, due to an empty eSIM contact list causing a null index exception.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during a core functionality (moving contacts), leading to device unusability for contact management.
rows.R&D Comment: Show 'Move Contact Tip' only when eSIM has saved contacts and handle index -1 case in MoveContactsPresenter

rows.Title: App Icon not changing when applying theme
rows.Problem: Some app icons are not perfectly fitted when applying theme
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons do not update correctly when applying a theme.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of icon scaling during theme application, affecting visual consistency but not rendering or device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: AppIcon scaling is derived from ThemePackage resources; relative scaling calculations are applied but may not align with expected icon sizing.

rows.Title: Phone is switching back to higher band to lower band even if there is a higher band available
rows.Problem: The phone is switching back to higher band to lower band even if there is a higher band available. It connects to higher band only in specific areas but does not switch to lower band when moving, while in other areas it fails to switch to higher band despite its availability.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone fails to maintain connection to higher network bands and inconsistently switches between bands, even when higher bands are available.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to consistently connect to higher bands, leading to unreliable network performance and potential data instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wallpaper 'Minor are not Allowed to Use this service' popup Occures while Use Generative AI
rows.Problem: I am not able to use generative ai to load background images
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use generative AI to load background images due to a popup indicating minors are not allowed to use the service.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable due to age restrictions, but users can still access it with proper account setup.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate that users must be above a certain age and use a non-minor Google account to access the feature.

rows.Title: Device Heatup without doing intensive task or Game
rows.Problem: Device overheats without performing intensive tasks or gaming, likely due to processor (Exynos) power consumption increase in low network regions with weak RSSI signals.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, especially in low network environments, due to increased power consumption from the processor.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating under normal usage can lead to device instability, performance degradation, or hardware damage, making the device unusable in certain conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating caused by processor power consumption in weak network conditions; countermeasure aligns with cause, indicating consistent behavior under low RSSI environments.

rows.Title: Bengali numbers not shown when setting Bengali language
rows.Problem: Bengali (with Bengali numbers) language has gone; need Bengali numbers instead of Western ones
rows.Summarized Problem: Bengali numbers are not displayed when Bengali language is set on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects language display but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and only impacts number formatting in a specific language.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Charging isn't stopping after reaching 100%
rows.Problem: Charging continues after reaching 100% and does not stop, even when basic battery protection is enabled, contradicting the stated behavior of the feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging continues after reaching 100% despite basic battery protection being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The device continues to charge beyond 100%, which contradicts the intended behavior of battery protection and may lead to battery damage or improper operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Normal battery protection operation: battery discharges only when above system needs; customer must use high-power scenarios to see battery drop below 100%. Guidance provided to customer.

rows.Title: Login error in Samsung Account desktop application for Windows 11
rows.Problem: Error when logging into Samsung Account desktop application for Windows 11, occurring for last few months
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience persistent login errors when using the Samsung Account desktop application on Windows 11.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is ongoing but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss; it affects only account access functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Frequently freezing and restarting
rows.Problem: Frequently freezing and restarting often. Done clearing cache and reset settings but same. Not manageable to use the phone in these situations.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes and restarts, making it unusable despite clearing cache and resetting settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent freezing and restarting, which prevents normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by UFS link layer errors, indicating a hardware-level problem involving the AP or UFS component; the recommended countermeasure is to have the device inspected at the customer service center for hardware issues.

rows.Title: Overheating during normal use
rows.Problem: The device becomes noticeably warm during routine activities like watching YouTube or offline videos, and heats up significantly when charging or gaming. It remains warm during the day even when idle and reaches uncomfortable temperatures within 30 minutes of gaming or within 5 minutes of downloading apps or videos.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal use, especially during charging, gaming, and app downloads, remaining warm even when idle.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal use and gaming leads to device instability and potential hardware damage, making it unusable under typical conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Suspected hardware issue with GPU clock or FPGA connector causing hardware hang and thermal instability.

rows.Title: Contacts storage is draining my phone battery daily
rows.Problem: Contacts storage is draining my phone battery daily
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts storage is draining the phone's battery daily.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant battery drain, impacting device usability and performance.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by WhatsApp's frequent database operations; however, Samsung has no control over the app's source code and cannot debug the root cause. Further investigation needed.

rows.Title: Unable to Enter in SIM Card Setting
rows.Problem: Network connectivity issues after updating to the latest security update. SIM card shows a round circle with cross icon 🚫, even when flight mode is on. SIM card does not work and device must be restarted. Issue begins after update; network is strong on other devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: SIM card shows a cross icon and fails to function even when flight mode is on, causing network connectivity issues after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the device from establishing a valid SIM connection, which is essential for basic network functionality, and requires device restart to resolve.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Image Quality
rows.Problem: Image quality from 50 MP camera mode is very bad after update, but was fine before update
rows.Summarized Problem: The image quality of 50 MP camera mode is significantly degraded after the update, despite being fine previously.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable degradation in image quality, but the camera remains functional and does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The high-resolution mode uses AI-based image processing, which differs from the hardware-based processing used in 12MP photos, leading to differences in brightness, tone, and color in certain scenes.

rows.Title: Test mode String (*#0*#) is not working
rows.Problem: Test Mode string Code is not working on my Galaxy A16 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: The test mode string code (*#0*#) is not working on the Galaxy A16 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning at all, preventing users from accessing test mode, which is a core system-level functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: String Not working
rows.Problem: Connection problem or Invalid MMI code message is displayed when trying to dial *#0#. WhatsApp application locks differently than on other Galaxy M35 devices, despite being updated to latest version. User suspects device is counterfeit.
rows.Summarized Problem: Invalid MMI code *#0# results in connection error, and WhatsApp behavior differs from other devices, raising concerns about device authenticity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a specific feature (MMI code) and inconsistent app behavior, but does not prevent device usability or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Customer tried an invalid string (*#0#), which is the cause; the same input causes the issue, and the countermeasure is identical to the cause.

rows.Title: Sleep data missing on Galaxy Watch4 after One UI 6 update
rows.Problem: Sleep tracking is gone haywire with missing sleep data on a daily basis. The watch stops tracking sleep and heart rate for almost an hour, though start and end times are accurate. There is an hour of missing sleep data and heart rate.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch4 stops tracking sleep and heart rate for an hour, resulting in missing data despite accurate start and end times.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to track essential health data during sleep, which is a core functionality and can lead to users missing important health insights.
rows.R&D Comment: Missing sleep data occurs due to lack of arm movement logs during sleep; logs are needed for analysis to confirm root cause and validate the issue.

rows.Title: Device getting freeze and unable to switch off
rows.Problem: My phone froze for some time, and I was unable to switch it off
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and prevents the user from switching it off.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable as the user cannot turn it off, leading to potential battery drain or system instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to open notification history from setting
rows.Problem: I can't access notification history sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access notification history intermittently from settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent access failure, not complete device malfunction or data loss, but affects usability of a key feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Significantly reduced battery life since February security patch update on Galaxy S23 Plus. Previously achieved 6 to 7 hours screen-on time; now barely reaches 4 hours. Battery drain is rapid when using hotspot, calling, and camera with multiple apps simultaneously.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy S23 Plus experiences significantly reduced battery life after a security patch, especially under heavy usage scenarios like hotspot, calling, and camera use with multiple apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain usable battery life under normal usage, making it functionally unusable for daily operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is attributed to high app usage and concurrent functions; no underlying software issue detected, but usage patterns cause rapid consumption.

rows.Title: Camera failed pop up occur
rows.Problem: Camera failed error warning message
rows.Summarized Problem: A warning message appears when the camera fails to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The error message indicates a malfunction in the camera function, which may prevent users from using the camera feature effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: White screen while incoming call
rows.Problem: Sometimes the device shows a white screen when receiving a call, making it impossible to see the screen and pick up the call.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows a white screen during incoming calls, preventing users from seeing the screen and answering calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from seeing the call screen, making it impossible to answer calls, which is a core telephony function.
rows.R&D Comment: Factory reset recommended to restore missing permissions; issue may be related to RetailMode configuration.

rows.Title: Face unlock not working
rows.Problem: Face recognition fails in low lighting due to poor image quality
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock fails in low lighting because the camera captures blurry images, preventing successful facial recognition.
rows.Severity Reason: Face unlock is a core biometric authentication function; failure in low light renders the device unusable for secure access.
rows.R&D Comment: Face recognition fails in low light due to insufficient image quality; users should use bright lighting or adjust their position to improve recognition.

rows.Title: External HDD not being connected with device
rows.Problem: If it's still not clear. Please give me a call so that I can provide relevant information.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect with an external HDD, possibly due to power shortage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in external device connectivity, which may be resolved with power adjustments or device checks, but does not cause device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no special communication error from the USB driver point of view. There is a possibility of power shortage, so please connect external power to HUB, connect HDD, or connect HDD alone. Or please check if it is the same on other types of phones, and if the problem persists, please let me know the HDD model product information.

rows.Title: Show hide camera cutout option not working
rows.Problem: Show/hide camera cutout option not working as expected
rows.Summarized Problem: The show/hide camera cutout option in the status bar is not working as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function properly but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is not clear from logs; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung health have duplicate records for daily activity badges
rows.Problem: Samsung health have duplicate records for daily activity badges
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health is generating duplicate records for daily activity badges.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes duplicate entries but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by badge update date being in February, and has been fixed in Samsung Health v6.29.5

rows.Title: Unable to receive OTP
rows.Problem: Still not able to receive OTP. Operator: AIRTEL LOCATION: VALSAD,GUJARAT-3960035 SIM SLOT: 1 & 2 BOTH TIME: 12:05 PM LOG HAS BEEN ATTACHED AND VIDEO ALSO HAS BEEN ATTACHED. PLEASE SOLVE IT ASAP. OR CALL ME 9033956245
rows.Summarized Problem: User is unable to receive OTPs despite the OTP service being functional and working for login.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is partial and affects only OTP reception, not full service failure or device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: OTP service is working properly and user is receiving OTPs for login; no discrepancy found in service functionality.

rows.Title: Widget UI overlaps
rows.Problem: Widgets behave abnormally after being removed and added multiple times
rows.Summarized Problem: Widget UI overlaps and behaves abnormally after being removed and added multiple times.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes abnormal widget behavior but does not result in device crash or data loss, and only affects UI appearance after repeated actions.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem occurs due to incorrect cellSizeBasedOnDefaultGrid usage during template span map update; the fix involves updating cellSizeBasedOnDefaultGrid before template span map update.

rows.Title: RCS message is not working
rows.Problem: The chat features (RCS) have not been shown in Samsung Messages for the past five days. Only SMS is working, and RCS chat is not enabled because there is no option to turn it on.
rows.Summarized Problem: RCS chat functionality is not working in Samsung Messages, with no option to enable it and only SMS functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot use modern messaging features like RCS, rendering a core communication function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: No required logs are present to analyze the issue; users need to capture logs as per steps in #C00003.

rows.Title: Swipe lock not working
rows.Problem: Lock screen stuck bug, happening intermittently
rows.Summarized Problem: The swipe lock function on the lock screen is intermittently not working and causing the screen to get stuck.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and affects usability but does not completely disable device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue not reproducible in latest binary; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Recent app animation glitch
