rows.Problem: Animation glitches in recent apps menu persist after security update and device restart. Network issues occur with unstable data connection switching between 4G and 5G, and data not showing even when SIM is changed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent apps animation glitches persist and are accompanied by unstable network connectivity with data showing intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core functionality of app navigation and network connectivity, leading to device instability and usability problems.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. The issue is not occurring in OS 15, suggesting a need to update to latest OS version.

rows.Title: flickering of camera with vibrating sound
rows.Problem: The issue of flickering of camera with vibrating sound is real
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera displays flickering with a vibrating sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera flickering with a vibrating sound indicates a major malfunction that affects core device functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module is defective; service center should be guided to replace the camera module.

rows.Title: Drawing assist not working
rows.Problem: Drawing assist not working when I select image automatically logout
rows.Summarized Problem: The drawing assist feature fails to function and causes automatic logout when an image is selected.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature failure leads to automatic logout, making the photo editing process unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sluggish when opening recent apps
rows.Problem: Massage app opens in full screen when going back and instantly opening recent apps, while other apps work properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The massage app opens in full screen when switching to recent apps, causing a performance issue during app transitions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a major malfunction during app switching, leading to unexpected full-screen behavior and potential instability in system performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Google Discover UI changed while change screen resolution
rows.Problem: Display resolution issues when switching between resolutions such as QHD to FHD or FHD to HD, causing fonts and content to appear distorted. Issue resolves after phone restart, suggesting a software bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Discover UI displays incorrectly when screen resolution changes, with content appearing distorted and fonts enlarged, resolving after a device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI rendering during resolution changes but does not cause device crash or complete failure; it resolves after restart, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: It needs to be checked by Google: b/378382983 [AGSA] Google Discover scaling changes when changing resolution

rows.Title: Camera Image Quality Captured Image getting Blur
rows.Problem: Images are blurred, tried hard resetting the phone multiple times but the camera has difficulties focusing on documents. Not every click results in blurred images but most of the times the subject focused on gets blurred.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera captures blurred images, especially when focusing on documents, despite multiple resets.
rows.Severity Reason: Blurred images prevent proper document viewing, making the camera function largely unusable for its primary purpose.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module is estimated to be defective; service center guidance for replacement is recommended.

rows.Title: Set routine App is not working Properly
rows.Problem: The routine for lost mobile notification is not working on lock screen. It was previously fixed by restarting but now triggers for every message. User cleared data of modes and routines to resolve.
rows.Summarized Problem: A lost mobile notification routine on the lock screen is not functioning correctly and is now triggering for every message.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine fails to work on lock screen, which is a core functionality for device security and user experience, and triggers incorrectly, potentially exposing user data.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera flash notification was enabled via routine action in accessibility settings and remains active even after routine removal; users need to disable flash notification in settings to prevent unintended behavior.

rows.Title: device getting restart frequently
rows.Problem: Personal data intelligence force closed and device restarted. I did not get the screenshot because device restarted. The logs should be sufficient.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently restarts due to a force closure of the Personal Data Intelligence feature, leading to data loss and loss of user session.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts frequently, causing loss of personal data and disrupting core functionality, making the device unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: We analyzed each TG, but it is difficult to find the cause due to lack of log. If the problem occurs again, please upload the log. If the log is uploaded additionally, we will proceed with additional analysis.

rows.Title: White Glare during image capture
rows.Problem: Camera has white glare and pixel tearing
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera displays white glare and pixel tearing during image capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The white glare and pixel tearing severely impair image quality and functionality, making the camera unusable for proper image capture.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wifi is getting disconnected immediately
rows.Problem: Wifi is getting disconnected immediately after connected. Tried all ways possible by resetting, switching on and off but unable to solve
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi connection drops immediately after being established, despite multiple attempts to resolve via resets and device restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The Wi-Fi connection drops immediately after pairing, making the device unable to maintain basic internet access, which is essential for usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The AP does not send beacon frames during connection attempts, indicating a temporary malfunction; recommend user to reboot the AP. If issue persists, collect AP model number for further analysis.

rows.Title: Portrait mode focus very crappy
rows.Problem: Focus issue in portrait mode makes it unusable
rows.Summarized Problem: The focus in portrait mode is poor, making the feature unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The focus issue renders the portrait mode unusable, severely impacting core camera functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed by applying proper dual camera operation log for portrait video operations

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is not functioning on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely non-functional, preventing basic device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: People Recognition feature is incorrectly grouping different individuals under the same profile or misidentifying faces
rows.Problem: The People Recognition feature is incorrectly grouping different individuals under the same profile or misidentifying faces. This leads to inaccurate photo organization and affects the overall usability of the feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: The People Recognition feature in Samsung Gallery incorrectly groups different individuals under the same profile or misidentifies faces, leading to inaccurate photo organization.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inaccurate photo organization but does not prevent core functionality or render the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: If analysis data is corrupted, clearing only the Gallery app data is insufficient; users must clear CMHProvider data in settings to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Charging beep notification
rows.Problem: Beep notification occurs with every 1% charge until nearly 23%, then stops. No PD charging log available due to delayed log extraction.
rows.Summarized Problem: A beep notification triggers with each 1% charge during charging, stopping at around 23%, and no PD charging log is available due to delayed extraction.
rows.Severity Reason: The repeated beep notification during charging disrupts user experience and may indicate a malfunction in charging feedback, potentially leading to user confusion or device misuse.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery Dump confirms the issue but dumpstate log extraction was delayed, resulting in no PD Charging Log; further investigation needed

rows.Title: unable to use phone call while running MS teams
rows.Problem: unable to use phone call to make calls while running MS teams
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot make phone calls while MS Teams is running.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unable to make calls during MS Teams usage, which is a major functional failure preventing core communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sim card is getting disabled and enabled on its own
rows.Problem: Sim card is getting disabled and enabled on its own. attaching video of the same and the log
rows.Summarized Problem: The SIM card is intermittently disabling and re-enabling itself.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to lose connectivity intermittently, leading to potential device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: 5G stopped working
rows.Problem: 5G stopped working after the update. Device remains in 4G mode only despite restarts, network settings changes, and new SIM card tests. Same SIM works on another device.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity has stopped working after the software update, with the device consistently operating in 4G mode only.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot connect to 5G networks, which is a major functionality failure that renders high-speed connectivity unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: Require CP silent logs to investigate root cause and verify network configuration behavior post-update.

rows.Title: Charging getting Fluctuate
rows.Problem: Charging problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging voltage fluctuates during use, leading to inconsistent charging performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The fluctuation in charging voltage can cause device instability and potential data loss or hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: Improve algorithm to correct and request voltage by the difference when not meeting ±100mV condition; Q7/B7/Q7M/S26 preliminary project development completed.

rows.Title: Camera not focus in 30x after update
rows.Problem: Camera not focus in 30x after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to focus in 30x mode after the software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is completely broken in a key mode (30x), rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens appears caught; users must visit a service center for diagnosis. Correct logs must be provided upon recurrence.

rows.Title: IMS & W3school crashing in device
rows.Problem: Multiple apps crashing without reason; speaker stops working after closing apps; issue resolves when app is reopened
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple apps crash and speaker stops working after app closure, issue resolves upon reopening.
rows.Severity Reason: Multiple apps crashing and sudden loss of speaker functionality indicate a major instability in device performance, making the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs needed at time when issue is happening, please share updated logs

rows.Title: Camera Image Quality Capture Image getting More warm & not optimized
rows.Problem: More warm photo click and not good optimization
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images are becoming too warm and lack proper optimization.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality, leading to inconsistent and unoptimized photos, which compromises user experience and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Current logs lack sufficient information; require CP silent logs during issue occurrence for proper diagnosis.

rows.Title: Screen tries to rotate automatically and get freezed during game play
rows.Problem: Screen tries to rotate automatically and get freezed for 2-3 seconds while playing game
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen automatically rotates and freezes for 2-3 seconds during game play.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freezing during gameplay makes the device unusable in that context, leading to a disruptive user experience and potential loss of game progress.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application; root cause cannot be identified without source code or logs from the app. Requires third-party app owner intervention.

rows.Title: Network Not Latch In device
rows.Problem: Please fi d the attached screen recording.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to establish network connection or registration.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot register to network, which prevents basic functionality and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Physical device not detected in the device. It is specific HW /device issue. HW gone bad

rows.Title: Photo editor is not responding
rows.Problem: When try to edit photo ex: smoothing image I see photo editor nor responding error
rows.Summarized Problem: The photo editor application is unresponsive when attempting to edit photos, such as applying smoothing effects.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely unresponsive during core editing functions, preventing users from performing basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a deadlock in a previous session within the SNAP framework; updating the GPU cache via FLUMEN CL:3078544 should resolve it.

rows.Title: Voice wake-up not working
rows.Problem: Voice wakeup keeps stopping. This problem observed last 2 to 3 days
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's voice wake-up feature repeatedly stops working after being used for two to three days.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature intermittently fails, preventing consistent use of voice commands but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a bug in Bixby Wakeup startup, which has been resolved in the latest version; users are advised to update BixbyWakeup.

rows.Title: SIM cards not being detected after update
rows.Problem: After updating the software on my S23 Ultra, one of the two SIM cards is not being detected. Only one SIM is showing. The same SIM works in other devices, and switching SIM slots does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: One of the two SIM cards is not being detected after a software update, despite the SIM working in other devices and the issue persisting across SIM slots.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to detect a valid SIM card, which prevents basic network connectivity and undermines core functionality of the device.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be software-related, as the same SIM works in other devices. Logs and hardware checks are needed to determine if it's a software bug or hardware issue.

rows.Title: Call timer not showing
rows.Problem: When answering a call, the timer does not start 6 out of 10 times, showing only 'Incoming Call' with a hang up button. After a delay, the timer starts but the other party cannot hear the caller, requiring multiple retry attempts.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call timer fails to start upon answering calls and occasionally starts late with audio issues, leading to repeated call attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The timer failure prevents proper call initiation and audio connection, causing significant usability issues and repeated call failures.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by retransmission of the ACK packet, delaying timer start; countermeasure is to provide CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Camera video recording unstable
rows.Problem: Videos taken are completely unstable sometimes, regardless of settings like FHD or HDR.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings are unstable and inconsistent under various settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The videos are completely unstable, making content unreliable and potentially unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Customer needs to provide proper logs when the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Quick panel icons disappearing after restart
rows.Problem: Notification center is disappearing after restart, sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: Quick panel icons disappear after device restart, intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction of the notification center, affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: reboot problem in my phone
rows.Problem: recently again I have received reboot problem in my phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing repeated reboots.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly, making it unusable and potentially leading to data loss or instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: App shortcuts not working with back tap gestures
rows.Problem: App shortcuts are not working with back tap gestures; they require the app to be opened first, even though apps open normally via backtap. Functionality works when other apps are in full screen or as popups.
rows.Summarized Problem: App shortcuts fail to activate with back tap gestures and require the app to be opened first, despite normal backtap functionality for other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific feature (app shortcuts) but does not prevent overall device usability or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Charging Notification flicker
rows.Problem: Inconsistent and constantly changing brightness when the phone is charging and screen is off
rows.Summarized Problem: The charging notification flickers and causes inconsistent brightness when the phone is charging and the screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent brightness but does not result in device freeze or data loss, and is intermittent rather than constant.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera Focus not working in 1X zoom
rows.Problem: Camera not working properly sometimes results in blur in 1x zoom, works fine at 0.6x or more than 3x
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera focus fails in 1x zoom, resulting in blurred images, while functioning normally at other zoom levels.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to achieve proper focus in a key zoom setting, leading to inconsistent image quality and usability during normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Lens of the Wide Camera Lens was stuck at a close distance point; recommend camera module exchange and customer guidance to visit service center.

rows.Title: SBI app not downloading
rows.Problem: Not able to download an application, even though the country of device and application is same, India Frequency is always
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot download the SBI app from the Google Play Store despite matching device and app country settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents app installation but does not cause device crash or data loss, and may be intermittent or context-dependent.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: camera getting crash
rows.Problem: After the latest security update my phone is not running properly every app and whole ui is crashing , full of lags and jitters and unexpected restarts all the time. Please help i cannot use my phone like this pls send a update to resolve.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is crashing after a security update, causing overall system instability and frequent crashes, lags, and restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes full system crashes and unexpected restarts, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: ANR has already occurred on the system server before QuickStar call stack, which seems to be a chain reaction. The direct cause is difficult to determine from logs.

rows.Title: Option to click picture doesn't come during video recording
rows.Problem: Option to click picture doesn't come most of the time when video recording
rows.Summarized Problem: The option to take a picture during video recording is missing most of the time.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable during video recording, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: If HDR10+ is enabled, picture capture is not supported; users must disable HDR10+ to take snapshots.

rows.Title: WhatsApp not opening
rows.Problem: WhatsApp cannot open and automatically exits after restart
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp app fails to open and exits immediately after launch on device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon launch, preventing user from accessing a core communication tool, making the device functionally unusable for messaging.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem from app side; app developer needs to fix it. Samsung cannot modify the app code.

rows.Title: Lock Screen Not able to set lockscreen text color to white
rows.Problem: Not able to set lockscreen text color to white, setting to white makes it set to black
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set the lock screen text color to white, and when attempting to do so, it defaults to black instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the lock screen functionality, as users cannot achieve the intended color setting, but the screen remains usable and does not crash or freeze.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Software bug in lock screen text color setting; Countermeasure: Reset display settings and verify software version.

rows.Title: Camera video start jitter while zoom
rows.Problem: Video recording flickers and freezes when zoom is applied, with black frames appearing for about 15 seconds in the middle of the video. The issue occurs during recording and may affect both the preview and recorded video.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording freezes and shows black frames when zoom is applied during recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The video freezes and shows black frames for 15 seconds, indicating a major malfunction in video recording functionality that disrupts the user experience during active use.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue timing log missing; need to verify if preview screen was black and collect logs during reproduction with front camera usage.

rows.Title: Quick Panel
rows.Problem: The internet symbol is still on even after data is turned off, even when the internet is not connected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The internet symbol remains on in the quick panel after data is turned off, even when no internet connection exists.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the quick panel, where the status indicator does not update correctly after data is disabled.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Phone dialer get hanged & Crashed
rows.Problem: Phone dialer get hanged when using. Unused space over 220 gb, RAM in good condition still facing issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone dialer application hangs and crashes during use, despite having sufficient RAM and available storage space.
rows.Severity Reason: The dialer crashes and hangs, making it unusable during operation, which directly impacts core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The current contact list and synchronization process consume significant resources, leading to performance issues; users need to reattach error logs via Contact App > Settings > Contact us > Send Error.

rows.Title: My camera gets flickering while using it mainly while using 5x lens in video mode
rows.Problem: My camera gets flickering while using it mainly while using 5x lens in video mode. Is it due to software or any issue with the phone..from the day 1 onwards I was facing this issue. Please respond as soon as possible and treat your customers in good manner
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera flickers when using the 5x lens in video mode, especially in low light.
rows.Severity Reason: The flickering occurs during active use of a key feature (5x zoom) and affects core functionality, making video recording unstable and unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: In low-light environments, when the zoom ratio is changed, the sensor switches to Tele sensor due to the difference in sensitivity, causing the brightness to change.

rows.Title: Galaxy Watch4 not reading wrist, no heart rate, no sleep detection
rows.Problem: Galaxy Watch4 after One Ul 6 update is not reading wrist, no heart rate, no sleep detection, no BIA sensor working. No improvement after reset or other actions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch4 fails to detect wrist, heart rate, and sleep after the One Ul 6 update, with no BIA sensor functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to provide essential health metrics, rendering core health monitoring functions unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Charging notification during each percentage increase
rows.Problem: During charging from 0% to 25%, the device shows a notification for each percentage increase indicating remaining battery charge and needing to charge, which is not normal and appears to be an error.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays unnecessary battery charge notifications during charging from 0% to 25%, indicating a malfunction in the charging progress feedback system.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification appears during a normal charging phase, causing user confusion and interrupting the charging experience, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Secure folder not found
rows.Problem: Secure folder is not found in my device
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder feature is missing on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder feature is entirely unavailable on the device, which is a core security function and renders a key feature inaccessible.
rows.R&D Comment: Galaxy A21 does not support Knox solution including secure folder due to hardware policy; performance improvement efforts underway.

rows.Title: Unable to play 4K video properly in device
rows.Problem: Defective UFS can cause slow read/write speeds leading to stuttering, lag, or delays during 4K video playback. Corrupted files may also occur due to defective UFS module.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to play 4K videos smoothly due to defective UFS storage causing lag and stuttering.
rows.Severity Reason: 4K video playback is a core functionality; stuttering and lag make video viewing unusable, especially on high-resolution content.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue arises due to defective UFS causing slow storage performance; countermeasure involves verifying playback with 4K@30fps content and checking app-side resolution options.

rows.Title: WiFi Not Working
rows.Problem: WiFi names are not coming and WiFi disconnects when moving away from router; connects when near router
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connectivity drops when moving away from the router and fails to show available networks at distance.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot maintain stable WiFi connection beyond a short range, leading to intermittent loss of connectivity and inability to access the internet.
rows.R&D Comment: WiFi networks are being filtered due to low signal strength; users should stay within the router's effective range to reconnect.

rows.Title: Animation Lag observe in device
rows.Problem: Animation is not good, Lagging observe while closing / Open apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Device exhibits lagging during app opening and closing, with poor animation performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Lagging during app transitions affects usability and responsiveness, making the device feel sluggish and unresponsive.
rows.R&D Comment: System performance issue with animation lag; platform-level limitation observed, requiring deeper investigation into SurfaceFlinger and system server resource allocation.

rows.Title: Prime Video app not working
rows.Problem: Unable to open Prime Video app; app crashes frequently during opening. Device freezes during launch. Restarted phone and tried troubleshooting, but issue persists. Downgraded and updated app versions without success.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Prime Video app crashes and fails to launch, causing device freezes during startup.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to launch and causes device freezes, making the device unusable for video content access.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application; root cause cannot be identified due to lack of source code and no commercial agreement between Samsung and the app owner. Requires escalation to the app developer.

rows.Title: Charging information display wrong while connect to Charging
rows.Problem: When my tablet Galaxy Tab A7 lite is connected to charger, it shows only 1 minute remaining to full charge regardless of current battery level
rows.Summarized Problem: The tablet incorrectly displays a 1-minute remaining charge time when connected to a charger, regardless of actual battery level.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows a completely incorrect charging time, leading to user confusion and potential misuse of charging status, which impacts usability and trust in the system.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by insufficient adapter power triggering a system limitation, and the countermeasure is to use a standard adapter for proper charging.

rows.Title: Phone freezes and restarts automatically
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and restarts automatically while functioning and even restarts while phone is at idle
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone repeatedly freezes and restarts, even when idle, indicating a power management issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts automatically during idle operation, making it unusable and suggesting a critical system-level malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Multiple Watchdog Bark events in logs indicate a potential hardware issue.

rows.Title: Lock screen hangs up sometimes
rows.Problem: Lock screen hangs up sometimes. Notice I am unable to perform any action. Also lockscreen and notification tray is visible same time.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen occasionally hangs, making it impossible to perform any actions and showing both lock screen and notification tray simultaneously.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen hangs, preventing user interaction and causing device unresponsiveness, which renders the device unusable during those instances.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Health is stopping popup
rows.Problem: Samsung Health is stopping
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health app is stopping unexpectedly and failing to show popups.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes or stops functioning, preventing users from receiving health-related notifications.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the Samsung Device Health Manager service not being properly handled by Samsung Health; users should clear app data and restart the device to resolve it.

rows.Title: Camera recording video not saving
rows.Problem: Camera recording video but not saving it shows the attached error
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera records video but fails to save it, showing an error.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to save recorded videos, which is a major functional failure preventing users from preserving content.
rows.R&D Comment: The recording process starts and stops correctly, but the video is not saved; the issue lies in the file writing or saving mechanism.

rows.Title: Phone app getting hanged & response slow
rows.Problem: Phone app getting hanged
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone app is hanging and responding slowly, causing poor user experience during call operations.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is hanging, which prevents normal operation and renders the telephony function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Charging estimated time not display on Lock screen
rows.Problem: only charging percentage visible, no estimated time displayed
rows.Summarized Problem: The estimated charging time is not displayed on the lock screen during charging, only the charging percentage is shown.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot predict charging duration, leading to confusion about battery status and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The absence of estimated time display in high temperature conditions is by design to prevent user confusion about charging status; this behavior is consistent with battery protection logic.

rows.Title: Unable to change my ringtone in device
rows.Problem: I am unable to change my ringtone since a long time. My sound picker is not working.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change their ringtone due to a non-functional sound picker.
rows.Severity Reason: The sound picker is completely non-functional, preventing users from customizing basic device settings, which is essential for usability.
rows.Resolve Type: Issue Fixed(Fixed automatically by Main branch)
rows.R&D Comment: The crash in sound-picker due to negative index error has been fixed with OneUI 6.1 upgrade including CL# 30310096. Please check with next release.

rows.Title: Text to Call on another device stops working
rows.Problem: The 'Text to Call' feature stops working two days after being enabled on another device, and does not ring when a call comes in. This has occurred multiple times and has not been resolved by technical support.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Text to Call feature stops working two days after being enabled and fails to trigger a call notification.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function during calls, leading to a complete failure in call handling on the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing sports info
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing sports from google
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar on the lock screen is not displaying sports information from Google.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning, as it fails to show sports content but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: One UI not responding
rows.Problem: Device not responding when touching apps, experiencing severe lagging, apps crash, device restarts automatically upon re-access, issue occurs in One UI and Samsung Members app
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's One UI is unresponsive and severely lagging, causing apps to crash and the device to restart repeatedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent crashes and restarts, preventing normal app interaction and operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Do not disturb mode getting turned on
rows.Problem: Do not disturb mode getting turned on by Galaxy watch manager even after sync with phone is turned off
rows.Summarized Problem: Do not disturb mode activates on Galaxy Watch even when phone sync is turned off.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature activates under normal settings, indicating a partial malfunction rather than a complete failure or device freeze.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Game is crashing many times while playing
rows.Problem: Game crashes more than four times during gameplay. Crashes occur despite clearing caches. Device gets hot during use. Game performance is not optimized, especially on Samsung devices. Battery backup also lacks improvement.
rows.Summarized Problem: The game crashes frequently during gameplay, causing device overheating and poor performance despite cache clearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes repeatedly during use, making gameplay unusable and causing device overheating, which impacts user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: Crash is due to null pointer dereference in a third-party app; requires third-party application to fix. No source code access or contractual relationship with app owner.

rows.Title: Boxes when made in samsung notes shows inconsistency in thickness
rows.Problem: Boxes when made in samsung notes shows inconsistency in thickness
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience inconsistent thickness when creating boxes in Samsung Notes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in stroke thickness rendering, affecting user experience but not rendering the app unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by pen speed influencing thickness instead of pressure, and the countermeasure is to apply touch point data (pressure, tilt, orientation) across multiple stroke points to enable variable thickness rendering.

rows.Title: Camera Image Quality Pictures have some visible noise while capture in Low light or while zooming
rows.Problem: Pictures have some visible noise, especially in low light or with many objects in the frame, which becomes clear when zooming in. Image processing can be better for reducing this grain or noise from pictures.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images show visible noise, especially in low light or when there are many objects in the frame, becoming more apparent upon zooming.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity in specific conditions but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Gallery folder stuck when opening
rows.Problem: Samsung Gallery app sticks in a folder when opening it, and tapping back closes the app without returning to the home page.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Gallery app freezes in a folder and closes when the back button is tapped, preventing return to the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes or hangs upon back navigation, preventing user from returning to the main interface, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: UI not responding
rows.Problem: UI HOME KEEP STOPING
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen UI is stopping and not responding.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen UI stopping completely prevents user interaction with the device, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Ai feature working Properly in Gallery
rows.Problem: Camera AI features not working, no edits like Best face and Remaster
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera AI features are not functioning, with no edits such as Best Face or Remaster.
rows.Severity Reason: AI features are completely non-functional, preventing users from performing essential editing tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AI features not working properly
rows.Problem: Ai eraser features are not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: AI eraser features in the Gallery app are not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI eraser feature is completely non-functional, preventing core functionality in the Gallery app.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Do Not Disturb for watch6 gets removed automatically
rows.Problem: When a mode is created with an action to turn on Do Not Disturb for watch, the Do Not Disturb action gets removed automatically. Only other actions are present.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Do Not Disturb action for the watch6 is automatically removed when a mode is created, preventing users from setting it.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing from the mode, making it impossible for users to configure Do Not Disturb on the watch, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: No Network problem while playing game
rows.Problem: A network problem occurs suddenly while playing Freefire, affecting both the user and friends with similar devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience sudden network disconnection while playing Freefire, despite having 5G connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The network issue occurs during gameplay, disrupting core functionality and causing device usability problems.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: VoNR functionality was not working
rows.Problem: VoNR functionality was not working and it was switched to VOLTE
rows.Summarized Problem: VoNR functionality is not working and is being switched to VOLTE during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to use modern VoNR calling functionality and defaults to older VOLTE, which may impact call quality and user experience during communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Charging stops at certain battery percentage
rows.Problem: Device automatically stops charging at a certain battery percentage and restarts immediately, happening every time during charging.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device stops charging at a specific battery level and restarts the process immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly stops charging at a specific battery level, causing inconsistent charging behavior and potentially leading to battery health issues or user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Downloading & Installing any apps from Play Store takes longer time
rows.Problem: App download times are significantly longer than normal, affecting all apps including updates. The RAM management is poor, preventing proper operation of multiple apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: App downloads and installations from the Google Play Store are excessively slow, and the device's RAM management is inadequate, preventing smooth operation of multiple apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The app download process is severely degraded, impacting core functionality across all apps, and RAM management issues prevent proper multitasking, making the device unusable for regular use.
rows.R&D Comment: The Play Store fails to retrieve network data due to a NetworkRequestException during RPC call; clearing cache and adjusting network settings may resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Signal suddenly goes to No Service or Emergency Calls Only network drops while using Airtel 5G
rows.Problem: Frequent network drops while using Airtel 5G cause signal to go to No Service or Emergency Calls Only, leading to difficulty placing or receiving calls. High ping and connection instability occur during gaming. Call pickup fails with no audio or timer start.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience sudden loss of signal and network drops while using Airtel 5G, resulting in failed calls and unstable connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of service and failure to establish calls, rendering the device unusable for communication during critical use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera captured dark image in night mode
rows.Problem: Camera clarity degraded after March security update, photos appear blurry in night mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera captures dark images in night mode due to reduced clarity after the March security update
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is partially impaired in night mode, leading to degraded image quality after an update, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Night mode attempts to brighten images but fails in low-light conditions; cleaning the lens improves clarity

rows.Title: Camera blue background appear while recording video in museum
rows.Problem: Blue background video while recording in museum
rows.Summarized Problem: A blue background appears during video recording in the museum environment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and only in specific environments, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not reproducing consistently. We will continue to monitor and resolve it.

rows.Title: Overheating occurs even with light usage like browsing and calls
rows.Problem: Galaxy S21 FE continues to overheat despite minimal background apps, disabled unnecessary features, and avoiding usage while charging. This issue seems widespread among S21 FE SD888 users.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy S21 FE overheats during normal usage such as browsing and calls, even with minimal background apps and no charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which can lead to performance degradation, safety risks, or hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: Unable to analyze the issue due to missing SSRM logs in dumpstate.

rows.Title: Bluetooth No sound is transmitted while connect wireless TWS earbuds
rows.Problem: No sound is transmitted when connecting wireless TWS earbuds via Bluetooth, though connection is successful. Audio works after restarting the phone until the next reconnect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio transmission fails when connecting to wireless TWS earbuds, with sound only working after phone restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of audio playback but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Audio policy manager logs show continuous output start events; invalid resource IDs in Instagram suggest potential app interference. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Quick Panel sound modes toggle and glitch
rows.Problem: When changing the sound modes it automatically toggles between all the 3 modes and glitches. This continues even when locking the phone and restarting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound modes in the Quick Panel automatically toggle between all three modes and glitch, persisting even after locking and restarting the phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes continuous malfunction of a core audio setting and persists across device states, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: My photos get automatically deleted from secure folder
rows.Problem: My photos get automatically deleted from secure folder after I had update software. This incidence was happened before a Month. I had tried to get it back but I don't get it back. All photos which was of captured before 30 August has been only deleted, after 30 August photos are not get deleted
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos are being automatically deleted from the secure folder, specifically those captured before August 30, with no recovery possible.
rows.Severity Reason: Photos are being permanently deleted, which results in data loss and user frustration, especially for users who rely on secure storage of personal images.
rows.R&D Comment: The customer stated that specific capture images from a certain point in time were deleted from the secure folder. Based on log analysis, the most recent software update was on 03/09/24 at 9:08 pm, about 7 months ago. Although the customer mentioned the issue occurred a month ago, there are no logs related to file deletion from the secure folder. Due to the delay in log acquisition, further analysis is difficult.

rows.Title: Samsung cloud application is not opening and it is constantly crashing
rows.Problem: Samsung cloud application is not opening and it is constantly crashing and whenever I open that, it crashes and says try again later but its later never came and because of that my data is not syncing and my Samsung notes app is not working because it's data is not syncing with my tablet notes app data
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Cloud app crashes repeatedly and fails to open, causing data syncing issues and affecting the functionality of the Samsung Notes app.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly and fails to open, leading to data loss and failure of critical app functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The app does not show abnormal termination in logs, but crashes persist; further investigation needed to identify root cause and reproduce issue.

rows.Title: Camera when switching lens zooming 3x and above jitteriness and shakiness
rows.Problem: When switching camera lens, mostly while zooming to 3x and above, there is jitteriness and the whole video or photo becomes shaky and the OIS makes a constant rattling noise until interrupted by shaking the mobile. Even after months of updates and clearing app cache, the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video and photos become shaky and OIS produces a rattling noise when switching camera lenses at zoom levels 3x and above.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant video instability and persistent noise, making content capture unusable during normal use.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module is defective; service center should replace the module.

rows.Title: Charging During charging with Samsung Charger from 0% to 25% it's showing notification during each % increase
rows.Problem: During charging from 0% to 25% of battery it's showing notification during each percentage increase in battery charge that "1 or 2 or 3 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 % etc battery charge remaining and need to charge the phone". This notification appears battery charge increasing upto 25%. During charging when battery charge level goes above 25%, such notification stops which is normal. But I think During charging upto 25% this type of notification is an error. But this type of notification is OK during di
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows repetitive battery charge remaining notifications during charging from 0% to 25%, which is inconsistent with normal behavior and appears to be an error.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification appears during charging up to 25%, causing user confusion, but does not prevent device operation or cause crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery draining too fast
rows.Problem: Battery draining too fast without using phone, even with 4 hours of screen time and requiring 100% charge after March security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains rapidly when not in use, even after 4 hours of screen time, and requires full charge after the March security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs without phone usage and leads to frequent full charging, making the device unusable without constant recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by WhatsApp usage during long calls; countermeasure is to investigate and optimize WhatsApp's background power consumption.

rows.Title: Wifi is not turning on
rows.Problem: Wifi is not turning on my galaxy f23 5g phone Only shows turning on but didn't getting on
rows.Summarized Problem: The WiFi function fails to connect and only shows a 'turning on' indication without establishing a connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a WiFi connection, showing only a turning-on indication, which prevents basic network functionality and renders the device unusable for internet access.
rows.R&D Comment: There is a firmware crash in the WiFi PD service; full RAM dump is required to diagnose and resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Jitter in background wallpaper while opening and closing apps
rows.Problem: Animation flashing and jittery background wallpaper scaling while opening and closing apps rapidly or normally
rows.Summarized Problem: The background wallpaper exhibits jitter and flashing during app opening and closing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent animation instability but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a limitation in animation handling during rapid app transitions; no immediate countermeasure is proposed.

rows.Title: ONE UI not responding
rows.Problem: System UI and One UI Home aren't responding; phone is slow since software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The One UI Home screen and system UI are unresponsive, causing significant slowness and poor usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI and home screen are not responding, making the device unusable and unresponsive to basic interactions.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher APK, please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: System UI Not Responding
rows.Problem: Phone hangs and does not work; severe lag occurs, especially with Samsung provided wallpaper
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is unresponsive and the device hangs frequently, causing severe lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive and unworkable, preventing normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bluetooth audio completely blank after any kind of call
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio completely blank after any kind of call
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio becomes completely blank after any call is received.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of audio during calls, making the device unusable for voice communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs after a call and results in no audio; logs are insufficient, further investigation needed

rows.Title: Note application gets auto restart while using
rows.Problem: Note app auto restarts during use, causing loss of data and efforts, and recording is discarded after screen freeze
rows.Summarized Problem: The note application automatically restarts during use, leading to loss of data and failed recordings.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crash during usage results in loss of data and prevents effective note-taking, making the device unusable for core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung Notes is being killed by LMKD (low memory killer), but no memory logs are available for verification.

rows.Title: Hijri calendar not showing proper date
rows.Problem: Hijri calendar is not showing proper date even after adjustment; shows 25 Ramzan when it should show 24 Ramzan
rows.Summarized Problem: The Hijri calendar is displaying an incorrect date, showing 25 Ramzan instead of the correct 24 Ramzan after user adjustment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in date display after user adjustment, leading to incorrect information but not rendering the app unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery backup is not good
rows.Problem: Battery discharging very fast and only lasts 4 hours on screen. Mobile was hanging. One of the worst phones I have chosen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains quickly and only lasts four hours on screen, with the phone frequently hanging.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing rapid battery drain and frequent hangs, making it unusable for normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram is consuming excessive battery in the background, leading to high battery usage and device hangs; users should restrict background data and disable push notifications.

rows.Title: Unable to switch ON Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
rows.Problem: Unable to switch ON wifi and Bluetooth in my cell
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable Wi-Fi and Bluetooth on their device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to enable fundamental connectivity features, rendering core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The WIFI IC is not recognized during boot; a hardware issue involving the WIFI/BT IC is suspected.

rows.Title: Camera's Slow motion and Panorama mode quality got worse
rows.Problem: After updating to the latest software update, the Camera's Slow motion and Panorama mode quality got worse. Previously, slow motion video mode maintained the same lighting as normal mode, but now it dims lighting by about 95% even with adequate outdoor lighting, making it nearly invisible indoors.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's slow motion and panorama modes now significantly reduce lighting, making videos nearly invisible in indoor settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes severe visibility problems in low-light environments, rendering slow motion videos unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to fps limitation in slow motion mode, brightness is naturally lower than in photo mode; current behavior is maintained as modification is technically difficult.

rows.Title: One UI stopped working
rows.Problem: Error occurs after March security update causing One UI to stop working
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI stops working after the March security update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional after the update, rendering a core user interface unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Voice recorder application doesn't record
rows.Problem: Voice recorder application doesn't record; shows can't record during incoming calls. The issue occurred previously and has returned.
rows.Summarized Problem: The voice recorder app fails to record audio, especially during incoming calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to record during critical call scenarios, making it unusable in real-world situations.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate that the issue scenario is not captured in logs; recommend user reboot and immediate log capture after reproduction.

rows.Title: Now bar not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Live notifications for sports on Google do not work as depicted. After setting to unfollow teams starting with 'a', the teams reappear with 'follow' option when searching, disabling the live notification feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar on the Lock Screen fails to disable live notifications for sports on Google, causing the feature to reappear after user settings are saved.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the live notification feature, where user settings are not properly saved or applied, but the device remains usable and core functions continue to work.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Google Quick Search Box app; updating to the latest version and clearing app data may resolve it. Further investigation needed if issue persists after update.

rows.Title: Battery getting drain after security update
rows.Problem: Battery drain suddenly after security update, percentage dropped from 90% to 85% out of 140 total apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains significantly after a security update, dropping from 90% to 85% in a short period.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is substantial and occurs after a system update, potentially affecting device usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Update process caused minor battery consumption, but no significant load detected; detailed analysis limited by missing batterystats logs; recommend user to collect logs before charging.

rows.Title: Gesture setting
rows.Problem: Palm swipe to capture still not working, this issue is not getting solved. It's been like 2 3 weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: Palm swipe to capture gesture is not working and has persisted for over two weeks.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture function is completely non-functional and has not been resolved after multiple weeks of reported issues, rendering a key user interaction unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The exact root cause is not clear from logs; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera control app not showing on Galaxy Watch 4
rows.Problem: Camera control app is not showing on Galaxy Watch 4 and user cannot control phone camera via watch.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera control app does not appear on Galaxy Watch 4, preventing users from controlling their phone's camera via the watch.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is missing, preventing camera control functionality, but the core device operation remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera controller will work only for flagship models, flip and fold models. For innovation models, camera controller will not show and will not work.

rows.Title: Text alignment is not proper in BT popup screen
rows.Problem: The alignment issue still exists even after software update
rows.Summarized Problem: Text alignment is incorrect in the Bluetooth popup screen, persisting after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual presentation but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: White balance doesn't work properly
rows.Problem: The display looks red colour more. The white color doesn't look white, it looks reddish. I see that the redness doesn't go away in natural mode. And white balance doesn't work.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display shows a reddish tint instead of white, and the white balance function is not working correctly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects color accuracy but does not render the device unusable or cause a crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar not displaying live scores on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not displaying live scores on the lock screen, even when following IPL teams and the tournament, and this issue occurred during the Champions Trophy cricket tournament.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar on the lock screen is not displaying live scores, even when users follow relevant cricket teams and tournaments.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from seeing real-time live scores during live events, rendering a key feature of the lock screen non-functional and impacting user experience during major sports events.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain is quite unusual and drain faster even with very mild usage
rows.Problem: Battery drain is quite unusual and drain faster even with very mild usage
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences unusually fast battery drain even during very mild usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains rapidly under minimal usage, which makes the device unusable without frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain issue is caused by prolonged camera usage on 3-25; screen on discharge rate was below 10% except during that period, indicating a specific usage-triggered anomaly.

rows.Title: Contacts Storage is using battery
rows.Problem: Contacts Storage is using maximum battery percentage even when not in use, automatically consuming battery. Other Galaxy users do not face this issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts Storage is consuming excessive battery even when not in use.
rows.Severity Reason: The app continuously uses battery at high levels, leading to significant power drain and device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Contacts Storage is causing high battery consumption due to frequent background queries; need to optimize background operations.

rows.Title: Now bar doesn't show up on notification panel
rows.Problem: Now bar doesn't work when using music or Google maps
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar fails to display on the notification panel when using music or Google Maps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to appear during core app usage, preventing users from seeing real-time information, which impacts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: charging suddenly stops and then restarts
rows.Problem: Charging suddenly stops and then restarts while the charger is still connected, especially during fast charging. It does not happen when fast charging is off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging intermittently stops and restarts while the charger remains connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The device stops charging mid-session, causing disruption in normal usage and potential user frustration, especially during fast charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by increased VBUS_ADC check delay leading to improper DC operation; improved via B7/Q7/Q7M/M task implementation.

rows.Title: Gaming Hub keeps getting hanged every time while play Farm Triple Match
rows.Problem: A particular game in the Gaming Hub keeps getting hanged every time I try to play it. When I click the play button, the screen just gets stuck. The game is stuck in level 301 and I have restarted the device several times but the issue still occurs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gaming Hub freezes and hangs when playing Farm Triple Match, causing the game to get stuck at level 301.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes during gameplay, preventing user interaction and rendering the game unplayable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Edge Panel handle disappears when sleep mode is turned on and off
rows.Problem: The Edge Panel handle disappears when sleep mode is turned on and off, until manually toggled. The Edge Panel is very useful, and this issue causes inconvenience.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Edge Panel handle disappears when sleep mode is toggled, requiring manual reactivation to restore.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of a useful feature, requiring manual intervention to restore functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Modes and routine app get stuck and get closed while enter in mode History
rows.Problem: Modes and routine app get stuck and get closed whenever i try to see running History of app
rows.Summarized Problem: The Modes and Routine app gets stuck and closed when attempting to view its history.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes or freezes when accessing history, preventing user from viewing app mode records, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera unable to focus properly in Portrait Mode
rows.Problem: In portrait mode, the front camera fails to clearly show faces of most people, showing only one or two faces clearly and the rest blurred.
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera fails to focus properly in portrait mode, resulting in blurred faces for most people.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents clear identification of faces in group photos, making the camera functionally unusable for common use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AOD bright is too dim
rows.Problem: AOD is too dim
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always-On Display is too dim, making it difficult to see.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility but does not render the device unusable or cause a crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Google Play System Update is stuck
rows.Problem: Google play system update is stuck on Oct 2024, seriously Samsung as the phone was released in Feb 2025. We pay a premium for flagship phones, then y not the basic updates on time?
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Play system update is stuck and not progressing, despite the phone being released in February 2025.
rows.Severity Reason: The update is stuck, preventing users from receiving essential software updates, which renders the device functionally outdated and unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The blocked update was previously due to Samsung's policy, but has now been resumed; users are advised to retry the update.

rows.Title: Photos get blurred after picture refinement in notification panel
rows.Problem: Photos become blurred only after picture refinement completes in the notification panel, despite clean lenses and reset camera settings. The blurring is evident in post-processing, especially in text clarity between 50M and 200M images.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos become blurred after picture refinement in the notification panel due to post-processing issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The blurring occurs after refinement, affecting image clarity and usability, making photos appear distorted and unusable for detail-based viewing.
rows.R&D Comment: Blurring occurs in close-range shots due to shallow optical depth in wide camera sensors; users should be guided to maintain distance when photographing.

rows.Title: Battery draining started after update of 6.1
rows.Problem: Battery is draining rapidly in idle mode, worse than expected, like it is drinking water. After update of 6.1, battery drain increased significantly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery is draining rapidly in idle mode after the 6.1 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain in idle mode makes the device unusable as it shuts down unexpectedly.
rows.R&D Comment: Long wakelock caused by com.finazzi.distquake app in background; recommend clearing app cache and monitoring system logs.

rows.Title: Galaxy Buds 2 Pro not working properly
rows.Problem: Not getting audio from YouTube and Spotify etc. Sometimes getting audio but can't increase or decrease volume and it goes to highest volume level
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Buds 2 Pro fails to deliver audio from apps like YouTube and Spotify, and volume control is unresponsive, often defaulting to maximum.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot hear audio from apps and volume control is completely broken, making the device unusable for core audio functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is a side effect of patch 27408544, which was introduced as a workaround for dual app audio support; it now causes audio failure and volume control issues when switching between apps.

rows.Title: judder frame drop during video playback
rows.Problem: judder or frame drop during video playback in netflix or youtube, especially during hdr or high quality video with motion smoothness set to adaptive refresh. judder clearly visible when camera pans behind lady's heads in the video
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback exhibits judder and frame drops, particularly during high-quality or HDR content with adaptive refresh motion smoothness.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible judder during video playback, impairing user experience and potentially affecting content perception, especially in dynamic scenes.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to insufficient frame rate handling during adaptive refresh; provide CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Camera Quality Degradation After Software Updates
rows.Problem: In 1x and 3x Portrait mode, the edges of the subject appear blurry and unnatural.
rows.Summarized Problem: The edges of subjects appear blurry and unnatural in 1x and 3x Portrait mode on the Galaxy S21 FE camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects specific portrait modes but does not completely disable camera functionality or cause device-wide crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears related to portrait mode rendering; further analysis with earlier software versions and test images is needed.

rows.Title: Camera not working intermittently
rows.Problem: Camera not working intermittently
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to work intermittently, causing intermittent malfunction.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails intermittently, which prevents reliable use and may lead to user frustration or device abandonment.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera module is faulty; recommend hardware inspection and servicing at service center.

rows.Title: Home Screen Folder Has Been Disappear after Naming it
rows.Problem: After adding two apps, a folder was created. After naming the folder, it disappeared and left a blank space in the app drawer. The apps are no longer showing in the folder. The apps are TELEGRAM & TESTBOOK.
rows.Summarized Problem: A folder created on the home screen disappears after being named, leaving a blank space and making apps inaccessible in the folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The folder disappearance causes loss of app organization and accessibility, making it impossible to locate apps in the app drawer.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Detect popup occurs in Device
rows.Problem: My phone just keeps showing this popup from time to time
rows.Summarized Problem: A detect popup appears intermittently on the device when no action is taken.
rows.Severity Reason: The popup appears intermittently and disrupts user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue reported to Google via bugnizer ID #411331731; ongoing monitoring for updates.

rows.Title: Secsound Speaker keep Stopping Popup Occurs
rows.Problem: When I apply setting > sound and vibration > ringtone, sometimes shows 'Sec Soundpiker keeps Stopping' and sometimes backs to previous window. I can't change my ringtone trying 20 times. After clearing data of Sec Sound Picker and Sound Picker and restarting, problem remains.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Secsound Speaker app intermittently stops and shows a popup when changing ringtone, preventing user from selecting a new ringtone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from changing their ringtone and causes repeated interruptions during normal device usage, making the sound settings function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a problematic ringtone file set by the Muzio Player app; users should delete the faulty ringtone and disable the app, then reconfigure via settings.

rows.Title: System not responding popup occurs in device
rows.Problem: System UI not responding in Samsung galaxy s21 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is not responding, causing a popup that occurs on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI not responding renders the device unusable, leading to a complete freeze in functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage caused by 16k++ notifications and WhatsApp binder calls; issue reported to WhatsApp, waiting for fix.

rows.Title: Ui home not responding
rows.Problem: Ui home not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen UI is not responding and causes popups on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen is a primary interface, and non-responsive behavior prevents user interaction with the device.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is insufficient; update to latest OS to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Camera video recordings display blurring and loss of focus, especially at 2x zoom
rows.Problem: Samsung video recordings display blurring and loss of focus, especially at 2x zoom. All videos show a general decrease in image sharpness. A sample video is attached for your review. Note the facial clarity at 1x zoom and the degradation after zooming to 2x, with clarity loss occurring approximately one second after reaching 2-than magnification.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings blur and lose focus when zoomed to 2x, with sharpness degradation occurring after one second of reaching 2x magnification.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant degradation in video clarity at 2x zoom, impacting usability and user experience during real-time recording.
rows.R&D Comment: The blurring is due to noise reduction in low brightness during remosaic crop zoom; the same behavior is observed as the countermeasure.

rows.Title: Control panel looking weird
rows.Problem: The notification and control panel on top, which contains bluetooth, wifi, etc. settings, gets into a weird shape and does not return to normal. Camera quality after UI 6.1.1 is also bad.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel displays incorrectly and becomes distorted, and camera quality degrades after UI 6.1.1.
rows.Severity Reason: The control panel malfunction causes a significant UI disruption, making it difficult to access essential settings, and camera quality degradation affects core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly

rows.Title: Netflix widevine becoming downgraded to L3
rows.Problem: Widevine is downgraded to L3 level despite updates and attempts to fix it, such as clearing data, reinstalling, and updating Google Play. This issue persists across devices and affects functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: Netflix Widevine decryption is downgraded to level L3, preventing proper content playback despite user efforts and updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of a major media service, leading to inability to access content, which renders the device unusable for core usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Key corruption in device prevents Widevine decryption; key rewriting required at service center.

rows.Title: Instagram
rows.Problem: Phone is getting completely hanged when opening Instagram and going to any accounts profile and then going to reels section and then clicking on reel. Nothing happens. Requires holding side button for long to reboot. This happens repeatedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram reels section causes device to hang completely, requiring forced reboot to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs completely during a core user interaction, leading to unresponsiveness and requiring manual reboot, making it unusable during the process.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: WhatsApp status is overlapping in instagram story
rows.Problem: The WhatsApp status is overlapping in instagram story both are opened on each other and the WhatsApp has also not showing status properly
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp status overlaps with Instagram story when both are opened simultaneously, and WhatsApp fails to display status correctly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of status display across apps, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue likely stems from app-level UI rendering conflict; user should clear WhatsApp cache and test on stable network.

rows.Title: Unable to Open shared gallery Image in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Unable to Open shared gallery Image in WhatsApp App
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open shared gallery images in WhatsApp, with intermittent BIN file sharing reported.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in image sharing functionality, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is reported as a third-party app problem; WhatsApp is being advised to close the issue.

rows.Title: Instagram app causes screen freeze and auto restart
rows.Problem: Screen freezes and buttons stop functioning while scrolling through Instagram, occurring twice a day. Device randomly restarts during use.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app causes screen freezes and random restarts during scrolling.
rows.Severity Reason: Device randomly freezes and restarts during app usage, making the device unusable during interaction with the app.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Overheating while using Instagram App
rows.Problem: Instagram app causes phone to overheat significantly within 2 to 4 minutes of use, reaching temperatures above 103 to 107 degrees Fahrenheit, leading to battery drain and making the device unbearable to hold. The issue is isolated to Instagram and does not occur with other apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Instagram app causes significant device overheating and rapid battery drain during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats to extreme temperatures, leading to physical discomfort and rapid battery drain, making the device unusable for extended use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram app has high CPU load as identified in CCU; Counter Measure: Recommend updating Instagram and clearing its cache to reduce load.

rows.Title: Video becomes blur when zooming during shooting
