rows.Problem: Video becomes blur when zooming during shooting. Unable to shoot proper 4K video while zooming to focus on far-reaching objects or subjects. This issue has existed since purchase and is not resolved by updates. Attached video sample shows the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video quality becomes blurry when zooming during recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The blurriness during video zooming prevents proper 4K video capture, severely impacting core camera functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to hardware and sensor limitations; improved in newer models like S24 Ultra and S25 Ultra.

rows.Title: N78 bands not working
rows.Problem: Samsung A145G N78 bands not working; device sometimes connects to 5G on N28 bands (700 MHz) instead of N78 bands (3500 MHz); request to enable N78 bands for 5G connectivity
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect to 5G on N78 bands (3500 MHz) and instead connects to N28 bands (70-800 MHz), preventing proper 5G connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish 5G connectivity on supported bands (N78), which is essential for modern 5G network operation, leading to a major functional failure in network performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gallery not responding
rows.Problem: Gallery is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app is not responding during image remastering.
rows.Severity Reason: The gallery is not responding, making it unusable during image processing.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: After updating to one UI 6.1 all the photos and videos in the device are lost
rows.Problem: After updating to one UI 6.1 all the photos and videos in the device are lost
rows.Summarized Problem: All photos and videos on the device have been lost after updating to One UI 6.1.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is now completely unable to access personal media, which is a core user function and results in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is from WhatsApp side; WhatsApp is a third-party app and lacks source code, so the issue must be handled by WhatsApp. Current status will be maintained and the issue will be closed as a third-party app issue.

rows.Title: Edge panel not shown in landscape mode
rows.Problem: Edge panel disappears in landscape mode. It shows up in portrait mode but not in landscape mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Edge panel does not display in landscape mode, only showing in portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the feature is missing in one orientation, but still functional in another.
rows.R&D Comment: The EdgePanel does not support landscape UI on phone devices due to lack of screen space and prior UX design.

rows.Title: Facebook images corrupted in Samsung Gallery
rows.Problem: Facebook images downloaded to Samsung Gallery are corrupted, though they appear fine in Google Gallery, My Files, Messenger, and other messaging apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Facebook images downloaded to Samsung Gallery are corrupted while appearing fine in other apps and folders.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image display in one gallery app but not others, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: keyboard copy paste option not working

rows.Severity Reason: The function fails to display text properly, preventing user interaction, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: notifications sound getting muted
rows.Problem: notifications sound getting muted even after software update and restart; no volume adjustment logs available

rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from receiving audible notifications, making the device functionally unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The absence of volume adjustment logs during issue occurrence makes it impossible to verify user actions; users must restart and manually adjust volume settings, and re-trigger the issue with timestamped logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Whatsapp opens automatically after unlocking device in morning
rows.Problem: After unlocking the phone in the morning, WhatsApp opens automatically after a few minutes. This happens only when the device is unlocked in the morning.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp opens automatically on the device after a few minutes of unlocking it in the morning.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes WhatsApp to open unexpectedly, but the device remains usable and core functions are not affected.

rows.Title: Phone getting hangs and the screen remains still after the update
rows.Problem: My phone hangs and the screen remains still after the update. Because the display is unresponsive, I am unable to access anything. The phone then restarts. After the upgrade, this has occurred more than five times. Please resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone screen hangs and becomes unresponsive after an update, preventing access to the device and causing repeated restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen is completely unresponsive, making the device unusable and leading to repeated restarts.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Camera lens switching not smooth
rows.Problem: My S25 ultra having camera lens switching issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera lens switching is not smooth during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The lens switching is not smooth, which affects the user's ability to switch between camera modes seamlessly, leading to a poor user experience and potential frustration during use.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera module is defective; service center replacement is required.

rows.Title: Camera quality not good in low light condition
rows.Problem: Camera performance is poor in low light, especially on 3x and 5x telephoto lenses, with high grain and poor picture and video quality. Front camera also performs very poorly. Selfie quality is worse than on 30k phones. Need updates to improve low light performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: Telephoto camera produces poor image quality in low light conditions due to sensor limitations and high graininess.
rows.Severity Reason: Low light telephoto performance is severely degraded, resulting in unusable image quality that undermines core camera functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Telephoto camera performance is inferior in low light due to sensor pixel size and aperture; recommend switching to wide camera or enabling Night Mode in low light.

rows.Title: Screen gets stuck even if i press back button or lock button
rows.Problem: My screen gets stuck even if i press back button or lock button. This crashing is happening very frequently even though its been barely an year since i got this mobile.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen gets stuck and does not respond to back or lock button presses, causing frequent crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen failure prevents normal device operation and leads to frequent crashes, making the device unusable in practical use.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Photos from Facebook cannot be viewed in Samsung Gallery
rows.Problem: Photos downloaded from Facebook cannot be viewed in Samsung Gallery. Colors are missing. The same pics can be viewed in WA gallery or Google Photos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos downloaded from Facebook fail to display in Samsung Gallery with missing colors, though they appear correctly in other gallery apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo viewing functionality in one gallery app but not others, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: phone is making emergency calls automatically
rows.Problem: My phone is making emergency calls automatically, sometimes even without me pressing the power button. Occasionally, it even happens with a single press. I’ve already turned off "Call with Side Key" under Emergency SOS settings, but the issue still continues. It happens randomly and unexpectedly. Blocked numbers are getting temporarily unblocked for 2 hours on their own. I didn- t allow this and there’s no setting enabled for it. I’ve confirmed this in the Phone app > Block numbers settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is making emergency calls automatically without user input and is also temporarily unblocking blocked numbers without user action.
rows.Severity Reason: The automatic emergency calls render the device unusable and pose a serious safety risk, while the unblocking of numbers compromises user privacy and control.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient log time coverage prevents analysis of call initiation and states; require CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Unable to send a default pdf manager/opener for pdf's received in the Parallel app version of WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Unable to send a default pdf manager/opener for pdf's received in the Parallel app version of WhatsApp. This is to Bring to your notice that the issue is not related to The Original version of WhatsApp. I'm able to set a default media file app for .pdf and .pptx on the original version and it's opens automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set a default PDF manager or opener for PDFs received in the parallel (dual) messenger version of WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents seamless handling of PDFs in the parallel version but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially available in the original version.
rows.R&D Comment: The platform does not support setting default apps in dual messenger environments; users must manually select apps, which aligns with Google AOSP intended behavior.

rows.Title: Unable to export notes files into pdf
rows.Problem: Unable to export notes files into pdf it takes very long buffering time and couldn't export at all
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot successfully export Samsung Notes files to PDF due to prolonged buffering and failure to complete the export process.
rows.Severity Reason: The export process hangs indefinitely, showing 0% progress while actual file creation continues, leading to a complete failure and user inability to access or save their notes.
rows.R&D Comment: The export process appears to hang with incorrect progress display; further investigation needed to determine root cause and improve progress tracking.

rows.Title: Over heating while scrolling YouTube and texting WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Phone overheats during mild usage such as scrolling YouTube and texting WhatsApp, even in an air-conditioned room
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage like scrolling YouTube and texting WhatsApp, even in an air-conditioned environment.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during regular usage can lead to device instability, potential damage, or safety risks, making the device unusable under normal conditions.

rows.Title: Multi colour line visible in front camera in dark places
rows.Problem: Multi colour line visible in front camera in dark places but works perfectly in bright light

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects camera performance in specific lighting conditions but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: UI is not responding

rows.Title: Bluetooth device media volume not working
rows.Problem: Bluetooth device media volume is not working only call volume working

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only media volume on Bluetooth devices, not core functionality or device usability, and is partial in nature.

rows.Title: Automatic network goes to "Emergency call only or no Service"
rows.Problem: Network issue: automatic network goes to "Emergency call only or no Service". Unable to use internet or call services over 4G; only works on "Dark" 5G. Problem persists after changing SIM, operator, resetting settings, and location. Occurs after March security update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically switches to emergency call only or no service after March security update, preventing normal 4G connectivity and internet usage, despite working on dark 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents normal network functionality and service access, rendering the device unusable for everyday communication and internet use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to investigate the root cause of the network registration failure post-March security update.

rows.Title: Notification text Overlap while long tap on notification
rows.Problem: When long pressing a notification on the notification panel, the setting menu appears and causes text overlapping, making the notification text hard to read.
rows.Summarized Problem: Text overlapping occurs when long pressing a notification on the notification panel, making the notification text hard to read.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the notification display, affecting readability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.Title: Sec song picker stops
rows.Problem: Sec song picker stops

rows.Title: BSNL VOLTE doesn't working fine in device
rows.Problem: BSNL VOLTE doesn't work fine in this handset, due to problems in modem files. It only works on 5G ready sims but performs poorly. VOLTE connection drops and requires device restart to recover. Basic troubleshooting steps like airplane mode have been tried.
rows.Summarized Problem: BSNL VOLTE fails to work consistently and drops intermittently, requiring device restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent disconnections and instability in voice services, making the device unusable for calls on supported networks.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Control panel is not working properly
rows.Problem: The right side of the control panel brings notifications instead of displaying the control panel, while the left side works correctly.

rows.Severity Reason: The control panel function is partially malfunctioning, affecting only a portion of the interface rather than the entire device operation.

rows.Title: Camera not responding
rows.Problem: Camera not responding. I have attached video and log file.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is not responding and fails to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely unresponsive, preventing basic device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a front camera eeprom i2c error. Please guide the customer to visit the service center for HW inspection if the problem persists after rebooting.

rows.Title: Lock Screen font size style and color change fails
rows.Problem: Difficulty in changing font size, style and color of lock screen clock
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the font size, style, and color of the lock screen clock.

rows.R&D Comment: This issue has been fixed in oneUI 8.0; users need to update to resolve it.

rows.Title: Unable to select 5G/LTE/3G mode
rows.Problem: Unable to select 5G/LTE/3G mode after yesterdays update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select 5G, LTE, or 3G network modes after the recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: The inability to select network modes prevents users from configuring their connection settings, making the device unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: volume on bluetooth has gone really down
rows.Problem: volume on bluetooth has gone really down. max volume on bluetooth on earphones does not even match the half volume of other phones. this is the same case with calls. there is some serious issue with volume levels while connected to bluetooth
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio volume has significantly decreased and is inconsistent across devices, affecting both music playback and call quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a major malfunction in audio functionality, rendering Bluetooth audio unusable and inconsistent across devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User has 'Disable absolute volume' enabled in Developer Options; Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: video quality switch causes screen flickering
rows.Problem: screen starts flickering when switching video quality from 1080p to 2160p
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen flickers when switching video quality from 1080p to 2160p during playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen flickering occurs during video playback and may lead to a poor user experience or device instability when switching high-resolution settings.

rows.Problem: Flickering visible while attaching media on WhatsApp

rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs during a specific action (attaching media) and is not a full device freeze or crash, but a partial malfunction affecting media interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is from WhatsApp side; update app and clear cache to resolve, otherwise consider third-party app defect.

rows.Title: Whatsapp App blinking while scroll
rows.Problem: Whatsapp is blinking during scroll
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp app blinks when scrolling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction during scrolling, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: No sound when connecting buds 2 pro to samsung s23
rows.Problem: No sound comes when connecting buds 2 pro to samsung s23, turning the phone off and on resolves the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio connection fails on Samsung S23, requiring phone restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is intermittent and requires phone restart to resolve, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: System ui not responding
rows.Problem: System ui not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is not responding, causing device instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI is a core component that directly affects device usability; a non-responsive UI renders the device unresponsive and unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Dual Messenger option not showing
rows.Problem: Dual Messenger option is not showing in my phone S25ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The Dual Messenger option is not displaying on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the interface, but the device is still usable and functionality is not fully disrupted.
rows.R&D Comment: Dual Messenger is unavailable when Device Owner is present; this is normal behavior and no action is needed.

rows.Title: Unable to change the Sound Of Alarm
rows.Problem: Sound of my alarm is not ringing. When I try to change alarm ringtone, it shows 'call ongoing' which prevents me from selecting a sound.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change their alarm ringtone because the device incorrectly displays a 'call ongoing' message when selecting a ringtone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from changing alarm sounds entirely, rendering a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by WhatsApp failing to properly terminate a call, leaving the audio mode in a hung state; countermeasure includes restarting WhatsApp or updating the app.

rows.Title: HomeUp app not available on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: HomeUp app features are not available on the lock screen, preventing users from changing task manager style.
rows.Summarized Problem: The HomeUp app is missing from the lock screen, preventing users from customizing their task manager style.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is missing from a key customization interface, but users can still access other features and the issue does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is insufficient; recommend updating to the latest OS version to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Front camera is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera fails to work despite user performing all tasks, indicating a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure point to a hardware issue with the front camera ID, suggesting a hardware defect in the camera module.

rows.Title: System process is not responding
rows.Problem: I was unable to capture screen. All working was stopped for few seconds. System process is not responding means process handler crashed due to some reasons, is it?
rows.Summarized Problem: The system process handler has crashed, causing screen capture to fail and system functions to stop momentarily.
rows.Severity Reason: The system process handler crash causes complete loss of functionality for a short period, rendering the device temporarily unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The payment information of the transportation card was forwarded to the SIM card for processing, but the SIM card did not respond to it, resulting in a recognition failure error. Please remove the SIM card for a while and then plug it back in. If the problem persists, you may need to replace the SIM card. Even if the phone or data function of the SIM card works normally, problems may occur in the NFC function.

rows.Title: Video call overheating
rows.Problem: Phone overheats during video call and switches network from 5G to 4G, occurring continuously from the start
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone overheats during video calls and consistently switches network from 5G to 4
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during video calls and switches network, causing potential performance degradation and loss of connectivity, making the device unusable in critical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during video calls is linked to OS version V OS Ver 15; mitigation requires OS update or thermal management improvements

rows.Title: Work profile apps in folders appear active after work profile is turned off
rows.Problem: Work profile apps in folders appear active after work profile is turned off
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps in folders still appear active after the work profile is turned off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes apps to remain visible and active in folders after the work profile is disabled, leading to confusion and potential misuse of the device's security settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Modified the condition to always enter the parent home when dragging exit is not supported by AppGroup.

rows.Title: camera take 6 to 8 seconds for opening
rows.Problem: camera take 6 to 8 seconds for opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera takes 6 to 8 seconds to open, causing significant lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera lag severely impacts usability, making it difficult to use the feature in real-time.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass is unavailable passkey104 error
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass is unavailable passkey104 error
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass is unavailable due to a passkey104 error.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from accessing Samsung Pass, a core authentication feature, rendering the device unusable for secure login.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs when PPP information is overwritten with 0 during KnoxMatrix EscrowVault registration; further investigation needed for logs.

rows.Title: Keep Screen On while viewing feature not working
rows.Problem: The screen turns off when viewing content, despite the phone being able to detect face for unlocking. The option to keep screen on during viewing is not functioning.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen turns off when viewing content, preventing continuous viewing without user intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen turning off during content viewing makes the device unusable for reading or browsing, disrupting core user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: This function uses face detection via front camera; mis-detection due to environmental factors like lighting or angle may occur. Accurate analysis requires stored visual data, which is not available during operation.

rows.Title: Portrait Video Autofocus is not working properly
rows.Problem: Portrait Video Autofocus on Galaxy S24 Ultra Is Unusable
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait video autofocus is not working properly on the Galaxy S24 Ultra, making it unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The autofocus function is completely unusable, preventing effective use of portrait video functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed by applying proper dual camera operation log for portrait video operations

rows.Title: unable to play call recordings from the samsung phone app
rows.Problem: I am unable to play call recordings from the samsung phone app. It's saved perfectly and I can listen to it from the file manager app but not from the samsung phone and when I click on play, it says buffering.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot play call recordings from the Samsung Phone app, though recordings are saved and accessible via file manager.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in a key feature, where playback works in one app but not another, leading to inconsistent user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Intelligence feature not working

rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to respond after showing a loading state, preventing users from using photo-related intelligence functions, rendering them unusable.

rows.Title: Calls are auto-recording even when select option 'not record calls from that specific number'
rows.Problem: Calls are auto-recording even when set to not record calls from that specific number or contact
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung dialer app continues to auto-record calls even when the user has selected 'not record calls' for a specific number.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature setting is not functioning as intended, causing calls to be recorded despite user preference, which renders the intended privacy control ineffective.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate the root cause of the recording behavior.

rows.Title: Images are appearing glitched only in Gallery
rows.Problem: Images downloaded from Facebook appear glitched only in the Gallery app. The same images open fine in other apps. Clearing cache, data, and thumbnails, and restarting the phone have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Images downloaded from Facebook appear glitched when viewed in the Gallery app, despite displaying correctly in other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image display in one app but not others, indicating a partial malfunction rather than a full device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Glitch Observer while Use contact app and Instagram
rows.Problem: Phone keeps refreshing every 15 seconds when using contact app and Instagram

rows.R&D Comment: App refresh issue due to Instagram and contact app interaction; troubleshooting steps include updating apps and restarting device.

rows.Title: WhatsApp flickers every 10 seconds
rows.Problem: WhatsApp flickers every 10 seconds; the home screen's customized display shows an error for
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp app flickers every 10 seconds during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The app flickering every 10 seconds disrupts user experience and may indicate a core malfunction or crash in the app's interface rendering.

rows.Title: Youtube PIP window getting stuck
rows.Problem: Application not responding properly

rows.Severity Reason: The application is not responding, leading to a functional failure in a key UI element that affects user interaction.

rows.Title: animation broken when going from Settings to Google Play System Update in pop-up view

rows.Severity Reason: The animation is missing or malfunctioning during a standard navigation flow, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera Auto close while zoom to 5X
rows.Problem: Camera app suddenly closes and doesn't respond when switching to 5x zoom
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app crashes when zooming to 5x.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during a core function (5x zoom), making the camera unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Camera HAL did not detect wide camera, likely hardware issue. Countermeasure: Replace module or motherboard.

rows.Title: camera battery drain and overheating
rows.Problem: when opening the phone camera, it drains the battery more quickly and overheats
rows.Summarized Problem: Opening the camera causes rapid battery drain and overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction during camera use, leading to increased power consumption and temperature rise, but does not result in device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is caused by high CPU usage from a heat-intensive game during camera use; the temperature remains within device specs. Countermeasure: Monitor game-based CPU load during camera usage.

rows.Title: Unable to setup Mobile plan on Watch
rows.Problem: Unable to select after the screen showing airtel logo. No selection available for next process
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select a mobile plan after the airtel logo appears during setup on the Galaxy Watch.
rows.Severity Reason: The user is unable to proceed with a fundamental setup step, making the device unusable for basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party operator (airtel) web content defect; countermeasure is to acknowledge it as a third-party defect, not a plugin issue.

rows.Title: Unable to install e sim on watch
rows.Problem: Unable to install e sim on watch
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install eSIM on the Galaxy Watch.
rows.Severity Reason: The eSIM installation feature fails completely, preventing users from setting up network connectivity on the device, rendering the device unusable for core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The ODA activation flow fails due to CompanionAppEligibility check returning 0 from the server; the Airtel server operator should investigate why eligibility is reduced to 0 for the related API.

rows.Title: no sound assistant in good lock app
rows.Problem: there is no sound assistant in good lock app
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound assistant feature is not working in the Good Lock app.
rows.Severity Reason: The sound assistant is missing in the lock screen app, preventing users from hearing voice feedback, but the app otherwise functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: phone is working only in 2G mode
rows.Problem: After the latest upgrade on 29 March 2025, the phone lost 4G and 5G services and now works only in 2G mode. All settings appear correct. The phone previously worked reliably on 5G in India for four to five months. The user confirms the phone supports 4G/5G bands of their operator, and a similar phone works fine. This indicates a software or SIM-related issue post-upgrade.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone now only operates in 2G mode after a software upgrade, despite previously functioning reliably on 5G and supporting the required frequency bands.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is no longer able to connect to 4G/5G networks, rendering it unusable for modern mobile connectivity, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: SIM card profile or reading issue; Countermeasure: Recommend user to replace SIM card or re-insert it.

rows.Title: Heating issue after update
rows.Problem: Customer faces heating issue after recent software updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats after software updates due to high CPU and network usage from specific apps in multi-window mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs under normal usage conditions due to app-specific high consumption, but device remains functional and temperature is within specs.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating is caused by high CPU and network usage from apps like WhatsApp and Amazon MP3 in multi-window mode; countermeasure aligns with cause, indicating no software-level fix needed.

rows.Title: Sudden stopped fast charging
rows.Problem: Galaxy S24 Ultra suddenly stopped fast charging. No water damage, no fall. Same charger works on another S24 Ultra. Tried all basic troubleshooting: fast charging enabled, cables and adapters checked, port cleaned, Safe Mode tested, Wipe Cache done. Issue remains.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy S24 Ultra has suddenly stopped fast charging despite no physical damage or external factors, and troubleshooting steps have been exhausted.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to perform fast charging, a core functionality, which renders the device unusable for normal use and causes significant user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a detected SBU-VBUS SHORT, possibly due to non-genuine accessories, cable or connector aging, or foreign substances. Recommendation: Remove non-genuine accessories, clean and replace the cable, and if the issue persists, visit a service center for connector inspection.

rows.Title: Microphone stopped working
rows.Problem: After installing the latest update, the microphone stopped working. It works during calls but not during recording, voice messages, or in games. Unable to send voice notes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The microphone stops working during non-call activities such as recording, voice messages, and in games, though it functions during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The microphone fails to work in multiple essential use cases, including voice messages and in-app interactions, making it unusable outside of calls.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to software interference or user obstruction during calls; hardware inspection is required if the problem persists.

rows.Title: Slow charging after February security update
rows.Problem: After the February security update, slow charging starts most of the time when connecting to the charger, though sometimes fast charging occurs. Using original 25W Samsung adapter and cable, latest software installed.
rows.Summarized Problem: After the February security update, the device frequently exhibits slow charging instead of fast charging, with occasional instances of normal fast charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent malfunction of charging performance, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: unable to fix satellites and get a GPS location
rows.Problem: watch unable to fix satellites and get a GPS location for Samsung Health workouts. It all started after One UI 6 watch update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Watch is unable to fix GPS satellites and obtain location data during Samsung Health workouts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper GPS functionality during workouts but does not cause a complete device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera Image quality not good
rows.Problem: The front camera has only 2MP and the rear camera is slightly better. The image quality is poor, and despite adjusting all settings, the issue persists. Using 1080P resolution improves clarity compared to 720P.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera on the Samsung Galaxy A16 5G produces poor image quality, especially in low-resolution modes, despite user setting adjustments.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity but does not cause device crash or complete failure; image quality is suboptimal under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is limited by hardware and resolution; recommend user to use 1080P mode for better results, and further investigation needed to confirm if software update can improve processing.

rows.Title: No network is showing in device
rows.Problem: No network is showing. Sim card is inserted, but showing ERROR WHILE SEARCHING FOR NETWORK.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows an error while searching for network despite having a SIM card inserted.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish network connection, which is essential for basic device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware issues in MIPI components (DevInst, BUS, MID, PID, USID, RF_Component) are causing failure in network registration; parts need verification or replacement.

rows.Title: Mobile Data doesn't work Properly
rows.Problem: Data doesn't open the connection symbol. No data access or data symbol. Tried safe mode and both 4G and 5G, issue occurs after some periods. Phone reset and service center visit already done.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data connection fails and no data symbol appears on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a data connection, preventing basic internet access and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: People & Pet category not created in Gallery
rows.Problem: Can't see the people and pets option in my gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: The people and pets category is missing in the gallery, making it impossible to access the feature.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access a key feature in the gallery, rendering the interface incomplete and unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The absence of face/pet analysis information in logs makes it difficult to confirm the root cause; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Digital wellbeing and Samsung tts consuming battery in background
rows.Problem: Digital wellbeing and Samsung TTS are running in the background and consuming 1% battery each per hour, despite not being used. Together, they consume 10% battery over 5 hours. Users want to stop these services from running in the background.
rows.Summarized Problem: Digital wellbeing and Samsung TTS are running in the background and consuming significant battery power without user usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Background services are consuming battery at a rate that leads to substantial battery drain over time, making device usage inefficient and impacting user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung TTS is loaded by applications when using text-to-speech; it can be controlled by apps, not system-wide, suggesting a need for app-level configuration to disable TTS.

rows.Title: bluetooth device does not show up in media output
rows.Problem: bluetooth device does not show up in media output. need to restart bluetooth multiple times for it to appear
rows.Summarized Problem: A connected Bluetooth device fails to appear in media output and requires multiple restarts to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure in media output functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Error in contact searching using dial-pad
rows.Problem: When searching for a contact with name pk tri, typing 7(p) 5(k) 8(t) causes the contact to not show. It works up to 'pk' but fails after typing 't'.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search fails after typing 't' in the dial-pad, despite working up to 'pk'.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a known behavior due to a space in the search term, not a malfunction of the system or device.
rows.R&D Comment: The behavior is normal due to a space in the search term; no action required.

rows.Title: Not able to change the date and time
rows.Problem: Unable to change the date and time after software and binary updates; some options are grayed out or hidden after February update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the date and time after recent software and binary updates, with some settings options appearing grayed out or hidden.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from setting the correct date and time, which is essential for device functionality and system operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: YouTube not showing collab or remix option enabled for shorts
rows.Problem: Samsung Z Fold 6 has a serious issue of not showing collab or remix option enabled for shorts on YouTube. The remix option is disabled on all the shorts.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Shorts on Samsung Z Fold 6 does not display the remix or collaboration options for short videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The remix feature is completely disabled across all shorts, preventing users from creating new content by remixing existing videos, which is a core functionality for video creators.
rows.R&D Comment: Remix feature disabled due to creator restrictions or copyright issues; requires clarification on content policies and user visibility controls.

rows.Title: 5G networks will revert to 4G after the March 2025 update
rows.Problem: 5G networks will revert to 4G after the March 2025 update. The device registers on 5G but receives a mobility command from the network to switch to 4G, causing the connection to drop to 4G. This issue occurs regardless of device or SIM, and is not device-specific.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches from 5G to 4G after the March 2025 update due to a network mobility command, even though it initially registers on 5-5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses 5G connectivity, which is a major network function, leading to degraded performance and user experience during 5G usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the network sending a mobility command from NR to LTE, and there is no device-side problem; the countermeasure is that the network behavior must be corrected.

rows.Title: sensors have stopped reading the data completely
rows.Problem: many sensors have stopped reading the data completely. Before the update, it used to detect all activities like jogging, weighted exercises, calisthenics, cycling, walking, and sleep without any flaws, but since the update, it has not recorded any of these activities except for a few.
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple sensors on the Galaxy Watch 4 have stopped reading data completely, especially during physical activities and sleep tracking.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to record essential activity data, which renders core functionality like fitness tracking and sleep monitoring unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by missing sensor hub kernel logs and improper timing of system dumps during sleep; a countermeasure is to capture system logs immediately after device wakeup when the problem occurs.

rows.Title: Live notifications sports on Google does not work
rows.Problem: Live notifications sports on Google do not work as depicted. After unfollowing teams and saving settings, teams are still displayed with 'follow' condition when searching for teams starting with 'a'.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live notifications for sports on Google are not working correctly after user settings are saved, showing teams with 'follow' status instead of 'unfollow'.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to retain user settings, leading to inconsistent behavior and loss of user control over notifications.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate root cause and validate VoNR failure.

rows.Title: Audio not hearable in device

rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from hearing audio, making device usage unusable.

rows.Title: After restarting device getting hangs
rows.Problem: Device hangs for 10 to 15 seconds after restart, despite being powerful. This issue occurs across all Samsung phones and affects usability.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device hangs for 10 to 15 seconds after restart, affecting usability across all Samsung phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs after restart, which is a major usability issue that prevents normal operation and is consistent across all Samsung phones.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: System UI crashing
rows.Problem: System UI crashing, I have already provided photos and issues, it is not resolving, plz connect me with technical teams of engineer, who can help me if there is hardware issue because same issue is happening in safe mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI is crashing, causing device instability and preventing normal operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI crash leads to device instability and potential unresponsiveness, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sound not working for any app, calls or alarms
rows.Problem: Incoming calls and WhatsApp calls show on screen but sound is muted. Alarms start ringing after device optimization, but WhatsApp calls still do not ring. Reset and restarts have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call sound is muted despite visual indication of incoming calls, and WhatsApp call audio does not ring even after device optimization and resets.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to deliver audio during calls, making communication impossible and rendering the phone unusable for basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model; behavior on V OS needs to be shared if reproduced.

rows.Title: Samsung keyboard Speech to text or dictation Features not working
rows.Problem: Speech to text or dictation software is not working properly and accurately on your phone. Please improve and rectify ASAP. Even Android 8 was better. How long will it take?
rows.Summarized Problem: The speech-to-text dictation feature on the Samsung keyboard is not working properly and accurately.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function at all, making it unusable for basic text input, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate the need for immediate log extraction after reproduction to analyze the issue.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi and Hotspot functionalities have stopped working
rows.Problem: After the recent One UI update, the Wi-Fi and Hotspot functions have stopped working. When attempting to enable them, nothing happens or the phone restarts automatically. The user has tried clearing cache, resetting network settings, and safe mode with no success.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi and Hotspot functions have stopped working completely after a recent software update, causing the device to restart when attempting to use them.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic connectivity and causes device instability, rendering the phone unusable for internet access and network functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Failed to load WiFi driver and initialize firmware mode controller due to invalid argument in driver state control; same failure observed in logs indicating a core WiFi HAL initialization failure.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: The fingerprint scanner is not working properly despite following all suggested troubleshooting steps including cleaning the sensor, removing screen protector, re-registering fingerprints, checking software updates, and factory reset.
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor fails to recognize fingerprints despite user attempts to clean and reset the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor is a core biometric function; its failure prevents secure device access and renders the device unusable for authentication.
rows.R&D Comment: When checking the log, the image quality from the fingerprint sensor is not good enough. This can be caused by thick protective film, dry fingers, or slight fingertip touch. Suggested countermeasures include removing thick film, using the center of the fingerprint, applying lotion for dry skin, and checking hardware at customer service if issue persists.

rows.Title: Unable to switch off select automatically button in Network operator
rows.Problem: Issue screenshot attached for reference
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot switch off the 'select automatically' option in the network operator settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially non-functional, preventing users from making a choice in network settings, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Rear camera 1x not working
rows.Problem: The rear camera is not working on 1x-2x, but works fine at 0.6x and 3x and above. The 1x lens is used by multiple apps including WhatsApp, GPay, and DocScanner. The issue occurs every time the rear camera is opened. No solution has worked after attempts. Screenshots are attached showing the issue in both camera app and WhatsApp.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera 1x lens is not functioning and fails to work across multiple apps, despite working at other zoom levels.
rows.Severity Reason: The 1x lens is used by multiple core apps and fails consistently, rendering the camera unusable for common tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to a faulty or improperly connected sensor, as indicated by MIPi error logs; recommended action is to reboot and, if persistent, send the device to SS center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: significant battery draining issue
rows.Problem: I experienced the same significant battery drain today; 6% was lost in just 6 minutes, even with no apps open, no background activity, sleep mode enabled, auto-sync off, and NFC and location services disabled. This appears to be a serious optimization problem that needs to be addressed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device loses 6% battery in just 6 minutes with no apps open or background activity, indicating a serious battery drain issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device drains battery rapidly even with all background functions disabled, making it unusable and posing a critical user experience risk.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by continuous current consumption at low voltage levels, and the recommended countermeasure is device inspection for underlying hardware or software faults.

rows.Title: Software update is failing
rows.Problem: My samsung fit 3 software update is failing
rows.Summarized Problem: The software update on Samsung Fit 3 is failing due to unstable SPP connection and insufficient data transfer timeout.
rows.Severity Reason: The update failure prevents the device from receiving necessary software, rendering it non-functional until resolved.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Dark mode Not applying on Widget
rows.Problem: Dark mode is not applying to the widget. The issue persists after turning dark mode on and off multiple times.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dark mode setting does not apply to the widget, and the issue persists after multiple restarts of the dark mode toggle.
rows.Severity Reason: The dark mode fails to apply to the widget, but the user can still use other features and the issue does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The widget fails to update properly due to a temporary system delay; users are advised to remove and re-add the widget as a workaround.

rows.Title: Talkback not working properly
rows.Problem: TalkBack reads English properly but fails to read Malayalam text when opening detailed content, despite working during notifications. The issue is specific to A56 model and not present on M35.
rows.Summarized Problem: TalkBack fails to read Malayalam text when expanding content, despite working during notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of text reading functionality in specific contexts, affecting accessibility for non-English users.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue likely stems from TTS engine language settings; recommend switching to Malayalam in TTS engine and reporting to Google TTS team with detailed examples of Malayalam text issues.

rows.Title: Galaxy app does not work
rows.Problem: The galaxy app does not work. Please solve this issue as soon as possible. This improve the wifi experience
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy app is not functioning properly, affecting the WiFi experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely non-functional, preventing users from using a key feature that impacts network connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Network server inconsistencies are causing the Galaxy app to fail; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bluetooth not connect
rows.Problem: Bluetooth device not connected with device. Video shows issue in action.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth device fails to connect with the device.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot establish a basic connection, preventing functionality of paired devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Remote device has terminated the connection, possibly due to remote device being uncharged or off. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Device freeze
rows.Problem: No photo or video since phone froze
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes, resulting in loss of photos and videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezing causes complete loss of media data and renders the device unusable during the freeze period.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Light sensor not working
rows.Problem: Light sensor stops working randomly
rows.Summarized Problem: The light sensor intermittently stops working, causing unpredictable behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The sensor fails intermittently, leading to partial malfunction but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be due to timing mismatch in logs; further investigation needed

rows.Title: 5G Sub-Network Not Working
rows.Problem: Device only connects to 4G despite 5G coverage and 5G-enabled SIM card, even after software update and setting checks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect to 5G and only connects to 4G despite being in a 5G coverage area and having a 5G-enabled SIM card.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to use 5G, which is a major network function, leading to reduced connectivity and performance in supported areas.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Always On Display Alignment Issue in Scheduled Mode
rows.Problem: When AOD is set to Scheduled mode, the layout – particularly the clock and icons – appears slightly misaligned or shifted, rather than staying centered on the screen. This misalignment isn't present when AOD is set to "Show Always", which suggests it's specific to the scheduling behavior.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display feature shows misaligned clock and icons when in scheduled mode, rather than staying centered.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual layout during scheduled display but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Good Lock Modules "Home Up" and "QuickStar" Not Available on Samsung A56
rows.Problem: Unable to access or install Good Lock modules Home Up and QuickStar on Samsung Galaxy A56.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access or install the Home Up and QuickStar modules in the Good Lock app on Samsung Galaxy A56.
rows.Severity Reason: The modules are not available, preventing full customization, but the core device functionality remains intact.
rows.R&D Comment: Please check it again, If you do not see the list, please remove app data to get the new list from a store server

rows.Title: Unable to disable and update Call forwarding feature
rows.Problem: Call forwarding is happening to a small number and cannot be disabled or updated. The network disconnects when checking forwarding. System log file is not generated.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot disable or update call forwarding, and the device disconnects from the network during the process, with no system logs generated.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from managing a core communication feature and causes network disconnection, making the device unusable during the operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Font style setting crashed while enter setting
rows.Problem: Font style getting crashed while trying to enter it setting
rows.Summarized Problem: The font style setting crashes when attempting to enter it.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when accessing the font style setting, making the feature completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: When re-entering the Font Style Settings after deleting the currently applied FlipFonts, an IndexOutOfBoundsException occurs due to a -1 font index value. This issue will be resolved with the U OS update; until then, users should switch to another FlipFont before deleting the one they intend to uninstall.

rows.Title: Flash option not available in video mode
rows.Problem: Flash is not available in video mode; front camera lacks flash feature, which is standard design as only rear camera has flash
rows.Summarized Problem: The flash option is not available in video mode for the front camera, which is a standard design limitation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a design limitation, not a malfunction or device failure, and does not impact usability or functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Front camera does not have a flash feature; this is a standard design choice, not a defect.

rows.Title: Device getting overheated
rows.Problem: Device overheating even when notifications and NFC are off, seems defective after recent update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats even when notifications and NFC are disabled, possibly due to a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation or hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly

rows.Title: Bluetooth audio fails to switch from call mode to media mode after WhatsApp calls
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio fails to switch from call mode to media mode after WhatsApp calls, preventing media playback until device restart. Issue persists across multiple TWS earbuds.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio fails to switch from call mode to media mode after WhatsApp calls, preventing music or video playback until device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents normal media playback after calls, rendering the device unusable for audio sessions without restart.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is caused by WhatsApp being in ringtone mode on device; root cause not accessible due to lack of WhatsApp source code and third-party app limitations.

rows.Title: Device getting Overheat while turn ON Hotspot
rows.Problem: Device overheats within 2 minutes of turning on hotspot without heavy use or overload
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats rapidly within two minutes when hotspot is turned on, even with no heavy usage or load.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating causes device to become unusable and may lead to thermal shutdown or hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is caused by high CPU consumption from games like Free Fire and high data usage in weak networks during hotspot use; countermeasure aligns with root cause.

rows.Title: Enhanced Data Protection recovery code lost
rows.Problem: Lost Enhanced Data Protection recovery code and need EDP state reset
rows.Summarized Problem: Users have lost their Enhanced Data Protection recovery code and require a reset of the EDP state.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the data protection feature, where users cannot recover their recovery code but can request a reset after consent.
rows.R&D Comment: For users who have lost their recovery codes, please obtain deletion consent from the customer and perform an EDP state reset.

rows.Title: Alarm sound doesn't ring
rows.Problem: Alarm sound doesn't ring even when all settings are ok; it just beeps and the alarm sound is not heard. Tried clearing cache and force stopping the app, but sound still doesn't come
rows.Summarized Problem: The alarm sound fails to play properly and only emits a beep, despite correct settings and app restart attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm function is completely non-functional, preventing users from receiving actual alarm notifications, which is essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app (WhatsApp) setting the audio mode to ringtone, overriding the alarm sound; countermeasure is the same — the problem stems from third-party app interference.

rows.Title: Device hotspot gets turn off after some time
rows.Problem: Devices connected to phone's hotspot get offline after a few minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: Connected devices lose connection after a few minutes when using the phone's hotspot.
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot remains active and client connections are established, but connections drop intermittently, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue may be client-side; recommend checking laptop-side Wi-Fi configuration and enabling verbose logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Call connectivity gone while network auto switch
rows.Problem: When phone displays 5g network and switches automatically to 4g, call and internet connectivity are lost. The issue occurs during network auto switch mode. Restarting the phone resolves the issue temporarily.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call and internet connectivity are lost when the phone automatically switches from 5G to 4G, and the issue resolves after a phone restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses both call and internet connectivity during a normal network transition, rendering basic functionality unusable until restarted.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Video Call effect setting no on/off option
rows.Problem: Cannot turn off video call effect as there is no on/off option available. User does not like the background effect in video call and wants to disable it.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn off video call effects due to the absence of an on/off option in the settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially functional as users can reset or disable effects via existing methods, but the lack of a clear on/off toggle creates usability issues.
rows.R&D Comment: The video call effect settings are currently accessible via the notification panel; users can reset or disable effects through the 'initialization (reset)' button or by selecting 'no setting' for background. A dedicated on/off toggle should be implemented for improved user control.

rows.Title: photos and video colors not stable and too much brown type color
rows.Problem: I updated the software, but still, the issue is present. Check the photos and video colors not stable and too much brown type color and still lips are too dark
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos and videos show unstable colors with excessive brown tints and dark lips.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects color accuracy in photos and videos but does not completely disable functionality or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The color was slightly pinkish and the face saturation was slightly increased to improve it. You can check that it is improved during V OS upgrade.

rows.Title: mobile heating even listening songs or making a phone call
rows.Problem: mobile heating even listening songs or making a phone call
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when listening to songs or making phone calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal usage (music playback and calls), which could lead to device shutdown or performance issues, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue reported to Google via issue tracker; request for silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Camera failed error message when trying to take photo from the rear camera
rows.Problem: I am seeing the camera failed error message when trying to take photo from the rear camera. The issue started coming yesterday night then in the morning the camera app was working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera displays a 'camera failed' error message when attempting to take a photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents the user from taking photos, which is a core functionality of the camera module, making it unusable in practical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Adding Null checks so that if Linkedlist is null Settings addition is not performed.

rows.Title: Custom notification not working in Modes & Routine
rows.Problem: Custom notification fails to send about 70% of the time when set as a routine. Tried deleting and recreating the routine, clearing app cache, restarting app, granting all permissions, and removing app restrictions. Issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Custom notifications set in routines fail to send reliably, occurring in approximately 70% of cases.
rows.Severity Reason: The failure rate of 70% indicates a major malfunction in a core functionality, preventing users from receiving scheduled notifications as intended.
rows.R&D Comment: Runtime logs are missing, making it infeasible to diagnose the root cause; users need to provide logs and video recordings to reproduce the issue.

rows.Title: Text disappeared while scrolling in Member App
rows.Problem: In the notice section of the Members app, when opening a notice and scrolling, the text disappears. The issue persists even after uninstalling and reinstalling the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Text disappears when scrolling in the notice section of the Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes content to be completely invisible during scrolling, making the app unusable for reading notices.
rows.R&D Comment: The screen is not displaying due to a WebView error. Please update to the latest WebView version and check again. If the issue persists, try resetting the WebView data by following the specified steps in settings.

rows.Title: Unable to access network drive in My file App
rows.Problem: I don't have SMB direct in Windows 11 Home. I have set up storage drives from my lap and another from bell giahub but I can't access either.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access network drives in the My Files app due to incorrect login credentials or unsupported SMBv1 connection.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to access stored drives, which are essential for file access and productivity, leading to device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Incorrect login credentials or use of SMBv1, which is not supported. Countermeasure: Users should use their abbreviated username in My Files app or enable guest account to access drives anonymously.

rows.Title: Server error popup occurs when trying to post on Samsung Members app
rows.Problem: User is unable to create a long post in the Samsung Members app, receiving a 'server error plz try again' popup. The issue has persisted for 20 days despite app update. Screenshot attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter a server error popup when attempting to create long posts in the Samsung Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents post creation but does not render the app unusable or cause data loss; functionality remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: The error was caused by an invalid keyword in post content, which has been removed from the disallowed keyword list.

rows.Title: Portrait mode has very bad edge detection
rows.Problem: Portrait mode has very bad edge detection; it was brilliant before. I have attached before-and-after photos for comparison.
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait mode now has poor edge detection, significantly deteriorating from its previous performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in a key camera feature, affecting performance but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fine blur effect errors occur due to difficulty in feature matching between two cameras during depthmap synthesis.

rows.Title: Super Fast Charging is no longer working
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 6.1 on my Galaxy S21 FE, Super Fast Charging is no longer working. Only normal charging is detected, even with the original Samsung 25W charger and cable (which works fine on other Samsung phones). Additionally, charging only starts when I flip the Type-C cable. Wipe cache and setting checks have been done. Please fix this or push a patch if this is a known issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Super Fast Charging is no longer working after the One UI 6.1 update, with only normal charging detected despite using a genuine 25W charger and cable.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform a major function (fast charging) after an update, rendering the device significantly less usable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to a USB Killer recognition log remaining in the system, possibly triggered by charger malfunction; users should use authentic chargers and visit service centers for terminal connector inspection.

rows.Title: Samsung wallet shortcut to swipe and open is not responding properly
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet shortcut to swipe and open is not responding properly. It sometimes doesn't open at all or sometimes opens after trying multiple times. In the attached screenshot you can see that the bar is not even there in the homescreen even though it is turned on from settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Wallet swipe-to-open shortcut is not responding and is missing from the homescreen despite being enabled in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The shortcut fails to function and is completely missing from the homescreen, making it unusable for users who rely on this feature.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Samsung keyboard toolbar not working
rows.Problem: Samsung keyboard toolbar is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard toolbar is not functioning due to application-side disabling of toolbar items.
rows.Severity Reason: The toolbar is completely disabled at the application level, preventing core keyboard functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Toolbar disabled at application level; application-side fix required to re-enable toolbar items.

rows.Title: Camera image quality is not good
rows.Problem: The camera picture quality is not up to mark and the camera lags significantly during use, especially given it is a 50MP camera. The device does not meet expectations compared to previous models like Samsung M34.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces low-quality images and lags significantly during use, failing to meet expected performance for a 50MP device.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera lags and fails to deliver expected image quality, making it unusable for core photography functions despite being a high-spec device.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware unit problem resolved; camera performance improved in software version YB3.

rows.Title: Recent Key not working
rows.Problem: Recent Key not working, Back and Home Key works. Frequently occurs and resolves with a restart. System log and screen recording attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Recent Key is not functioning properly, while Back and Home Keys work normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction of a navigation function, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery draining faster than usual during normal video watching
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster than usual during normal video watching, consuming 4-5% in 5 minutes and up to 10-15% in 10-20 minutes when using map services like Google Maps or Uber, even with screen off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device battery drains excessively during normal video playback and significantly more when using map apps, even with screen off.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is severe during active usage and persists with screen off, indicating a major power management failure that impacts core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Phone is getting heated up when using
rows.Problem: My phone is getting heated up when using. Extreme heat. When it goes below 20%, extreme heat produced. It doesn't charge at that time even if charger plugged and battery drains to 0% and gets off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats during usage, especially when battery drops below 20%, leading to charging failure and battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating causes device to stop charging and battery drains completely, rendering the device unusable under normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not available or displayed on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar is not displayed on the lock screen after a recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: The Now bar is a core feature on the lock screen, and its absence makes the device unusable for real-time information access.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Super slow motion is not working properly
rows.Problem: Super slow motion is not working after March security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The slow motion feature in the camera is not working after the March security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially non-functional after an update, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: There's no information of Video player in the attached log and I couldn't analyze issue at all. Please share new dumpstate log file which is got right after the problem happens.

rows.Title: widget is not syncing with the current Clock app settings
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock stuck on London despite removing it from the Clock app; London still appears on lock screen world clock even after adding only Tokyo; tried clearing app data, resetting widgets, changing clock style, and using Good Lock/LockStar — no solution found
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen world clock is not syncing with the current Clock app settings and continues to display 'London' even after it has been removed from the Clock app.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen clock remains displaying a non-removed time zone, preventing user customization and potentially causing confusion or misuse of the device's time display.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Call background wallpaper not setting up and showing up after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Call background wallpaper not setting up and showing up after One UI 7 update. Featured background wallpapers are stuck at preview and not showing on calls. Please fix the issue and call background bug is very ugly and the color is very annoying
rows.Summarized Problem: Call background wallpapers fail to display after One UI 7 update, remaining stuck in preview and showing an ugly, annoying solid color.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper call background display, resulting in a visible and annoying UI flaw that impacts user experience during calls, making the device feel unstable or unprofessional.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Show Contact photo background in case of Contact Number not saved photo image. Counter Measure: Fix to show default background in this case. This modification will be included in next MR version. If you want to not see the solid color, please do in below 3 ways: 1. Save the picture you want to display in the contact. 2. Configure the profile card image in the contact. 3. Set to Custom image in the background of the call.

rows.Title: Camera auto focus not working
rows.Problem: S24 ultra camera doesn't auto focus on a person. Autoframing also doesn't auto focus. Even if it auto focuses, it doesn't hold focus constantly and goes out of focus in between.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to maintain consistent auto focus on a person during video recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to auto focus on a person and loses focus mid-recording, making it unusable for video sessions.
rows.R&D Comment: As the lens is not moving, the issue may be a hardware problem; however, without camera operation logs, further investigation is needed.

rows.Title: Drawing assist feature is not working
rows.Problem: After the update to oneUI 7, the "drawing assist" stopped working. It's not generating images.
rows.Summarized Problem: The drawing assist feature is not generating images after the oneUI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature stops working after an update, but it is not a complete failure or crash; it is a partial malfunction due to safety filters.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by safety filters blocking the keyword 'flag' in input sketches, and the countermeasure confirms this is an intended result of the safety filters.

rows.Title: Sluggish lock screen
rows.Problem: There is a slight delay when I lock my phone's screen after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen experience is sluggish with a noticeable delay after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a minor delay in screen locking, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn't reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from the provided logs. If the issue persists, please raise a new issue with logs and video attached.

rows.Title: Delayed or failed incoming call
rows.Problem: Incoming calls are delayed or fail to connect on Samsung Galaxy S23 when using an Airtel SIM card, while working on other devices like iPhone 15 Pro.
rows.Summarized Problem: Incoming calls are delayed or fail to connect on Samsung Galaxy S23 when using an Airtel SIM card.
rows.Severity Reason: Calls failing to connect or being delayed renders the device unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Volte call menu is not displayed for Airtel SIM due to unsupported operator and country configuration; incoming call disconnection is caused by SIM-specific network settings.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass error PASSKEY.401
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass throws error PASSKEY.401 after device formatting and reset
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass displays error PASSKEY.401 after device formatting and reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents device authentication and renders Samsung Pass unusable after reset, blocking access to device features.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to PPP initialization overwritten with zero value during KnoxMatrix EscrowVault registration; further investigation needed for logs to validate root cause.

rows.Title: Task changer view not set properly
rows.Problem: Task changer view shows recent apps in vertical list before switching to stack
rows.Summarized Problem: The task changer view displays recent apps in a vertical list before transitioning to a stack, indicating a view update failure.
