rows.R&D Comment: Damage to the AF drive unit due to impacts or vibrations; recommend hardware inspection at an A/S center.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Unable to change Silent log setting
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the Silent log setting in the Mobile Networks setting.
rows.Severity Reason: The setting modification is partially blocked, preventing users from adjusting a key configuration, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: network issue
rows.Problem: shared speedtest result shows 8 mbps on this device, but same SIM card in another device gives 250 mbps
rows.Summarized Problem: This device shows significantly lower network speed compared to another device using the same SIM card.
rows.Severity Reason: The speed difference indicates a potential device-specific network malfunction that could affect overall usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to investigate the root cause.

rows.Title: Weak signal strength and no internet connectivity
rows.Problem: Connectivity issues after latest software update on Galaxy S22 Ultra; signal strength is extremely weak and no internet connectivity, despite working on other devices on same Airtel network. Tried restarting, airplane mode, and SIM check — all normal on other devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy S22 Ultra experiences weak signal strength and no internet connectivity after a software update, despite working on other devices on the same network.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish internet connectivity in areas where other devices work, rendering it unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Clock size reduces in AOD
rows.Problem: The AOD clock automatically reduces its size frequently, requiring frequent manual adjustments.
rows.Summarized Problem: The AOD clock size reduces automatically, requiring frequent manual correction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent manual intervention but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sound related issue
rows.Problem: Sound noise occurs when playing a video song recorded on another mobile. The issue started on 19/04/25 and was previously resolved after a software update in September 2024. No logs are available during the time of the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: A noise is heard when playing a video song, with no relevant logs captured during the occurrence.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves audible noise during media playback, which is a major functional failure affecting user experience and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs during media playback with no logs at the time of occurrence; customer needs to restart device and capture logs with timestamp for reproduction and analysis.

rows.Title: Palm swipe capture issue
rows.Problem: Unable to take screenshot after performing palm swipe gesture
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot take screenshots using the palm swipe gesture.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture fails to trigger a screenshot, making a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no kernel touch log for palm swipe events; immediate log and video capture are needed during reproduction.

rows.Title: Live Caption issues
rows.Problem: No subtitles are displayed when the 'Live caption' mode is enabled. The Live Caption feature has not been working since updating to One UI 7. The feature still displays Vietnamese font format despite system language being set to English.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live Caption feature fails to display subtitles and shows incorrect font format after system language change, despite being disabled in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to display subtitles, a core functionality, and displays incorrect font, making content inaccessible and disrupting user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a Google LiveCaption issue; reported to Google with tracking link and auto-update via Google Store.

rows.Title: Slow charging
rows.Problem: After updating OneUI7, facing very slow charging issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience significantly slower charging after updating to OneUI7, especially when device temperature rises during usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to charge at a substantially reduced rate under normal usage, leading to prolonged charging times and potential user frustration, impacting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The slow charging is due to thermal management limiting charging current when device temperature exceeds a threshold during active usage; this behavior is part of the device's built-in thermal safety mechanism.

rows.Title: AI generated image not downloading
rows.Problem: AI generated image does not download when clicking the arrow mark; it shows the photo is saved in gallery but it is not actually saved
rows.Summarized Problem: AI-generated images fail to download and are not properly saved in the gallery despite showing a saved status.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions as images appear to be saved but are not actually saved, leading to user confusion and incomplete functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Good lock home app not working
rows.Problem: Good Lock Home up app not working on Samsung Tab S10 Plus after updating to OneUI 7.0
rows.Summarized Problem: The Good Lock Home Up app is not working on Samsung Tab S10 Plus after the OneUI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is not functioning after an update, but the device remains usable and core functions are not entirely disabled.
rows.R&D Comment: We are preparing the HomeUp for Fold and Tablet of OneUI 7.0; users will be able to download the GoodLock HomeUp soon.

rows.Title: background shows one colour only
rows.Problem: Call background shows solid colour only when receiving a call, although different backgrounds are set in call settings; after call ends, screen tint remains in same colour
rows.Summarized Problem: Call background displays a solid colour instead of the configured or default background during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects call background display but does not prevent call functionality or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background when contact photo is not saved; will be included in next MR version.

rows.Title: Game not open on full screen
rows.Problem: Efootball game apk cannot open in full screen mode after one ui7 installation
rows.Summarized Problem: The Efootball game APK fails to open in full screen mode after UI7 installation.
rows.Severity Reason: The game fails to function properly in full screen mode, which is a partial malfunction affecting usability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn't reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from the provided logs.

rows.Title: Wallpaper and Lockscreen settings
rows.Problem: Wallpaper and lock screen settings are not working; previously working in beta 6, now not showing settings to change wallpaper frames etc
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access or modify wallpaper and lock screen settings in the system UI.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to change wallpaper and lock screen settings, which are fundamental to device personalization and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Background internet usage on Google Chrome
rows.Problem: Background internet usage on Google Chrome stops working intermittently after updating to One UI 7.0, causing image generation tasks to fail when switching away from the page, but works when staying on the page.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Chrome stops processing background tasks intermittently after One UI 7.0 update, leading to failed image generation when switching away from the page.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects partial functionality of Chrome's background operations, causing intermittent failures but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be related to content site handling and coincides with One UI update; further investigation needed with cleared cache and fresh reproduction.

rows.Title: Object eraser not working properly
rows.Problem: The object erasing function in the gallery now has advanced face or image reconstruction after erasing, which may be part of UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The object eraser function in the gallery now triggers advanced image or face reconstruction after erasing, leading to unexpected behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the eraser function with unexpected post-erase behavior, not rendering the app unusable but altering expected user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The user is referring to Galaxy AI's Photo assist feature; users should check for the blue button in the Transform menu to activate the feature.

rows.Title: Lag in quick panel while opening in landscape mode
rows.Problem: There is a slight lag when opening the quick panel in landscape mode. After multiple openings, it opens smoothly. Hope it will be fixed in the next update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel exhibits a slight lag when opened in landscape mode, though performance improves after repeated use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction that occurs under specific conditions but resolves after repeated use.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to change the background of calendar widget
rows.Problem: I am trying to change the background for calendar widget to Light but it is not changing to Light
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the background color of the calendar widget to Light.
rows.Severity Reason: The background color setting fails to update, preventing users from customizing the widget appearance, but the widget remains functional otherwise.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue arises after a FOTA upgrade due to changes in widget settings from U OS to V OS; users can temporarily resolve it by removing and re-adding the widget, and it will be fixed in the next store update.

rows.Title: Samsung music app buffering while playing
rows.Problem: When playing music from Samsung music player app, on the Home navigation screen in the media gadget, it displays as buffering with a circle. Attached video.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung music app shows buffering with a circle during playback on the Home navigation screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent playback failure but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Clock size gets small automatically on lockscreen
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock sometimes gets small even when set to maximum size. The issue appears after expanding the now bar on the lock screen. Screen recording attempts are interrupted when the phone unlocks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen unexpectedly shrinks to a smaller size despite being set to maximum, especially after expanding the now bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core display element but does not cause device failure or data loss; it is intermittent and occurs under specific user actions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sluggishness observed while opening Samsung Wallet app
rows.Problem: When opening the Samsung Wallet app, it starts a loop of opening app - authentication - and app opening page.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Wallet app loops between opening, authentication, and display when launched due to background activity termination.
rows.Severity Reason: The app repeatedly restarts and loops during launch, causing a significant user experience disruption and making the app effectively unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Background activity termination due to battery protection settings. Countermeasure: Users should disable 'Don't keep activities' in Developer Options to prevent app restart loops.

rows.Title: Display colors getting washed out
rows.Problem: The colors of the display get washed out from time to time since the Update One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The display colors are washing out intermittently after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent color distortion but does not render the device unusable or cause a crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lags in opening and server error message
rows.Problem: Members application takes more time to open and shows server error message. Device working slowly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Members application is slow to open and displays a server error message, causing device sluggishness.
rows.Severity Reason: The application fails to load and shows server errors, leading to device slowness and potential unresponsiveness.
rows.R&D Comment: The onServiceDisconnected error occurred due to improper unregisterCallback; fixed by pairing register and unregister calls in next version.

rows.Title: Unable to send MMS
rows.Problem: Cannot send MMS to any contacts while internet and text messages work normally
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot send MMS messages despite having a working internet connection and functional text messaging.
rows.Severity Reason: MMS functionality is partially failing while other messaging features work, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Notification Panel collapses when SMS is deleted from notification panel
rows.Problem: Deleting SMS from the notification panel causes the entire notification panel to collapse
rows.Summarized Problem: Deleting an SMS from the notification panel causes the notification panel to collapse
rows.Severity Reason: The notification panel collapsing completely prevents users from viewing notifications, making the device unusable in that context
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: No animation display on lockscreen
rows.Problem: While locking my phone, it directly blacks out or turns off without any animation. This happens every time I lock the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen lacks animation when locking the device, turning off immediately without any visual transition.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen fails to show animation on lock, resulting in a partial malfunction of the user experience, but does not prevent device usage or cause crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Setting home screen scaling to max
rows.Problem: When setting home screen scaling to max, the bottom left corner app closing animation becomes distorted
rows.Summarized Problem: Distorted animation when setting home screen scaling to maximum.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation distortion occurs during a specific user action but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is because the home scale is too large and the icon has not yet reached its original position. In this case, reduce the home animation duration.

rows.Title: App Transfer to external storage problem
rows.Problem: The app transfer to external storage problem persists despite following the suggested solution.
rows.Summarized Problem: The app transfer feature to external storage continues to malfunction after applying the suggested solution.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue persists despite user following the recommended solution, indicating a fundamental failure in the app transfer functionality that prevents proper operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Navigation Bar Overlap with Progress Bar
rows.Problem: When scrolling down on a short video in YouTube, the progress bar hides behind the navigation buttons, making it inaccessible.
rows.Summarized Problem: The progress bar hides behind the navigation buttons when scrolling on YouTube videos, making it inaccessible.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of video playback interface, but does not prevent full device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AOD clock and battery icon glitching
rows.Problem: While in AOD the clock and battery icon are glitching, changing positions after every tap. Everything on the notification bar is slightly blurred during AOD and becomes clear when unlocking the phone or on home screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock and battery icon glitch and change position during AOD, and the notification bar appears blurred in AOD mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The glitching icons and blurring affect core UI elements during AOD, leading to confusion and potential user error in reading time and battery status.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Clock on AOD not updated
rows.Problem: When I customise the lock screen, the AOD is stuck with the same clock. The clock shown on AOD does not match the one I selected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The AOD clock does not update when the lock screen is customised, showing a mismatched clock.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual consistency of the AOD but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: screen flicker Green screen issue
rows.Problem: S23 Ultra after One UI 7 update am facing screen flicker Green screen issue attached screen shots please resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen on the S23 Ultra is flickering and showing a green screen after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen flicker and green screen issue render the device unusable and may indicate a critical display malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The graphics logs show no layer coloring issues; customer should undergo hardware inspection.

rows.Title: When pressing the side button to lock, the phone freezes screen for a sec and then locks it
rows.Problem: When pressing the side button to lock, the phone freezes screen for a sec and then locks it
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes for a second when the side button is pressed to lock the screen, then proceeds to lock.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the lock screen response, causing a brief freeze but not preventing the device from functioning.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Overall UI responsiveness feels unstable and inconsistent
rows.Problem: Overall UI responsiveness feels unstable and inconsistent. Lock Button Animation Missing: When I press the lock button, there's no transition animation. The screen freezes momentarily and then turns off abruptly after a fraction of a second. This feels unpolished. No Background Blur on Large Folders: In the beta version, opening large folders triggered a pleasant background blur
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface feels unstable and inconsistent, with missing animations and freezing when interacting with the lock button and large folders.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and fails to respond properly during basic interactions, making it unusable for normal operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lock automatically each time you leave app
rows.Problem: There is bug in security system of secure folder. Secure folder bug, "Lock automatically each time you leave app" Not working perfectly. Whenever open the app and then re entering after exit, App not locking automatically.
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder fails to lock automatically when the user exits the app, leading to security lapses.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to lock automatically after exit, creating a security vulnerability that allows unauthorized access.
rows.R&D Comment: Locking of secure folder is not instant; users must wait 2-3 seconds after exiting before reopening, to ensure proper locking.

rows.Title: Gemini App appears on device, unable to uninstall
rows.Problem: After upgrading to OneUI 7, two Gemini apps appear on the device with different package names. Neither can be uninstalled, causing constant irritation.
rows.Summarized Problem: Two Gemini apps appear after OneUI 7 upgrade and cannot be uninstalled.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot remove the apps, leading to persistent clutter and potential confusion on device interface.
rows.R&D Comment: Two Gemini apps with different package names are present; fixed in latest CLs by modifying layout files.

rows.Title: Font color not display proper in Home Up module of Good Lock
rows.Problem: When "Apply folder background color" is turned on, the text label color of the folder's apps turns black, making it unreadable.
rows.Summarized Problem: The text label color of folder apps turns black when folder background color is applied, making it unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects readability but does not cause device crash or complete malfunction, only a partial UI failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: network issue
rows.Problem: My phone is facing network issue. I'm unable to call someone and no one is able to call me. When I removed the SIM and used it in another phone, it worked properly. I think this is a network issue only on my S25 phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device cannot make or receive calls due to missing 3G network coverage and incorrect network mode settings, despite working on another device with the same SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish voice calls entirely, rendering basic communication functionality unusable, which is a critical user need.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: 2G mode is missing in network settings; operator lacks 3G coverage and does not support VOLTE. Countermeasure: Enable 2G in Settings > Connection > Mobile Networks and disable Auto Blocker if present.

rows.Title: Lock Screen Setting
rows.Problem: Unable to see customize option on lock screen. Lockstar icon appears on notification bar after few minutes of restart. Rotation to landscape mode is disabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot customize lock screen settings, see lockstar icon unexpectedly on notification bar, and cannot rotate to landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Multiple critical functions on lock screen are not working, affecting core usability and device interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Notification Panel color not getting changed properly
rows.Problem: Notification panel color turns green when applying normal theme or changing in good lock app. User wants blur notification panel. This is the 9th report with no resolution.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel color does not change properly and turns green when applying a normal theme or using a good lock app, with user requesting a blur effect.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the appearance of the notification panel but does not cause device malfunction or data loss; it is a partial malfunction of visual styling.
rows.R&D Comment: Bug in the transparent part of the quick panel in the theme park has been fixed in version 1.1.01.06; users should test with the latest theme park version.

rows.Title: Not able to open phone app and call history
rows.Problem: Unable to open phone app and no call history displayed after updating to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open the phone app and view call history after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone app and call history are completely inaccessible, preventing basic device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by data corruption in app storage; countermeasure involves clearing app data and resyncing contacts, which risks losing user contacts.

rows.Title: Camera quality issue
rows.Problem: The camera image quality has dropped significantly, with photos appearing blurry and lacking sharpness, especially in high-megapixel modes. Previously good image clarity is now absent, making photos feel unpremium despite good log video quality.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo image quality has deteriorated significantly, with reduced sharpness and clarity in high-megapixel modes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity in key modes but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is not fully consistent across all conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality degradation is due to hand blur in video snap mode and HDR not being applied due to high device heat; countermeasure aligns with observed conditions.

rows.Title: Empty space issue in app drawer
rows.Problem: There is an empty space on the left side of the app drawer when opening it after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: An empty space appears on the left side of the app drawer when opened after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the layout of the app drawer but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and only occurs in specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar alignment not properly in AOD screen
rows.Problem: When the charger is connected, the charging information on the Now Bar in Always On Display is aligned to the left or right instead of center.
rows.Summarized Problem: The charging information on the Now Bar in Always On Display is misaligned when the charger is connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent display alignment but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wonderland app doesn't function as intended
rows.Problem: Wonderland app doesn't function as intended after the one ui 7 update on s23. I have attached a screen recording of the wonderland app which shows the preview of the animated wallpaper and a recording of it not functioning as intended
rows.Summarized Problem: The Wonderland app fails to function properly after the One UI 7 update on the S23, likely due to a malfunction in the Lock Screen Alpha feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The app does not function as intended, preventing users from using the animated wallpaper feature, which is a core functionality of the Lock Screen.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a malfunction in the Lock Screen Alpha feature on V OS and will be resolved in the upcoming B OS update.

rows.Title: Always On Display wallpaper not displayed
rows.Problem: Device does not display the Always On Display wallpaper after One UI 6.1 and One UI 7 updates
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to show the Always On Display wallpaper after software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core display feature but does not cause device failure or data loss, and persists after updates.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: One UI7 isn't properly optimized for full screen gestures
rows.Problem: One UI7 isn't properly optimized for full screen gestures. The issue is immediately solved when switching to button navigation and returns when moving to gesture navigation. Despite enabling the show camera cutout on games, gesture navigation doesn't work properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Gesture navigation in One UI7 is not working properly and only functions when using button navigation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality under specific navigation modes but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be resolved by switching to button navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home. Will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Issues in alignment of AOD
rows.Problem: The now bar on Always on display sometimes shifts left or right and occasionally goes completely white when opened from the top
rows.Summarized Problem: The now bar on the Always On Display intermittently shifts left or right and occasionally turns completely white when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent visual misalignment and display failure, but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The UI element shift is intentional to prevent burn-in; no countermeasure provided, further investigation needed

rows.Title: error when accessing tips and guides in settings
rows.Problem: error when attempting to access the tips and guides option in the settings menu and video fails to play when accessing a youtube link via whatsapp notification
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access the tips and guides option in the settings menu, and YouTube videos fail to play when opened via WhatsApp notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in two distinct contexts but does not cause device crash or data loss; access is blocked rather than fully broken, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to app permissions or outdated app versions; users should verify WhatsApp and YouTube permissions and ensure both apps are updated.

rows.Title: Device is very slow while using recent tab or opening status bar
rows.Problem: Device is very slow while using recent tab or opening status bar or notification panel like frame drops and late touch input registration/laggy touch input as seen in the video. This is video is recorded just now and I'm also sending along with logs as soon as recorded the video (i.e withing 1 min)
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag and frame drops when using the recent tab or opening the status bar and notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and unusable during normal navigation, causing a poor user experience and potential functional failure in core UI operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Performance degradation due to preload class creation; require silent logs to analyze root cause and validate system-level bottlenecks.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on Rotate to landscape mode
rows.Problem: Rotate to landscape mode is grayed out and cannot be toggled, despite Auto-rotate being on or off. This is a basic smartphone feature and appears to be a malfunction.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable the Rotate to landscape mode feature due to it being grayed out, even when Auto-rotate is turned on or off.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely unavailable despite user intent, making it unusable as a basic smartphone function.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Battery widget not working properly
rows.Problem: The battery widget is not behaving properly after UI 7 upgrade. The battery % number and charging icons are not aligned properly. This occurs on both 500dp and 441dp screens.
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery widget displays misaligned battery percentage and charging icons after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget malfunctions in alignment, affecting usability but does not cause device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Face frame drop and lagging
rows.Problem: Device has several instances of face frame drop and lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: The face frame on the device experiences drop and lagging during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The face frame drop and lagging impair core visual functionality and cause noticeable performance issues affecting user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by system preload class creation; countermeasure requires silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Camera lagging and poor quality
rows.Problem: I tried the troubleshooting but still doesn't solve issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera experiences lag and poor video quality when zooming in and out, especially under varying device conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent performance degradation during video capture, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely caused by temporary delays due to device heat and app execution; countermeasure is to re-report if the issue recurs and check for OS updates.

rows.Title: Routines not working
rows.Problem: The created routine is not working. When the Bluetooth connection condition is met, the playlist playback condition fails. Error messages are displayed during execution.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth-connected routines fail to trigger Spotify playlist playback due to missing error handling or execution logic.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine fails to execute its intended action after a successful Bluetooth connection, rendering a core automation feature non-functional and preventing user workflow completion.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate the root cause of the failed condition execution in routine automation.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain, widgets disappear, LTE and Bluetooth icons not showing in status bar
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain with widgets disappearing and connectivity icons missing from the status bar.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and missing system icons prevent normal device operation, making the device unusable for daily tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home; will be fixed in Homescreen version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Separate app sound not working
rows.Problem: Separate app sound feature is not working when using Android Auto after UI7 update. The device does not identify the vehicle as a Bluetooth device during connection, preventing separate audio routing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The separate app sound feature fails when using Android Auto due to incorrect device identification during connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature failure prevents users from routing audio to different devices, making the Android Auto experience unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because Android Auto uses a remote device and fails to identify the vehicle as a Bluetooth device, causing the separate sound function to not activate. A countermeasure is to ensure proper device identification during Android Auto connection.

rows.Title: Display Blink while minimize YouTube video in PIP Mode
rows.Problem: Black blink occurs when minimizing a YouTube video into picture in picture mode
rows.Summarized Problem: A black blink appears when minimizing a YouTube video into picture in picture mode
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual interruption during video playback but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera quality not good
rows.Problem: My 23 ultra cam is not good the picture quality is very poor and it's not optimizing. The 10x and 3x zoom are not even getting the picture quality. Very very bad resolution and it's not even optimizing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces poor picture quality, especially at zoom levels, with inadequate resolution and lack of optimization.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to deliver usable image quality at zoom levels, making it difficult to capture clear images, which significantly impacts core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is affected by hand blur and insufficient lighting; digital zoom degrades optical quality due to sensor limitations.

rows.Title: vibration not working
rows.Problem: phone's vibration is not working and sometimes vibrates a little then goes silent, suggesting a software bug
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's vibration feature is not working properly, with intermittent partial vibration followed by silence.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction with intermittent vibration, indicating a software bug rather than complete failure, but still impacts core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Screen resolution change affects app icons size
rows.Problem: Changing screen resolution causes app icons to change size, affecting app interfaces such as Instagram's story section and others.
rows.Summarized Problem: Changing screen resolution causes app icons to resize, affecting UI consistency across applications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent app interface appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: App UI changes with screen resolution are normal behavior, consistent with Pixel devices.

rows.Title: Phone App Search is not working Properly
rows.Problem: Search bug in Phone application. When searching for contacts, tapping on a contact from the list results in incorrect selection. The UI is also laggy.
rows.Summarized Problem: The search function in the Phone app incorrectly selects contacts and suffers from UI lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The search function fails to correctly select contacts, leading to incorrect results, and the UI lag makes the app unusable during operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery icon no longer appears in the status bar
rows.Problem: The battery icon no longer appears in the status bar after updating to One UI 7. The "Battery Indicator" option is missing entirely in Settings > Display > Status bar.
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery icon is missing from the status bar after an OS update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing entirely in the settings, preventing users from seeing battery level, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: When search the contact from dial pad, its did Not select Default SIM
rows.Problem: When searching a contact from the dial pad using T9, the device does not auto-select the set default SIM (sim 1) for calling, even though it was previously saved. Only after clicking the search result again does it switch to sim 1.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to auto-select the default SIM when searching a contact from the dial pad, requiring a manual click to change to the correct SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the calling flow, as the correct SIM is not selected automatically, but resolves after a user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Mobile network keep switching from 5g to 4g every few seconds
rows.Problem: Mobile network keep switching from 5g to 4g every few seconds after updating to one ui 7. Basic troubleshooting has not resolved the issue. Same device model with one ui 6 works fine on s21fe.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly switches between 5G and 4G networks every few seconds after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connectivity but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Airtel's mixed 5G and 4G cell areas may cause frequent 5G cell addition and release due to small data activity, leading to 5G ping-pong; this issue is exacerbated by lack of 5G subscription on Jio.

rows.Title: Distortion observed in image while taking extended screenshot
rows.Problem: Distortion in center of image during extended screenshot, appears as mismatch line
rows.Summarized Problem: A distortion appears in the center of the image when taking an extended screenshot.
rows.Severity Reason: The distortion occurs during a core image capture function and results in a visible mismatch line, rendering the screenshot unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Distortion occurs due to incorrect composition of scroll-captured bitmap when touch event triggers webview animation; adding a 250ms delay before capturing fixes the issue.

rows.Title: Vibration feedback not working during call receive and end
rows.Problem: Vibration feedback is not working while a call receive and call end. This problem started after updating to OneUi 7 on my s23.
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration feedback fails to activate during call receive and end events.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects call interaction but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss; it is a partial malfunction of a feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Touch interaction vibrations are disabled; user has not allowed specific vibration categories. Countermeasure: Enable touch interaction vibrations in system settings and monitor behavior.

rows.Title: When 5G internet connection is poor, it is not automatically switching to 4G
rows.Problem: When the 5G internet connection is poor, it is not automatically switching to 4G. So, I am not getting internet access. When 5G preferred is manually switched to LTE only, I am getting internet connection.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not automatically switch from 5G to 4G when 5G signal is poor, resulting in loss of internet access.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain internet access when 5G is weak, making the device unusable without manual intervention.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the absence of proper network switching logic, and the recommended countermeasure is to provide CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Long pressing notification overlaps itself
rows.Problem: Long pressing on any notification to disable it or enter settings causes the panel to overlap over the notification itself, happening for all apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Long pressing a notification causes the quick panel to overlap and cover the notification itself.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects all apps and interferes with user interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Navigation button overlapping on other app display
rows.Problem: Navigation button overlapping on other app display unable to use phone properly. On YouTube app screenshot you can see navigation bar is there but YouTube icons are missing. On WhatsApp screenshot you can see navigation bar is overlapping. Due to this I'm Unable to send the text
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation button overlaps on other app displays, preventing proper use of the phone and blocking access to app icons and functions.
rows.Severity Reason: The navigation bar overlaps on multiple apps, blocking essential functionality like sending text, making the device unusable in practical use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Change wallpaper and clock style
rows.Problem: Not able to change wallpaper and clock style
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the wallpaper and clock style on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable, preventing users from customizing their device's appearance, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Contact search and call issue
rows.Problem: Contacts app tends to dial a different contact usually placed below the intended contact when searching and making calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Contacts app incorrectly dials a different contact when searching and making calls, typically selecting one below the intended contact.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect calls, leading to potential miscommunication and device misuse, making the core functionality of the app unreliable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device is heating a lot and restarted 5 times
rows.Problem: Device is heating a lot and restarted 5 times in just 30 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and restarts multiple times within a short period, leading to instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats and restarts repeatedly, making it unusable and potentially causing hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: Random crashes due to hardware instability; recommend PCB replacement and customer service inspection.

rows.Title: Bluetooth can't connect in device
rows.Problem: I can't connect Bluetooth and I did restart but not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect to Bluetooth devices despite restarting the device.
rows.Severity Reason: Bluetooth connection failure prevents device from pairing with external devices, rendering a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs indicate connection info is incomplete; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Navigate gesture is stuck at AOD screen
rows.Problem: Navigate gesture is stuck at AOD screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigate gesture is stuck when on the AOD screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture is stuck, preventing user interaction with the navigation bar on the AOD screen, which is a critical interface element.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Dialer App always shows a solid colored background during Call
rows.Problem: No gradient video call background present and always shows a solid colored background regardless of the picture used
rows.Summarized Problem: The dialer app displays a solid colored background during calls instead of a gradient or user-selected image background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper visual context during calls, making the experience inconsistent and unprofessional, and affects core functionality of video call backgrounds.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background when contact photo is not saved; this modification will be included in next MR version.

rows.Title: Camera color quality not good
rows.Problem: Camera color quality not good. Color are very dull. The significantly degraded image quality is unacceptable and requires immediate resolution.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces dull and poorly colored images, with significantly degraded image quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The degraded color quality makes images unacceptably dull and impacts user experience significantly, rendering the camera function subpar for practical use.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be due to lens debris or software rendering; users should check for physical debris on the camera lens.

rows.Title: Now Bar does not show scores when in locked screen
rows.Problem: The nowbar of my s24ultra does not show scores when in locked screen although its turned on. I have attached the screenshot. Google sports notification and locked screen notification is turned on. Please help me.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the locked screen does not display scores, despite being turned on.
rows.Severity Reason: The Now Bar fails to show scores on the locked screen, which is a major functional element of the lock screen experience, rendering the feature non-operational.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Visibility Issue in NowBar
rows.Problem: When the 'Reduce Transparency and Blur' setting is turned ON, the NowBar's background becomes fully white and the foreground text remains white, causing the content to become invisible or unreadable, severely affecting usability due to lack of contrast between background and text.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar becomes invisible when 'Reduce Transparency and Blur' is enabled due to lack of contrast between background and text.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the content to become completely invisible, making it unusable and severely impacting user interaction with the Now Bar.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sports from Google option not showing under Now Bar
rows.Problem: Sports from Google option not showing under Now Bar
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Sports from Google' option is not displaying under the Now Bar on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from a key UI element, but the device remains functional and usable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: DeX crashes when changing audio output to display device
rows.Problem: DeX mode crashes on loop when changing audio output to play through the display device after OneUI 7.0 update
rows.Summarized Problem: DeX mode crashes repeatedly when the audio output is changed to play through the display device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes on loop, making DeX mode unusable during audio output changes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Timer showing inappropriate data
rows.Problem: Timer displays AM instead of PM when set for PM time and shows 60 h instead of 1 hour or 60 mins
rows.Summarized Problem: The timer incorrectly displays AM for PM times and shows 60 h instead of 1 hour or 60 minutes.
rows.Severity Reason: The timer malfunctions in time formatting but still functions to set and display durations, indicating partial failure rather than complete device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: User started a 60h timer; timer name and end time are correct, so the issue is a display error in time formatting.

rows.Title: Stutter is not visible
rows.Problem: The transition when toggling Wi-Fi or Bluetooth is stutery, especially when expanding and collapsing the list. It happens frequently and is noticeable in real life, though not in screen recordings due to higher frame rates.
rows.Summarized Problem: UI transitions when toggling Wi-Fi or Bluetooth are stutery and inconsistent, causing a noticeable stutter during real-time use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability during common interactions but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs intermittently.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Not able to find Wifi sharing under Mobile hotspot setting
rows.Problem: I'm not able to find the wifi sharing option under Mobile Hotspot setting in my Samsung Galaxy A16 5g device. Can you clarify what's exactly the problem within my device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot find the Wi-Fi sharing option under Mobile Hotspot settings in the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the expected location, preventing users from accessing a common data-sharing function, but the device remains otherwise usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Clock widget background issue
rows.Problem: Users cannot set background transparency for the 2x2 analog clock widget after updating to oneUI 15. The feature was previously available but is now removed. Other widgets still allow background control.
rows.Summarized Problem: The transparency option for the 2x2 analog clock widget has been removed in oneUI 15, preventing users from choosing background transparency.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific widget function but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: Transparency option removed from 2x2 analog clock widget in oneUI 7; no background switch option available in settings. Feature implementation follows oneUI 7 guide.

rows.Title: Camera issue
rows.Problem: After rotating the camera to horizontal position and returning to home screen, the wallpaper first displays in horizontal position and then returns to portrait.
rows.Summarized Problem: The wallpaper incorrectly displays in horizontal orientation after camera rotation and returns to portrait when returning to home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual inconsistency but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not observed in OneUI8.0; upgrade to OneUI8.0 may resolve it.

rows.Title: Video playback not working
rows.Problem: Video playback stops working completely across all apps, including Instagram, YouTube, Netflix, and downloaded videos. The issue affects video loading, screen staying black, or app freezing. It began before One UI 7 update and persists after.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback fails across all apps, resulting in videos not loading, black screens, or app freezes.
rows.Severity Reason: Video playback failure across multiple apps and platforms renders core functionality unusable, causing device-wide issues in media consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: Video is not attached. Please retest in latest version of apps and attach new logs and video in sync if issue persists.

rows.Title: Zoom Blur Issue
rows.Problem: Camera screen has a dark spot on the right side bottom in 1x zoom, but works properly in 2x zoom after One UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: A dark spot appears on the right bottom corner of the camera screen when using 1x zoom, but not in 2x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only one zoom level and does not prevent device usage or cause crashes, but impacts functionality during specific use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Current logs lack relevant information; further logs are needed to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Charging animation is broken
rows.Problem: Charging animation is broken, it's like a gif slapped over the battery icon, battery pill size is too large and users are complaining
rows.Summarized Problem: The charging animation is broken and appears as a gif over the battery icon, with an excessively large battery pill.
rows.Severity Reason: The charging animation is visibly broken and misrepresents the charging state, making it unusable and confusing for users.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery Charging VI is improved since OneUI8. Please check OneUI8 FOTA update. BENI CL 31549660

rows.Title: Wifi calling issue
rows.Problem: Wifi calling functionality not working after UI update 7, using eSIM
rows.Summarized Problem: Wifi calling functionality is not working after a UI update, especially when using eSIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from making calls over Wi-Fi, which is essential for connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: No response from network; possible temporary network or subscription issue. Recommend testing with different SIM and hotspot, and contacting operator if needed.

rows.Title: Quick setting panel is dark even when dark mode is off
rows.Problem: Quick setting panel is dark even after dark mode is turned off. Lockscreen bottom shortcuts are light even after dark mode is turned on with no translucent effects.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick setting panel appears dark when dark mode is off, and lockscreen bottom shortcuts show incorrect lighting with no translucent effects.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency in a functional UI element but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Contact profile picture becomes blurry after answering a call
rows.Problem: Contact profile picture appears sharp before answering a call but becomes blurry after answering, starting after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact profile picture blurs when the user answers a call, after appearing sharp before the call.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in contact display functionality, affecting user experience during call interaction but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: OneUI 7.X changed the background concept; if a contact has a photo, it is blurred and displayed in the background during call initiation, and the system defaults to a background image when no photo is available during initialization.

rows.Title: Photo ambient wallpaper not working on heavy rainfall or thunder
rows.Problem: Photo ambient wallpaper works on normal rainfall but not on rainfall with thunder or heavy rainfall
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo ambient wallpaper fails to activate during heavy rainfall or thunderstorms.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function under critical weather conditions, rendering the wallpaper ineffective when it should be active, which significantly impacts user experience during adverse weather.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Weather data not applied to wallpaper due to location update issues; Countermeasure: Patch applied to fix location data handling, users should verify via weather widget and software update.

rows.Title: Control panel is blue colored and lags when turning off screen
rows.Problem: The control panel is blue colored in both light and dark modes and there is a lag when turning off the screen and when AOD turns on.
rows.Summarized Problem: The control panel displays a blue color in both light and dark modes and lags when the screen is turned off or AOD activates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag and visual inconsistency but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery widget doesn't display battery percentage on home screen when Samsung Watch 3 is connected to Samsung phone
rows.Problem: Battery widget on home screen doesn't display battery percentage when Samsung Watch 3 is connected to Samsung phone via wearable app, despite connection being established.
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery widget on the home screen fails to show battery percentage when Samsung Watch 3 is connected to a Samsung phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only the display of battery percentage in a widget, not core device functionality or usability, but prevents accurate battery status visibility during connection.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Notifications are overlapping the fingerprint area
rows.Problem: Notifications are overlapping the fingerprint area. Therefore, when I try to unlock the phone with my fingerprint, it opens the app on top of the fingerprint area
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications overlap the fingerprint area, causing the phone to open an app instead of unlocking properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents successful fingerprint authentication, making the device unusable for secure unlocking.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to open quick panel by swiping down
rows.Problem: I am unable to open quick panel when swiping down from the right side or the left side of the notification panel. Only notification screen appears. I then have to manually swipe right to access the quick panel. This happens only in home screen. I can access quick panel with right side swipe when I am on other apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open the quick panel by swiping from the sides of the notification panel on the home screen, forcing them to manually swipe right to access it.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality on the home screen but works when on other apps, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Vibrate when answered feature not working
rows.Problem: Vibrate when answered feature not working; vibration is synced when previewing custom ringtone but does not vibrate for incoming calls
rows.Summarized Problem: The vibrate when answered feature does not work for incoming calls, despite syncing vibration during ringtone preview.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to provide vibration on incoming calls, which is essential for user awareness and usability, making the device functionally incomplete in call handling.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Multiple issue with the camera
rows.Problem: After launching the camera app the phone drastically gets warm. While trying to take burst shots, after swiping down the shutter button it first takes a shot then takes a second then clicks pics. While trying to enable the floating button there's also the same problem it first clicks a pic then it moves. While trying to record videos by directly long pressing the shutter button same thing also happens there.
rows.Sub-Module: Burst Shot and Floating Button Function
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app causes excessive heating and inconsistent behavior during burst shots and floating button interactions, including repeated photo capture and erratic UI response.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats and exhibits unstable functionality during core camera operations, which can lead to device instability or crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Memory backpressure due to continuous camera usage and background processes; countermeasure is user-level cache and app clearing, reboot, and wait.

rows.Title: Device takes a long time to wake up from sleep
rows.Problem: Device takes a long time to wake up from sleep, like 3 to 5 seconds after pressing the power button, been happening ever since the one UI 7 update that was received 2 days ago
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes 3 to 5 seconds to wake up after being in sleep mode, which has been persistent since the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable delay in a core system function but does not cause device failure or data loss, and system resources are normal.
rows.R&D Comment: CPU and memory usage are normal; the delay is likely due to a software-level sleep/wake handling issue in One UI 7.

rows.Title: Option not working in Secure Folder
rows.Problem: Option 'Each time I leave an app' in Secure Folder settings does not stay selected and reverts back when selected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Each time I leave an app' option in Secure Folder settings fails to stay selected and reverts when chosen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature intermittently fails to retain user selection, impacting usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: One UI 7 got crashed while working on split screen
rows.Problem: One UI 7 got crashed while working on split screen
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI 7 crashes when using split screen functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes during a core multitasking function, making it unusable in practical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is caused by an incomplete XML layout in the Instagram app, indicating a deficiency in the app's UI definition; a countermeasure is needed to ensure proper layout attributes are defined in the app code.

rows.Title: Hissing sound during video calls
rows.Problem: After the software update, a hissing sound like wind is heard during video calls, making it difficult for the person on the other end to understand the conversation.
rows.Summarized Problem: A hissing sound is heard during video calls, interfering with clear communication.
rows.Severity Reason: The sound significantly impedes communication, making it difficult for the other party to understand the user.
rows.R&D Comment: When full spectrum mic mode is activated, ambient sounds are picked up; users hear environmental noise. Recommend deactivating this mode in the quick panel to prevent unintended audio feedback.

rows.Title: Camera stutters
rows.Problem: camera facing same issue, user wants replacement device instead of repair
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera AF oscillation is unstable due to UV damper separation and misalignment causing driving force errors.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is fundamentally impaired, leading to unstable autofocus and potential device usability issues.
rows.R&D Comment: UV damper separation and misalignment cause AF oscillation instability; improved jig and OVS inspection will mitigate the issue.

rows.Title: Portrait Feature Issue
rows.Problem: The resulting image often has a completely different face with no resemblance to the original photo
rows.Summarized Problem: The Portrait mode in the camera feature generates images with a completely different face that does not resemble the original photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The generated face lacks any resemblance to the original, resulting in a completely incorrect output that undermines the core functionality of the feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Identity mismatch is a limitation in the current cloud AI model; efforts are being made to align identity matching to approximately 90% accuracy.

rows.Title: Whatsapp issue in secure folder
rows.Problem: While in a call with WhatsApp in the secure folder, I cannot make or receive cellular calls. This was working in One UI 6.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp in the Secure Folder prevents cellular calls during calls, despite working in One UI 6.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the user from making or receiving cellular calls during a WhatsApp call, rendering a core communication function inoperable.
rows.R&D Comment: App permissions in Secure Folder are not properly configured for call functionality; users need clear guidance on enabling call permissions within Secure Folder settings.

rows.Title: Heating issues
rows.Problem: Heating issue appears to be primarily correlated with camera application usage
rows.Summarized Problem: Device heats up when camera application is used
rows.Severity Reason: The heating is linked to camera usage but not severe enough to cause device freeze or data loss
rows.R&D Comment: Heating occurs during camera entry, mode switching, and lens switching scenarios, which are performance-oriented and result in high CPU usage; camera CPU share is normal

rows.Title: Battery Drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain is occurring heavily, device not usable due to rapid battery loss
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain, leading to frequent shutdowns or reduced usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains at a rate of 9.22% per hour, which is significantly high and leads to device unusability within a short period.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Signals not registered error
rows.Problem: After android 15 update, telecom signals not registering. Unable to call, always showing not registered to network. Both slots are showing this issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Telecom signals are not registering after Android 15 update, preventing call functionality on both SIM slots.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot make calls due to complete failure of network signal registration, rendering basic communication functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Can't connect to mobile networks while flight mode is on
rows.Problem: A system toast notification 'Can't connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is on' appears and stays on the screen for too long, especially when opening or using the Camera app, blocking the camera interface and delaying photo capture. The same issue occurs with the toast notification 'sent'.
rows.Summarized Problem: A toast notification indicating inability to connect to mobile networks while flight mode is on remains displayed for an excessively long duration, obstructing camera functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The persistent toast notification blocks core user interaction (camera use) and creates a significant usability barrier during critical operations.
rows.R&D Comment: The toast notification duration is excessively long and interferes with camera functionality; logs indicate user state attributes suggest no touch or gesture handling is enabled, implying a UI timing issue in the network module.

rows.Title: Live sports cannot be brought back to now bar and status bar
rows.Problem: When live sports score is removed from notification panel, it cannot be recovered and disappears from now bar and status bar after clearing notifications
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot recover live sports scores once removed from the notification panel, leading to permanent disappearance from the now bar and status bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature cannot be restored after removal, resulting in loss of critical real-time information during live matches, making the device unusable for users during events.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Phone dialer and contacts not loading
rows.Problem: Phone dialer and contacts are not loading after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone dialer and contacts are not loading after the UI 7 update, leaving them in an 'Updating contacts' state due to a prolonged database index rebuild.
rows.Severity Reason: The contacts are not loading at all, preventing basic phone functionality and user interaction with the dialer.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a prolonged database index rebuild due to the large size of the contacts database, and the same countermeasure is proposed as the cause.

rows.Title: Samsung Wallet issue
rows.Problem: Samsung Wallet repeatedly asks for full access permissions despite not being required, unlike Google Pay or PhonePe.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Wallet persistently requests full access permissions unnecessarily, which is not required for a wallet app.
rows.Severity Reason: The app repeatedly requests excessive permissions, which could compromise user privacy and lead to security risks or user frustration, making it unusable or misleading.
rows.R&D Comment: Media permission is required only in case of import from PDF flow. So, we have removed and added in specific flow.

rows.Title: LockStar and Home Up apps not opening
rows.Problem: LockStar and Home Up apps are not updated and are not opening after updating to UI 7 on Tab S9 Plus
rows.Summarized Problem: Home Up and LockStar apps are not updating or opening after UI 7 update on Tab S9 Plus
rows.Severity Reason: The apps are not opening, preventing core lock screen functionality from working
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Face search feature not found
rows.Problem: In gallery, face search option is not visible after Ui 7 update; only location and document search are visible
rows.Summarized Problem: Face search option is missing in the gallery after the Ui 7 update, only location and document search are available.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing, but core functionality (location and document search) remains available, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: FaceService requires reanalysis after engine update; full analysis is needed when new engine is applied, especially on S24 with Android 15.

rows.Title: Battery Drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains very fast after updating to oneui 7, likely due to inefficient OpenGL graphics API replacement of Vulkan.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after updating to oneUI 7 due to inefficient graphics API switch from Vulkan to OpenGL.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, which significantly impacts daily usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by third-party GMS apps running continuously in background; countermeasure is to limit background operations of such apps.

rows.Title: Gap between bottom of the screen and apps on home screen
rows.Problem: There is a gap between the bottom of the screen and the apps on the home screen, preventing apps from being moved to the bottom. This issue started after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: A gap appears between the bottom of the screen and home screen apps, preventing app placement at the bottom.
rows.Severity Reason: The gap prevents proper app arrangement, impacting usability but does not cause device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wrist detection and BIA sensor stopped working
rows.Problem: Wrist detection and BIA sensor have stopped working after the last 2024 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Wrist detection and BIA sensor have stopped working after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The sensors are completely non-functional, preventing core health and interaction features from working.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by no contact with electrode sensor; countermeasure is to check film attachment and visit service center if needed.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: When airplane mode is turned off and a call is ended, the call does not disconnect and remains static for minutes. This is a software glitch that occurs every time.
rows.Summarized Problem: A call fails to disconnect properly when transitioning from airplane mode to normal mode, remaining static for minutes after end.
rows.Severity Reason: The call remains static for minutes after disconnection, making the device unusable during the call flow and causing a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate the root cause.

rows.Title: WiFi is getting disconnected automatically
rows.Problem: WiFi is getting disconnected automatically after updating to UI7. It was working fine in UI6. On S23 Ultra, the network shows 'Ready to connect when network quality improves' and connects only when WiFi is manually turned on and off. The connection drops after some time.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection drops automatically after updating to UI7, with the device showing a 'ready to connect when network quality improves' message and requiring manual on/off to reconnect.
rows.Severity Reason: The WiFi connection drops repeatedly, preventing stable internet access and rendering the device unusable for basic online functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by poor signal strength leading to unstable data communication; countermeasure suggests testing with strong signal APs to confirm root cause.

rows.Title: Scanned Data dialog box
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, a "Scanned Data" dialog box appears when opening a travel ticket PDF, instead of automatically scanning and opening it with Samsung Wallet. The dialog only allows copying scanned data to clipboard, which is not useful.
rows.Summarized Problem: A "Scanned Data" dialog box appears instead of automatically scanning and opening a travel ticket PDF with Samsung Wallet after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature no longer functions as intended, reducing user convenience, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to increased security protocols in One UI 7 and has been fixed in post-Q2 updates.

rows.Title: Poor sound quality in buds 3
rows.Problem: After the ui7 update in my s24 ultra everything is nice, just the sound experience with my buds 3 pro is very bad. The bass just got reduced very much after update, the sharpness is so high that i cant turn up the volume above 70 percent
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound quality of Buds 3 has deteriorated significantly after the UI 7 update, with reduced bass and excessive sharpness that prevents volume adjustment beyond 70 percent.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from achieving a usable audio experience and limits volume control, making it a critical usability problem.
rows.R&D Comment: EQ policies changed from One UI 7.0 have led to a mismatch between phone and Buds EQ, requiring re-adjustment of the Buds' EQ settings.

rows.Title: Albums grouped by date despite option off
rows.Problem: Albums are grouped by date in Samsung Gallery app even when the date grouping option is turned off or on.
rows.Summarized Problem: Albums in the Samsung Gallery app are incorrectly grouped by date even when the date grouping option is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a malfunction of a user-configurable feature, resulting in inconsistent behavior but does not prevent core app functionality or cause device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue not reproduced in testing; app data needed for accurate analysis; will add detailed logs in next update.

rows.Title: Black screen issue
rows.Problem: Black screen appears when swiping down and then left on Instagram stories
rows.Summarized Problem: A black screen appears when swiping down and then left on Instagram stories.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a complete black screen during story navigation, making content inaccessible and rendering the device unusable for social media interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by an error in the Instagram app's network disconnection handling; no Samsung involvement or source code access exists, requiring further investigation.

rows.Title: Call background issue
rows.Problem: The call background screen displays the profile picture instead of the custom call background I selected
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background screen shows the contact profile picture instead of the user-selected custom background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the call background feature, preventing users from seeing their intended custom background.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Shows contact photo background when contact photo is not saved. Countermeasure: Fix to show default background in this case and include in next MR version.

rows.Title: Battery performance issue
rows.Problem: The battery drains quickly despite minimal usage, requiring charging twice a day. Performance mode is set to light, but battery consumption is still high.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device drains battery rapidly even with minimal usage, requiring frequent charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unusable for daily tasks due to frequent charging needs, indicating a major battery performance failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by prolonged use of mobile hotspot, which consumes excessive power; a user guide is needed to prevent unnecessary usage.

rows.Title: Charging connects and disconnects simultaneously
rows.Problem: Charging disconnects and connects after latest update on S25 ultra. Once stable for about 10 minutes, it starts disconnecting and reconnecting again.
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging connection repeatedly disconnects and reconnects after stabilizing for about 10 minutes following the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent charging, leading to device instability and potential data loss or user frustration during usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Teams do not sync or receive notifications in the background
rows.Problem: Microsoft Outlook (including Outlook Lite) and Microsoft Teams do not sync or receive notifications in the background. These apps only sync when manually opened. Notifications and background sync work fine for other apps like WhatsApp, Telegram, Gmail, etc.
rows.Summarized Problem: Microsoft Outlook and Teams fail to sync or receive background notifications, only working when manually opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The apps fail to function in the background, preventing users from receiving critical updates and messages, making them unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Photo quality issues
rows.Problem: I need to know which picture looks good and natural and clear. One photo is from a 4-year-old phone and one from the latest S25, suggesting a quality gap.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo quality varies significantly between devices, with older devices producing noticeably poorer results compared to newer models.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable difference in photo quality but does not result in device failure or data loss, and is not fully reproducible without user input.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to use Bixby
rows.Problem: I'm unable to use Bixby offline
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use Bixby when offline, despite offline processing being disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby is a core feature that is completely non-functional under offline conditions, making it unusable for users who rely on it.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bluetooth icon not displayed
