rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application. The root cause is related to Unity engine timeout during pause, and the app developer must fix it. Reporting to app owner is recommended.

rows.Title: Battery drains quickly after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly after One UI 7 update. Charging speed has slowed down, taking 30 to 35 minutes extra. Phone sometimes hangs or runs slowly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences rapid battery drain and slower charging after the One UI 7 update, with frequent app switching exacerbating battery consumption.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain and slow charging, which significantly impacts daily usage and device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Frequent app switching increases battery consumption due to resource concentration during app transitions; this behavior is amplified post-update as apps recompile to adapt to new UI.

rows.Title: Same icon is showing for multiple different apps
rows.Problem: Icons are disappearing or same icon is showing for multiple apps in a folder
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple apps are displaying the same icon in a folder, causing confusion and potential usability issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of app icon display, leading to confusion but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: App icons not visible in folders
rows.Problem: Icon hide in home page
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons are not visible on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen interface, preventing users from seeing app icons.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Pictures deleted permanently from gallery and recycle bin get restored in gallery again
rows.Problem: Permanently deleted pictures from Gallery and recyclebin are again coming in Gallery after few days
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos that were permanently deleted from the gallery and recycle bin reappear in the gallery after a few days.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose access to deleted photos, which are then restored, leading to potential data loss and confusion about file status.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely caused by a misconfiguration in media handling or file operations; countermeasure suggests checking WhatsApp's media auto-download setting to prevent automatic downloads.

rows.Title: Performance issues
rows.Problem: Device hangs frequently after One UI 7 update, causing performance issues and making it difficult to use.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently hangs and experiences performance issues after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs frequently, making it unusable and significantly impairing core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Watchdog reset due to telephony API call during location service operation; Countermeasure: Android 16 fix prevents location service from holding locks during telephony API calls.

rows.Title: Issues with color fidelity and fading when using 5x zoom
rows.Problem: issues with color fidelity and fading when using 5x zoom feature while recording videos and clicking photos
rows.Summarized Problem: Color fidelity and fading occur when using the 5x zoom feature during video recording and photo capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core visual quality during critical camera operations, leading to inconsistent and unreliable image output.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlaps YouTube Shorts screen
rows.Problem: Navigation bar overlaps YouTube screen, especially YouTube Shorts, causing out-of-bounds display and misclicks during use
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar overlaps the YouTube Shorts screen, causing out-of-bounds display and misclicks.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in user interaction with YouTube Shorts, leading to accidental clicks but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is inside YouTube app's source code; Samsung has no control over its development. Clearing cache resolves the issue temporarily.

rows.Title: Device overheats when enabling GPS
rows.Problem: Device overheats during normal usage even with only GPS enabled. User cannot perform at least 30 minutes of gaming due to heat. This is a flagship phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during normal usage when GPS is enabled, especially under gaming load.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during typical usage and gaming, but the device is not completely unusable or crashing; thermal management is functioning as expected under load.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during GPS use and gaming is normal due to CPU usage; thermal management system is working as designed.

rows.Title: Application icons missing in the folder
rows.Problem: Application icons missing in the folders
rows.Summarized Problem: Application icons are missing from the folder section of the launcher.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the launcher interface, as some app icons are missing but the system remains functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster and also overheating and lag while normal usage after updating to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences faster battery drain and overheating with lag during normal usage after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significant battery drain and overheating, which are major performance issues affecting usability and device stability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery is bad: ASOC is only 84%, meaning current capacity is 84% of original; recommend customer replace battery at CS center

rows.Title: After One UI update getting only 6hrs SOT before tome was 8- 9 hrs
rows.Problem: I got only 6 hours of SOT using 135% battery, before the one ui update, I used to get 8 to 9 hours of SOT. This is insane
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has decreased from 8-9 hours to 6 hours after the One UI update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is now unable to sustain normal battery usage, resulting in significantly reduced operational time, which makes the device unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Power consumption analysis shows increased background usage; countermeasure reduces total battery use to 56.3%, indicating a potential fix in background processes.

rows.Title: Always On display not aligned properly
rows.Problem: Always On display things are not aligned properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display elements are misaligned and shift from their original positions.
rows.Severity Reason: The misalignment affects visual consistency but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The shift is intentional to prevent burn-in; further investigation needed for user perception and alignment consistency.

rows.Title: Battery drains quickly
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains quickly during normal usage, lasting only about two hours on screen time.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is significant but occurs within expected usage patterns, primarily due to app activity, not a system-level failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is attributed to app usage, particularly Instagram, and can be mitigated by user-level app management.

rows.Title: Instagram app causes device to freeze and restart
rows.Problem: Device freezes and restarts automatically when using Instagram or watching reels, lasting up to 2 minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and restarts when using Instagram or watching reels.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and restarts, causing complete loss of functionality during use, making the device unusable for social media activities.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by metadata errors in META server content (HDR10+ in HLG images) and has been resolved on the server side; no further action required.

rows.Title: Device freeze and restart after updating UI 7
rows.Problem: Device sometimes freezes and restarts automatically, causing fast battery drain after updating UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and restarts automatically after updating UI 7, leading to rapid battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent freezing and restarts, which are critical system failures.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain quickly
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly despite minimal usage, optimized settings, and no background apps, even with minimum brightness and single app usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences rapid battery drain after updating to oneUI 7, even with optimized settings and minimal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, requiring frequent charging and limiting daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: CPU usage by GMS increases significantly during WiFi scans; root cause is outside Samsung's control, and source code access is unavailable.

rows.Title: Word suggestions display in light theme even in dark mode
rows.Problem: When typing in the Samsung keyboard in WhatsApp, the system auto-corrects and displays suggestions in the light theme even when the device is set to dark mode. This issue started after the UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard displays word suggestions in light theme despite the device being set to dark mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the user experience during typing but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and can be resolved by user settings adjustment.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by auto-correction settings in the Samsung keyboard; users can disable auto-suggestions to resolve it.

rows.Title: App showing Gpay logo
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, multiple app logos on S22 Ultra appear identical, including WhatsApp, Telegram, PayTM, and Google Pay.
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple app icons on the launcher display the same Google Pay logo instead of their correct app logos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes confusion in app identification and may lead to user errors in navigation or app usage, making the device interface unreliable.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared; scheduled for OneUIHome app update on May 9th.

rows.Title: User can unlock device without entering password or using fingerprint
rows.Problem: Phone opens without entering password or fingerprint after update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can unlock the device without entering a password or using fingerprint after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device can be unlocked without authentication, which compromises user security and privacy.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Device shows only 3 hours 11 minutes of screen on time with 61% battery consumption, despite using light performance mode and limited app usage (X and Instagram for 10 minutes each).
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain under normal usage conditions despite light performance mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is significant and leads to short screen on time, making the device unusable for daily tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device goes into DND mode automatically after restart
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, device automatically goes into DND mode after restart
rows.Summarized Problem: Device automatically enters Do Not Disturb mode after restart following an update to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable for calls and notifications immediately after restart, disrupting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: DND mode is incorrectly enabled post-restart due to misconfigured Zen mode settings; logs show no manual rule or suppression, indicating a system-level bug in One UI 7.

rows.Title: Network connectivity issues
rows.Problem: Frequent network and call connectivity issues after updating to one UI 7, causing daily disturbances with calls and network disconnections.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent disconnections during calls and network connectivity after updating to one UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Call disconnections and network drops make the device unusable during communication, which is a critical function.
rows.R&D Comment: Call drop observed due to dedicated bearer loss; this is a temporary network issue.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: Massive battery draining after UI 7 update, device overheats, gaming lags, frame drops occur during gameplay
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences severe battery drain, overheating, and lag during gaming due to a third-party app using excessive CPU resources.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable during gameplay due to extreme battery drain and overheating, which significantly impacts core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app consuming excessive CPU resources; the app developer must optimize their code to reduce resource usage.

rows.Title: Home up animation feature doesn't work
rows.Problem: The home up animation feature is not working after update to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The home up animation feature is not working after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning after an update, but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is that the animation value is 0; turning off reduce animation or resetting it to 1 in developer settings resolves it. No countermeasure provided.

rows.Title: Camera captures blurry pic & is unable to capture sharp details
rows.Problem: The camera performance has significantly degraded since the One UI 7 update. Image quality, particularly in telephoto and moon/sun photography, is now substantially inferior to the pre-update performance. Issues include blurry images and an inability to capture sharp details, such as the pinpoint depiction of the sun, which is now a diffused smudge.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera now captures blurry images and fails to produce sharp details, especially in telephoto and sun/moon photography, after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera's inability to capture sharp details renders key photographic functions unusable, affecting core user experience and device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The 1st image is not an original JPG, it is difficult to analyze the cause of the issue. If you could provide an unedited original video, it would be helpful for analysis. In the case of the 2nd image, the sharpness of the leaves in the backlit scene appears to be normal. If you have reference videos from before the update, they would also be helpful for analysis.

rows.Title: Overheating in device
rows.Problem: Heating issues after One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats after updating to One UI 7, likely due to background activity from the Instagram app.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating can lead to device instability, performance degradation, or even hardware damage, making the device unusable under sustained use.
rows.R&D Comment: Background services in Instagram app are causing high CPU usage, leading to overheating; no Samsung involvement in app development.

rows.Title: Device lags and power button not responding
rows.Problem: Device hung for 30-40 seconds during use, power button not responding to long press, eventually restarted on its own
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags significantly and fails to respond to long press of the power button, causing interruptions in usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs for extended periods and fails to respond to a fundamental control function, making it unusable during critical operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wallpaper and style service keeps stopping
rows.Problem: Wallpaper and style service keeps stopping. Can't change clock location and can't use photo ambient wallpaper.
rows.Summarized Problem: The wallpaper and style service keeps stopping, preventing users from changing clock location and using photo ambient wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The service failure prevents core lock screen functionality, including clock location and ambient wallpaper, making the device unusable for basic personalization.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Rotate to landscape mode not working
rows.Problem: The option to enable 'rotate to landscape mode' in settings does not work on the device and is not available for use.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'rotate to landscape mode' feature in settings is not functional and does not enable on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable and the issue is limited to a specific setting.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate that enabling 'Free Grid' in homeup blocks the feature; disabling Free Grid resolves the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining faster than usual, even though other devices with less battery capacity last longer than this device.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences faster-than-usual battery drain, even when compared to other devices with smaller batteries.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is noticeable and inconsistent with expected performance, but the logs indicate normal discharge rates under typical usage conditions, suggesting a partial malfunction rather than a complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage appears normal based on logs; further investigation needed to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly after update; factory reset did not resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain after an update, even after a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain and overheating
rows.Problem: After update to One UI 7, device experiences battery drain and overheating issues
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain and overheating after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and overheating can lead to device shutdown or poor performance, making the device unusable under normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: After the UI 7 update, phone drains battery faster and heats quickly. Battery consumption increased by 15-25% during usual afternoon charging. User is playing games like Gameloader and Clash of Clans, which consume significant power. Old version of Telegram also contributes to power consumption. Recommend updating Telegram to latest version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone experiences increased battery drain and overheating after UI 7 update, primarily due to high-power apps and outdated software.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain and overheating, which affects core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device getting restart on its own
rows.Problem: Phone restarting on its own and becoming slow, even after formatting/reset
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is restarting on its own and has become significantly slow after a reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is restarting unexpectedly and becoming slow, which renders it unusable and indicates a critical system-level failure.
rows.R&D Comment: UFS link layer errors and power_fatal_error during initialization suggest a hardware-level issue requiring inspection of the H/W board and interface between AP and UFS component.

rows.Title: Animation glitch during app opening and closing
rows.Problem: App opening and closing animations glitch during screen recording. When opening multiple apps simultaneously, animations glitch, and the screen sometimes flashes or the corner radius of app opening animations becomes boxy instead of rounded, or app closing or opening animation behaves abnormal.
rows.Summarized Problem: App opening and closing animations glitch with boxy corners, flashing, or abnormal behavior during rapid app switching.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects animation quality during rapid app switching but does not cause device crash or data loss or render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to fast movement not being a normal user scenario; no visible defect in video, and no functional impact observed.

rows.Title: 5G connectivity unexpectedly lost
rows.Problem: 5G connectivity has been unexpectedly lost following the One UI 7 update on Samsung S23, not present in previous One UI 6.1. Troubleshooting steps like APN reset, device restart, and contacting Airtel support have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is unexpectedly lost after the One UI 7 update on Samsung S23, with no resolution from standard troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of 5G connectivity, rendering the device unable to access mobile data, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Vibration not working when call pick up and call end
rows.Problem: Vibration is not working specifically when call pick up and call end after One UI 7 update, while other vibration functions work normally.
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration fails to activate when a call is picked up or ended, despite being enabled in the UI settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects specific call-related vibration functions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem is caused by a missing implementation in vibration settings code; setting media vibration intensity to a non-zero value resolves it.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery drain has significantly increased after the phone update, reducing daily usage time from one full day to requiring multiple charges. The issue persists despite restarts and setting adjustments.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing significantly faster battery drain after the One UI 7 update, impacting daily usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is severe enough to require multiple charges and disrupts daily productivity, making the device unusable for extended periods.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Transition when quick panel is pulled down in landscape mode takes time
rows.Problem: Animations have become inconsistent and slightly laggy during video playback in landscape mode, especially when swiping to view the quick panel, causing a one-second delay in the transition
rows.Summarized Problem: The swipe transition for the quick panel in landscape mode during video playback is slow and laggy, causing a one-second delay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves inconsistent animations and a noticeable delay during a common user interaction, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar not showing on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing at bottom of screen after UI7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying at the bottom of the lock screen after the UI7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a key feature on the lock screen but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Speaker & Mute option not available in ongoing call notification
rows.Problem: Speaker mute options are not visible on notification panel in Samsung S22 Ultra after UI 7 update, showing outdated design after second swipe
rows.Summarized Problem: Speaker mute option is missing from the notification panel during an ongoing call on Samsung S22 Ultra after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing and only accessible via a down arrow key, limiting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Speaker & Mute option is available when clicking the down arrow key in the notification panel; customer should be guided to use this option.

rows.Title: Contact selection automatically changes to random contact details
rows.Problem: When trying to select a contact for calling, it automatically changes to a random contact
rows.Summarized Problem: Selecting a contact for calling automatically changes to random contact details.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect contact selection, leading to potential misdialing and device misuse.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain faster after update
rows.Problem: Continuous battery drain issue after one UI 7 update. Everyone is facing this. Battery usage exceeds 139% with significant consumption by Instagram and WhatsApp apps while screen off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain after UI 7 update, with high power consumption detected from background apps like Instagram and WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain exceeds 139% and includes significant background app usage, leading to device unusability and rapid power depletion.
rows.R&D Comment: App background activity (Instagram, WhatsApp) is consuming excessive power; Samsung has no control over third-party app development or behavior.

rows.Title: App icons automatically disappear
rows.Problem: App icons automatically disappear after UI 7 update on S22 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons disappear automatically after the UI 7 update on the S22 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes app icons to vanish unexpectedly, making the device interface unusable without proper app access.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Device didn't take charge after 93% and got really hot
rows.Problem: Phone stopped charging at 93% and became hot. Battery drains quickly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone stops charging at 93% battery level and becomes hot, indicating a charging issue with rapid battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device stops charging and becomes hot, which could lead to hardware damage or safety risks, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Speaker sound interrupts bluetooth audio every time any audio feed start
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio interrupts whenever there is an audio feed start or stop on the phone, such as scrolling past a video, even though both audio sources work fine afterward.
rows.Summarized Problem: The speaker audio interrupts Bluetooth audio every time an audio feed starts or stops on the phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a complete disruption of Bluetooth audio during normal phone usage, making it unusable for users relying on continuous audio playback.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs during audio feed start/stop events; logs show no playback history, suggesting a software handling flaw in audio routing. Requires deeper investigation into audio session management.

rows.Title: Sort option not there to switch the app drawer in alphabetical order
rows.Problem: On OneUI 7, the horizontal app drawer is still active and there is no option to sort apps alphabetically as required for the vertical drawer
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot sort apps alphabetically in the app drawer on OneUI 7, despite needing this feature for the vertical layout.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the expected location, preventing proper use of the vertical app drawer, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Sort option is available in the homescreen search box; users should click on 3 dots to access it.

rows.Title: Lag and slow response observed in the device
rows.Problem: After updating to one UI 7, the device shows slow responsiveness, faster battery drain, and noticeable heating on the side. The device feels less fluid with animations.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits slow responsiveness and increased heating after the one UI 7 update, with poor fluidity in animations.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing significant lag and heating, which impacts core usability and performance, making it difficult to operate effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage by the YouTube app is causing device heating and lag; reassign to relevant team for investigation and optimization.

rows.Title: Phone app and contacts app does not display anything when launched
rows.Problem: Phone app and contacts app do not display anything when launched and device heating is observed
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone and contacts apps fail to display content upon launch, causing device heating.
rows.Severity Reason: The apps fail to load content, leading to a complete display failure and device heating, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Large database deletions during onupgrade cause timeout; fix by running the operation in background and clearing local app data to recover.

rows.Title: Phone incorrectly restarted or froze
rows.Problem: freeze and auto restart issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and automatically restarts when playing HDR content on Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated freezes and restarts, causing a complete loss of functionality during video playback.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect HDR10+ metadata in HLG-based videos from the server, and has been resolved by the server-side fix from META.

rows.Title: Unable to take scrolling screenshot
rows.Problem: After One UI® 7.0 update on Samsung S24 Ultra, scrolling screenshots appear different in the gallery despite clicking the scroll screenshot option.
rows.Summarized Problem: Scrolling screenshots appear distorted or different in the gallery after One UI® 7.0 update on Samsung S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects screenshot consistency but does not prevent full functionality or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery is draining faster
rows.Problem: Battery is draining faster than before the UI 7 update and selfie camera heats up during calls
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains faster than before the UI 7 update and the selfie camera heats up during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is attributed to app-level CPU usage and data communication, which is within normal ranges based on usage patterns, but the heating during calls indicates a potential thermal issue that affects user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery consumption is within normal range due to app usage patterns; thermal heating during calls may indicate a thermal management issue requiring further investigation.

rows.Title: People tab not coming in gallery
rows.Problem: The people tab is not reflecting as a category though selected
rows.Summarized Problem: The people tab is not appearing as a category in the gallery after selection.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not displaying correctly when selected, which affects user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to face analysis service requiring reanalysis after updates; taking photos after OS update helps initiate the process.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue after One UI 7 update. Before the update, the battery was good.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after the One UI 7 update, with normal battery performance prior to the update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain severely impacts device usability, leading to frequent recharging and potential device unavailability during use.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. The Meta engineering team is currently investigating it and will update the app via Play Store once fixed.

rows.Title: Device lags and switches off after update
rows.Problem: Phone suddenly hangs and switches off on its own, drains battery tremendously after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs and unexpectedly shuts off after the UI 7 update, causing severe battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to unexpected shutdowns and severe battery drain, indicating a major system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect HDR10+ metadata in HLG-based videos from the server, leading to a kernel panic; resolved by server-side fix from META.

rows.Title: Fast Charging switches to Normal Charging after a few seconds
rows.Problem: Battery drain is high during idle state. Fast and Super charging does not work; when connected to charger, device shows Fast Charging for a few seconds before switching to Normal Charging. Issue persists across different Samsung chargers and cables.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device shows Fast Charging briefly before switching to Normal Charging, and experiences high idle battery drain with no Super or Fast charging functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain Fast Charging, leading to inefficient charging and increased battery drain, which directly impacts usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation; once fixed, it will be updated via Play Store.

rows.Title: Slight graphical glitch and app closes on video call initiation in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: A weird graphical error appears for a fraction of a second when initiating a video call in WhatsApp, then the app closes, but no issues occur during actual video calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: A brief graphical glitch occurs when initiating a video call in WhatsApp, followed by app closure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a temporary app crash during video call initiation, disrupting user experience but does not prevent full functionality during actual calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Video call app has translucent pixel format causing surface view issues; adding a background layer will improve animation stability.

rows.Title: Call background showing blur
rows.Problem: Profile card image becomes blurry when answering a call and cannot be seen, previously it was clear and visible during calls. The issue started after updating to Android 15.
rows.Summarized Problem: Profile card image blurs when answering a call, making it invisible to the user.
rows.Severity Reason: The image blurs during call answering, preventing visibility, but the call functionality remains intact and the issue does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain faster after update to ONE UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery drain faster after update to ONE UI 7 and phone was heating too much, can check temperature
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences faster battery drain and overheating after updating to ONE UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats and drains battery rapidly, which can lead to performance issues or hardware damage, making it unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during 5G operation with background app activity and non-charging state causes high power consumption; mitigation requires identifying and limiting background CPU usage and network communication.

rows.Title: Screen froze during Instagram usage
rows.Problem: The screen froze for about ten seconds during Instagram usage, causing disconnection of Galaxy Buds 2 Pro and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic LTE. The phone then restarted. This has occurred repeatedly and only while using the Instagram app from Google Play Store. Cache clearing and app reinstallation did not resolve it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen freezes during Instagram use, causing device restart and loss of connected peripherals.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freezing during app usage leads to device restart and loss of connectivity, making the device unusable during the event.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was resolved on the server side by META; no further action required on device side.

rows.Title: Vibrate when call answered and vibrate when call ends option not working
rows.Problem: Vibrate when call answered and vibrate when call ends both option is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The vibration options for when a call is answered and when a call ends are not working.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot receive vibration feedback during call events, which is essential for usability and notification.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by media vibration intensity set to zero in the system; adjusting it to a non-zero value resolves the problem.

rows.Title: Pictures are blurry even without portrait and even on focusing at one particular point
rows.Problem: My rear camera is not working properly. It is taking blurry photos even without portrait. I'm trying to take normal photos and even if I focus a point that point is still blurry. I have update my phone to latest available software.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera takes blurry photos even when focused and without portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to produce clear images under normal usage, making photos unusable and affecting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The wide camera lens cannot move due to coil fault, gap, or PCB issues; recommend camera module exchange and advise against using the phone on bicycles or motorcycles to prevent physical damage.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Faster battery drain after UI 7 update, provided resolutions not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Users report faster battery drain after the UI 7 update, with existing resolutions ineffective.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain causes device to shut down prematurely, rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to continuous data usage, CP continues to shoot TX power. But there is no useful CP log so we can not find why TX power is high.

rows.Title: Battery drain after update
rows.Problem: Device consumes more battery after latest update, screen on time is very low. User is considering selling the device and ending relationship with Samsung. Previous issue about battery backup raised 2 months ago.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after the latest software update, resulting in very short screen on time.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, which severely impacts daily usage and user satisfaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Comprehensive GMS log analysis indicates WhatsApp app is a major power consumer; third-party app behavior is outside Samsung's control, but ongoing optimization of background services is recommended.

rows.Title: Login issue with email ID on Samsung Account
rows.Problem: Unable to login to Samsung Account using email ID; system shows incorrect name or birth date or email not registered, despite user providing correct details. Likely due to typo in name or birth date by account creator who no longer remembers.
rows.Summarized Problem: User cannot log in to Samsung Account using correct email and personal details due to mismatch in name or birth date, possibly caused by a past typo during account creation.
rows.Severity Reason: The user is unable to access their account, which is essential for device functionality and personal settings, making it unusable without authentication.
rows.R&D Comment: Account is blocked and email not verified; account withdrawal required. User must contact CS for verification and resolution.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Camera is producing crap quality images despite phone being 3 months old and updated with latest OS, with no physical damage or cover issues
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces low-quality images despite the device being up to date and having no physical damage.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is producing consistently poor image quality, which directly affects core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Please attach original pictures for more accurate problem analysis. We can't check the information taken without the original picture and debugging information.

rows.Title: Battery drain, overheat and slow charge observed in the device after update
rows.Problem: Device experiencing battery drain, overheat, and slow charging after software update. Previous performance was smooth. Issues appear to be caused by the software update, not user settings. App-specific CPU usage reported as excessive by Meta, under investigation.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain, overheating, and slow charging after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to battery drain and overheating, which directly affect core device functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. The Meta engineering team is currently investigating it and will update through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster and phone started heating after 20 to 30 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains faster and the phone heats up after 20 to
rows.Severity Reason: The device battery drains faster and overheats, which can lead to device malfunction or shutdown.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. The issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Notification saying refining picture after taking picture
rows.Problem: A pop-up notification appears saying 'refining picture' and stays for a very long time after taking a picture in the camera app
rows.Summarized Problem: A persistent notification saying 'refining picture' appears after taking a picture in the camera app.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification remains active for a long time, causing user annoyance, but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Actual log coverage for the issue is missing; reupload logs when the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Swipe left and right quick panel for notification and quick icon is not working
rows.Problem: When swiping down from left or right, the device opens notification only and cannot access different elements via left or right swipes
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel does not respond to left or right swipes, only showing notifications instead of accessing quick icons.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions, preventing access to quick icons while only showing notifications.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Media sound gets muted when notification comes while connected to bluetooth
rows.Problem: Media sound gets muted for the duration of notification vibration when connected to bluetooth, even in vibrate mode. This only occurs when notification vibration is synced to the notification sound, not when using a different vibration effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media sound is muted when a notification arrives while connected to Bluetooth, specifically when notification vibration is synced to the notification sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of media audio during notifications, rendering a key user experience function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to notification stream volume being muted when vibration is synced to sound; a fix requires adjusting stream volume handling during Bluetooth connectivity and notification playback.

rows.Title: Wallpaper & Style error pop up
rows.Problem: Error pop up occurs consistently in the LockStar app within the GoodLock module
rows.Summarized Problem: Error pop-ups occur consistently when using the Wallpaper & Style feature in the Lock Screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The error pop-up occurs consistently and disrupts the user experience in a core Lock Screen feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery backup reduced from 7-8 hours to 4-5 hours after One UI 7.1 update
rows.Problem: Battery backup has reduced from 7-8 hours to 4-5 hours after updating to One UI 7.1. Despite trying cache wipe, battery saver, turning off background scanning, app sleep settings, dark mode, 60Hz refresh rate, minimizing apps in RAM, factory reset, and software update from service center, the battery life remains at 4-5 hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly decreased from 7-8 hours to 4--5 hours after updating to One UI 7.1, despite multiple troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is no longer usable for extended usage, and battery life reduction is severe and persistent, impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by high CPU usage in the YouTube app (24-25%) during operation, which is a third-party app not developed by Samsung. Root cause analysis is beyond Samsung's capability due to lack of access to Google's source code.

rows.Title: Screen freezes during scrolling Instagram
rows.Problem: Screen freezes during scrolling Instagram after recent UI 7 update. Phone gets stuck with Bluetooth turned off. Only restarting phone resolves the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen freezes when scrolling through Instagram, causing usability issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freezing during scrolling renders the device unusable for social media interaction, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by UI 7 update; resolution involves updating Instagram app, clearing cache, and restarting device.

rows.Title: Time shows horizontal thick line on tiny front screen
rows.Problem: After folding the phone, the tiny front screen shows a horizontal thick line where the time should be, covering the full screen width
rows.Summarized Problem: A horizontal thick line appears on the lock screen time display after folding the phone, covering the full screen width.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue blocks visibility of the time on the lock screen, making it unusable for users to check the time immediately after device folding.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue may be related to a third-party app package (YouTube Music) interaction; user should clear data and cache and verify with fresh logs if problem persists.

rows.Title: Mobile network Auto option not available
rows.Problem: Unable to set network mode to auto connect
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set mobile network mode to auto connect.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is unavailable, preventing intended automatic connection but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drains faster after updating to one ui 7
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after updating to one ui 7 and lock screen charging animation is problematic
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery drains faster after updating to one ui 7, with a problematic lock screen charging animation.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and charging animation issues impair core device functionality and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Device was mostly in poor network area, leading to increased power consumption due to cellular signal strength.

rows.Title: UI lagging after ui7 update
rows.Problem: UI is lagging especially with keywords and overheating issue after ui7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The UI is lagging significantly, especially when using keywords, following the ui7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag in specific use cases but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share symptoms video with same time matching timestamp logs

rows.Title: Battery backup reduced after updating to One UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery life has decreased from two charges per day to three to four charges per day despite unchanged usage patterns.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly decreased after the One UI 7 update due to increased background power usage by the Instagram app.
rows.Severity Reason: The device requires multiple charges daily, indicating a major degradation in battery performance under normal usage, making the device unusable for daily operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app is consuming excessive background CPU power; reported to Meta and expected to be fixed in v382.

rows.Title: App icon did not change after update
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, app icons did not change even though all apps were updated from the Samsung Store
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons fail to update after a system and app update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app appearance but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue has been fixed in the latest OneUI home; users should check after updating from the store.

rows.Title: Google app icon not showing
rows.Problem: The icon of an app is disappearing completely.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google app icon is disappearing completely from the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The app icon disappearance makes the app inaccessible, preventing user interaction with the app.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: System UI isn't responding on opening Samsung Members
rows.Problem: System UI is unresponsive
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI becomes unresponsive when opening Samsung Members.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI unresponsiveness prevents normal device operation and may cause the device to become unresponsive during key interactions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device gets hanged & touch became unresponsive
rows.Problem: Phone touch stopped working after update, phone gets hanged for more than hours
rows.Summarized Problem: After an update, the phone becomes unresponsive and touch input stops working, causing device to hang for extended periods.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, making it unusable, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Device hangs and touch becomes unresponsive; user must re-raise issue with logs and video during sluggish scenario.

rows.Title: Rear camera flickers
rows.Problem: Rear primary camera vibrates for more than one minute then becomes normal, vibration is felt and visible, issue occurs after software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear primary camera vibrates for over a minute after a software update before returning to normal.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera vibration lasts over a minute, causing significant user disruption and potential usability issues, indicating a major malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and misalignment due to improper assembly and curing; improved jig and OVS inspection to prevent recurrence.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster when using Insta, especially with Dream Cricket 2025 app playing on speaker. Device heats up during use, and battery performance is poor after May update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain when using the Dream Cricket 2025 app with speaker, especially during Insta usage, and heats up as a result.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and occurs during active use, leading to reduced device usability and heating issues that impair overall performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by high usage of Dream Cricket 2025 with speaker; no abnormal background behavior found in logs, but app usage is a known contributor to high power consumption.

rows.Title: Slight delay when notification panel is swiped down
rows.Problem: A slight delay and lag is felt when swiping down to view the notification panel. Battery drains slightly faster after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: There is a noticeable lag when swiping down to view the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a delay in response but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Additional information required: specific app usage, reproduction video, and device logs to identify root cause and validate the issue.

rows.Title: Long press notification app name overlaps notification text
rows.Problem: Long pressing a notification to enter the notification center renders a broken UI where the app name text appears on top of the notification text, regardless of the app
rows.Summarized Problem: When long pressing a notification, the app name overlaps the notification text, causing a broken UI.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the notification center UI, affecting user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Call background color tone changes after call ends
rows.Problem: The background color tone differs between before and after a call ends
rows.Summarized Problem: The background color tone changes after a call ends, differing from the pre-call state.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visual inconsistency during a call flow but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining much faster than usual, even with minimal usage and standard settings, after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain after the One UI 7 update, even with minimal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly under normal usage, making the device unusable without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixes available in Continuity Service App (AP3A.240905.015.A2.S711NKSU5CYDA) via Galaxy Store; request QA to verify latest binary and register new PLM if issue persists.

rows.Title: Authenticator in accessibility doesn't turn off when power saving mode is on
rows.Problem: Authentication issue when switching to power saving mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The accessibility authenticator does not turn off when power saving mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the accessibility feature during power saving mode, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is the intended behaviour of MPSM mode to save battery drainage, consistent with Google's Battery Saver policy.

rows.Title: Battery drain observed in the device
rows.Problem: Battery backup has decreased significantly after the May security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains faster significantly after the May security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is a major function failure that impacts device usability and operation duration.
rows.R&D Comment: Wake lock issues in AudioMix and system jobs are causing excessive battery drain; countermeasure confirms same root cause.

rows.Title: Device overheating during video calls
rows.Problem: Device overheats during video calls on WhatsApp, Google Meet, and Zoom, even in cool environments and on both Wi-Fi and mobile data, affecting usability and raising concerns about long-term battery health.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during video calls, even in cool environments and on both Wi-Fi and mobile data, affecting user comfort and potentially impacting battery health.
rows.Severity Reason: The overheating occurs during video calls but does not cause device crash, freeze, or data loss; it is a partial malfunction that affects usability but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during WhatsApp video calls reaches 38°C, within expected thermal limits for VT calls; no abnormalities detected in logs or power consumption.

rows.Title: Automatic brightness not working
rows.Problem: Automatic brightness is not working correctly after one UI 7 update. Phone automatically dims down after 30 seconds of usage and brightness needs to be increased manually. I have phone on power saving mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically dims after 30 seconds of usage, preventing automatic brightness from functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of screen brightness control, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a new power saving setting in ONE UI 7.0 that sets screen timeout to 30 seconds, which conflicts with automatic brightness; users should disable this setting in power saving mode to prevent dimming.

rows.Title: App icons not changed after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Some app icons look the same as in One UI 6 even after updating to One UI 7. All updates are installed, but the issue persists. Is this a bug?
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons remain unchanged from One UI 6 after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been fixed and the user will receive the fix version via the store in the next MR.

rows.Title: Device lag
rows.Problem: Device is unresponsive and sluggish
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing significant lag due to being in power saving mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unresponsive and sluggish, making it difficult to use effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Refining process takes too long on clicking pictures
rows.Problem: After installing One UI 7, image processing takes excessively long, failing to complete even after 14 hours. Users have tried reducing optimization, clearing cache, and resetting camera, but issue persists. A screenshot shows processing time over 13 minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: Image processing takes excessively long and fails to complete after extended periods, even after attempting troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The image processing fails to complete within a reasonable time, rendering the camera function unusable for practical use.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Hotspot fails to turn on
rows.Problem: Hotspot fails to turn on after updating to onu ui 7, requires multiple restarts to enable
rows.Summarized Problem: The hotspot feature fails to turn on after updating to onu ui 7 and requires multiple device restarts to become functional.
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot is a core network function that fails repeatedly, rendering the device unable to share internet connectivity without restarts, which significantly impacts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a failure in the WiFi interface index retrieval during boot; countermeasure recommends hardware inspection for Wi-Fi chipset issues.

rows.Title: Device getting auto restart
rows.Problem: Phone stuck at restart phase for more than six times after One UI 7 update, major issue in flagship device
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly restarts and gets stuck during the restart process.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly restarting and getting stuck, making it unusable after the update.
rows.R&D Comment: Abnormal power off issue observed; device needs service center inspection for defective parts.

rows.Title: Selfie camera stops working
rows.Problem: Selfie camera stops working and shows an error. User has tried restart, reset, deleted apps, and updated to latest version but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The selfie camera fails to function and displays an error despite multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera stops working entirely, preventing basic device functionality, and persists after all software troubleshooting steps.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera sensor (S5K3LU) is faulty and requires physical replacement at a hardware center.

rows.Title: Purple tint visible when brightness is low and dark mode is enabled
rows.Problem: A purple tint is visible when device brightness is low and dark mode is enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: A purple tint appears on the display when brightness is low and dark mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance under specific conditions but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery life significantly decreased after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery life significantly decreased following the One UI 7 update. Prior to the update, battery performance was satisfactory without any power-saving measures; all tablet features were used without restriction. Now, feature deactivation is required to maintain acceptable battery life, which undermines the device's value proposition.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly decreased after the One UI 7 update, requiring feature deactivation to maintain acceptable performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable without power-saving measures, undermining core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Power consumption is high due to background activity from apps like YouTube, Instagram, and WhatsApp; countermeasure shows no change in behavior, indicating insufficient optimization or unaddressed background drain.

rows.Title: Alarm sound low after UI 7
rows.Problem: Alarm volume is too low after updating to UI 7. It was louder before. Tested on multiple devices; older A7 tab has louder alarms than current S9 tab.
rows.Summarized Problem: Alarm sound is significantly lower after UI 7 update compared to previous version.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm volume is reduced, affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue scenario is not captured in logs; users are requested to attach logs when the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Battery Drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after update, especially with background services like Bluetooth and location, which were previously off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains faster after software update due to prolonged background activity from Google services.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable as battery drains rapidly, requiring frequent charging and disrupting normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: GMS app is running continuously in background, consuming significant power; this is a third-party service outside Samsung's control, and further investigation is needed to assess mitigation options.

rows.Title: Battery drain on light usage
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly even when phone is used lightly
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain even during light usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, which significantly limits practical phone usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause identified in third-party app wake-up events; countermeasure is to request the app developer to fix the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster than before. Screen on time has dropped from around 8 hours to barely 6 hours despite using adaptive brightness and light performance profile. User has tried clearing app cache and switching from 5G to 4G, with no improvement. Usage is now in air-conditioned environments to avoid direct sunlight.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains faster than usual, with screen on time decreasing from 8 to 6 hours despite optimal settings and reduced usage conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is significant and affects core device usability, with screen on time dropping below expected levels for a flagship device, making it unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by user-enabled display extra brightness; countermeasure is to recommend disabling the extra brightness setting for better efficiency.

rows.Title: Now brief not getting any activity updates
rows.Problem: Selected all content in service but didn't get any update in now brief
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is not showing activity updates despite selecting all content in service.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not update as expected, but the core functionality is still partially available and not completely broken.
rows.R&D Comment: Now Brief works based on user app usage and context information; users should verify their setup and app interactions before reporting issues.

rows.Title: Lock Screen shows for a second before turning off when locked via double tap
rows.Problem: After completing minor tasks and locking the phone via double-tap, a one-second delay occasionally occurs before the screen locks, displaying only the wallpaper. This behavior is inconsistent with expected functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen displays for a second before turning off after a double-tap lock, causing a brief visual inconsistency.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes an inconsistent user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: No improvement in battery after following all steps. Specifically after one UI 7 update on S24 Ultra. Very frustrating, does not want to sell the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after the UI 7 update, with no improvement despite following all troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is severe and persistent, rendering the device unusable for daily use, leading to user frustration and potential device disposal.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by excessive CPU usage from a third-party app (Truecaller), which is not preloaded and not under Samsung's control. A countermeasure has been proposed: the issue is classified as a third-party app problem and should be closed accordingly.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery percentage dropped significantly after 9 hours of use, even with battery saver on, and continues to drain rapidly after updating to UI 7. Typing also causes additional battery loss.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain, especially after updating to UI 7, with significant consumption even when battery saver is active.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable quickly due to uncontrolled battery drain, leading to unexpected shutdowns or inability to use the device beyond a short period.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screen color and font become blurry
rows.Problem: The screen color, font, and text appear blurry and not readable. The issue appears after using the phone, and although a screenshot shows normal appearance on another device, the screen looks different when viewed on the phone. Resetting settings and factory reset temporarily fixes it, but the issue returns after five minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen text and font appear blurry and unreadable, especially after device usage, with the issue returning after a short period despite factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects readability but does not cause device failure or crash, and resolves temporarily after a reset.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Relumino outline feature being enabled; users should be guided to disable it to resolve the blurriness.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery draining fast after ONE UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery is draining rapidly after the ONE UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly, which makes the device unusable due to frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: High battery consumption caused by background apps; mitigation requires app-level power optimization.

rows.Title: Video does not cover whole screen when zoomed on Hotstar
rows.Problem: When zooming in on Hotstar, only half of the video is zoomed and the other half remains unzoomed. On YouTube, videos sometimes play in background without audio and appear blacked out.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback on Hotstar and YouTube shows partial zoom or blacked out screens during playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial video display and occasional black screen, affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Known app-side issue on Android devices across multiple OS versions; requires app-level fix.

rows.Title: Network switched from 5G to 4G automatically while playing game
rows.Problem: Game connectivity drops from 5G to 4G after starting play; issue persists for one to two months despite phone reset
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically switches from 5-5G to 4G during gameplay, causing disconnection.
rows.Severity Reason: The network switch during gameplay leads to disconnection, disrupting user experience and rendering the game unplayable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi Calling turns off on device restart
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi Calling turns off when the phone restarts. It should remain on after reboot.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi Calling turns off after device restart, failing to remain active as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to remain active after reboot, which is essential for consistent connectivity and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: No logs available to confirm the issue; customer advised to collect logs if Wi-Fi Calling turns off after reboot.

rows.Title: Ghost touch issue
rows.Problem: Ghost touch problems after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience ghost touch problems after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect input responses, making the device unusable in certain scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: phone freezing and then restarting when scrolling reels
rows.Problem: phone freezing and then restarting when scrolling reels
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes and restarts when scrolling through reels on social media apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and restarts during normal use, causing a complete loss of functionality during content navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device overheat issue
rows.Problem: My device is overheating just from using WhatsApp. Now bar is not working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when using WhatsApp and the Now bar is not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal use and failure of a key UI feature indicate a major malfunction that affects usability and device stability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar is not working
rows.Problem: My Now bar is not working; that setting doesn't show my AOD display. I did everything, but it's not working; I can't see it on my S23 Ultra.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar on the lock screen is not displaying the AOD content.
rows.Severity Reason: The Now bar is a core lock screen feature that fails to show AOD content, making it unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause and countermeasure indicate duplicate issues with the same root cause; the issue should be closed and monitored via P250528-00558.

rows.Title: Device freezes and auto restart issue
rows.Problem: Phone freezes when using Instagram app, then auto restarts. Phone takes a lot of heat when playing games
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and auto-restarts when using the Instagram app and overheats during gaming.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and auto-restarts during app usage, which renders the device unusable and causes overheating, leading to potential device damage or instability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a server-side problem with META's content metadata handling and has been resolved; no further action required.

rows.Title: Heating observed in device on using camera or while playing games
rows.Problem: Device gets very hot when using camera app or playing games for 30 minutes, reaching nearly 50 degrees Celsius, despite normal temperature when screen is off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats significantly during camera usage or gaming sessions.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating during active use renders it potentially unsafe and unusable, posing a risk of damage or performance failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient log coverage prevents accurate analysis of thermal behavior under load.

rows.Title: Degraded picture quality with unusual brightness
rows.Problem: After oneui7 update, photo gets distorted when zoomed in, the picture clarity is degraded, moreover unusual brightness and degradation in video stabilisation is also being noticed. Specifically, the 10x, 3x lenses, and portrait mode 1x and 0.6 exhibit subpar performance with over exposure, characterized by excessive noise, grain, and reduced saturation, color, and contrast.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo clarity and brightness are degraded, especially in zoomed-in shots and portrait mode, with visible noise, grain, and reduced color and contrast.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core image quality in multiple modes and leads to visibly poor photo output, impacting user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: The degradation is caused by low image quality settings and ProMode lacking HDR support; users should switch to Auto Mode and adjust quality optimization to Maximum.

rows.Title: Now bar not aligned on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now bar not aligned on Lock Screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not aligned properly and appears above the fingerprint sensor on the Lock Screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual alignment and user experience but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Heating observed in device on using camera
rows.Problem: The device overheats significantly when using the camera, even with minimal usage and no heavy apps or background processes. Temperature exceeds 45°C, indicating severe heating, not just slight warmth.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats significantly during camera use, reaching temperatures over 45°C, even with minimal usage and no background apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats to over 45°C during camera use, which can lead to performance issues or hardware damage, making it unusable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera usage in high ambient temperature and low network conditions causes significant heating; this is not due to device operation peculiarities but environmental exposure and multi-window usage.

rows.Title: Device heating during video playback on YouTube
rows.Problem: Phone overheats while charging and watching videos on YouTube, especially in multiwindow mode with apps like WhatsApp using camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during video playback on YouTube while charging, especially in multiwindow mode with camera-intensive apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during normal usage but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is within expected thermal limits under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is observed during multiwindow usage with camera apps; thermal management system operates within expected parameters under these conditions.

rows.Title: Home screen icons do not align correctly
rows.Problem: Home screen icons do not align correctly
rows.Summarized Problem: Home screen icons are misaligned and do not appear in the correct position.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual layout of the home screen, causing misalignment of icons, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home; will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Google security version reset to February after update
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, the device's Google security version reset from April to February
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's Google security version has been reset from April to February after a One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core system setting but does not cause device crash or data loss, and the functionality remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device became unresponsive
rows.Problem: The device became unresponsive after a sudden event; unable to clear apps, swipe to left, open settings, or close notifications. App drawer not opening. Phone was working fine before. Restart did not resolve the issue. Device had limited battery.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device became unresponsive, preventing users from clearing apps, swiping to close them, or accessing settings, with the app drawer failing to open.
rows.Severity Reason: The device became completely unresponsive across multiple core functions, including app management and settings access, making it unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery performance degraded
rows.Problem: Battery performance degraded after updating to OneUI 7. There's huge battery drain. I am using S23FE with health in Good and normal as per diagnostics. It goes from 100 to 0 percent in very moderate usage in 2-3 hours with 1 hour of SOT with light 10 mins gaming at best.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device battery drains rapidly during moderate usage after updating to OneUI 7, dropping from 100% to
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains to zero in 2-3 hours under moderate usage, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation; once fixed, it will be updated through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Device freezes while scrolling instagram
rows.Problem: While using the instagram app on device model S23, the Reels screen intermittently gets stuck or freezes. The issue occurs repeatedly. Checked for reboot, reset but no solution. Very frustrating since last 2 months.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Instagram Reels screen intermittently freezes while scrolling, causing a poor user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent freezing during normal use but does not result in device crash or data loss, affecting only a specific feature within the app.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a server-side problem in META's content delivery, specifically related to HDR10+ metadata in HLG images, and has been resolved on the server side. No further action required.

rows.Title: Notification not showing on lockscreen
