rows.Problem: Notification is visible in home screen quick panel but not in lock screen. It happens intermittently and has been observed only with WhatsApp.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp notifications fail to display on the lock screen, though they appear on the home screen quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and affects only specific notifications, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Quick panel settings not expanding fully
rows.Problem: Quick setting panel does not open fully after initial pull and gets stuck at the initial view. Scrolling does not resolve it. The issue occurs after upgrading to UI v7 and was not present in UI v6. It intermittently returns after a period of time.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick setting panel fails to expand fully after being pulled and gets stuck at the initial view, especially after upgrading to UI v7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the panel functionality, preventing full access to settings, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Call drops observed in the device
rows.Problem: Connectivity issues, call drops and internet connectivity issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience call drops and internet connectivity issues during usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops render the device unusable for voice communication, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Server-side authentication error (401 unauthorized) during IMS registration is observed; CP logs are needed to validate channel conditions and confirm root cause.

rows.Title: samsung keyboard not auto fetching OTP
rows.Problem: Samsung keyboard used to auto fetch OTP from SMS app and show it on the top of the keyboard. This feature is no longer visible
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard no longer auto-fetches OTP from SMS and displays it on the top of the keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the keyboard still functions for basic typing, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Slow document scanning speed via camera
rows.Problem: The document scanning speed via camera is slow, resulting in single-file outputs instead of multiple files, and requires output in PDF format.
rows.Summarized Problem: Document scanning via camera is slow and produces single-file outputs instead of multiple files.
rows.Severity Reason: The scanning speed is suboptimal, causing partial malfunction in output generation but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The recognition rate is improving, but execution speed remains limited; future version development will address performance improvements.

rows.Title: Device auto restart while using instagram and also overheating
rows.Problem: Phone gets very hot while using simple apps like Instagram and gets stuck, then restarts itself
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and restarts when using Instagram, indicating a thermal management issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts during app usage, which renders it unusable and poses a safety risk due to overheating.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by server-side metadata handling in Instagram content and has been resolved on the server side; no device-level action required.

rows.Title: App icon disappearing frequently from folders
rows.Problem: Some app icons are disappearing frequently from Samsung app folders, with names and placeholders still visible. Occasionally, app icon images are mixed between different apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons frequently disappear from folders and are sometimes incorrectly mixed between different apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes functional loss of app access and data confusion, making the device unusable for navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Face lock gets activated on its own
rows.Problem: Face unlock option gets activated on its own even when face data is deleted and screen lock face option is turned off, displaying an error message on lock screen. The issue persists after device restart and reappears within a day or two.
rows.Summarized Problem: The face unlock feature activates on its own despite being disabled and face data being deleted, causing an error message on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature activates independently when it should not, leading to a visible error and potential user confusion, making the device appear to malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Charge percentage overlap on icon in Battery Status Widget
rows.Problem: Battery Status Widget is not optimised. The charge percentage is overloop on icons. The Now Bar's position is not in center in Always On Display.
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery charge percentage overlaps on icons in the Battery Status Widget, and the Now Bar is not centered in the Always On Display.
rows.Severity Reason: The charge percentage overlap on icons causes visual confusion and disrupts user experience, making it difficult to read battery status.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue was not reproducible in latest binary; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining too fast in oneui 7, especially when using YouTube, WhatsApp, and Facebook with high brightness. Was good in oneui 6 but now drains rapidly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain, particularly when using apps like YouTube, WhatsApp, and Facebook with high brightness, even when the screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly under normal usage, leading to device becoming unusable before a full charge cycle ends, indicating a major performance issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Slow charging
rows.Problem: Slow charging issue persists despite all required steps being completed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device charges very slowly despite all required steps being completed.
rows.Severity Reason: The charging issue persists after proper steps, indicating a partial malfunction of the charging function.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Check if this device has good battery life
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing excessive battery drain, leading to poor battery life.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain causes the device to lose power quickly, making it unusable without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: App crashes may contribute to excessive battery usage; recommend disabling or updating the problematic app to reduce drain.

rows.Title: Ghost touch observed while using Youtube
rows.Problem: Device has an auto touch problem after software update, causing significant frustration
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits ghost touch issues after a software update, leading to unintended touch actions during video playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The auto touch problem causes device malfunction and disrupts user interaction, making the device unusable during normal use.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause likely involves a hardware defect in the touch sensor panel; recommend user inspection at service center with panel hardware check or replacement.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery percentage missing in UI, battery drains quickly, UI 7 is not acceptable, user wants to revert to UI 6
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery percentage is missing in the UI, and the device experiences rapid battery drain after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The missing battery percentage and rapid battery drain make the device unusable for daily use, affecting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is not occurring with the latest released version; increased battery consumption is attributed to new features in One UI 7, and performance improvements in the latest release will resolve it.

rows.Title: Battery backup reduces after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery performance deviates from its typical behavior after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery performance degrades after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery behavior deviates from normal but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background; Meta is investigating and will update via Play Store.

rows.Title: Camera image quality degraded
rows.Problem: Following the One UI 7 update, image quality has significantly declined with increased noise and loss of detail, especially in telephoto lens shots. A factory reset has been performed but issue persists. Comparative examples before and after the update are attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo and video quality has deteriorated significantly after the One UI 7 update, with increased noise and loss of detail, particularly in telephoto lens shots.
rows.Severity Reason: The degradation in image quality affects core camera functionality and is noticeable in real-world use, especially under low-light conditions, making it a major usability issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is not affected by One UI updates; however, the provided image appears to be heavily processed due to high ISO and low light, and debugging information is unavailable. Original image required for accurate analysis.

rows.Title: Pointer popped randomly around middle of the screen
rows.Problem: The pointer issue was not resolved after full reset. Pointer popped randomly just now. Around middle of the screen. Happened in last 3-4 min of this report
rows.Summarized Problem: The pointer on the launcher randomly jumps to the middle of the screen and does not stay stable.
rows.Severity Reason: The pointer issue persists after a full reset and occurs intermittently, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Battery drain and heating after security patch update
rows.Problem: Device experiences heating and battery drain after security patch update, with performance issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain and overheating after a security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing battery drain and heating, which are critical issues affecting usability and device safety.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery degradation detected; user advised to replace battery at service center.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Unoptimized battery performance during daily usage and idle drain
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain during daily use and when idle due to unoptimized battery performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain during daily use and idle periods makes the device unusable without charging, leading to a significant impact on user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Power consumption is high due to Instagram running in background; recommend updating Instagram to the latest version.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, low battery backup is noticed. Battery degradation is not suspected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience rapid battery drain after updating to One UI 7, with no indication of hardware degradation.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is observed after an update, but no complete device failure or data loss is reported; functionality remains partially usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage appears normal based on logs; request QA to collect logs under controlled conditions with no background apps.

rows.Title: Device has become slow and display refresh rate reduced
rows.Problem: After One UI 7 update, the phone has become very slow and the refresh rate of the display has reduced. All over device is slow, battery backup reduced, camera performance reduced, over heating issue, refresh rate not working properly automatically down as 60hz, 5G network connectivity low even compared to competition brand mobile phone. Please improve in next FOTA update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device has become significantly slower and the display refresh rate has dropped to 60Hz after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing overall slowness and a critical drop in display refresh rate, which impacts core usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain and performance issues are primarily caused by third-party apps (InstagramPro and YouTube); users should update these apps and perform a full device idle cycle to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Device suddenly resets after ending WhatsApp call
rows.Problem: Device suddenly resets after ending WhatsApp call. Mobile charged was 47%.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device resets unexpectedly after ending a WhatsApp call.
rows.Severity Reason: The device resets after a call ends, which is a critical failure that can disrupt user experience and lead to data loss or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wallpaper doesn't show up
rows.Problem: Call background screen shows plain colour instead of assigned background or caller background. Camera app is slow when selecting menus and using the app. Weather widget lags and stutters during navigation. Battery usage is not auto-marked and is high. App performance has degraded after One UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background screen displays a plain colour instead of the assigned background or caller background.
rows.Severity Reason: The call background fails to display the intended image, resulting in a blank or plain appearance, which significantly impacts user experience and usability during calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Show contact photo background when contact photo is not saved. Countermeasure: Fix to show default background in this case and include in next MR version.

rows.Title: Camera failed warning comes up on launching camera
rows.Problem: Still camera not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The still camera is not working and displays a failure warning when launching the camera app.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to function upon launch, resulting in a failure warning, which prevents users from using the still camera feature entirely.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be hardware-specific; recommend checking the rear camera module for defects or improper connection.

rows.Title: Not showing glance for Samsung topics
rows.Problem: Device not showing glance for Samsung topics since 2024
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is not displaying the Samsung topics glance feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing on the device but does not prevent full device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Require CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: WiFi keeps searching network & doesn't connect
rows.Problem: When I try to turn on the WiFi on my device, it keeps displaying searching for WiFi and does not connect at all. Have finished trying network reset also factory reset but still same issue continues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device continuously searches for WiFi networks but fails to connect, even after factory reset and network reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a WiFi connection, preventing basic internet access and rendering the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a PCIe interface problem preventing the WiFi chipset from powering up; a hardware inspection at the service center is required as a countermeasure.

rows.Title: Battery drain faster
rows.Problem: Battery life has suddenly decreased from 6 hours to 4 hours on average usage after updating from ONE UI 6.1 to 7.0, likely due to poor optimization in the new UI version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has dropped from 6 hours to 4 hours after updating to ONE UI 7.0, likely due to poor optimization.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is no longer usable under normal usage conditions due to significantly reduced battery life.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Battery consumption has increased by 10 to 20 percentage. Uncertain if clearing cache partition is safe and whether it affects internal storage.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery consumption has increased significantly, with users unsure whether clearing cache will help or affect internal storage.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly, which makes the device unusable for daily use and raises concerns about data and storage integrity.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage is not captured in current logs; request QA to provide logs under controlled conditions to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Video has high contrast in low light
rows.Problem: HDR10 has contrast problems in low light. Playing HDR images on SDR monitors makes them look high contrast; recommended to play on HDR-compatible monitors or Samsung phones.
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos taken in low light with HDR10 have high contrast, appearing unnatural when played on standard displays.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual quality in low-light conditions but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is mitigated by user-end playback settings.
rows.R&D Comment: The contrast issue in low-light HDR videos is due to current image quality optimization; recommended to play HDR content on HDR-compatible displays.

rows.Title: Status bar overlaps on main activity
rows.Problem: Status bar glitch by opening notification section of any personal chat on WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar overlaps the main content when opening a personal chat notification in WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the UI layout during specific interactions, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Significant lag and performance issues
rows.Problem: The device has been experiencing significant lag and performance issues after updating to One UI 7. The user interface feels sluggish, app transitions are not smooth, and overall responsiveness has decreased noticeably. Basic troubleshooting steps have been tried but the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy S21 FE launcher shows significant lag and sluggish performance after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves noticeable but not complete failure of responsiveness, affecting user experience during normal operations, though the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The lag is caused by continuous use in power saving mode, which limits device performance. Users should switch to normal mode for optimal performance; if issues persist, further details and logs are needed.

rows.Title: Device switches from 5G to 4G
rows.Problem: The phone is getting hot and then switches from 5G to 4
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches from 5G to 4G after overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The device switches from 5G to 4G after overheating, which indicates a potential malfunction in network operation under thermal stress, leading to loss of high-speed connectivity and possible device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screenshare icon stays on status bar
rows.Problem: After updating to one ui 7, the screenshare icon stays on the status bar even after ending the screenshare.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screenshare icon remains on the status bar after screenshare is ended.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a persistent visual indicator that does not disappear after use, affecting user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery issues despite dark mode and battery optimization settings; Instagram app consumes significant battery in background.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains quickly due to Instagram consuming excessive background power.
rows.Severity Reason: Instagram is consuming 8.52% of battery in background, leading to rapid battery drain and device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app consumes significant battery in background; update to latest version to reduce power consumption.

rows.Title: Rotate to landscape mode is disabled
rows.Problem: Rotate to landscape mode is disabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's ability to rotate to landscape mode is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home; will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Device keeps switching 5G mode to 4G mode always
rows.Problem: Phone slows down, freezes, overheats, and frequently switches from 5G to 4
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently switches from 5G to 4G mode and experiences freezing, overheating, and performance degradation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent switching between network modes and freezing, leading to poor connectivity and performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate root cause and validate behavior.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: I have an S24 FE 5G. After updating to One UI 7, I have a battery drain issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain after updating to One UI 7, specifically due to the Instagram app consuming high CPU in the background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant battery drain, leading to device unusability due to rapid power depletion.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. The issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Audio from the phone’s speaker sounds distorted and crackles
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, audio from the phone’s speaker sounds distorted and crackles, especially at higher volumes during media playback or calls. Bluetooth audio quality is also degraded—tinny, flat, and lacking clarity.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone’s speaker produces distorted and crackly audio, especially at higher volumes, and Bluetooth audio is degraded in quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio quality during media playback and calls, but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is intermittent or context-dependent.
rows.R&D Comment: In logs, only music playback is captured; path and volume are correctly applied, no abnormal logs related to crackling found. Issue may be related to playback handling or audio processing under high volume.

rows.Title: App icons missing
rows.Problem: Apps are going blank and sometimes show logo with other apps after UI 7 update; texting gets hung
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons are missing or showing incorrectly after UI 7 update, causing apps to go blank and text messaging to hang.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes apps to go blank and text messaging to hang, making the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared; scheduled for OneUI Home app update on May 9th.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining fast after update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery is draining quickly after the device update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences rapid battery drain, which significantly impacts usability and device performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by increased CPU usage from Instagram app; mitigation via Instagram v382 update.

rows.Title: No animation and lag when locking device
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, there is no animation and lag when locking the device using Double Tap to Lock or side button. It takes time to lock and sometimes requires pressing the side button twice.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits no animation and significant lag when locking, causing delayed response and requiring repeated button presses.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen function is delayed and lacks visual feedback, making it difficult to use and potentially leading to user frustration and device usability issues.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device issues in scanning and connecting Watch 6 Classic and Earbuds 3 Pro
rows.Problem: Degraded performance in scanning and connecting Watch 6 Classic and Earbuds 3 Pro after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth connectivity and scanning performance are degraded after the One UI 7 update, particularly with Watch 6 Classic and Earbuds
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in Bluetooth pairing and scanning, affecting specific devices but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: When tapped on the searched contact, it goes to the top, and the details of some random contact opens up.
rows.Problem: In contacts, when we search and click a contact the display name changes and while calling the wrong display name it connects with the original contact
rows.Summarized Problem: When a contact is searched and tapped, the app displays a random contact's details and uses a wrong display name during calling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect contact connections during calls, leading to potential miscommunication and device usability failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device overheat causing 5G network to drop to 4G & lag
rows.Problem: Device frequently overheats during multitasking and simple activities like video calls, YouTube streaming, or web browsing, causing 5G network to drop to 4 or 4G with significant lag. Camera quality has degraded, especially at 2X and 3X zoom. Issue persists after reset and began after updating to One UI 6.1 and 7.0.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during use, causing 5G to drop to 4G and resulting in lag, with camera quality degradation.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating leads to network drop and lag, making the device unusable for core functions like calls and browsing.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating caused by unofficial app with high CPU usage; recommend removing app [app.rvx.android.youtube] and closing as app issue.

rows.Title: Navigation button overlaps on UPI pin screen
rows.Problem: Navigation buttons (not gesture) are used while on the UPI pin screen during payment or balance check, causing the bottom numbers of the keyboard to merge
rows.Summarized Problem: Navigation buttons overlap with the keyboard on the UPI pin screen, causing input confusion during payments or balance checks.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of input interaction but does not prevent device usage or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Apps like chatgpt, instagram keeps crashing
rows.Problem: My phone keeps crashing and is slower after latest UI7 update. Apps keep crashing especially chatgpt and instagram. After switching to safe mode for 2 hours it has become stable. But as soon as I remove safe mode apps keep crashing every 10 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone crashes frequently after the UI7 update, especially with third-party apps like Instagram and ChatGPT, and instability returns once safe mode is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unstable and crashes repeatedly, especially with key apps, and instability returns immediately after safe mode is disabled, indicating a critical system-level issue affecting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app logs show deserialization and background module issues; countermeasure suggests app restart, update, and cache clearing, indicating a potential app-level defect with underlying system integration problems.

rows.Title: Device freeze and auto restart while using instagram
rows.Problem: Device freezes instantly and automatically restarts, with excessive heat on the display and back side
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and restarts when using Instagram, causing excessive heat and disrupting app functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable during app usage due to freezing and restarts, leading to a complete loss of functionality and potential hardware stress.
rows.R&D Comment: Heap overflow caused by mismatched iterator size; resolved by changing iterator type to size_t to accommodate larger blob sizes.

rows.Title: Lock Screen module not working
rows.Problem: The LockStar module is not functional after the UI7 update on tab s9
rows.Summarized Problem: The LockStar module is not working after the UI7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The module is completely non-functional after an update, making the lock screen unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Multi window display not proper while playing Instagram
rows.Problem: Multi window optimization is very bad; apps appear incorrectly in screen recording. Now bar on always on display not centered, sometimes tiled towards right
rows.Summarized Problem: Multi-window display appears incorrectly during Instagram usage, with apps misaligned and the now bar not centered on the always-on display.
rows.Severity Reason: The multi-window functionality is visibly broken during app usage, causing incorrect app layout and UI misalignment, which impacts usability during active tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lock screen clock can't be aligned
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock can't be aligned
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen cannot be aligned and keeps disappearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock function is partially malfunctioning, causing inconsistency in display but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery Draining Rapidly
rows.Problem: Battery draining rapidly even during idle or minimal use after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing rapid battery drain even during idle or minimal usage after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is severe and occurs during minimal use, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Device is in a poor network area; recommend keeping the device in a good network area to resolve battery drain.

rows.Title: Saved contacts blocked after update
rows.Problem: Saved contacts are being blocked on calls after updating to OneUI 7 with Android 15. Settings do not resolve the issue, and restarting the device has no effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Saved contacts are being blocked during calls after the latest OS update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from receiving calls from known contacts, making the device functionally unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: G shock watch not showing notifications on the mobile
rows.Problem: Bluetooth notification feature on G shock watch stops working after initial connection; no new notifications are received on the watch, despite working on a friend's Z Flip but not on Samsung S23 or brother's S23
rows.Summarized Problem: The G shock watch fails to receive new notifications after the initial connection via Bluetooth, despite working on some devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature stops working after initial setup, preventing users from receiving critical alerts, making the device functionally unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs do not contain sufficient information for BT connection/notification; capture logs as per steps and provide dumpstate & btsnoop logs

rows.Title: Unable to turn on Dolby atmos in game settings
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos gaming toggle is missing in OneUI 7. It used to be available in OneUI 6.1.1 and was supported in Call of Duty on S24 Plus. Now, the game shows it is not supported, despite previous functionality. This is my third report with attached files and logs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Dolby Atmos gaming toggle is missing in OneUI 7, causing users to lose the ability to enable Dolby Atmos in game settings on supported devices like S24 Plus.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a newer UI version, affecting user experience, but the core device functionality remains intact and is managed by third-party apps.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos for gaming switch was removed from OneUI 6.1.1; it now turns on automatically when Dolby Atmos is enabled, and Call of Duty manages it via third-party apps. Current status will be maintained.

rows.Title: Battery draining after updating phone
rows.Problem: Battery draining after updating my phone before it was going well
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's battery is draining rapidly after an update, with insufficient log data to fully analyze the issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing rapid battery drain, which significantly impacts usability and could lead to sudden shutdowns or device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drains faster after updating to One UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after updating to One UI 7. Charging speed slows down after 50%, previously slowed only after 80%. Phone takes 80 minutes to fully charge. Only gets 7 hours of battery life.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains quickly and charging slows down after 50% charge, significantly worse than before the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot maintain charge efficiently, leading to rapid battery depletion and impaired charging functionality, making the device unusable under normal use.
rows.R&D Comment: Input current limited by AICL; check external charger or cable. If issue persists, hardware inspection required.

rows.Title: Poor quality of portrait picture's sharpness & tone
rows.Problem: After one UI 7 update, camera quality has degraded significantly, with poor sharpness and tone in portrait shots. The device, which was purchased for 67k, now has poor image quality after 1.5 years, and the overall performance is unacceptable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait pictures have significantly degraded in sharpness and tone after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera's image quality has deteriorated to a point where portrait shots are unacceptably blurry and poorly toned, impacting core device functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The Quality optimization option is set to "Minimum" in Intelligent optimization menu; changing it to "Maximum" improves image quality.

rows.Title: Multiple clock issues, the selected alarm turns white in color and alarm data not visible
rows.Problem: When selecting one or more alarms using long press, the selected alarm turns white in color and the data of that particular alarm will not be visible. With the implementation of the new "Group Alarms", selecting multiple alarms and clicking on "Move" shows 6 folders created but doesn't display the folder names. Selecting any folder also fails to display properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Alarms app displays incorrect visual feedback when selecting alarms, with selected alarms turning white and data invisible, and folder names not displayed during group alarm operations.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot see alarm data or folder names, making it impossible to manage alarms effectively, which directly impacts usability of a core feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Group alarm BG and move dialog box along with background changes for alarm list have been implemented with commit IDs 070ecdb7f6abbbcd07f79eb748f506c253ff2df0, 8406599ab69991284fea85e5352f47518019fd1a, ff724f1449c109f4533137d0bc9535c526c566a2. Changes will be reflected in Clock APK version 12.4.10.4 and Theme APK version 15.0.40w.1

rows.Title: picture gets partially black
rows.Problem: Following the 7.0 update, Gallery photos are displaying as partially black
rows.Summarized Problem: Gallery photos are displaying with partial black areas after the 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo display but does not cause device crash or complete failure, only partial visual distortion.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Gesture swipe from left to go back doesn't work after one ui 7 update
rows.Problem: The gesture swipe from left to go back doesn't work often after upgrade to one ui 7. The right gesture to go back functions work just fine. It's just the left one.
rows.Summarized Problem: The left gesture swipe to go back fails intermittently after the One UI 7 update, while the right gesture works normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a primary navigation function but does not completely disable device usability or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain and heating issue
rows.Problem: Low battery backup and over heating, which was not present in beta version, requires update to prevent this from being my last Samsung device
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain and overheating, especially compared to beta version, affecting usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain and overheating, which are critical functional failures impacting core device operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp app holds partial wake locks for extended durations, leading to excessive power consumption. Countermeasure: Limit WhatsApp background data and reduce media auto-download to mitigate battery drain.

rows.Title: Find my phone got reset remotely
rows.Problem: A scammer tricked me into logging into a Gmail account linked to an Indonesian location. Shortly after, my Samsung device was remotely reset via the "Find My Device" feature, despite being connected to my regular Wi-Fi and having the network saved in my Samsung account.
rows.Summarized Problem: A device was remotely reset via the Find My Device feature after a scammer tricked the user into logging into a third-party Gmail account.
rows.Severity Reason: The remote reset of the device resulted in loss of all data and rendered the device unusable immediately after.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AOD displays application or widget on lockscreen wallpaper
rows.Problem: AOD displays application or widget on lockscreen wallpaper for a fraction of seconds
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always-On Display shows applications or widgets on the lockscreen wallpaper for a brief moment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual anomaly but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery backup issues
rows.Problem: My perfectly performing S23 Ultra has battery issues ever since updating to one UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after updating to one UI 7, with abnormal power consumption observed across multiple system functions.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows excessive power drain beyond normal usage, with actual power consumption exceeding computed values and affecting overall device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is caused by third-party apps installed from the Play Store and not preloaded on the device; no source code or commercial agreement exists between Samsung and the app owner, indicating it is a third-party application issue.

rows.Title: Device's screen freezes in between
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and cannot take screenshots or videos; unable to perform actions or send error logs
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen freezes during use, preventing user interaction and media capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes completely, making it unusable for basic functions like taking screenshots or videos.
rows.R&D Comment: Heap overflow caused by mismatched iterator size; resolved by changing iterator type to size_t to accommodate larger blob sizes.

rows.Title: Gesture recognition not working
rows.Problem: Gesture controls are not being registered or are too late, making navigation difficult. Bixby is not understanding voice commands.
rows.Summarized Problem: Gesture controls are not being recognized or are delayed, and Bixby fails to understand voice commands.
rows.Severity Reason: Gesture controls are essential for navigation, and Bixby failure impacts core device functionality, rendering the device difficult to use.
rows.R&D Comment: Gesture recognition failure is likely due to quick touch lift causing app exit; need to confirm behavior and check Bixby side.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good after update
rows.Problem: Camera quality and filters are not satisfactory after the UI 7 update, compared to previous versions
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera quality has significantly degraded after the UI 7 update, with users reporting poor image quality and filter performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Users report a major drop in camera performance, which directly impacts core device functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide original image and note that background brightness differences may affect image quality.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Phone is experiencing increased battery drain after update, despite usage pattern remaining unchanged. Device performance is not as expected, particularly in battery consumption. Bluetooth disconnection would affect connectivity to Galaxy Watch.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is draining battery faster after the update, even with unchanged usage patterns.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is significant and affects device usability, making it unusable for daily tasks without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain during screen-on state is increased; Instagram CPU overload issue will be fixed in v382, pending monitoring.

rows.Title: Circle to search doesnt select texts in search
rows.Problem: After first search result, second circle to search attempt does not select text and shows share option instead. Previously, there was an option to select text even if image recognition failed. Icons are large and battery drains 25% faster.
rows.Summarized Problem: The circle to search feature fails to select text after the first search result and instead shows a share option.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to perform a core text selection function, which is essential for users to extract information from search results, making the search experience unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing at my end. The circle to search feature is provided by Google. Clearing cache of the Google app may resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Switch apps, old app restarts
rows.Problem: Apps do not stay in background; when switching apps, the previous app restarts even if no action is taken. This occurs with YouTube, WhatsApp, and games. Memory management appears to be faulty despite available RAM.
rows.Summarized Problem: When switching apps, the previous app restarts instead of being properly closed or suspended, causing instability and disrupting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes apps to restart unexpectedly during normal usage, leading to a poor user experience and potential data loss or state corruption.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by quickswitch transition bug; resolved in latest OneUI home APK by updating app lifecycle handling.

rows.Title: Battery drains fast
rows.Problem: Battery drains fast while device is normal
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains very quickly during normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Rapid battery drain prevents device usability and may indicate a critical system performance issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Edge Panel leftward slide triggers error
rows.Problem: A leftward slide on panel eight triggers an unforeseen error. This disruption halts the intended function and requires immediate attention. Further investigation is needed to pinpoint the root cause of this issue. A solution must be implemented to ensure seamless operation and user experience. Addressing this error will improve the overall performance and reliability of the panel interaction
rows.Summarized Problem: Sliding a panel on the edge triggers an unforeseen error that halts the intended function.
rows.Severity Reason: The error halts the intended function, making the feature non-operational and disrupting user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Delete the 3rd party panel that causes the error.

rows.Title: Fingerprint Sensor Not Work
rows.Problem: Device has a problem with fingerprint sensor, unable to communicate between AP and sensor.
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not working due to a hardware issue causing failure in communication between the device's AP and the sensor.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot authenticate users via fingerprint, which is a core biometric function, making it unusable for security and access.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Failed communication between AP and fingerprint sensor due to hardware issue. Countermeasure: Service center inspection required.

rows.Title: Dolby Atmos isn't working in Apple Music
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos isn't working anymore in Apple Music after updating to One UI 7 with Android 15. No good quality audio, no support of Dolby Atmos in Apple Music after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos audio is not functioning in Apple Music after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable in a specific app after an update, but audio processing is still working when streamed through the Apple Music app, indicating a configuration or application-level issue rather than a complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos processing is working when audio streams through the Apple Music app; the issue may be related to phone-side settings or app-specific handling, requiring user feedback to confirm whether the problem occurs at the phone-level setting or content-level.

rows.Title: Delay between double-tapping to lock the screen
rows.Problem: There is a delay between double-tapping to lock the screen and it actually turning off. The lock sound is heard immediately, but the screen stays on for a bit.
rows.Summarized Problem: There is a delay between double-tapping the screen and the screen actually locking, despite the lock sound being heard immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock function is partially malfunctioning, with a noticeable delay in screen response after input, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Microsoft apps not opening
rows.Problem: Microsoft apps are not opening after Samsung One 7 UI update. Cleared cache, force stopped, uninstalled and reinstalled, but issue persists. Battery drains rapidly from 90% to 6-60% in three hours, which was not happening before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Microsoft apps fail to open after the Samsung One 7 UI update, with additional battery drain issues.
rows.Severity Reason: Apps are completely failing to open, making core functionality unusable, and battery drain is severe, impacting device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Popup view Shows curropt in Home Screen
rows.Problem: Bug in a pop up view show like this
rows.Summarized Problem: A corrupted popup view appears on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The popup view is visually corrupted but does not cause device freeze or crash, and functionality remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn't reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from the provided logs.

rows.Title: Status Bar Notification icons overlap with the clock
rows.Problem: When going from lock screen to home, notification icons overlap with the clock for a moment during live notification in status bar. This bug happens every time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification icons briefly overlap with the clock when transitioning from lock screen to home screen in the status bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual overlap during screen transition, affecting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Slow charging
rows.Problem: Slow charging on 25w after one ui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device exhibits slow charging at 25W after UI 7 update, likely due to heat generation from the update.
rows.Severity Reason: Slow charging at 25W renders the device unusable for users expecting fast charging, impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Heat generation due to device update causes temporary reduction in charging current; device returns to normal charging when in room temperature.

rows.Title: Not showing exposure opinion in camera app
rows.Problem: Not showing exposure opinion in camera app
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app does not display exposure settings in normal mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in normal mode but can be accessed via pro mode, indicating partial functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The exposure feature is unsupported in normal mode on OneUI 7; users can use pro mode instead.

rows.Title: Unable to remove sports update from Not Interested part under Search personalisation settings
rows.Problem: Sports update is not showing on Now Bar despite enabling Now Bar settings, and attempting to remove it from Not Interested section causes it to reappear immediately
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove sports updates from the 'Not Interested' section in Search personalisation, causing the update to reappear after removal attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature setting, where the update reappears after attempted removal, preventing user control but not rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to Set Date & Time
rows.Problem: Cannot set the time manually
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot manually set the device's time.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot set time manually, which is essential for correct system operation and functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Rounded Corners Cutting Off widget's Content
rows.Problem: Widget has overly rounded corners, and its content is getting cut off, making it unreadable. The issue persists after restarting the phone and happens regardless of widget resizing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Widget content is cut off due to overly rounded corners, making it unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from reading widget content, directly impacting usability and functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Ivory filter remove from camera & Photo editor App
rows.Problem: Ivory filter is no longer available in camera and photo editor app after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Ivory filter is missing from the camera and photo editor app after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The filter is no longer available, but the core camera functionality remains intact and users can still access other features.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: The Ivory filter was previously provided by a third-party vendor due to contract changes; we are working with the vendor to re-upload it and will introduce user-created filters starting with S25.

rows.Title: network disconnects or 5G signal disappears
rows.Problem: the device loses 5G connectivity automatically after connecting, specifically on Jio network, while working fine on other networks like Airtel
rows.Summarized Problem: The device disconnects from 5G or loses 5G signal specifically on Jio network after connection, while maintaining connectivity on other networks.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of 5G connectivity on a primary network, rendering the device unusable for mobile data on that network.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to send video or picture in whatsapp status
rows.Problem: Cannot send video or picture in WhatsApp status on S25 Ultra. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling WhatsApp, but issue persists. Also unable to delete status.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot send videos or pictures to WhatsApp status and are unable to delete existing status entries.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from using a core feature (sharing status) and affects functionality after app reinstall, indicating a fundamental failure in media handling.
rows.R&D Comment: MediaCodec error during encoding/decoding prevents media processing; users cannot send or delete status content.

rows.Title: keyboard bottom is getting merged with navigation buttons
rows.Problem: using navigation buttons (not gesture) while on the screen at the time of entering upi pin while making payment or checking balance, bottom nos. of keyboard is getting merged with navigation buttons. this happens only with gpay not with paytm. some issue between gpay upi app keyboard and one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The bottom numbers of the keyboard are merging with navigation buttons when using navigation buttons instead of gestures, specifically during UPI PIN entry in the GPay app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of navigation functionality during specific app interactions, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Payment Issue in Galaxy Store
rows.Problem: Money deducted from account during purchase of font from Galaxy Store, but purchase not completed and option to buy appears after payment. User requests refund.
rows.Summarized Problem: User's payment is deducted but purchase fails to complete in Galaxy Store, resulting in a failed transaction and request for refund.
rows.Severity Reason: The transaction is partially completed, leading to loss of purchase intent and potential financial loss for user, making it unusable for intended functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Serious SW Issue detect problem occur in device
rows.Problem: I am unable to use inner display of Fold 4 since the last update 6.1.1. in January or February. The moment I open the inner display, I notice 2 things: 1. No sim card detected message for few seconds 2. Inner display and front display go blank for few minutes 3. Wifi stop working I have to restart and then everything works except the inner display.
rows.Summarized Problem: The inner display of Fold 4 fails to function properly after update 6.1.1, showing no SIM card message briefly, going blank for minutes, and causing Wi-Fi to stop working, requiring restart to restore functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The inner display fails to function after update, leading to complete loss of display functionality and requiring restart, making the device unusable during the affected period.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Game booster option not available in gaming hub
rows.Problem: Cannot see the game booster option in gaming hub. Reinstalled gaming hub but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The game booster option is unavailable in the gaming hub.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a missing feature due to model policy, not a functional malfunction or device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The game booster app is not provided for JDM models as per company policy; no action required.

rows.Title: Scheduling Not work In Dark Mode
rows.Problem: Dark mode should automatically turn off at 7:30 am but stays on even when battery is over 30% and dark mode is set to turn off at that time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dark mode fails to automatically turn off at 7:30 am as scheduled, remaining active even when battery is above 30%.
rows.Severity Reason: The dark mode fails to turn off at the scheduled time, causing a persistent UI state that contradicts user expectations and routine settings, rendering the feature non-functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Separate app sound not working
rows.Problem: Separate app sound not working after one ui7 update on my samsung s21fe
rows.Summarized Problem: Separate app sound is not working after a UI7 update on Samsung S21FE.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific sound function but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We cannot reproduce the issue at our end; user needs to reset settings and provide preconditions for the problem to occur.

rows.Title: Samsung PASS isn't working
rows.Problem: Samsung PASS isn't working. It's showing that Temporarily not available, Try again later.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung PASS is showing a 'Temporarily not available' message and fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and prevents user access to the service, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Modified the condition to check if it is an FMM lock response. Will be distributed via SamsungPass 2Q regular app update.

rows.Title: Significant heating issues
rows.Problem: Significant heating issues even with limited application usage (3-4 apps)
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant heating even with minimal app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which can lead to performance degradation or potential damage.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating occurs during app updates, indicating a thermal management issue during background package installations.

rows.Title: Battery drain after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue persists after One UI 7 update; user asks if downgrading to One UI 6.1 is possible
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain prevents device usability and may lead to rapid shutdowns or device failure to operate.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background; Meta is investigating and will update via Play Store.

rows.Title: Battery draining really fast after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery is draining very fast after the One UI 7 update, previously fine before the update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains very quickly after the One UI 7 update, despite being stable prior to the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, requiring frequent charging and impacting daily usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram app causing high CPU usage; Countermeasure: Issue resolved by Instagram side; user advised to verify fix.

rows.Title: Ghost touch
rows.Problem: Phone sometimes automatically touches anywhere on screen and fixes after locking the screen. This happens suddenly and unexpectedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone exhibits sudden ghost touches across the screen that resolve after locking and unlocking the device.
rows.Severity Reason: Ghost touches can cause unintended actions, making the device unusable during operation, leading to user confusion and potential data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Ghost touch occurs due to abnormal touch baseline during boot caused by A73's lack of TSP Cal data; rebooting or power cycling resolves it.

rows.Title: Unable to image search in gallery
rows.Problem: After updating the UI 7, my phone gallery people image search option is showing
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot perform people image search in the gallery after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The image search feature is showing incorrectly but does not completely fail or crash the app, suggesting a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: User is using 'Gallery labs' feature, which is internal and unstable; guide users to disable it and clear settings.

rows.Title: Notification Panel is always in dark mode
rows.Problem: After updating OneUI 7.0, the notifications panel is always in dark mode with no transparency or background blur. Users want an option to set background blur intensity.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel is stuck in dark mode with no transparency or background blur after OneUI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual usability but does not cause device crash or data loss; users can still access notifications, though the appearance is suboptimal.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Visibility Issue in NowBar
rows.Problem: The now bar shows live scores with white text that matches the background color, making the scores invisible.
rows.Summarized Problem: The live scores in the Now Bar display with white text that matches the background, making them unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of live scores but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AOD turns on automatically when power saver is turned on
rows.Problem: Power Saving Mode does not reduce battery consumption or limit background activities as expected. Features like CPU speed reduction, screen brightness adjustment, or app restrictions do not activate. The battery drains at the same rate as when Power Saving Mode is off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Power Saving Mode fails to reduce battery consumption or restrict background activities, leading to unchanged battery drain despite being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Power Saving Mode is a core battery management function; its failure results in device unusability due to uncontrolled battery drain.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Hang in device observed while using biometric in settings
rows.Problem: See the results
rows.Summarized Problem: Device hangs when using biometric authentication in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs during biometric use, making the feature unusable and disrupting user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Game Plugins not working
rows.Problem: Game Plugins (specifically the FPS monitor) isn't working, even after the stable One UI 7 update. When trying to open it, it says "unable to run GOS lite."
rows.Summarized Problem: The FPS monitor feature in Game Plugins is not working and shows an error when attempting to launch.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to launch and displays an error, preventing users from using a key gaming utility, making the device unusable for gamers.
rows.R&D Comment: GamePlugin is no longer supported from Android V-os; functionality has been moved to GameBooster and Good-lock app.

rows.Title: Unlocking is slow
rows.Problem: Unlocking is slow and jerky
rows.Summarized Problem: The device unlocking process is slow and jerky.
rows.Severity Reason: The unlocking process is slow and jerky, making it difficult to use the device effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share one more set of logs with matching video and timestamp

rows.Title: Wifi takes time to connect and detect
rows.Problem: Frequently used Wi-Fi network Mywifi2.4 is not connecting automatically when detected. In oneUI 6.1, the detection and connection process was fast, but after oneUI 7.0 update, it stopped working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to automatically connect to a frequently used Wi-Fi network after the oneUI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as expected, but the device remains usable and internet access is still possible if manually configured.
rows.R&D Comment: The automatic Wi-Fi connection feature fails when Mobile Data is off, requiring data and location access to detect networks; ensure these permissions are properly enabled in the settings.

rows.Title: Camera image quality degraded
rows.Problem: Camera quality and color tone downgraded after one UI 7 update, especially in 1x, 2x, and 3x lenses in portrait mode. Saturation and sharpness are too high, making pictures look unrealistic, dark, and grainy with excessive noise. Issue is prominent in portrait mode across all lenses.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality has degraded after the One UI 7 update, with increased noise, unrealistic color tones, and poor sharpness in portrait mode across all zoom levels.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core camera functionality across multiple zoom levels and modes, resulting in visibly poor image quality that undermines user experience and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality degradation is due to sensor pixel size limitations in low light and narrow field of view under 2x/3x zoom; hand tremors contribute to blur in wide-angle shots. Countermeasure: optimize sensor exposure and image processing in low-light conditions for zoomed modes.

rows.Title: Faster battery drain after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery drains 25-30% faster than before after updating to One UI 7, despite using minimal setup and standard charging procedures.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains 25-30% faster after updating to One UI 7, even with minimal usage and standard charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable increase in battery drain, but the device remains functional and usable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Airtel 4G data not working
rows.Problem: Airtel 4G data is not working sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: 4G data connectivity is intermittently failing on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of 4G data, which is essential for basic device functionality and user communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Not able to play Freefire max on mobile data
rows.Problem: The game does not start or load when using mobile data or power saving mode, even on WiFi. It works only when both mobile data and power saving mode are disabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Freefire game fails to start or load when using mobile data or power saving mode, even on WiFi.
rows.Severity Reason: The game fails to launch under common network and power settings, making it unusable in typical usage scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gemini doesn't show camera option
rows.Problem: I don't have the gemini live camera option on s23 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gemini live camera option is missing on the S23 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing, preventing users from accessing a specific camera function, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Gemini is a Google application; the issue has been reported to Google (b/438038696) and requires follow-up from Google.

rows.Title: Device overheating
rows.Problem: Device heats up to 43 degrees C, causing lag and FPS drops in games
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats to 43 degrees C, causing lag and game FPS drops
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating leads to device lag and performance drops, making the device unusable during gameplay
rows.R&D Comment: Heating is suspected due to high CPU consumption by system_server; no current thermal engine or modem mitigation actions are in place

rows.Title: Register for chat service pops up everytime
rows.Problem: The chat service shows as not enabled even though it has been enabled multiple times, causing repeated registration prompts.
rows.Summarized Problem: The chat service repeatedly prompts for registration even after being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature shows incorrect status and prompts users repeatedly, leading to a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs to investigate the cause of incorrect status display.

rows.Title: Device becomes noticeably hot during normal usage
rows.Problem: Device becomes noticeably hot during normal usage such as while charging, during voice or video calls, and when using basic apps or watching videos. This overheating raises concerns about battery health and long-term device usability.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage, raising concerns about battery health and long-term device usability.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal use can lead to device malfunction, battery degradation, and potential safety risks, making it a critical issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to install Key Cafe
rows.Problem: KEY CAFE INSTALLATION GETTING CANCELLED
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to install the Key Cafe app, which results in installation being cancelled.
rows.Severity Reason: The installation process is being cancelled, preventing users from accessing the app, which is a core feature in the settings menu.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unread email count not updating
rows.Problem: After last update, Samsung email does not clear notification for read email. If any email received, a notification appears at the top left, but after reading the email, it does not clear. Even after closing the app, the email icon shows unread emails, such as when two emails are received, reading both and closing the app still shows two unread emails.
rows.Summarized Problem: The app fails to update the unread email count after reading emails, showing incorrect unread status even after closing the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accurately knowing which emails have been read, leading to confusion and potential missed communications.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Not receiving calls from MT side
rows.Problem: Network issue for two months; receiving call notifications but not hearing ringtone; need to restart device every hour; network sound is very bad; tried all network settings but sound is still poor to hear
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are not receiving calls from the mobile side and cannot hear ringtone despite notifications, with persistent poor network audio quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to receive calls and users cannot hear ringtone, making it unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gmail content hides behind keyboard when longer
rows.Problem: Email body content gets hidden behind keyboard when longer and requires closing keyboard to see content. UPI pin keypad buttons are cut off after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Email body content is hidden behind the keyboard when long, requiring user to close keyboard to view it.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of email composition interface, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Health is slow and lagging
rows.Problem: Samsung Health is slow and lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health app is slow and lagging due to background processes.
rows.Severity Reason: The app experiences slow performance and lag, which affects usability but does not cause device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Background processes are causing app state delays; issue is not reproducible in latest version.

rows.Title: Notification blocker option not available
rows.Problem: Gaming options such as game priority, booster, FPS, CPU temperature, and notifications blocker are missing after the recent update
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification blocker and gaming features are missing after a recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: The absence of core features like notification blocking and game performance tools renders key functionality unavailable, making the device unusable for essential tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incorrect configuration; users should use 'Do not disturb' in Mode & Routine settings to achieve the desired functionality.

rows.Title: Quick panel overlaps the home app screen
rows.Problem: The full quick settings panel appears on the home screen even though the notification drawer has not been pulled down, floating above apps. This happens occasionally and restarts temporarily fix it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick settings panel incorrectly appears on the home screen and floats above apps, even when the notification drawer is not opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen interface, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Scroll capture not working in call logs
rows.Problem: Scroll capture is not working in call logs after update. The scroll capture button is missing in call logs, although it appears in other apps and used to work before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The scroll capture feature is not functioning in call logs after the update, with the button missing despite working in other apps previously.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing entirely in a core app functionality, preventing users from capturing screen content during calls, which is a critical usability function.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because call logs are not in the allowlist for screenshot scrolling; a structural change to support comprehensive screenshot scrolling based on view structure is needed for One UI 8.0.

rows.Title: Split window not working properly with physical keyboard
rows.Problem: Alt tab shifts between two apps in split screen and now considers split screen as a single app, redirecting to recent apps instead of switching between split screen apps. Multitasking between two or three split screen apps using physical keyboard is no longer possible.
rows.Summarized Problem: Split screen functionality is broken when using a physical keyboard, causing alt tab to redirect to recent apps instead of switching between split screen apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable for multitasking, which is a core productivity function, especially for users relying on split screen for study tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Tracking auto focus not working
rows.Problem: Tracking auto focus not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's tracking auto focus function is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The auto focus function is completely non-functional, preventing basic camera operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lag in device observed
rows.Problem: Phone becomes choppy after updating to UI 7, lagging significantly even while writing this report
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits significant lag after updating to UI 7, impacting overall responsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes noticeably choppy and unresponsive during normal use, severely affecting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app is causing high CPU usage and device lag; this is a third-party app with no Samsung involvement, and the issue is not attributable to Samsung software.

rows.Title: Android Auto communication error
rows.Problem: Android Auto showing error after major update to S24 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Android Auto displays a communication error after a major software update on the S24 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: The error occurs after a software update and affects app connectivity, but users can work around it by disabling Android Auto in the Secure Folder settings.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to Secure Folder and Android Auto connection; a workaround is available, and Google is investigating the root cause.

rows.Title: Google speech recognition using mic despite denied access
rows.Problem: Google's speech recognition app uses the microphone without permission even though access has been explicitly denied
rows.Summarized Problem: Google's speech recognition feature continues to access the microphone despite user permission being denied.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a core privacy violation where a major functionality bypasses user permission, potentially compromising user trust and device security.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to stem from a failure in permission enforcement within One UI; the customer should be guided to obtain logs immediately after reproduction to verify behavior.

rows.Title: Unable to image search in gallery
rows.Problem: Cannot see people in gallery search options. Only location and documents available when people search category is enabled in settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot see people in gallery search options when the people search category is enabled, only location and documents are visible.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the search functionality, where one search category (people) is missing despite being enabled.
rows.R&D Comment: The face analysis service requires a full reanalysis after engine updates, which causes temporary failure of people recognition in image search until reanalysis completes.

rows.Title: Swipe down from right side on Instagram stories
rows.Problem: The swipe-down from right side gesture on Instagram Stories is grayed out and grayed out the complete screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The swipe-down gesture from the right side on Instagram Stories grayed out the entire screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture is completely grayed out, preventing user interaction with Instagram Stories, which is a core feature of the app.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is likely due to app-specific UI handling; countermeasure suggests updating the app and clearing cache, indicating a potential app-level bug that may require deeper investigation.

rows.Title: BT device gets auto-connected even after disconnecting
rows.Problem: Bluetooth devices auto-connect after being disconnected, even when not manually reconnected or after Bluetooth is turned off. The phone repeatedly connects to car Bluetooth within 10-15 seconds of disconnection, requiring the device to be unpaired and re-paired.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth devices auto-connect after being disconnected, requiring manual unpairing and re-pairing.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly reconnects automatically, making the Bluetooth functionality unreliable and forcing users to manually re-pair, which disrupts normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The phone cannot control disconnection; the remote device (Grandi10) attempts to reconnect automatically after user disconnection.

rows.Title: Not able to check contacts or call anyone
rows.Problem: After installing the latest software update, the contacts app is not functioning properly and the user is unable to check contacts or make calls, despite caller ID being active.
rows.Summarized Problem: The contacts app is not functioning after a software update, preventing users from viewing contacts or making calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The user is unable to use the phone for basic communication functions, rendering the device largely unusable for calls and contact lookup.
