rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive for 3-5 minutes, preventing user interaction and rendering the device unusable during that period.
rows.R&D Comment: Missing event log: Window-Manager : take a screenshot, triggered by keyCombination; user must provide complete logs for analysis.

rows.Title: 5G not working properly
rows.Problem: After one UI 7 update, 4G is not supported and 5G is not working properly. Network shows either emergency calling or no service. Fix needed
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is failing after UI 7 update, showing only emergency calling or no service.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot access 5G network, preventing normal communication and rendering mobile connectivity unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to extremely low signal strength, the network does not respond to TAU requests from the device; users should try in a different location and re-open if issue persists.

rows.Title: 5GHz does not work
rows.Problem: With OneUI 6, 5GHz works fine on both bands. With OneUI 7, only 2.4GHz works; 5GHz does not work.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5GHz Wi-Fi band stops working after updating to OneUI 7, only functioning on 2.4GHz band.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to connect to 5GHz Wi-Fi, which is a major network function, rendering one of the primary connectivity options unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The error code -19 (EFAULT) indicates a firmware or driver fault; updating to the latest firmware or drivers is recommended.

rows.Title: Apps screen grid not available
rows.Problem: After updating the device with a new software update, the app grid feature is missing. The device now only allows horizontal sliding, while a friend with the same model has the grid feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: The app grid feature is missing after a software update, leaving only horizontal scrolling available.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific view but is present on the same device model for another user, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: In One UI 7.0, alphabetical app sorting now uses vertical scrolling, making the horizontal grid view obsolete; this change is consistent across devices and aligns with navigation efficiency.

rows.Title: Sports notifications not showing
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing live score of sports
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying live sports scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the Now Bar feature, preventing live sports score display but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: IRCTC app can't access server after update
rows.Problem: IRCT- app shows can't access server after update, though server is working fine on web
rows.Summarized Problem: The IRCTC app cannot access the server after an update, despite the server being functional on the web.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to connect to the server, which is essential for booking tickets, making the app unusable for core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for further investigation

rows.Title: Not able to open recent tab
rows.Problem: Recent items sometimes not opening
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent items on the home screen fail to open intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen functionality but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The home screen app appears not to be moving; further investigation needed to determine root cause and log analysis limitations.

rows.Title: Contact search expands unintended contact
rows.Problem: When searching for contacts with minimum characters, selecting a contact causes it to be moved to frequently searched section and opens the next contact with dial option, even if not selected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search incorrectly expands and selects unintended contacts when searching, causing unintended navigation to dial option.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in contact search functionality but does not prevent overall device usability or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The feature that moves selected contacts to frequently searched section only takes effect after app restart in next version.

rows.Title: Cover screen preview is upside down
rows.Problem: The cover screen preview is now upside down in my Samsung Galaxy Flip6 after the last software update. Frequency: All the time after the last SW update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The cover screen preview is displayed upside down after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the display to show content incorrectly, making the screen unusable for normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs when the camera assistant option is on, leading to incorrect surface usage; the fix involves checking cable connection and disabling the option until binary release.

rows.Title: Phone calls interface not displaying anything
rows.Problem: Applications are crashing after a recent software update. Unable to access contacts, search, or find apps. WhatsApp is not working. Multiple issues occurring.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone calls interface is not displaying any content after a recent software update, causing applications to crash and users unable to access contacts or search functions.
rows.Severity Reason: The interface failure and application crashes render the device unusable for basic communication functions, leading to a major malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Large database deletions during onupgrade cause timeout and provider failure; modify onupgrade to operate in background and allow recovery via clearing contacts data after sync.

rows.Title: Device taking too long to charge
rows.Problem: After update not charging in normal time
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is taking significantly longer than normal to charge after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is not charging properly, which can lead to device unusability and potential data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DCD timeout due to defective cable, unstable connection, dust, or USB connector/IFPMIC issues. Countermeasure: Check with alternate cable and charger; if issue persists, service center inspection of IFPMIC is required.

rows.Title: Not able to move data from secure folder
rows.Problem: Downloaded items like videos or photos sometimes fail to move in or out of the secure folder after a few months. Some items can be moved while others cannot, even when freshly downloaded. The issue appears inconsistent and unpredictable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Downloaded files occasionally fail to move in or out of the secure folder, with inconsistent behavior between newly and older downloads.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of file movement functionality, affecting some downloads intermittently but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by overly long file names causing move operations to fail; users should be guided to rename files, and we will review file name constraints for improvement.

rows.Title: Audio keeps playing after exiting Instagram
rows.Problem: Audio continues to play after exiting Instagram when a video is playing in the app
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio continues to play after exiting Instagram when a video is playing in the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio playback does not stop after exiting the app, leading to a persistent and disruptive user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Volume set to zero by the audio system during playback; countermeasure confirms same root cause.

rows.Title: One Ui not responding
rows.Problem: Please find the attached photos
rows.Summarized Problem: The One UI interface is not responding
rows.Severity Reason: The UI is unresponsive, making the device interface unusable
rows.R&D Comment: System native crashes and kernel panic resets suggest memory corruption; recommend factory reset and hardware inspection if issue persists

rows.Title: Phone freezes forever
rows.Problem: Phone freezes forever and cannot be swiped back, opened settings, or restarted normally. Issue occurs randomly and only resolves when battery is completely drained or by force restarting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes indefinitely and cannot be controlled through normal interface functions, requiring battery drain or force restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, preventing basic user interactions and rendering the phone unusable until a restart is performed.
rows.R&D Comment: User should avoid using the device when temperature is high or while charging to reduce freeze occurrences; new logs are needed immediately after the issue happens.

rows.Title: Swiping home after back press causes ghosting
rows.Problem: Swiping home after pressing back causes previous app screen to ghost. This occurs every time and is annoying, especially on a premium phone. The issue is frequent and present on the homescreen.
rows.Summarized Problem: Ghosting occurs when swiping home immediately after pressing back on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual artifacts on the home screen during normal navigation, making the interface unreliable and disruptive to user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Ghosting occurs due to predictive back animation support in apps; a normalized non-linear animation will be implemented in the next B OS.

rows.Title: Bluetooth functions glitchy and suddenly disconnects
rows.Problem: Bluetooth functions become glitchy and suddenly disconnect, causing media to play automatically when nothing was played. This happens when connected to headphones or speakers. Before the update, disconnections occurred occasionally during media playback, but now it happens frequently and repeatedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth connection becomes unstable, causing sudden disconnections and automatic media playback when no content was played.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent disconnections and unintended media playback, making the device unusable during media use.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several packet retransmissions causing the issue; snoop log is required for further debugging.

rows.Title: Wonderland missing from Good Lock
rows.Problem: Wonderland plugin is not available in the Good Lock application under the Plugins tab.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Wonderland plugin is missing from the Good Lock application's Plugins tab.
rows.Severity Reason: The plugin is unavailable, but the core Lock Screen functionality remains operational.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Wonderland requires high memory and performance; not supported on Galaxy A3 series. Countermeasure: Ongoing improvements to support broader device range.

rows.Title: Photo Remasterer Darkens the whole photo
rows.Problem: Photo Remasterer Darkens the whole photo and I don't know how can I get logs for it
rows.Summarized Problem: The Photo Remasterer feature darkens the entire photo output.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature alters image content in a way that affects the entire photo, resulting in incorrect output and potential user confusion or loss of image quality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lag in multitasking with notes app
rows.Problem: Glitch in Samsung Notes app during multitasking. Video attached to demonstrate.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app experiences lag during multitasking scenarios.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during multitasking, causing lag but not rendering the app unusable or crashing.
rows.R&D Comment: The lag occurs due to layout reactivity when keyboard appears during multitasking; countermeasure aligns with the root cause.

rows.Title: Alarm does not ring when tab cover is on
rows.Problem: When the tab cover is on, the alarm only vibrates and does not ring. When the cover is removed, the alarm rings and resumes functioning normally. The alarm volume setting is set to ON, and logs show the alarm should ring and vibrate when the cover is closed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The alarm fails to ring when the tab cover is on, only vibrating instead, and resumes normal operation when the cover is removed.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm function is partially malfunctioning but still operates when the cover is removed, allowing basic functionality to resume.
rows.R&D Comment: The alarm is not ringing when the cover is on, despite volume being set to ON; silent logs are needed to confirm behavior under cover state.

rows.Title: Camera photos blurry and grainy
rows.Problem: Photos and videos taken in plenty of light are still grainy and noisy, resembling oil pastel or painting
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera produces blurry and grainy images even in good lighting conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Images are not sharp or clear in adequate lighting, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is judged normal; no unusual logs found.

rows.Title: Icons alignment get changed on landscape mode
rows.Problem: icon layout being messed up and the app grid is weird too. layout untouched, it messed up my app grid
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons alignment is incorrectly displayed when the device is in landscape mode, causing a distorted app grid layout.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual layout of the app grid but does not cause device failure or data loss, and is limited to a specific orientation.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Task bar doesn't disappear
rows.Problem: Taskbar doesn't disappear even when apps are open
rows.Summarized Problem: The task bar does not disappear when apps are open, remaining visible and obstructing the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The task bar remains visible during app usage, causing partial obstruction but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Task bar state is incorrectly managed when apps are launched; additional logging added to improve root cause detection.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working on home page or lock screen, works on biometric page but not on lock screen. No software update, issue persists with or without screen guard.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint sensor fails to work on the lock screen despite working on the biometric page.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor fails to authenticate on the lock screen, which is a primary access point, making the device unusable for secure authentication.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause appears to be corruption of the first fingerprint template; silent logs required for deeper investigation.

rows.Title: A black cursor keeps on appearing on the screen and then disappears
rows.Problem: A black cursor keeps on appearing on my Samsung S25 Ultra screen out of the sudden for few seconds and then it disappears. It is also not getting captured in screenshot. I have also read about it that other users are also facing same issue online. Please let me know if this is UI bug or enabled function and how I can correct it.
rows.Summarized Problem: A black cursor appears briefly on the screen and then disappears, making it difficult to capture in screenshots and causing confusion about whether it is a UI bug or enabled function.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent visual disruption but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor appearance is a known behavior when devices with mouse properties connect; in future OS versions, this will be suppressed to improve user experience.

rows.Title: Camera focus not working properly
rows.Problem: Camera focus is still not working properly after trying the suggested solution
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera focus function is not working properly despite attempts to resolve it.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera focus function is completely failing, which prevents basic photo-taking functionality, making the device unusable for core usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Face unlock gets automatically disabled
rows.Problem: Face unlock is automatically disabled despite trying provided solutions
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock is automatically disabled after being enabled, even after attempting provided solutions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents consistent use of face unlock, a core biometric feature, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Heavy battery drain when idle. Device drops charge quickly beyond 5% and depletes rapidly during simple usage. User has deleted unused apps and performed minimal tasks, yet battery drains fast.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences severe battery drain when idle, dropping charge rapidly even during minimal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot be used for basic tasks without frequent recharging, making it functionally unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation; once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: SmartTyre Car & Bike turns off the BT
rows.Problem: Bluetooth blocking
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth is being blocked by the device, preventing user control over connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: Bluetooth is being blocked, which prevents users from managing connectivity, making the device functionally unusable in key scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: After adding a contact it's still shows the option of saving contact
rows.Problem: After adding a contact it's still shows the option of saving contact
rows.Summarized Problem: The option to save a contact remains visible after adding a contact.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not fully function as expected, leaving a visible option after contact addition, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to dismiss add contact dialog after clicking.

rows.Title: Sports notification on now bar not working
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing live sports scores despite enabling all Google settings and following teams and leagues
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying live sports scores, even after enabling all required settings and following teams and leagues.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the Now Bar feature, where live sports updates fail to appear despite proper configuration.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Green line issue
rows.Problem: Green line issue after latest update
rows.Summarized Problem: A green line appears on the display after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual display but does not cause device freeze or crash, and is reported as a known issue with users.
rows.R&D Comment: The green line is likely caused by hardware defects such as Display Driver IC damage, COP bending crack, or data line foreign matter; users should visit a service center for repair.

rows.Title: Device not responding and screen turns off
rows.Problem: Device not responding and screen automatically turns off after updating to One UI 7 without any reason
rows.Summarized Problem: The device becomes unresponsive and automatically turns off the screen after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to respond and screen turns off unexpectedly, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share video and one more log set matching timestamp

rows.Title: Notification grouping is not working for apps other than system apps
rows.Problem: Notification grouping is not working for apps other than system apps. Like in this example, notifications from the PW app are not grouped. And in the image given below, you can see that notifications from the SMS app are grouped.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification grouping fails for third-party apps but works for system apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only third-party apps, resulting in partial functionality rather than complete failure or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to update Google Play Services
rows.Problem: Unable to update Google Play Services on s24 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update Google Play Services on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The update failure prevents the device from accessing essential apps and services, making the device functionally unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Weak internet connection or insufficient storage space. Countermeasure: Users should check internet connection and free up storage space.

rows.Title: Notification panel is in black color without dark mode
rows.Problem: Notification panel is completely black without night mode after update, does not fix with reset or uninstalling themes
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel appears black when dark mode is not enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI visibility but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: cannot find Lengpui Mizoam India in samsung weather app

rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot find specific locations such as Lengpui and Mizoam, India in the Samsung Weather app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in location search functionality, preventing users from finding specific places, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Can't set only 5g in my secondary sim
rows.Problem: Can't set only 5g in my secondary sim. Please update my phone and fixed the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set 5G only on the secondary SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full 5G configuration on secondary SIM but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Require CP silent logs to investigate root cause and validate fix.

rows.Title: Dynamic lock screen inconsistent color rendering
rows.Problem: Dynamic lock screen exhibits inconsistent color rendering; background and bottom text occasionally display as gray or black despite configured white theme
rows.Summarized Problem: The dynamic lock screen displays incorrect colors, showing gray or black instead of the configured white theme.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent appearance but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: call background is weird
rows.Problem: My call background is weird despite re setting it in settings and also rebooting the device
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background displays incorrectly when the contact does not have a saved photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent background display but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background when contact photo is not saved; will be included in next MR version.

rows.Title: Block all spam and scam calls option does not work
rows.Problem: The "Block calls from unknown numbers" option does not work properly. Even though it is enabled, the user still receives calls from unknown numbers. The "Block all spam and scam calls" option also does not function.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call blocking feature, including 'Block calls from unknown numbers' and 'Block all spam and scam calls', is not functioning as expected and allows unknown calls to pass through.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning, allowing some unknown calls to go through despite being enabled, but not causing complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The 'Block calls from unknown numbers' feature only blocks calls from hidden/private numbers, and 'Block all spam and scam calls' appears to work for suspected spam and fraud calls; therefore, the issue is not a complete failure but a partial misalignment in functionality.

rows.Title: Performance profile mode not showing in Device Care
rows.Problem: Performance profile mode not showing on S22
rows.Summarized Problem: The performance profile mode is not displaying in the device care settings on the S22.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the interface, but the device remains otherwise functional and users can still access other settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to use keyboard and mouse in tab after update
rows.Problem: Keyboard and mouse connected via USB dongle stopped working after UI 7 update. No connection logs found in device logs. User has tried changing settings, OTG, and device battery but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: After the UI 7 update, the keyboard and mouse connected via USB dongle no longer work, with no connection logs found in device logs.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to recognize external input devices after update, making basic functionality like typing and cursor control impossible.
rows.R&D Comment: No connection logs found during USB dongle use; suspect USB connector damage. Customer should visit service center for device check.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, battery life has significantly decreased, requiring two to three charges daily instead of one. Despite using all recommended battery optimization strategies, the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are experiencing significantly reduced battery life after the One UI 7 update, requiring multiple charges daily despite using battery optimization features.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent charging needs, which disrupts normal usage and daily operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Heavy Battery draining
rows.Problem: Heavy Battery draining
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing heavy battery draining after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and operational duration, making the device unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background and will be fixed in version v382 via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Phone is getting heating up while do normal task
rows.Problem: Phone is getting heating up during small tasks, even without using apps like Instagram or Facebook, battery drains rapidly, and the phone does not perform well under normal usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats during normal use, leading to rapid battery drain and poor performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during basic tasks, which can lead to performance degradation and potential battery damage, making it unusable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is caused by excessive camera usage, which triggers high thermal load; countermeasure confirms it is a normal thermal response to camera activity.

rows.Title: Notes app disappeared from recents and didn't resume on relaunch
rows.Problem: Samsung Notes app unexpectedly disappeared from memory and did not resume from where it was left when relaunched, while user was in the middle of writing a note.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app unexpectedly disappears from memory and fails to resume from the last state when relaunched.
rows.Severity Reason: The app disappears from memory and fails to resume, causing loss of user work in progress, making the device unusable for note-taking tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no logs related to Notes found within. So I request to register problem within 5-10min so the problem reason can be detected.

rows.Title: Heating observed on playing heavy games
rows.Problem: Phone heats up significantly during heavy game play, such as Call of Duty Mobile, especially after battle segments. This was not present in previous UI versions but now occurs after the update to UI 7. Temperature drops after closing the game, and device returns to normal. Log file attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during heavy game play, particularly in high-performance modes like 90fps, and returns to normal after game closure.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during gameplay but resolves after game exit, indicating a partial malfunction rather than a complete system failure or device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is caused by high frame rate settings in games; recommended to adjust game settings to balance mode to reduce temperature.

rows.Title: Live score not showing in notification panel
rows.Problem: Sports feature from Google is not working in the Nowbar. Live score is not showing in the notification panel. Tried multiple times but it did not work.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live score is not displaying in the notification panel on the Now Bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working despite multiple attempts, indicating a partial malfunction of the sports feature in the Now Bar.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: secure folder not working
rows.Problem: unable to use secure folder due to security policy preventing installation
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access or use the secure folder feature due to a security policy error after Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder feature is entirely non-functional, preventing users from securing their data, which is a core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a device owner (DO) state inconsistency; factory reset is required to resolve it.

rows.Title: Samsung Notes Folders and Content disappear
rows.Problem: Folders and content in Samsung Notes have suddenly disappeared after restoring from Samsung Cloud, despite prior backups. The user checked the notes bin and found nothing, and the sync function was not properly restoring data.
rows.Summarized Problem: Folders and content in the Samsung Notes app have disappeared after a restore from Samsung Cloud, with no data found in the trash or bin.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue results in loss of critical user data, making the app functionally unusable for note management.
rows.R&D Comment: The app does not support backup/restore of deleted notes in the cloud due to privacy policies; users must rely on sync functionality to preserve data.

rows.Title: Unable to install icici bank application
rows.Problem: After updating galaxy a55 on one ui7, unable to install icici bank application despite trying all possible methods
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install the icici bank application after updating to one ui7 on galaxy a55.
rows.Severity Reason: The app installation fails due to a version downgrade detection, preventing users from installing a critical banking app, which renders a key functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Downgrade detected during app installation due to version mismatch. Countermeasure: Same as cause; requires version control fix in update process.

rows.Title: Glitch in recent apps section
rows.Problem: Error when sharing videos and images, even in member posts
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience errors when sharing videos and images in the recent apps section, even in member posts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failures in content sharing but does not completely disable functionality or cause device freeze or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is insufficient; issue not occurring in OS 15, suggesting update to latest OS may resolve it.

rows.Title: Calendar notifications not displayed
rows.Problem: User is not receiving calendar notifications for meetings despite trying to change settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are not receiving calendar meeting notifications due to phone and wearable device notification settings being muted.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure of notification delivery, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is that notifications are muted on the phone and in the wearable device settings; the countermeasure is to guide users to unmute notifications in the Wearable app settings.

rows.Title: Now Bar Sports from google toggle not found
rows.Problem: Google sports live score not showing in now bar though it is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Sports from Google' toggle is missing in the Now Bar settings, and Google sports live scores are not displaying despite being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing entirely and does not appear in settings, preventing users from accessing sports content, which is a core functionality on the lock screen.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Image shift when switching camera zoom
rows.Problem: When switching from 2x to 3x zoom, image shift happens
rows.Summarized Problem: Image shifts when switching from 2x to 3x zoom in the camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during camera zoom transition, causing visual shift but not rendering the device unusable or crashing.
rows.R&D Comment: The image shift is due to parallax caused by differences in camera positions; a smooth transition between zoom centers is required to mitigate the effect.

rows.Title: Sound in recorded videos is very bad
rows.Problem: Voice in videos is strange, sometimes missing, voice focus doesn't work, sound cuts off, and after clearing app data, camera lags and quality deteriorates. Background noise is also present in some videos.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete failure of voice recording, leading to unusable video content and potential data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Repeat notification sound plays during calls when call sound setting is off

rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Power saving mode has a lag in turning on
rows.Problem: There is a lag in the power saving option turning on; it does not show immediately and stays active even when turned off. The power saving symbol appears in the battery icon even when power saving is off. Requires restart to resolve, and issue persists.

rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to respond promptly and remains active incorrectly, making it unusable and potentially leading to unexpected battery behavior.
rows.R&D Comment: The delay is intentional due to system-level actions; no change needed as current behavior is by design.

rows.Title: YT video resolution changes to 480p on its own when trying to switch to 2160p

rows.Title: On launching, it displays a black screen for a millisecond

rows.Title: YouTube crashes or drops to 144p/240p when selecting 4K 60fps or HDR

rows.Title: Battery drain

rows.Title: Buds and watch are not connecting
rows.Problem: After the one UI 7 update, the phone does not connect to my buds 3 pro, buds 2, and most importantly to my watch 4, which was also updated with the recent security patch. To have the devices connected, the phone must be restarted. Within the last couple weeks of one UI 7 update, this incidence has happened at least 10 - 12 times

rows.Title: Battery drain

rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain renders the device unusable for daily use, leading to frequent recharging and potential user dissatisfaction.

rows.Title: Lag in device
rows.Problem: Phone is lagging with high RAM usage and overheating after factory reset, despite not installing many apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag and overheating due to high RAM usage after a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unresponsive and overheating, which can impair usability and potentially damage the device.
rows.R&D Comment: SAP library doesn't exist at all. Samsung Health Monitor app doesn't know which wearable will be connected. That's why the app registers events from both Tizen and Wear OS. It is not an app-side issue.

rows.Title: Device show connected, but doesn't work
rows.Problem: Input stops after closing the keyboard cover on ProElite Cantilever Bluetooth Keyboard with integrated trackpad. Typing and cursor movement fail after cover closure, despite Bluetooth connection showing as active.

rows.Title: Black bar appears when swiping back to homescreen from landscape app
rows.Problem: When opening an app in landscape orientation and swiping back to homescreen, a black bar appears on the wallpaper, causing visual glitch.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visible visual glitch but does not prevent device operation or crash.

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device

rows.Title: 120Hz refresh rate isn't functioning as smoothly
rows.Problem: The device's 120Hz refresh rate performance is not smooth, with frame skipping observed in system logs, indicating the issue is due to software timing rather than hardware or device limitations.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 120Hz refresh rate on the device is not smooth due to frame skipping in the system's main thread, which is a software timing issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag or unsmooth scrolling but does not result in device crash or complete failure of core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Frame skipping in the main thread is causing perceived smoothness issues; the problem is software timing-related and not due to hardware or device faults.

rows.Title: Vibration stopped working
rows.Problem: The vibration function continues to fail despite trying all software troubleshooting steps including restarting, resetting settings, running diagnostics, testing in Safe Mode, removing third-party apps, and updating to the latest software version. The issue persists after exhausting all software solutions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's vibration function has stopped working despite all software troubleshooting steps being completed.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function is completely non-functional after all software solutions have been tried, rendering a key physical feedback feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a hardware defect in the COIN DC motor component or motor connector pin assembly. A hardware inspection is required to confirm and analyze the defect.

rows.Title: Clock animation not working on Lock Screen

rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access or use their previously set routines, rendering a core functionality of the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Routines created in One UI 5 or earlier are not visible in One UI 7 and above, and this issue is expected to be resolved in One UI 8.0.

rows.Title: Getting b7002 error while doing in app purchases on my phone on a game downloaded using galaxy store

rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from making purchases, which directly impacts core functionality of the Galaxy Store and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to a change in bypass payment policy, in-app purchases are now blocked; users may be unable to recover from future blocks without administrative intervention.

rows.Title: Dark mode not applying on Voice recorder now bar card

rows.Title: Sound quality is very bad

rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because YouTube playback during a call is routed through the call path instead of the multimedia path, resulting in degraded audio quality. A fix is needed to route multimedia playback correctly during calls.

rows.Title: Overheating and battery drain

rows.Title: Charging speed is getting slow
rows.Problem: Charging speed has slowed down after updates, especially with ONE UI 7. Earlier, phones charged within 1 to 1.5 hours with a 15-watt charger; now it takes over 2 hours. This issue is observed on both Galaxy M52 5G and A53 5G models, with multiple customers reporting similar concerns.

rows.Severity Reason: The device is taking over two hours to charge, which is a major degradation in usability and performance, affecting user experience across multiple devices and customers.
rows.R&D Comment: Slow charging is caused by overheating protection reducing current to prevent battery temperature rise; customers should be guided that this is a safety feature, not a software bug.

rows.Title: screen and notification bar flickering upon unlocking

rows.Title: Device Overheats

rows.Title: Photos are grainy and blurry in low light night mode
rows.Problem: Photos taken in low light using night mode are grainy, blurry, and lack detail, significantly worse than on previous versions of One UI. The issue persists after clearing app data and cache.

rows.Title: Phone app not showing contacts and closes itself
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, the contacts app does not show any contacts and closes itself when opened. The app shows 'updating contacts' for over 14 hours even though all contacts are stored in Gmail. Clearing cache and data, and restarting the phone have not resolved the issue. No contacts are visible, and calls cannot be made.
rows.Summarized Problem: The contacts app fails to display contacts and crashes upon opening after an OS update, despite having all contacts stored in Gmail.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes and fails to show contacts, making it impossible to make calls, which renders the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a large database upgrade operation taking over 10 seconds, leading to a contacts provider failure; countermeasure is to move large operations to background and provide a data-clearing workaround.

rows.Title: Contact app not working
rows.Problem: Contact app and call functionality not working. Software up to date, cleared data, uninstalled and reinstalled app. No resolution found.
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact app and calling functionality are not working after clearing data and reinstalling the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to function entirely, preventing users from making calls or accessing contacts, rendering core device functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a long-running database upgrade process during app updates, which causes the contacts provider to fail. A countermeasure is to move large operations to background with proper handling, though this may result in data loss; users are advised to clear app data as a temporary fix.
