rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Color dropping and blur in photos, especially in high-resolution mode. This is not a budget phone but a premium flagship phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos show color drop and blur, particularly in high-resolution mode, indicating poor image quality under certain conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality but does not cause device crash or data loss, and blur is partially attributable to subject distance, not a core malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Exposure variation and subject distance are contributing factors; sample photos in high-resolution and 12MP modes are needed for comparison.

rows.Title: Fingerprint also enabled on restarting the phone
rows.Problem: After a factory reset, fingerprint unlock is now working when the device locks offline, whereas previously it only allowed PIN unlock for security reasons. This change compromises security.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication is now enabled during offline device lock, which was previously disabled for security.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue compromises device security by allowing fingerprint unlock when PIN-only should be required, potentially exposing the device to unauthorized access.
rows.R&D Comment: Exact issue faced by customer is not clear. Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Voice focus feature not working
rows.Problem: Voice focus feature not working after one ui 7 update in f15
rows.Summarized Problem: The voice focus feature is not working after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is malfunctioning after an update, but the device remains usable and core functions are intact.
rows.R&D Comment: The feature is located in the quick panel (swipe down during a call), and users can access it directly.

rows.Title: One UI system crash
rows.Problem: SM-S908E update one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device crashes when using the One UI system after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The system crash prevents normal device operation, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Front camera pix distortion
rows.Problem: Front camera shows pixellation distortion in S25 ULTRA, especially in low light when recording at 60 FPS. The issue is not present on lower-end phones like Xiaomi 11 Lite and M55S.
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera on S25 ULTRA shows pixellation distortion when recording at 60 FPS in low light, which is inconsistent with lower-end phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video quality under specific conditions but does not prevent core functionality or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The distortion occurs due to reduced exposure time at 60 FPS in low light; the Auto FPS feature defaults to 30 FPS, and 60 FPS may result in increased noise and brightness issues.

rows.Title: Eye comfort shield not working in normal use
rows.Problem: Eye comfort shield is working only in maintenance mode and not in normal use. If turned on and restarted, it stays on; if turned off and restarted, it stays off. Issue persists after updating to OneUI 7.0 (Android 15).
rows.Summarized Problem: The eye comfort shield feature does not function properly during normal use and only works in maintenance mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to operate under normal conditions but works in maintenance mode, indicating a partial malfunction that affects user experience but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Users should check and adjust the color temperature level in Eye Protection Mode to ensure proper functionality; if not at minimum, re-add the LOG to restore operation.

rows.Title: 3x camera wobbling
rows.Problem: 3x camera is wobbling in portraits, pro video, and everywhere. Footage is shaky, especially in motion, despite being a professional photographer using the phone for photography and videography.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 3x camera produces shaky and wobbling footage during use, particularly in motion shots.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is severely impaired, resulting in unsteady footage that compromises professional-quality video output, making it unusable for professional photography and videography.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: MIPI error in sensor configuration indicates a defective or improperly connected front sensor module. Countermeasure: Service center reassembly or replacement of the camera module.

rows.Title: UI lag observed in device while opening and closing the device
rows.Problem: There is more lag than before when using the device, especially during opening and closing actions
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits noticeable lag when opening and closing, particularly during UI transitions.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag is noticeable and affects user interaction but does not cause device freeze or crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Lag occurs due to high device temperature triggering reduced operating frequency; countermeasure is to improve thermal management during device operation.

rows.Title: Voice recorder not working
rows.Problem: Unable to use voice assistant in Gemini, Bixby, YouTube or other apps that support voice assistant. Voice recording not working in voice recorder app; no audio captured during recording or voice search attempts. Mic appears to be non-functional.
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice recording and assistant functions are not working across multiple apps, indicating a microphone or voice processing issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot perform basic voice functions across multiple apps, rendering core interaction features unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue to investigate root cause of voice assistant and recording failure.

rows.Title: Sports update automatically set block in Google Setting
rows.Problem: Sports update automatically block problem

rows.Title: Clock style chosen is diff from what it is displaying on AOD

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a mismatch in visual presentation but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Recent menu elements not working properly
rows.Problem: Problem with recent menu
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent menu elements are not working properly.

rows.Title: Charging not showing on lock screen

rows.Title: Unable to load multiple apps with wifi

rows.Title: Pause USB PD charging when gaming option not workable

rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Pause USB PD charging when gaming' feature is not functional in game booster settings, despite using a compatible PD 3.0 charger.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is greyed out, preventing user from pausing charging during gaming, but device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Network drops to single point; unable to run speed test. Same SIM works on another phone. Issue occurs with both SIMs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences network drops and fails to run speed tests, despite the same SIM working on another device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot perform basic network functions like speed testing, which renders core connectivity features unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The networking for the speedtest app is blocked; allowing background data for the app resolves the issue.

rows.Title: Screen does not turn on after update
rows.Problem: After the One UI 7.0 update on the Galaxy A34 5G, the screen does not turn on even after pressing the side button or double tapping the screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen fails to turn on after the One UI 7.0 update, even when the side button or double tap is used.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot power on the screen, making it unusable for basic operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Status Bar Icons Dimmed on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: On the lock screen, the status bar icons — such as battery percentage, network signal, Wi-Fi, and notification icons — appear dim/faded instead of at full brightness. When I tap the screen once, the icons brighten for about half a second to one second, and then dim again, even though the rest of the lock screen content (cloc
rows.Summarized Problem: Status bar icons on the lock screen appear dimmed and briefly brighten before dimming again when tapped.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of status bar icons, which intermittently brighten and then dim, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device is automatically shutting down
rows.Problem: My phone Samsung A53 is automatically shutting down and the network is also disconnected. I even tried resetting the phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone automatically shuts down and loses network connection, even after a reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shuts down unexpectedly, which renders it unusable and affects core functionality like connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem is due to ongoing exceptions; further analysis requires logs, and the device may be defective, recommending service center replacement.

rows.Title: Camera stabilization issues
rows.Problem: Camera stabilization quality has significantly declined after Android 15 update, resulting in shakier videos and photos compared to previous performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera stabilization is degraded after Android 15 update, causing videos and photos to be noticeably shakier.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera no longer performs as expected after the update, impacting core functionality and user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to outdated binary (YDB) lacking recent stabilization fixes; users should check for the latest software update.

rows.Title: App turns on automatically
rows.Problem: Storage booster application turned itself on at midnight to clean but can't complete throughout the day
rows.Summarized Problem: The storage booster app starts automatically at midnight to clean storage but fails to complete its task throughout the day.
rows.Severity Reason: The app starts automatically and fails to complete its operation, resulting in partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The behavior is normal due to auto-delete settings; insufficient logs prevent root cause identification; user can disable it in settings.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Sometimes the network suddenly goes away despite good network reception on other phones for the same network
rows.Summarized Problem: The device occasionally loses network connection despite having good reception on other devices using the same network.

rows.Title: Smooth transition from AOD to lock screen
rows.Problem: Inconsistent transition between Always On Display and normal/lock screen display. The animation stutters, and the content on AOD doesn’t align properly with the lock screen, causing a noticeable visual mismatch.

rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has decreased from 10 hours to 5 hours after update 15, indicating increased power consumption under normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is no longer lasting as long as before under normal usage, which significantly impacts usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage rate of 0.61% per hour is normal; further investigation needed to determine root cause of reported drop in battery life.

rows.Title: After update to one UI 7 it stuks after screen lock and restarts
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and restarts after screen lock, with significant lag and poor smoothness compared to previous UI version

rows.Title: UI not working
rows.Problem: Apps are crashing, the device is lagging severely, and it shuts off with a long boot time. The UI is not responding, and camera applications are also malfunctioning due to the UI failure.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface is not responding, causing app crashes, severe lag, and device shutdowns with long boot times.
rows.Severity Reason: The UI failure leads to app crashes, device instability, and long boot times, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by UFS link layer errors, indicating a hardware-level problem in the AP or UFS component; the recommended countermeasure is to have the device inspected at the hardware level at a customer service center.

rows.Title: wifi is automatically connected but it is not indicated that wifi is connected
rows.Problem: wifi is automatically connected but it is not indicated that wifi is connected but after restarting the mobile this issue will resolved automatically

rows.R&D Comment: The device connects to Wi-Fi without indicating status; insufficient log data to confirm root cause. Recommend logging connection events immediately after connection to capture state changes.

rows.Title: Wi-fi not turning on
rows.Problem: My device's WiFi feature is not turning on at all. This has been happening since the last 3 months, in between it came back for a week or two but again went away and I have been without WiFi since then. I request the Samsung team to look into this issue as this is not only for my device but I've seen many devices with the same problem
rows.Summarized Problem: The WiFi feature on the device is not turning on and has been malfunctioning for three months with intermittent returns.
rows.Severity Reason: The WiFi function is completely failing, preventing basic connectivity and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely hardware-related, as logs show repeated failure in WLAN subsystem initialization; hardware inspection is recommended.

rows.Title: unable to use samsung notes app, it keeps on crashing
rows.Problem: samsung notes app keeps crashing on opening after 10-12 days of random occurrence. user has tried clearing cache and restarting device, and contacted customer care via smart tutor app with no resolution. app is critical for accessing important pdfs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app crashes repeatedly upon opening, preventing user from accessing important files.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on opening, making it unusable and preventing access to critical data, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be a corrupted app state; recommend reinstalling the APK without deleting current app data, with a temporarily signed APK delivered within two weeks. If the issue persists post-reinstall, re-register the problem with new logs.

rows.Title: Hotspot not working properly when switching to 5GHz frequency
rows.Problem: Hotspot works fine on 2.4GHz but fails when switching to 5GHz frequency
rows.Summarized Problem: Hotspot fails to work when switching from 2.4GHz to 5GHz frequency.
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot function, a core connectivity feature, fails under normal usage conditions, rendering the device unusable for network sharing.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both state: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wifi disconnects automatically
rows.Problem: WiFi on 5GHz keeps disconnecting and reconnecting; works partially on 2.4 GHz. Disconnection affects other devices on the network. This issue has been reported by other users. Log data has been attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi on 5GHz frequently disconnects and reconnects, affecting network stability for all connected devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent disconnections and impacts overall network stability, affecting multiple devices on the same network.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Not able to set SMSC number
rows.Problem: I was not able to update the smsc number in my phone
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update the SMSC number in the SMS settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from updating SMSC settings, which is a functional but not critical feature, and may require manual intervention to resolve.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue stems from a potential database corruption in the messages app; users are advised to clear app data and update the app as a countermeasure.

rows.Title: Camera cutout not working with some games

rows.Title: Switching from gaming app to other app causes game to restart
rows.Problem: Switching from a gaming app to another app causes the game to restart, not only Call of Duty but any game. This issue started after the One UI 7 update and was not present before.
rows.Summarized Problem: Switching from a gaming app to another app causes the game to restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The game restarts upon app switching, which disrupts gameplay and makes the experience unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by aggressive background app optimization in One UI 7, and the app owner must address it as it is a third-party application with no source code available for Samsung to fix.

rows.Title: Green screen when playing YouTube Shorts in Google Chrome
rows.Problem: After the latest software update, YouTube Shorts videos in Google Chrome show a green screen and the device hangs for 2 to 3 seconds before restarting. This occurs for any Shorts video in Chrome after the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Shorts videos display a green screen and cause device hangs and restarts after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device hangs and restarts, making the device unusable during video playback.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Screen not able to switch ON after pressing power button
rows.Problem: Screen not able to switch ON after pressing power button intermittently. This happens 10 out of 5 times. All starts after latest update which I have done yesterday on 14 Jun 2025
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen fails to turn on after pressing the power button intermittently, following a recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen failure prevents the device from being usable, making it impossible to interact with the device after power-on.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: device frequently auto-restarts and screen freezes on AOD when flashlight is on
rows.Problem: after updating to One UI 7, device frequently auto-restarts and screen freezes on AOD when flashlight is on
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently auto-restarts and the screen freezes on AOD when the flashlight is on after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device auto-restarts and screen freezes during AOD, which prevents normal device usage and could lead to data loss or user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause is unclear due to lack of timestamped logs; customer needs to provide logs with matching timestamps and video to reproduce the issue.

rows.Title: Apps taking too long to install
rows.Problem: Apps download quickly but take more than 10 to 15 minutes to install. Restarting sometimes resolves the issue, but it does not always work.
rows.Summarized Problem: App installation is excessively slow, taking over 10 to 15 minutes, and sometimes fails even after restart.
rows.Severity Reason: Installation process is significantly delayed, affecting user experience, but does not completely prevent app usage or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Phone not displaying anything
rows.Problem: Some apps auto closing, unable to get some contacts
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone screen is not displaying anything, and some apps close unexpectedly while contacts cannot be retrieved.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is not displaying anything, making it completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: The onUpgrade method performs large operations from 1708 to 1900, taking over 10 seconds and causing contact provider issues. Countermeasure: Move large operations to background; temporarily clear contacts data via Settings > Apps > Filter and sort > Show system apps > Contacts Storage > Clear Data (with risk of losing contacts).

rows.Title: Lag observed in device while scrolling and touch
rows.Problem: After the recent update May 1 security patch my phone has become very laggy and slow plus there are scrolling and touch issues
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences lag during scrolling and touch interactions after a recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of touch responsiveness, affecting user interaction but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Abnormal external noise from charger causes touch panel noise mode; recommend using genuine charger and changing charging location.

rows.Title: Do not disturb exceptions not working
rows.Problem: In DND Mode, only selected apps should send notifications, but all app notifications are visible on the notifications screen even after clearing them.

rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot effectively manage notifications in DND mode, leading to a major disruption in device usability.

rows.R&D Comment: The blur issue is likely due to hardware failure in the front camera; users should visit service centers to verify hardware operation.

rows.Title: Device hangs

rows.Title: Sports from google not working on lock screen

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains too quickly even when the phone is not in use. A full charge (like 80%) lasts only 3.5 hours with screen on.

rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly under normal usage conditions, making the device unusable without frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Lots of background services are running, causing high system consumption; users should reduce camera and speaker usage during Facebook sessions and turn off WiFi when the screen is off.

rows.Title: Strange video observed in recorded video

rows.Title: Time taken to full charge the device not displayed

rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not display the estimated time to fully charge the battery during charging, only showing the current battery percentage.

rows.R&D Comment: The expected charging time is not displayed when battery temperature is high, as part of normal battery protection; this behavior resumes when temperature decreases.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on mobile hotspot
rows.Problem: The mobile hotspot feature has stopped functioning properly after an update. Tapping the toggle has no effect, and the issue recurs almost every second day, requiring frequent restarts to resolve.

rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the device failing to get capability from Wi-Fi firmware; users should be guided to check the hardware Wi-Fi chipset at a service center.

rows.Title: Bixby not working with commands

rows.Summarized Problem: The Bixby app fails to respond to voice commands.
rows.Severity Reason: The app completely fails to respond to user commands, making a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by outdated Bixby On-Device version; resolved by updating the on-device resource or disabling the feature.

rows.Title: Not able to access secure folder
rows.Problem: The Secure Folder is currently not working at all. I am unable to access it, and none of the standard troubleshooting steps have resolved the problem.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to access the Secure Folder feature on their device.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access a core security feature, which renders the device's privacy and data protection mechanisms inoperable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not reproducing at our end; user is requested to reproduce the issue, take logs, and reach out again. Password reset process is provided for cases of forgotten passwords.

rows.Title: Clicking on music notification doesn't take to the app

rows.Title: Icons on status bar is not visible
rows.Problem: On fullscreen, the top area that usually displays notification, battery etc. is black and doesn't display content. The issue persists regardless of opening PDFs from file manager or notes app.

rows.Title: Sluggish device

rows.Title: Phonepay app widget often doesn't work

rows.Title: Camera not focusing
rows.Problem: Camera is not focusing well. Blurry noisy images. I have tried all settings in multiple scenarios, still not change.

rows.Severity Reason: The camera cannot achieve proper focus, leading to unusable image quality in all scenarios, making photography ineffective.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to incorrect object detection in the touch area; users must get closer to the pepper to achieve proper focus. A countermeasure is to improve object recognition and auto-focus logic to prioritize the pepper over red pepper leaves.

rows.Title: Issues in vibration detected
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI-7.0, vibration has stopped completely. No vibration for notifications, calls, messages, no haptic feedback
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration functionality has stopped completely after updating to One UI-7.0, with no haptic feedback for notifications, calls, or messages.
rows.Severity Reason: Device no longer provides any vibration feedback for critical notifications and calls, making it unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Vibration software logs show normal activity; issue likely stems from hardware defect. Recommend hardware inspection or replacement of vibration motor.

rows.Title: Home screen wallpaper issue while switching applications
rows.Problem: Wallpaper animation is disturbing when switching applications
rows.Summarized Problem: Wallpaper animation becomes disturbing during application switching.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable disruption in user experience during app switching, but does not result in device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint fails to recognize even after multiple attempts. This issue has persisted for six months.

rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint function is consistently failing, preventing users from securely unlocking the device, which is a core usability feature.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by poor image quality from the sensor, likely due to thick protective film, dry fingers, or improper finger placement. Countermeasure: users should remove thick protective film and use the center part of their fingerprint for enrollment and verification.

rows.Title: Smart things app widget not loading
rows.Problem: The smartthings app widget keeps buffering and does not load. Repeatedly signing up the app is not a viable solution, as it is essential for managing the entire home setup.
rows.Summarized Problem: The SmartThings app widget fails to load and buffers repeatedly, preventing users from accessing their home automation setup.

rows.Title: Sound quality degraded after update

rows.Title: Now bar not working with Google map

rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to a misalignment between Google Maps and the Now Bar feed; user can resolve it by updating apps and clearing cache.

rows.Title: Data on Jio fluctuates
rows.Problem: After oneui 7 update data on jio fluctuates and apps doesn't work or load properly
rows.Summarized Problem: Data connectivity on Jio fluctuates after OneUI 7 update, causing apps to fail to load or function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents apps from loading or working properly, leading to a significant degradation in device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Network connectivity failure due to DNS resolution issues; requires deeper investigation into network probe failures and host resolution.

rows.Title: Vibration alert not working
rows.Problem: Vibration alerts during and at the end of calls stopped working after updating to one UI 7. The 'call alerts' option is ineffective as there are no vibrations or notifications during call start or end.
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration alerts for call start and end are not working after updating to one UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to provide vibration feedback during call events, making users unable to receive critical call notifications, which is essential for usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by media vibration intensity set to zero in the system; setting it to a non-zero value resolves the problem.

rows.Title: App icon not updated
rows.Problem: Old icon still present
rows.Summarized Problem: The app icon is not updating and an old icon persists after theme changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the icon does not update, but the device remains usable and core functions are unaffected.
rows.R&D Comment: Old theme data persists due to outdated ThemePark version; newer ThemePark versions will resolve this, and users can apply default icons as a workaround.

rows.Title: Battery drain after update
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue after ui7 6

rows.Title: Network fluctuation

rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences repeated network switching between 4G and 5G, causing instability despite troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent network instability but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Accidental Touch Protection feature not working well
rows.Problem: Accidental Touch Protection feature isn't working well. Due to this I accidentally called my Emergency Numbers. Although the phone is in Dark place/Pocket/Bag - the feature doesn't work. as a result the phone wakes up its screen by accidental Touch and then accidentally open Emergency Call (without unlocking the phone) and then calls my Emergency Numbers. This feature was working fine with One UI 6.1 But, After updating to ONE UI 7 it's not working! As now we have NOW BAR, this feature is
rows.Summarized Problem: The Accidental Touch Protection feature fails to detect when the phone is in a pocket or bag, causing the screen to wake and trigger emergency calls without user intent.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature failure leads to unintended emergency calls, which can result in serious safety risks and device misuse.
rows.R&D Comment: The Accidental Touch Protection function relies on TSP and light sensor to detect pocket state; when screen turns on, it checks brightness and touch conditions. If brightness is below 10lux and touch is detected, a popup prevents the touch. This condition was satisfied during the incident, indicating a potential flaw in the logic or sensor integration post-ONE UI 7 update.

rows.Title: Secure folder not working

rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder feature, a core functionality for device security, is completely blocked by the system policy, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Device owner property and policy state indicate inconsistent configuration; the secure folder is blocked due to device owner state, requiring a fix in device policy management.

rows.Title: green lines appear when sharing image on social media
rows.Problem: Green lines appear on images when sharing via social media platforms after capturing with 48 MP camera using flash on and off
rows.Summarized Problem: Green lines appear on images during sharing on social media after capturing with 48 MP camera using flash.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible artifacts in images, impairing user experience and potentially affecting image quality significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem was caused by missing elevation value in HEIF decoding and buffer alignment mismatch; fixed by sending elevation value to SW HEIF decoder and resolving buffer alignment.

rows.Title: Camera line Issue
rows.Problem: 48 MP camera picture showing green line
rows.Summarized Problem: A green line appears in 48 MP camera photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible distortion in photos, affecting image quality and usability of the camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause was a missing elevation value in HEIF decoding; the fix involves sending elevation value to the software HEIF decoder to resolve buffer alignment mismatch.

rows.Title: Archive option missing confirmation popup
rows.Problem: When clicking the 'Archive' option on an app, no confirmation or warning popup appears. The app gets archived immediately, and users must wait for it to restore, which can take time—especially on slow networks. This creates risk of accidental app removal.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Archive' action on apps lacks a confirmation popup, leading to accidental app archival and potential user frustration due to long restoration times.
rows.Severity Reason: Users may accidentally archive apps, resulting in loss of access until restoration, which can disrupt workflow and cause device unusability in urgent situations.
rows.R&D Comment: Add a confirmation window before archiving apps to prevent accidental actions and ensure user awareness.

rows.Summarized Problem: The display's 120 Hz refresh rate is not functioning properly after a UI 7 update, behaving as if it is still at 60 Hz despite user settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to deliver a core visual performance feature (120 Hz refresh rate), resulting in a degraded user experience that persists despite factory resets.
rows.R&D Comment: It is confirmed that the refresh rate only works at 60 Hz in logs; the issue appears to be software-related, but the root cause is unknown without a clear reproduction path.

rows.Title: Spelling Error on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Spelling mistake on Lock Screen: 'double tab' written instead of 'double tap'
rows.Summarized Problem: The Lock Screen displays 'double tab' instead of 'double tap', causing a spelling error.
rows.Severity Reason: The error is a spelling mistake that affects clarity but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Call Drop Issue
rows.Problem: A new issue has been detected, with a screenshot and video attached previously. A new file is now attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dialer application is experiencing call drop issues.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops prevent the device from maintaining basic communication functionality, making it unusable in real-time operations.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be hardware-related; customer service center visit is recommended for inspection.

rows.Title: High Battery Drain & Sluggish Performance
rows.Problem: Battery is draining fast and device is much more laggy
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences rapid battery drain and significant lag after update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing severe performance degradation and rapid battery drain, making it unusable for daily operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Touch sensor in display OCTA has HW defect (Tx channel 00 and 0s are cracked); Octa module should be checked and replaced at service center.

rows.Title: Sound Assistant Plugin Issue in GoodLock
rows.Problem: Floating button for sound control panel always tends to disappear in landscape mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The floating button for sound control panel disappears in landscape mode on GoodLock.
rows.Severity Reason: The control element fails to remain visible in a primary usage orientation, making sound control inaccessible during normal device use.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Speaker Muted After SW Update
rows.Problem: After the recent update, sound from apps no longer plays through separate outputs. The device now routes both apps' audio to the same output, even when apps are switched, and users cannot independently control audio output for different apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: After the software update, the phone no longer allows separate audio output for different apps, causing both apps to play through the same output device.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot independently control audio output for different apps, leading to a complete loss of audio routing functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue description is unclear; users need to specify which apps are affected and expected behavior for audio routing.

rows.Title: UI not updated after UI 7.0 update
rows.Problem: A screenshot shows an old UI layout, including Instagram and YouTube Shorts HUD and navigation bar, persisting after UI 7.0 update. This causes a yellow tint on all app backgrounds regardless of the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: After the UI 7.0 update, apps display outdated UI elements such as old HUDs and navigation bars, causing a persistent yellow tint on all app backgrounds.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects all apps and results in visible visual distortion across the display, making the interface unusable and inconsistent.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Calculator Always Giving 0 Value for any Task
rows.Problem: After UI 7, the calculator app shows 0 always; whenever a number is typed, a zero is added, making 5 become 50, 10 become 100.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app incorrectly adds a zero to any entered number, resulting in incorrect values.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete malfunction of the calculator's basic input function, making it unusable for any numerical operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a timing problem leading to incorrect cursor positioning in the first input; fixed in version 12.4.00.13 and released for verification.

rows.Title: Unable to Clear Cache of Game App Clash of Clans
rows.Problem: I cant clear the cached data of clash of clans, I have tried several times
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot clear the cache of the Clash of Clans game app, despite multiple attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in app cache clearing, which affects usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Users need to follow specific steps to clear cache via app settings; no root cause identified yet.

rows.Title: Game Booster Application is Not Working Properly
rows.Problem: No GPU option available and favorite game FreeFireMax not listed in Game Booster settings. Users experience touch issues and lag during gaming.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Game Booster app lacks GPU option and does not list FreeFireMax, causing touch issues and lag during gameplay.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to support key game features and causes significant usability and performance issues during gameplay, making the device unusable for gaming.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Best Face Option Not Available in Camera
rows.Problem: Best faces option not available in my samsung a 56 5g
rows.Summarized Problem: The best face option is not available in the camera app, likely because the feature is intended for motion photos and the current image is not a motion photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work in the intended context, but the camera function remains usable for other purposes, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Best face is intended for motion photos; current image is not a motion photo, so the feature is not applicable.

rows.Title: Device is Hanging while Using Application
rows.Problem: Device is hanging during application usage
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs when using the Market App.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs during application usage, which prevents normal operation and renders the app unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Background dexopt not fully performed post-upgrade; device should be fully charged and kept at low temperature to allow automatic background dexopting.

rows.Title: Unable to Connect BT
rows.Problem: Not able to connect the bluetooth
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to connect to Bluetooth devices.
rows.Severity Reason: Bluetooth connection failure prevents device from pairing with peripherals, rendering functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Connection is failing due to page timeout; ensure remote device is powered on, charged, and in pairing mode, and verify with other devices; OTA logs required if issue persists.

rows.Title: Unable to See Any Contacts in Contacts App
rows.Problem: After UI 7.0 Software Update, contacts aren't showing up in the contacts app, a popup message indicates uploading contacts but the app closes immediately. Phone logs and keypad are not visible. Urgent help requested.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts are not displaying in the contacts app after the UI 7.0 update, with the app closing immediately after attempting to load contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon attempting to load contacts, making the feature completely unusable and preventing access to essential contact data.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large database deletions during onupgrade operation exceed 10-second timeout, causing provider execution failure. Countermeasure: Move onupgrade operation to background runtime; clear local contacts data and re-sync with Samsung or Google accounts to recover data.

rows.Title: App Animation while Switching Apps is Not Consistent
rows.Problem: The new animation when switching between or swiping away recent apps feels laggy, clunky, and unpolished. Please refine the animation or give us the option to choose animation speed/style like before.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animation when switching between apps feels laggy and clunky, lacking polish and responsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is inconsistent and unpolished, affecting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera is Not Working
rows.Problem: After the android 15 software update, my camera is not working. I have done a factory reset but it is still not working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is not working after an Android 15 update, even after a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely non-functional after an update, rendering a key device feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is a damaged camera module with abnormal MIPI communication; replacement of the hardware module is required.

rows.Title: Eye Comfort Shield Not Working Properly
rows.Problem: Screenshot taken with eye comfort shield on looks yellow after OneUI 7 update; looked normal in OneUI 6
rows.Summarized Problem: Eye Comfort Shield causes yellow tint in screenshots after OneUI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance during screenshots but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality may still be partially usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Audio Mute Issue
rows.Problem: After a recent update, a headphone symbol appears even without a connected headphone, causing no sound output on the speaker and no option to resolve it.
rows.Summarized Problem: A headphone symbol appears without any headphone connection, causing no sound output on the speaker.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from hearing audio through the speaker, rendering the device unusable for basic communication and media playback.
rows.R&D Comment: Audio path is coming with headset path but no log found when headset is connected. Please reboot and check if the issue is reproducible; if so, visit the service center.

rows.Title: Vibration is not Working
rows.Problem: Sharing log data and video recording as per suggestion
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration function is not working on the device in any scenario.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function fails completely across all scenarios, indicating a device-wide malfunction that prevents basic device feedback.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause indicates software-level processing is correct but hardware defect suspected in COIN DC motor or motor connector pins; countermeasure recommends hardware inspection at service center.

rows.Title: Unable to Customize Navigation Key
rows.Problem: The persistent bottom navigation hint, previously customizable in One UI 6, is now permanently enabled in One UI 7, removing user choice and representing a downgrade rather than an upgrade. The removal of alternative navigation options is unacceptable, as navigation is a fundamental and non-removable feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can no longer customize the navigation key after the update, with a persistent bottom navigation hint now permanently enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Navigation is a fundamental and non-removable feature; removing user customization makes the feature unusable and represents a significant downgrade.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to Play 4K Video in Samsung Video Player
rows.Problem: 4K SDR and HDR 10-bit videos do not play in Samsung Video Player or other video players like VLC Media Player.
rows.Summarized Problem: 4K HDR and SDR 10-bit videos cannot be played in Samsung Video Player or other video apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot play high-quality 4K HDR videos, which is a core functionality for video playback, rendering the device unusable for media consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: Exynos8825 chipset does not support 10-bit video playback; this limitation prevents playback of 10-bit 4K videos in all video players.

rows.Title: WhatsApp Call Notification Not Coming on Lockscreen
rows.Problem: WhatsApp call not showing in lockscreen even after all notifications are on
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp call notifications do not appear on the lockscreen despite all notifications being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the user from seeing incoming WhatsApp calls on lockscreen, which is a partial malfunction of a key notification feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device is Charging Slowly After Update
rows.Problem: My Samsung M35 phone is not supporting fast charging and only charges slowly after the UI 7 update, even with an authentic 25W Type-C charger.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung M35 phone is not supporting fast charging and only charges slowly after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform fast charging, which is a major functional failure affecting core usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device is Overheating while Using
rows.Problem: Device is overheating during use
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during use, despite temperature readings remaining under thermal specifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The overheating occurs within acceptable thermal limits and does not impact device usability or performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Youtube remains in dark mode after applying light mode from quick panel
rows.Problem: Youtube content remains in dark mode after light mode is applied from quick panel
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube app remains in dark mode after user applies light mode via quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific app's appearance after a user action, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in latest YouTube version; retest required in updated app version.

rows.Title: Auto Brightness Not Working
rows.Problem: Screen brightens automatically in bright social media posts, making text unreadable when adaptive brightness is turned off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto brightness adjusts screen brightness in bright social media content, making text unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen becomes unreadable in bright content, impairing usability of core content viewing.
rows.R&D Comment: It is difficult to confirm the exact phenomenon due to insufficient information. Please visit the service center to get a diagnosis.

rows.Title: Time Stamps of Images/Video are Not Correct
rows.Problem: Over 400 photos and videos are appearing at the top of the Recent folder with incorrect timestamps
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos and videos in the Recent folder are appearing with incorrect timestamps.
rows.Severity Reason: Incorrect timestamps cause users to misidentify when media was taken, leading to data misrepresentation and potential confusion in usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by rapid database insertions from WhatsApp app; countermeasure is to update WhatsApp and disable media auto-sync in the app.

rows.Title: High Battery Drain Issue
rows.Problem: Battery drop observed in screen shot
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after update, possibly due to app installations and power settings.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain can render the device unusable and may lead to unexpected shutdowns.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery consumption increases post-update due to app installations and power settings; users need to follow a specific logging procedure to reproduce and validate the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to Create Passkey
rows.Problem: When trying to create a passkey on a new Samsung device, the system first asks for the PIN of the old device, then asks for the new device's PIN. After entering both correctly, it shows an error that Samsung Wallet is temporarily unavailable (passkey.401). Resetting the phone does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot create a passkey on a new Samsung device due to a persistent error after entering both old and new device PINs.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from setting up a fundamental authentication feature, rendering the device unusable for secure access to Samsung services.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to incorrect PIN initialization in the KnoxMatrix EscrowVault service; further investigation needed for logs to confirm root cause.

rows.Title: Message App Flicker while Click on Link
rows.Problem: When clicked the unsubscribe hyperlink in messages app to stop receiving messages from sender, causes the popup to flicker a lot while opening and the screen becomes unresponsive sometimes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The unsubscribe link in the messages app causes popup flickering and screen unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen becomes unresponsive, which renders the device unusable during interaction with the message app.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue reported to Google via issue tracker; request for silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Space in Keyboard while using in Whats App
rows.Problem: There is a visible space between the keyboard and the typing box when using WhatsApp on Samsung device with Android 15, regardless of whether Gboard or Samsung Keyboard is used. The issue persists after resetting keyboard, clearing personalized data, and restarting the device.
rows.Summarized Problem: A visible gap appears between the emoji keyboard and the typing box in WhatsApp on Samsung devices, affecting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects keyboard usability during messaging but does not cause device crash or data loss, and persists only in a specific app context.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by WhatsApp's UI implementation; no Samsung involvement, and source code access is unavailable for root cause analysis.

rows.Title: Relax mode not shown in Quick Panel
rows.Problem: Relax mode is activated by a routine but sometimes not displayed in the Quick Panel, despite being active and restricting apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Relax mode is activated but not displayed in the Quick Panel, leading to user unawareness of its active state.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works but fails to provide visible feedback, causing partial malfunction in user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Internet speed is very slow or inconsistent despite 5G being shown in the status bar
rows.Problem: Internet speed is very slow or inconsistent despite 5G being shown in the status bar. At times, the network disappears completely for a few seconds to minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet speed is very slow or inconsistent despite 5G being shown in the status bar, with occasional network disconnections.
rows.Severity Reason: The network disconnects intermittently and speeds are consistently slow, making the device unusable for basic online activities.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Captured images seem artificial while zooming
rows.Problem: The camera quality appears reduced after a software update. Images look artificial, especially when zoomed in. Camera lens is clear, but photos show visual artifacts.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos appear artificial and distorted when zoomed, despite a clear lens and normal image quality metrics.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image appearance during zoom but does not cause device crash or complete failure of camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality appears normal; only color and brightness were adjusted in the software update. Further investigation needed with high-resolution sample images.

rows.Title: Lag during pull down notification and quick panel
rows.Problem: Notification or control centre pulldown has serious lag issues on S23 with 256GB memory, persisting for months with no fix
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel and notification center experience significant lag when pulled down.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag affects usability during common interactions but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Lag occurs due to garbage collection in Android during panel pull-down; countermeasure is to optimize GC timing or UI responsiveness during memory management.

rows.Title: Weather App showing Wrong weather report
rows.Problem: Weather app shows incorrect weather data; it reports rain when it is actually sunny.
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather app displays incorrect weather data, showing rain when it is actually sunny.
rows.Severity Reason: The app provides incorrect weather information, leading to user confusion and potential misjudgment of outdoor conditions, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar isn't showing Sports form Google option
rows.Problem: Notifications from Google with sports updates are selected, but the sports content is not visible on the Now bar, despite being enabled in settings. The Now bar shows other options like voice, recorder, maps but not sports updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports updates from Google are not appearing on the Now bar despite being enabled in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning as sports updates are missing from the Now bar while other content is visible, indicating an incomplete display issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: App icons image in the folder disappear or sometimes take the image of last use app
rows.Problem: In the new android and samsung ui update, app icons in the folder disappear or sometimes take the image of the last used app. After clicking, it returns to the original correct icon. Attached pictures show both scenarios: drive icon disappeared and drive icon changed.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons in folders disappear or show the image of the last used app, and revert only after clicking.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the interface, affecting visual consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Updated code would request user to update software and then check as it has been fixed in latest versions of ONE UI HOME

rows.Title: Incoming call got hanged
rows.Problem: Incoming call got hanged while trying to receive. Call shown as denied but user tried to receive. Call disconnected and user had to dial back, which came as busy, requiring three attempts. This issue forces user to switch back to iPhone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Incoming calls hang when attempting to receive, leading to disconnection and repeated failed attempts to reconnect.
rows.Severity Reason: The call fails to connect properly and users are unable to receive calls, resulting in a complete loss of communication functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to add ICICI MakeMyTrip credit card to Samsung Wallet
rows.Problem: Unable to add ICICI MakeMy
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add ICICI MakeMyTrip credit card to Samsung Wallet due to card not being supported by Samsung Pay.
rows.Severity Reason: The card is not supported by Samsung Pay, leading to a failure in a core wallet function that prevents users from adding payment cards.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Mastercard account settings not enabling Samsung Pay; the same condition triggers the PAN_INELIGBLE error and is consistent across the same PAN.

rows.Title: Body fat% measurement gets stuck at 67%
rows.Problem: Body fat percentage measurement gets stuck at 67% during analysis, even when hands are not touching the sensor. This occurs consistently, not intermittently. Measurement starts automatically without user input.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device gets stuck at 67% during body fat percentage measurement and fails to complete the reading.
rows.Severity Reason: The measurement fails to complete, resulting in no valid data, which renders the feature unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: The body composition measurement history is missing; users should store dumps immediately after measurement. If water is present on the sensor or measurement is done immediately post-exercise, it may cause errors.

rows.Title: Show contacts while sharing
rows.Problem: Show contacts while sharing option is gone after the update
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Show contacts while sharing' option is missing after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is no longer available, affecting user functionality but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: App icons getting disappeared
rows.Problem: App icons disappear when opening the device for the first time, reappear on subsequent opens. The option to close all apps at once is intermittently missing and appears only after retrying.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons disappear upon first launch and reappear later, with intermittent failure of the 'close all apps' option.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of app management functionality, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Text disappears when zooming out in Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: Text disappears when zooming out in Samsung Notes and reappears on zoom in
rows.Summarized Problem: Text in Samsung Notes disappears when zooming out and reappears upon zooming in.
rows.Severity Reason: The text functionality is partially broken, with intermittent visibility issues during zoom operations, but the note content remains accessible after zooming back in.
rows.R&D Comment: Cache error causing text display inconsistency; recommend user to save and reopen note from My File app to resolve.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on call waiting on SIM 2
rows.Problem: Unable to turn on call waiting on SIM 2. It says "failed to read data"
rows.Summarized Problem: Call waiting feature fails to activate on SIM 2 and displays 'failed to read data'.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function and returns an error message, preventing users from enabling call waiting on SIM 2, which is a core communication function.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs during call waiting updates and is caused by a data read failure in the service class handling; countermeasure suggests a data read validation fix.

rows.Title: Poor battery backup after update
rows.Problem: Device shows very poor battery backup after update, with only 3.30-4 hours of usage time, despite no battery issues detected during testing
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significantly reduced battery backup after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to maintain adequate battery life, which directly impacts usability and daily operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Media picker doesn't show any other folder apart from Favourites, Camera, Downloads, Screenshot
rows.Problem: Media picker doesn't show any other folder apart from Favourites, Camera, Downloads, Screenshot whenever I try to upload or share images on any of the apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The media picker only displays predefined folders like Favourites, Camera, Downloads, and Screenshot, and does not show other albums or folders.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access or share images from other folders, making it impossible to upload images from a wide range of sources, which severely limits functionality across third-party apps.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the photo picker using Google's mainline AOSP, which restricts album visibility to only five predefined folders. A countermeasure is that users can access all photos via the 'Photos' tab, but the root limitation in the photo picker cannot be modified by Samsung due to its mainline nature.

rows.Title: Touch protection feature not working properly
rows.Problem: The pocket protection feature is causing accidental emergency calls, even after disabling and enabling the feature and resetting phone settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The touch protection feature is malfunctioning and triggering accidental emergency calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is causing unintended emergency calls, which poses a serious safety risk and renders the device potentially unusable in critical situations.
rows.R&D Comment: All calls are initiated from the dialer and are not emergency calls; issue scenario logs are missing for further investigation.

rows.Title: WiFi not turning on
rows.Problem: WiFi is stuck on searching networks and automatically turns off after upgrade to One UI 7, preventing user from connecting to Wi-Fi.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi fails to connect and repeatedly resets after device upgrade to One UI 7, staying stuck in network searching state.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish a Wi-Fi connection, making it unusable for basic internet access, which is essential for daily operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate a HAL driver state mismatch; rebooting resolves the issue temporarily, but root cause is unclear due to missing logs.

rows.Title: Unable to connect mobile hotspot and wifi
rows.Problem: The video recording was already sent a few days ago, sending it again. Error logs were sent yesterday.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to connect to mobile hotspot and Wi-Fi, with conflicting or missing error logs that prevent proper diagnosis.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic connectivity, rendering the device unusable for core network functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Instagram crashes when launched
rows.Problem: Instagram crashes every time it is launched
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram crashes every time it is launched upon startup.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, making it unusable and preventing user access to the application.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem from app side; app developer needs to fix it due to repeated connection failures and network timeouts. Reporting requires manual reproduction, which is not feasible or prioritized by the app developer.

rows.Title: Unable to set call type
rows.Problem: Nothing displayed in Call Type while trying to report a telemarketer call
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot see or set call type when reporting telemarketer calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The call type field fails to display content, preventing users from reporting telemarketer calls, which is a core functionality for user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AOD doesn't display music and map
rows.Problem: AOD does not work when music player is playing or map is in use, and only becomes visible after clearing from recent apps. The now bar is involved in the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display fails to show music and map content when those apps are active, and only works after clearing the recent apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The AOD fails to display essential content during normal usage, rendering a key feature unusable when needed.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bixby not working properly
rows.Problem: Bixby responds with unrecognizable or inappropriate text, and users cannot digest the response
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby fails to respond with meaningful or appropriate text, resulting in confusing or inappropriate outputs.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby is a core AI feature that users rely on for interaction; inconsistent or inappropriate responses make it unusable for basic tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sluggish device
rows.Problem: Device started to freeze a lot after the one 7 update, with increased animations causing performance issues
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing frequent freezes and sluggish performance after the One 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes frequently, making it unusable during operation, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Performance issues not clearly identified in logs; further investigation needed to confirm root cause and validate issue reproduction.

rows.Title: Device lags while playing a game
rows.Problem: Screen gets stuck multiple times even after swiping, happens in almost every game, player cannot rotate or aim properly, gyroscope in game not working consistently, sometimes fast and other times slow
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags severely during gameplay, causing screen freezes and inconsistent gyroscope performance that disrupts player control.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to respond to user input during gameplay, making it unusable for interactive features like rotation and aiming, which are essential for gameplay.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Lock screen clock size gets smaller
rows.Problem: My always on display clock sometimes becomes very tiny and it remains as it is. When I try to edit my lock screen it shows me full size. Its very annoying and it is a bug in the one ui7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen becomes very small and remains that way after being set to full size.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent display size but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to reply from notification panel in landscape mode
rows.Problem: Unable to reply to WhatsApp messages directly through notification panel while using some apps in landscape mode and can only reply back when in portrait mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot reply to WhatsApp messages directly from the notification panel when in landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in a specific context (landscape mode) but does not prevent overall device use or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: App icon size gets back to default after resizing
rows.Problem: App icon size resets to default after being resized; user tries multiple times, uninstall/reinstall, but issue persists
rows.Summarized Problem: The app icon size resets to default after user adjustment and persists even after reinstalling the lock screen app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions as the user setting is not retained after a short period, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Auto restart issue
rows.Problem: Device auto restarts and Bluetooth not working with pop-up showing on display. Despite all troubleshooting and reset, issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly auto-restarts and Bluetooth fails to function, even after full troubleshooting and device reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly auto-restarting, which renders it unusable and disrupts core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: AP malfunction occurred 286 times; likely due to AP/DRAM/PCB issues, requiring hardware inspection.

rows.Title: WhatsApp video call camera switch freezes
rows.Problem: During WhatsApp video calls, when i switch to the rear camera, it freezes and doesn't switch.
rows.Summarized Problem: During WhatsApp video calls, switching to the rear camera causes the app to freeze and fail to switch.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the camera to fail to switch during a critical function (video call), leading to a complete disruption of communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs show no system-level anomalies; recommend immediate log extraction during issue occurrence to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Unable to switch to rear view camera during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Unable to switch to rear view camera during WhatsApp video call. The rear camera works with other apps. Clearing cache and reinstalling WhatsApp does not resolve the issue. The call gets stuck when attempting the switch. Issue occurs only on Samsung S series devices. This is a basic functionality that should work.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot switch from front to rear camera during WhatsApp video calls, causing calls to get stuck.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes calls to get stuck, preventing basic functionality and making video calls unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to WhatsApp enabling VDIS for VT calls; updating WhatsApp and software resolves it.

rows.Title: Instagram Crashing
rows.Problem: Instagram keeps crashing on my Samsung S25 Ultra after the recent update. Reinstalled multiple times, but no fix. Needs urgent attention.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram crashes repeatedly on Samsung S25 Ultra after the latest update, despite multiple reinstallations.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes fatally, preventing normal usage, and persists after reinstallations, making the device unusable for social media functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is caused by a pending exception in the app's source code; META must investigate and fix the root cause. No Samsung involvement in app development.

rows.Title: Back camera video pauses on WhatsApp video call when switching from front to back camera
rows.Problem: Back camera video pauses on WhatsApp video call when switching from front to back camera after One UI 6.1 update. Front camera works fine, issue only occurs on switching. Cleared cache, reinstalled app, disabled Video Call Effects — problem persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The back camera video pauses during WhatsApp video calls when switching from front to back camera after One UI 6.1 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a complete interruption in video call functionality, making it unusable during real-time communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to WhatsApp enabling VDIS for video calls; updating WhatsApp and software resolves it.

rows.Title: Search for contact name shows different name
rows.Problem: Search for contact name shows different name but calling the correct person when selected
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search displays a different name than entered, though correct contact is called upon selection.
rows.Severity Reason: The search result is incorrect, leading to potential confusion, but the call function still works correctly.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Green screen after 25 seconds while playing YouTube Shorts
rows.Problem: When playing YouTube Shorts videos in Google Chrome browser, the video shows a green screen after 25 seconds and the device hangs for 2 to 3 seconds before restarting. This occurs for any YouTube Shorts video after the latest software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Shorts videos display a green screen and cause the device to hang and restart after 25 seconds of playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs and restarts during video playback, leading to a complete loss of functionality for video content viewing.
rows.R&D Comment: Device reboots during playback; no codec issues in logs. Requires input-output dumps for further analysis. Issue not reproducible on Sherlock.

rows.Title: battery protection at maximum at 85% not working
rows.Problem: After UI 7 update, settings like folder icon grid cannot be set, widget transparency not previewed, status bar server information not smoothly running, and battery protection at 85% not working while charging continues
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery protection set at 85% is not functioning and device continues charging to 100%.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery protection feature is not working, allowing the device to continue charging beyond the set limit, which may lead to overcharging or battery degradation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera image washed out after update
rows.Problem: Camera light metering has been spoiled by OneUi 7 update, causing photos to be almost washed out, overweight, and of poor quality
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images are washed out and of poor quality after the OneUi 7 update due to issues with light metering.
rows.Severity Reason: Photos are severely degraded in quality, making them unusable for standard photographic purposes, indicating a major malfunction of a core camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery is limited to charge till 85 % but it is still charging beyond it
rows.Problem: Battery is limited to charge till 85 % but it is still charging beyond it
rows.Summarized Problem: The device stops charging at 85% but continues to charge beyond that level, indicating a malfunction in the battery charging limit functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is showing incorrect charging behavior, which may lead to battery overcharging and potential damage, posing a safety and usability risk.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to access all buttons in panel 2nd
rows.Problem: Cannot access all buttons in panel two in quick access menu
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access all buttons in the quick access panel after recent updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a functional menu, preventing full access to some buttons but not rendering the interface unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Share option shows all apps in New ui 7
rows.Problem: Share option shows all apps even though customize apps is selected; UI 6 worked ok
rows.Summarized Problem: In New UI 7, the share option displays all apps regardless of custom app selection, unlike UI 6.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions by showing all apps instead of only customized ones, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Website not working after update
rows.Problem: One website of daily use is not working after device update. Website works when using VPN. Same SIM and devices in family do not face this issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: A specific website stops loading after device update, but works when using a VPN.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects website access under specific conditions (VPN bypass), but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device Auto restart
rows.Problem: Phone experienced a partial restart between 2-4am, showing Samsung logo without fully shutting down. User bought phone 4 months ago and is concerned about the cause. Requested logs to investigate.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device performs a partial restart showing the Samsung logo without fully shutting down, occurring intermittently at night.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts without proper shutdown, potentially causing data loss or instability, and affects core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Device restarted by device care, which is a normal user-enabled setting.

rows.Title: Navigation Bar overlapping with google Pay PIN screen
rows.Problem: Google Pay PIN numbers are getting hidden by the navigation buttons at the bottom, making it difficult to enter the PIN
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar is overlapping with the Google Pay PIN screen, hiding the PIN input field.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot enter their PIN due to complete obstruction of the input field, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wifi is getting turned off automatically when bluetooth is connected
rows.Problem: Wifi is getting turned off automatically when bluetooth is connected. I have tried everything, like cleaning the cache by turning off the device and volume up and power button, I have reset wifi and bluetooth settings, did a reset on my router as well, also tried restarting my phone. What should I do to fix this.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi disconnects automatically when Bluetooth is connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to lose internet connectivity when Bluetooth is active, making the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: FW panic in Bluetooth module is causing WiFi disconnection; require CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: All applications crashing after UI 7 update
rows.Problem: All applications are crashing after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: All applications are crashing after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable as all applications crash, preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Scroll to capture more of the screen
rows.Problem: After one UI 7 update, the "Scroll to capture more of the screen" feature is not working and is quite annoying.
rows.Summarized Problem: The scroll to capture feature is not working after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working after an update, causing user annoyance but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Google Messages Not Opening
rows.Problem: Google Messages app freezes when tapped, preventing users from viewing or replying to messages despite receiving notifications and message previews.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Messages app freezes when opened, preventing users from viewing or replying to messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to open entirely, blocking core messaging functionality and rendering the device unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Ensure Google Messages is set as default SMS app and update to latest version; provide silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Paytm taking too long to fetch data and refresh
rows.Problem: Even while writing this I had to switch to mobile data. Attaching a video demonstrating slowness on PayTM app.
rows.Summarized Problem: PayTM app is taking excessive time to fetch data and refresh, forcing user to switch to mobile data.
rows.Severity Reason: The app's slowness forces users to switch to mobile data, indicating a critical performance issue that impacts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Wi-Fi link quality is confirmed to be fine; issue likely stems from app-side data fetching performance. Further investigation needed

rows.Title: AI Core remains active in the background
