rows.Problem: The AI core remains active in the background, having operated for approximately two hours. This daily occurrence often extends operational runtime to seven or eight hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI core stays active in the background for two hours daily, extending device runtime to seven or eight hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes extended runtime but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Instability focus and inaccurate color saturation issues result in poor image quality, leading to dissatisfaction with the device's camera performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces poor image quality due to instability in focus and inaccurate color saturation, especially under digital zoom and maximum softening settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core camera functionality, resulting in poor image quality that undermines user experience and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality degradation is caused by digital zoom and user-applied softening settings; countermeasure includes optimizing settings and clarifying image capture conditions.

rows.Title: Phone screen dims automatically
rows.Problem: Phone screen dims automatically after 2.5 minutes in sunlight, even when brightness is set to max
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone screen dims automatically after 2.5 minutes of exposure to sunlight, despite brightness being set to maximum.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of screen visibility under sunlight but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device lags while using Phonepe app
rows.Problem: Samsung galaxy s24 ultra freezes while running Phonepe app and nothing is working
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra freezes when running the Phonepe app, causing device lag and unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes during app usage, making it unusable and preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Noticeable delay observed while locking the device
rows.Problem: When I lock my screen on my samsung galaxy s24 ultra there is a small noticeable delay in it.
rows.Summarized Problem: There is a noticeable delay when locking the device screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay is noticeable but does not prevent device usage or cause a crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Swipe for split screen not working
rows.Problem: Two finger swipe up to split screen feature is not working; user must select from options instead of triggering split screen directly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The two-finger swipe-up gesture to split screen is not functioning and requires manual selection from options.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to work as intended but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss; users can still access split screen through alternative methods.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Security policy prevents installation of Secure Folder
rows.Problem: Error occurs when opening Secure Folder; request to resolve immediately
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter an error when attempting to open the Secure Folder, preventing its installation or use.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents the secure folder from being accessed or installed, which is a core security feature and directly impacts device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue arises due to device owner (DO) state changes; factory reset is required to resolve. A factory reset is recommended as the countermeasure.

rows.Title: Apps and widget position changed after update
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, apps and widgets are now centered on the home screen, unlike before when they were positioned near the corners and fully utilized screen space. The app sizes have also reduced, causing many to fit in just one line.
rows.Summarized Problem: After the One UI 7 update, apps and widgets are centered on the home screen and appear smaller, reducing screen utilization.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app layout and screen usability but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality remains partially operational.
rows.R&D Comment: The attached logs are insufficient; we need logs and video sync with time to diagnose the issue.

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device
rows.Problem: Severe lag after updating to One UI 7 on Galaxy A14 5G; overall system performance degraded, with choppy scrolling, laggy emoji panel and keyboard, and slow app switching and basic tasks
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences severe lag after updating to One UI 7, affecting overall system responsiveness and usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag impacts core system functions like scrolling, app switching, and keyboard input, making the device largely unusable for everyday tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Fence timeout in DRM subsystem indicates a kernel-level performance issue; countermeasure aligns with root cause, suggesting a driver or graphics pipeline issue in the updated UI.

rows.Title: Phone screen doesn't wake up when notification is received
rows.Problem: My screen doesn't wake up when I receive notification when my phone is locked. I have enabled my lock screen notifications and selected all apps to display notification on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone screen fails to wake up when a notification is received while the device is locked.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen does not respond to notifications, which affects usability during locked state, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Now bar sports from google notification doesn't show up
rows.Problem: Live Google score notification disappears when Now bar (sports from google) is turned on and device is rebooted, even though Google sends live sports notifications when Now bar is off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live Google sports notifications disappear when the Now Bar is turned on and the device is rebooted, despite Google still sending notifications when the Now Bar is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes loss of critical real-time sports notifications, rendering a key feature of the lock screen non-functional after reboot.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Overheating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Continuously facing overheating problem on Samsung Galaxy A35 5G, affects 5G network performance by switching to 4G when heated. Device becomes unusable due to heat.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats significantly, causing 5G to drop to 4G and making the phone unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating causes device to lose 5G connectivity and becomes unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by third-party app (YouTube) consuming excessive CPU; countermeasure is to limit app resource usage or implement app-level throttling.

rows.Title: Poor signal
rows.Problem: Signals are poor and unable to communicate properly over the phone; voice search command is not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences poor signal strength, leading to communication issues and failure of voice search commands.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain reliable communication, causing critical functionality (voice search) to fail and potentially disrupting user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Poor signal due to low RSRP values in the test area; recommend testing in areas with better signal conditions.

rows.Title: Buffering due to network issue
rows.Problem: Network buffering observed
rows.Summarized Problem: Network buffering is occurring due to low WiFi signal strength, possibly caused by a damaged antenna.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences significant buffering, which directly impacts usability and connectivity, making it difficult to use core functions like streaming or browsing.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Low WiFi signal strength indicates potential antenna damage; countermeasure: Place device close to router and check hardware at after-sales service if issue persists.

rows.Title: 5G data not working
rows.Problem: After updating to one UI7, unable to access mobile data. Enabled preferred 5G but see 'E' symbol instead of 5G when switching on mobile data.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G mobile data is not functioning and displays an 'E' symbol instead of 5G when activated.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows a non-functional data symbol ('E') instead of 5G, preventing actual data access, which is essential for core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: CP log missing; countermeasure: CP log not available. Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: Device overheating causes hands to get burnt at the back cover. User needs guidance on how to take photos or videos of the heating effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats at the back cover, causing burns to the user's hands.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating leads to direct physical burns and poses a safety risk to the user, making it a critical issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause remains undetermined due to missing log data during peak resource consumption; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Status bar overlaps YouTube screen
rows.Problem: Status bar overlaps after opening YouTube
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar overlaps the YouTube screen when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial screen obstruction but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sports from Google and Maps not displayed on NowBar
rows.Problem: Now bar for maps and Google sports doesn't work
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar fails to display sports content from Google and Maps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is limited to content display on the Now Bar.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been fixed in Google app version 16.27.* onwards; users should update and verify.

rows.Title: Device doesn't vibrates when calls are received
rows.Problem: After update to UI 7, haptic feedback that is vibration stopped working. Whenever the phone is in pocket and a call comes, the user is not able to feel it and the call gets missed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device no longer vibrates when receiving calls, causing users to miss calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to feel incoming calls, leading to missed communications and potential device usability failure.
rows.R&D Comment: If no vibration occurs, the device may have a defective vibrator hardware; recommend hardware inspection or replacement of the motor component.

rows.Title: More options in camera not showing the features
rows.Problem: The camera options do not show up properly and it happens everytime. The camera works properly but the 'more' options do not show up on screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'more' options in the camera do not display on screen, despite the camera functioning normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only the visibility of camera features, not core functionality, and occurs consistently but does not prevent device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by accessibility settings overriding the menu display; disabling 'Reduce animations' resolves it.

rows.Title: Lag in closing apps
rows.Problem: Slow recent app closing animation
rows.Summarized Problem: The recent apps closing animation is slow and laggy.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is slow but does not cause device to crash or become unusable, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Pass unable to login
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass unable to login
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to Samsung Pass after withdrawing it, requiring them to sign up again after data deletion.
rows.Severity Reason: Users face partial functionality failure after data deletion, requiring manual reinitialization but do not lose full device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: User must reinitialize Samsung Pass data after deletion; no technical fix available, only process guidance.

rows.Title: Game crashes when switching apps during heavy gameplay
rows.Problem: Game stops and requires reopening after switching to another app during heavy gameplay, especially with eFootball. Screen dims and locks more quickly than before, consistently since One UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The game crashes when switching to another app during heavy gameplay due to high memory and CPU pressure.
rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes and requires reopening, making it unusable during gameplay, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: High memory and CPU pressure from excessive resident processes and disabled Ram Plus option; enabling Ram Plus can improve memory availability and reduce crashes.

rows.Title: SIM preferences reset on device restart
rows.Problem: After updating to Android 15 and UI7, SIM preferences for call, message, and data reset to SIM 1 every time the device restarts, even though it was previously set to SIM 2.
rows.Summarized Problem: SIM preferences reset to SIM 1 on every device restart after Android 15 and UI7 update, despite being set to SIM 2 previously.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent SIM configuration, leading to potential call and data connectivity failures after every restart, making the device unusable for users relying on specific SIM settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DDS switch is requested by multiple modules; exact cause unknown due to insufficient logs. Counter Measure: Request CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: CX faces Routines disappear issue
rows.Problem: Routines created in earlier versions of One UI are no longer visible in the Routines page after the One UI 7.0 update. Users cannot see existing routines such as those for battery charging alerts, and attempts to create new routines with the same conditions result in errors.
rows.Summarized Problem: Existing routines created in earlier One UI versions are no longer visible in the Routines page after the One UI 7.0 update, and new routines cannot be created with the same conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose access to previously configured automation routines, which are essential for device functionality, and cannot create new ones, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Routines created in One UI 5 or earlier are not visible in One UI 7 and above due to a system-level compatibility issue; users can restore routines via backup and settings reset.

rows.Title: Samsung My Files app crashing
rows.Problem: Samsung My Files app crashing again and again. NOT ABLE TO OPEN FILES FROM Categories
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung My Files app crashes and fails to open files from the Categories section.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, preventing users from accessing files, which renders a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Added exception handling for non-hierarchical URI; users should clear download_uri data by renaming and restoring the Downloads folder.

rows.Title: Extract Text feature from gallery photos is not working
rows.Problem: The Extract Text feature from gallery photos is not working. It shows a message saying No text found. Photo remastering is also not working. These problems started after the UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Extract Text feature from gallery photos fails to detect text and displays 'No text found', especially in Gujarati language photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature completely fails to function in supported languages, leading to user inability to extract text from photos, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The given language (Gujarati) does not support text extraction, so the app shows 'No text found'. No countermeasure provided.

rows.Title: picture is automatically get deleted when try to crop any Picture & saving it choose the increase resolution
rows.Problem: Whenever I choose any picture to crop and save with increased resolution, the picture is automatically deleted. This happens only when going to the search and selecting a family member's photo. The photo gets deleted after cropping.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos are automatically deleted when cropping and saving with increased resolution, especially after selecting a family member's photo in the gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes loss of user data (photos) during a core operation (cropping), leading to irreversible data loss and a major user experience failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Editing an image may cause mismatch between stored DB metadata and actual content, leading to DB reset and unintended deletion; a fix is needed to preserve image metadata during editing.

rows.Title: UI is getting stuck and not responding
rows.Problem: The UI is getting stuck and not responding. The phone is not accepting the charge. WiFi is connected but not showing in status bar.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface is stuck and not responding, with the device failing to accept charge and WiFi not showing in the status bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is not accepting charge and UI is unresponsive, indicating a critical failure in core system functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Pop up window close glitch
rows.Problem: Pop up window close glitch; after closing a tab from notification icon bar, UI shows processing notification and app opening is stuck for about 3 seconds
rows.Summarized Problem: A pop-up window close glitch occurs, and after closing a tab from the notification icon bar, the UI shows a processing notification and apps fail to open for about 3 seconds.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to become unresponsive when attempting to open apps, making it unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to scroll up apps menu, cant pull down quick panel and notification bar
rows.Problem: After installing one ui 7 update I often encounter unresponsiveness. I can''t scroll up apps menu, cant pull down quick panel and notification bar. Some apps suddenly stop responding to my clicks. I have to repeatedly use power button and restart the screen to get things done.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience unresponsiveness in the apps menu, quick panel, and notification bar after a UI update, with some apps failing to respond to clicks and requiring repeated restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device unresponsiveness and requires repeated restarts, making the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Not able to use my phone application at all
rows.Problem: Not able to use my phone application at all. Nothing is visible. Not able to call. Not able to operate.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the phone application at all, with nothing visible and no ability to make calls or operate the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unusable as basic functions like calling and operation are entirely disabled.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs during OS upgrade from uOS to vOS when the contacts provider fails, especially with large contact data; it has been fixed and is under verification, with a fix expected in the September MR binary.

rows.Title: App crashed when i click on downloads tab
rows.Problem: App crashed when i click on downloads tab
rows.Summarized Problem: The app crashes when the user clicks on the downloads tab.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on a core navigation action, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Added exception handling for non-hierarchical URI; users should rename and restore the Downloads folder to clear corrupted download_uri data.

rows.Title: Unable to change the help text and clock face's colour
rows.Problem: Don't change the help text and clock face's colour for 3 months please solve the problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot modify the help text and clock face color on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents customization of the clock face appearance but does not render the device unusable or cause critical failures.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Smart view and modes button overlapping issue
rows.Problem: Quick panel bug, Smart view and modes button overlapping each other and not even opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The Smart View and Modes buttons in the Quick Panel are overlapping and fail to open properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The buttons fail to open, causing the user to be unable to access core functionality in the Quick Panel.
rows.R&D Comment: Timing issues caused layout overlap; fixed by adjusting layout to match timing and included in OS update.

rows.Title: Unable to setup work account
rows.Problem: Unable to setup work account after clicking delete data for work account. Now, unable to setup work account from the start.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set up a work account after deleting existing work account data.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to perform a fundamental setup function, making it impossible to use the device for work-related features.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to find gpu settings and game performance settings in the game booster plugin in good lock
rows.Problem: I cant find gpu settings and game performance settings in the game booster plugin in good lock! What the hell is this? We spend so much money trying to buy a flagship device, and previous years flagships get neglected so much by samsung. I freaking have tab s9 with sd 8gen 2 and adreno 740 man. Isnt my device capable of the gpu settings in game booster plugin huh? Am super pissed off by this neglecting of samsung. You people only give best features to latest flagships only? That means you dont c
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot find GPU settings and game performance settings in the Game Booster plugin within the Good Lock interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The absence of key game performance settings prevents users from optimizing their device's gaming experience, rendering essential features unavailable on flagship devices.
rows.R&D Comment: The Game Booster plugin in Good Lock version 3.0.13.1 no longer includes the 'Gamebooster +' plugin; users should instead access game optimization via the game name in the Game Booster menu.

rows.Title: Video quality not clear in device
rows.Problem: Movie plays blurry at times and becomes clear after a while
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback appears blurry intermittently before becoming clear.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent playback quality degradation, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: ringtone volume automatically goes to zero
rows.Problem: Every time I receive an incoming call, the ringtone volume automatically goes to zero, resulting in silent calls. All other sounds and notifications work perfectly fine — only the ringtone gets muted during calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: The ringtone volume automatically drops to zero during incoming calls, causing silent calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from hearing incoming calls, making the device functionally unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: power button on side not working
rows.Problem: power button on side is not working after the security patch software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The side power button is not working after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The power button is a critical function for device activation and shutdown, and its failure renders the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Wi-Fi calling is getting disable after update
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi calling is getting disable after update. it should remain active once it is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi calling is disabled after a system update and should remain active once enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to remain active after update, making it unusable for users relying on Wi-Fi calling.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a server-side AUTHENTICATION_FAILED error, and requires further investigation with the operator to understand the root cause of the error.

rows.Title: Nowbar isn't showing Google Sports live score
rows.Problem: Nowbar isn't showing Google Sports live score
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying Google Sports live scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to show live sports scores, which is a partial malfunction of a key suggestion element.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Calculator app begins with 0
rows.Problem: Calculator app begins with 0, and when a number is entered, it appears before the 0
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app starts with a 0 and displays entered numbers before the 0.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss; it is a partial malfunction of the display behavior.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Noise issue in video
rows.Problem: Noise issue in video please fix it soon without degrading video quality by softening video
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings exhibit noise during digital zoom, which cannot be reduced without degrading image sharpness.
rows.Severity Reason: The noise issue occurs during zoom and affects video quality, but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and cannot be fully resolved without degrading image clarity.
rows.R&D Comment: Noise during digital zoom is due to sensor limitations; no improvement possible without degrading image sharpness.

rows.Title: images not showing in apps folders
rows.Problem: gallery not showing in apps; only few albums displayed when sharing images in social media apps or WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: Image gallery is not displaying properly in apps, showing only a few albums instead of the full gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access the full image library when sharing photos, making it difficult to use core functionality like WhatsApp.
rows.R&D Comment: Google Photos Picker not working; recommend updating Google Photos app, restarting device, and clearing cache and data.

rows.Title: audio continues playing while video shuts off on realme buds air 6
rows.Problem: Audio continues playing after video shuts off on realme buds air 6, causing latency where audio comes early compared to video. This issue started around 15-16 June after a phone update and temporarily resolves with phone restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio continues playing after video stops on Realme Buds Air 6, causing visible audio-video latency.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable latency but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue likely occurs due to delayed Bluetooth disconnection; requires logs captured immediately after the event to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Can't enlarge the clock on lock screen
rows.Problem: I can't enlarge the clock on my lock screen any further, nor does it animate upon opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen cannot be enlarged and does not animate when opening.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock fails to animate and cannot be enlarged, which affects usability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: network issue where the sim slot 1 sometimes stops working
rows.Problem: device is getting slower day by day despite storage not being full; network issue with sim slot 1 sometimes stops working, signal takes 5 to 10 minutes to return after restart, both sims are present
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences intermittent network failure with SIM slot 1, leading to signal loss and prolonged restart time to regain connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to lose signal intermittently, making network functionality unreliable and potentially rendering the device unusable in certain scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to diagnose the root cause of the SIM slot 1 network failure.

rows.Title: device heating up when scrolling on insta or texting on whatsapp
rows.Problem: device heating up like crazy even when just scrolling on insta or texting on whatsapp, no heavy usage or gaming
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage such as scrolling on Instagram or texting on WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation or battery damage, posing a safety and usability risk.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Galaxy Watch 3 does not vibrate or show popup for MultiTimer app notifications
rows.Problem: Galaxy Watch 3 does not vibrate or show popup for MultiTimer app notifications — only red dot. Native timer works fine. All permissions set correctly. Issue appeared after pairing with Galaxy S24 (One UI 7 / Android 15).
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch 3 fails to vibrate or display a popup for MultiTimer app notifications, despite the notification arriving in the side pane.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification is visible but lacks essential feedback (vibration and popup), impairing user experience, though core functionality (notification delivery) remains partially intact.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by Fit3 plugin returning null vibration and sound; countermeasure is to have MultiTimer app post alarm category notifications and extract alert values based on alarm policy.

rows.Title: Data is not connected sometimes
rows.Problem: I am facing data connection issue. Data is not connected sometimes. Check the system log. I AM FACING THIS ISSUE FREQUENTLY.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences intermittent data connection issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The data connection is intermittent, which can lead to device unavailability during critical operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Network storage not working properly
rows.Problem: Network storage is not working properly, even after filling everything correctly in the PC it is showing errors, username and password are also correct but still the storage is not connecting to the PC
rows.Summarized Problem: Network storage fails to connect to the PC despite correct username, password, and form completion.
rows.Severity Reason: The storage fails to connect even with correct credentials and form inputs, preventing access to files.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Image Quality: Light is getting scatter while taking any photo
rows.Problem: While taking any photo from my Galaxy A54, there are errors found. The images show light scattering. I have already reset camera settings and diagnosed the camera using the member app. Images are attached for reference.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken on the Galaxy A54 show light scattering, indicating poor image quality due to possible contamination of the camera lens or display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible defects in photos, affecting core camera functionality and user experience, making images unusable for standard use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Clean the display at the top of the camera and Cam Deco; if the issue persists, the internal camera lens is likely contaminated and requires service center visit.

rows.Title: Unable to crop images from right as the back gesture integers with the cropping tool
rows.Problem: Unable to crop images from right as the back gesture integers with the cropping tool. There is no such issue when cropping from left
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot crop images from the right side because the back gesture is incorrectly triggered during cropping, causing unintended navigation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the crop function in specific areas, disrupting user experience but not rendering the tool unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Device Rebooting After One UI 7 Update
rows.Problem: Device randomly reboots when pressing volume buttons, opening media apps like YouTube, or switching to landscape mode after updating to One UI 7 / Android 14.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently reboots under specific user interactions after updating to One UI 7 and Android 14, indicating instability in core system operations.
rows.Severity Reason: The device reboots under normal usage conditions, making it unusable and posing a risk of data loss or permanent failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Device failed to create valid texture during operation; logs cleared, root cause unidentified. Countermeasure: Requires RAMdump and dumpsys logs from warranty center for diagnosis.

rows.Title: Navigation Touch not working proper
rows.Problem: False touches happening when swiping back in full screen navigation, such as pressing like buttons in Instagram Reels or YouTube Shorts
rows.Summarized Problem: False touch events occur during navigation swipe back actions, causing unintended interactions like pressing like buttons in media content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unintended interactions during navigation but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem is not reproduced in the latest version. Please check again in the latest version.

rows.Title: Camera app lagging and freezing when switching to 0.5x or front camera
rows.Problem: Phone has no focus issue in camera with visible black dot; camera app lags and freezes when switching to 0.5x or front camera, showing 'camera app stopping'
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app lags and freezes when switching to 0.5x or front camera, with a visible black dot and 'camera app stopping' message.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app crashes or freezes during basic operation, preventing user from using the camera function effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: CameraService connection and buffer handling issues observed; require new logs to reproduce and diagnose.

rows.Title: Internet switching doesn't work during calls
rows.Problem: During calls, internet switching does not work on second sim slot, unable to change internet over sim 2
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot switch internet between SIMs during active calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents switching internet on second SIM during calls, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Gallery app crashing on open
rows.Problem: Gallery app crashes every time it is opened, returning to home screen, causing phone to heat up and slow down. This started after software updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app crashes when opened, causing device to heat up and slow down.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on opening, leading to device instability and performance degradation, making the device unusable for photo access.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is caused by a OneDrive integration issue; countermeasure is to report the issue to OneDrive and close it as a third-party app problem.

rows.Title: Camera failed pop up occurs after working for a few seconds
rows.Problem: Camera fails to function after working for a few seconds, resulting in a pop-up error
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to function after a short period of operation, causing a pop-up error.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to function after a short period, indicating a critical malfunction that disrupts core device operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware issue causing sensor power failure; recommend customer visit service center for inspection.

rows.Title: Sports from Google not working on Now bar
rows.Problem: Facing issue with Now Bar despite completing all settings and checking Google settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports content from Google is not displaying on the Now Bar of the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working despite proper settings, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: unlocking with another person's fingerprint that is not registered
rows.Problem: My Galaxy S21 FE is unlocking with another person's fingerprint that is not registered. This is a major security concern. Please investigate and advise. In the attached video, you can clearly see that only one fingerprint is registered in the phone (mine), but the device is getting unlocked by another person’s fingerprint. This proves that the fingerprint authentication system is not working correctly and accepting unauthorized fingerprints. This is a serious security issue. Please investigate
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is unlocking with an unauthorized fingerprint that is not registered, posing a serious security risk.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is accepting unauthorized fingerprints, which compromises user security and makes the device potentially unusable for secure access.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Today and yesterday Text UI not proper while scroll in Logs
rows.Problem: In the new Samsung One UI 7, the call app shows incorrect text placement in the call log. When scrolling, the 'Today' and 'Yesterday' labels are misaligned and not properly positioned, which was correct in One UI 6. The UI also feels unsmooth and requires refinement.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Today' and 'Yesterday' labels in the call log are misaligned and improperly displayed during scrolling, causing a visual inconsistency.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency and smoothness but does not prevent core functionality or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: TalkBack not working properly
rows.Problem: TalkBack is not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: TalkBack is not working properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: TalkBack is not functioning correctly, which affects user accessibility but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: TalkBack is currently being developed by both Google and Samsung using the same code; differences in implementation are being addressed.

rows.Title: USB not showing connected in the device
rows.Problem: USB cannot connect to phone; no options shown in files or notification panel, even after resetting all settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone does not show USB connection options or notifications when a USB is inserted.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to recognize USB connection, preventing file access and notification functionality, making the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: The terminal cannot communicate with USB; USB connector hardware should be checked.

rows.Title: Unable to remove pop up message from app
rows.Problem: A notification stays on screen for 2 to 3 minutes and cannot be removed
rows.Summarized Problem: A notification from an app remains on screen for 2 to 3 minutes and cannot be dismissed.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification persists for an extended period, preventing user interaction, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: UI Icon coming on quick panel screen
rows.Problem: Ui bug on notification tray
rows.Summarized Problem: A UI icon is appearing incorrectly on the quick panel screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visual anomaly on the notification tray, which is a partial malfunction of the interface.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Notification animation not working properly
rows.Problem: Notification animation not working properly. Earlier drop down icon first then it shows notification by open up animation. Now drop down icon with notification together.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification animation is malfunctioning, with the drop-down icon now appearing simultaneously with the notification instead of sequentially.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the notification animation sequence, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlap
rows.Problem: After updating to one ui 7, navigation bar is overlapping app details in many apps. This also occurs on upi pin page. The issue was not present in one ui 6.
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar is overlapping app content in multiple apps after updating to one UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multiple apps but does not cause device crash or complete failure of functionality, only visual overlap.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the app targeting Android 15 with edge-to-edge enabled by default. The app developer needs to adjust their UI to handle window insets properly; however, this is a third-party app issue and cannot be resolved by the device manufacturer.

rows.Title: Clock disappears when changing clock position on lock screen
rows.Problem: Clock disappears when trying to change clock position on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock disappears when the user attempts to change its position on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock is a core element of the lock screen interface, and its disappearance prevents users from viewing time, making the device unusable for basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Widget issue in notification panel
rows.Problem: Bug in notification panel after July update
rows.Summarized Problem: A bug causes widget issues in the notification panel after the July update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in the notification panel but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to change app label color
rows.Problem: The app icon label cannot be read as it is black. There is currently no option to manually change the icon label color.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the color of app icon labels, making them unreadable when set to black.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from adjusting app label visibility, impacting usability but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unstability in 5G network
rows.Problem: 5G network is very unstable, mostly bad, while other devices have good speed. Camera quality is very bad with pixels breaking and screen flickering like old 2007 keypad phones.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G network connectivity is unstable and the camera has poor image quality with pixel breakage and screen flickering.
rows.Severity Reason: The 5G instability affects overall device usability, and the camera malfunction with pixel breakage and screen flickering renders core functionality unusable from day one.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera image quality is lower than mainstream standards due to 8MP resolution; provide CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Gallery App Freezes When Viewing Motion Photo
rows.Problem: Gallery app freezes completely when viewing a motion photo and becomes unresponsive, requiring force close to recover.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gallery app freezes completely when attempting to view a motion photo, becoming unresponsive and requiring a force close to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The app becomes completely unresponsive, preventing user interaction and requiring force closure, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The mppserver process is frozen in do_freezer_trap state; reproducibility needs confirmation and a ramdump is required for further analysis.

rows.Title: Multitasking issue with PW app during video playback
rows.Problem: When playing a video in the PW app, launching another app causes a black screen or temporary display shutdown, especially during multitasking from the taskbar or edge panel.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback in the PW app causes a black screen or display shutdown when switching to another app.
rows.Severity Reason: The device display shuts off or turns black during multitasking, making the device unusable while a video is playing.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: One UI 7 Not Showing
rows.Problem: One UI 7 Not Showing in My Phone. But This feature officially available in My Phone. So Please help me by solving issues as soon as possible.
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI 7 is not displaying in the phone despite being installed.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is present but not visible, leading to user confusion and incomplete functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Sim switch setting not working properly
rows.Problem: When trying to switch dual SIM on Samsung M32 4G, it always shows an error and the feature cannot be used
rows.Summarized Problem: Dual SIM switching fails on Samsung M32 4G, showing an error and preventing feature usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The dual SIM switch function is completely failing, preventing user from using a core feature of the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Weather app showing updated time
rows.Problem: Weather apps show update time 30 minutes ahead of current time
rows.Summarized Problem: Weather apps display the update time 30 minutes ahead of the current time.
rows.Severity Reason: The time display is significantly off, leading to incorrect information and potential user confusion.
rows.R&D Comment: The weather forecast update was successful, but only the last update time display was not displayed properly.

rows.Title: Device is not charging
rows.Problem: After updating one UI 7 in my M34 I am facing charging issues. After connecting charger the device is not charging.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is not charging when connected to a charger, even after updating UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to charge, which renders it unusable until the issue is resolved.
rows.R&D Comment: The CC-VBUS short state limits charging current; recommend checking cable, charger, and USB connector; if unresolved, device damage may be present.

rows.Title: Switch to 5G not working
rows.Problem: Overheating and not switching to 5G. Also having slow response and hanging
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and fails to switch to 5G, with additional slow response and hanging issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to switch to 5G, which is a major network function, and experiences freezing and hanging, making the device unusable for basic connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating and poor memory management in the app com.offshore.pikachu contribute to temperature rise and system instability; app-side memory optimization is needed.

rows.Title: Video playback not smooth at 1080p, 1440p & 2160p
rows.Problem: 1080p, 1440p and 2160p video playback is not smooth despite good 5G connection and high download/upload speeds. MediaPlayer logs are missing from the error logs.
rows.Summarized Problem: High-resolution video playback is not smooth on YouTube, with missing MediaPlayer logs and no indication of underlying technical failure.
rows.Severity Reason: Playback is not smooth but still functional; the issue does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Missing MediaPlayer logs; recommend playing videos in YouTube app or browser and capturing logs promptly if issue recurs.

rows.Title: Calculator not working properly
rows.Problem: After Android 15 update, Calculator shows '0' when opened. When trying to input numbers, a 0 automatically appends.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator displays a default '0' when opened and automatically appends a '0' when inputting numbers after the Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the calculator function but does not prevent full device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The default '0' was added to comply with EAA regulation; updated to allow user input to replace it in version 12.4.00.13.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi not connecting
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi Quick Connect Failure: Quick toggle fails. "Obtaining IP address" loop then blank. Requires manual connection via full setup.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi Quick Connect fails, resulting in a loop of 'obtaining IP address' before blanking out, requiring manual connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish Wi-Fi connectivity through the quick toggle function, making it unusable without manual intervention.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue raised to Google via partner issue tracker; Google is analyzing the root cause.

rows.Title: Downloads screen opens and minimizes immediately in My Files app
rows.Problem: Clicking on 'Downloads' in 'My Files' app opens the screen, shows no files, and immediately minimizes and goes to background.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Downloads screen in the My Files app opens with no files and immediately minimizes upon appearance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the Downloads screen, preventing users from viewing files, but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: UnsupportedOperationException due to non-hierarchical URI in download file source. Countermeasure: Added exception handling for non-hierarchical URIs; users should rename and restore the Downloads folder to clear corrupted URI data.

rows.Title: Time & date widget not displayed properly
rows.Problem: After upgrading to Android 15, after each reboot on home screen time and date widget is displaying just a black background in lieu of date and time. Each time I have to reboot again to retrieve the normal display.
rows.Summarized Problem: The time and date widget displays a black background after reboot instead of showing the actual time and date, requiring a reboot to restore normal functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen display, affecting usability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to connect Android Auto
rows.Problem: Error when trying to connect USB for Android Auto; works on another handset, issue started after software update UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect Android Auto via USB, despite working on other handsets, following a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents reliable connection in some cases but does not cause device freeze or data loss, and works on other devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to disabling the Android Auto app in settings to resolve connectivity issues.

rows.Title: Not able to screen record while playing a game
rows.Problem: Screen recording option was available before the ONE UI 7 update, but is now unavailable while playing games.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot record screen while playing games after the ONE UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during gameplay, but the device still supports screen recording in general, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Screen recording is not supported by the device's OS or GameBooster app; this is a known OS-level limitation.

rows.Title: Background wallpaper of contact gets blur
rows.Problem: Contact photos become blurred when calling or receiving a call after answering, which was not the case when the phone was originally purchased.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact photos blur when called or after answering a call.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during calls but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Default 0 not removed when entering a number
rows.Problem: Calculator displays 1000 instead of 100 when entering a number, after Android 15 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator incorrectly displays 1000 instead of 100 when entering a number, due to a bug in input handling after Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The input functionality is completely broken, leading to incorrect calculations and user confusion.
rows.R&D Comment: We updated the condition to correctly update cursor position after the first digit, and released version 12.4.00.13 on Galaxy Store to fix the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to use Bixby
rows.Problem: Issue occurs when trying to use Bixby; device is up to date
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use Bixby after leaving it, as personal data deletion takes about a week and prevents re-signup.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby functionality is partially unavailable due to data retention, preventing reactivation but not causing device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Once personal data is deleted after a week, users can re-sign up; if issue persists, further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Pass not working
rows.Problem: The Samsung Pass app icon disappeared from the home screen and when tried to open via Settings, it asked to log in again. The login link went to spam folder, requiring a password reset. This occurred after previous touch-related app glitches, suggesting a system-level or One UI bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Pass app icon disappeared from the home screen and failed to load properly, requiring a password reset due to a login link being directed to spam.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the app functionality and login flow, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is unclear due to missing logs; however, the pass appears to have reactivated. If the issue recurs, immediate logging is required for accurate analysis.

rows.Title: Contact app not opening
rows.Problem: Contacts folder is not opening on device; keypad not working properly; device software update caused issues; user unable to resolve without service center; user frustrated and unwell
rows.Summarized Problem: The Contacts app is not opening and the keypad is malfunctioning after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app failure prevents basic device functionality and user interaction, making the device unusable for essential operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Upgrade process takes over 10 seconds with large contact database, causing provider issues. Countermeasure: Move large operations to background and advise clearing app data as temporary fix.

rows.Title: Network issues
rows.Problem: Network and Internet not working after update, even with full signal, despite multiple troubleshooting attempts including reset, SIM change, and manual APN setup.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile network connection drops and internet fails after updating to One UI 7, despite full signal and multiple troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain basic connectivity, rendering the device unusable for core functions like calls and internet access.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Lag observed in notification panel
rows.Problem: notification bar lagging, sound breaks, very frustrating
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel lags and produces a broken sound, causing user frustration.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification panel lag and audio failure significantly impair user experience and device responsiveness, making it difficult to use.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to use Whatsapp
rows.Problem: WhatsApp was corrupted after updating to One UI 7.0 and failed to install properly via Play Store. Installation completes only when using an APK, but this version does not sync with Play Store for updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp fails to install or update properly after a system update, and only works via an APK with no Play Store sync.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely non-functional through the official store, making it unusable for users who rely on it.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is in WhatsApp's source code (developed by META), and Samsung has no involvement; further investigation needed to identify the root cause.

rows.Title: Remaster option not found
rows.Problem: Photo editing does not show the Remaster image option
rows.Summarized Problem: The Remaster image editing option is missing in the photo editing feature of the gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key editing function but does not prevent overall device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: unlock transition effect laggy and glitchy
rows.Problem: unlock transition effect seems laggy and glitchy with frame drops during home screen to lock screen transition
rows.Summarized Problem: The unlock transition effect on the device is laggy and glitchy with noticeable frame drops during the home screen to lock screen transition.
rows.Severity Reason: The transition effect is laggy and glitchy, causing a noticeable disruption in user experience during a core interaction, leading to a poor and inconsistent device operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to connect Internet & call
rows.Problem: Unable to connect to internet or make calls after Android 15 update, experiencing software glitches despite changing SIM, resetting phone, and visiting service center.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect to internet or make calls after Android 15 update, despite troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform basic communication functions (internet and calls), rendering it unusable for core operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on Call waiting option
rows.Problem: Cannot receive new call notifications while on a call. Call waiting toggle is disabled by default in Call settings under Supplementary services.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot receive new call notifications while on an active call due to the call waiting feature being disabled by default in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable in settings, preventing users from enabling call waiting, but the device does not crash or become unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Call waiting is a network-based feature; users should contact their network operator to enable it.

rows.Title: network stopped working
rows.Problem: Cellular network stopped working after recent update. Factory reset and hard reset tried. Service center could not fix it; suggested motherboard or IC replacement at ₹30,000 or ₹15,000. Phone has become unusable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Cellular network connectivity has stopped working after a recent software update, despite multiple resets and service center visits.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is no longer able to connect to cellular networks, rendering it essentially unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be a hardware-specific problem where devices are unable to communicate with MIPI, suggesting a design or compatibility flaw in the hardware-software interaction.

rows.Title: WhatsApp video call lines apps in screen
rows.Problem: Black lines appear for a few seconds when tapping video call options in WhatsApp, then disappear. Everything else works normally. Issue persists despite service center visit, which attributed it to software.
rows.Summarized Problem: Black lines appear briefly during WhatsApp video calls before disappearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently during a specific function but does not prevent full device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached logs and video are not in sync. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Call drop issue and data not working
rows.Problem: Call drop issue and data not working, incoming calls not connecting, LTE option not showing, WiFi data switching over improperly. Issue started after update and persists for three months. Remote access performed but issue remains.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience call drops, failure to connect incoming calls, and data issues including missing LTE and poor WiFi data switching, persisting since an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic communication functions and renders the device unusable for calls and data, leading to a complete loss of connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: No call failure logs found; issue cannot be conclusively identified or resolved with current data.

rows.Title: Glitch observe while locking the device
rows.Problem: The screen goes blank during the lock screen animation, either halfway or immediately after starting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen animation fails and causes the screen to go blank during the locking process.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen going blank during the lock screen animation renders the device unusable at that moment, preventing user access.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery display mismatch
rows.Problem: The battery of watch was 88% but on the circle it showed 100.
rows.Summarized Problem: The watch shows incorrect battery level on the circular display, showing 100% when actual battery is 88%.

rows.Title: WiFi and WiFi Hotspot do not toggle ON sometimes at random
rows.Problem: WiFi and WiFi Hotspot do not toggle ON sometimes at random. This issue started after updating to OneUI 7. To fix it, I have to restart the phone. I have attached a screen recording of the problem. These are vital functions for a smartphone. Please fix these issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi and WiFi Hotspot fail to turn on intermittently, requiring a phone restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: WiFi is a vital function for smartphone usability, and intermittent failure prevents reliable connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a PCIe interface problem during boot that prevents Wi-Fi from initializing; users should be guided to service centers for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Photo and Video quality becomes dull and low-saturated after editing
rows.Problem: When I edit a photo or video (e.g., adjust brightness, apply filters, crop), the saved version becomes very dull, low in contrast, and loses saturation. The original looks fine, but after editing, the result looks lifeless and flat. This happens with normal photos, HDR photos, and videos as well. It seems like color profile issue.

rows.Title: Youtube video quality drops
rows.Problem: YouTube app on Samsung Galaxy M35 5G experiences a drop in video quality from 2160p to 240p when app cache reaches 150-200MB, even when set to 2160p. Quality returns to normal after cache is cleared. This suggests a firmware issue on the Exynos 1380 processor related to cache management during high-resolution video playback.

rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain high-resolution video playback under normal usage, leading to a degraded user experience and potential loss of functionality for high-quality content.

rows.R&D Comment: There are no crash fatal logs related to Modes and Routine. Please provide logs if issue reproduces.

rows.Title: Device gets mute randomly
rows.Problem: Volume decreases randomly, similar issue reported across Samsung devices, many user reviews on Samsung blog
rows.Summarized Problem: Device randomly mutes and volume decreases without user action.
rows.Severity Reason: Volume control is a core device function; random muting and volume loss can render the device unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Airtel eSIM losing signal
rows.Problem: Airtel eSIM loses signal at night, even though network is fine on other devices. Sim manager shows no number. Issue resolves when phone is powered off and on, or when eSIM is manually toggled in settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Airtel eSIM loses signal at night and shows no number in sim manager, but the issue resolves after restarting the device or toggling the eSIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue partially affects network connectivity and requires user intervention to resolve, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Setting Not working Properly
rows.Problem: This recent updates was totally unsuccessfull my phone does not work properly infact setting was not opened
rows.Summarized Problem: The Finder setting is not opening and the phone is not functioning properly after recent updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The setting fails to open, making a core functionality inaccessible, rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Degraded camera quality
rows.Problem: Facing camera issue and blur, ultra white, camera not clear
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera produces blurry and unclear images with excessive shaking during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the camera function, resulting in poor image quality but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Shaking during photo capture is causing blurry images; minimizing camera shake can improve image clarity.

rows.Title: network issue
rows.Problem: facing network issue in s23 e-sim multiple times need to restart phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences repeated network issues with e-SIM on the S23, requiring frequent restarts to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to lose service and requires frequent restarts, disrupting normal operation and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: SIM refresh triggers IMS de-registration and network detachment, requiring full CP logs to understand root cause.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi won't auto-connect for now message popup sticks to the screen
rows.Problem: The message 'Wi-Fi won't auto-connect for now' sticks to the screen and does not go away, making it difficult to type and use the screen. No solution exists other than a restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: A Wi-Fi auto-connect message remains stuck on the screen, obstructing usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The persistent message blocks screen interaction, rendering the device unusable for typing and navigation without restart.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been identified and a fix is included in the next OS release.

rows.Title: Now bar sports live notifications not working
rows.Problem: Now bar sports live notifications are not working. Google scores are not visible on Now bar after fulfilling all criteria. Music, timer features also missing from Now bar.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports live notifications and Google scores are not appearing on the Now Bar feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The Now Bar feature fails to display critical real-time notifications, rendering a key functionality of the lock screen unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Default messages becomes unresponsive and hangs
rows.Problem: The default Messages app does not function normally and occasionally hangs or becomes unresponsive after the latest software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The default Messages app hangs and becomes unresponsive after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app hangs and becomes unresponsive, preventing normal use of the messaging function.
rows.R&D Comment: Check the latest AM version: messages.android_20250706_00_RC00.phone_samsung_dynamic

rows.Title: Facebook app back button quits app instead of returning to home page
rows.Problem: In facebook app, when i press back button it quits the app instead of take me to the home page with updated feeds and posts
rows.Summarized Problem: The Facebook app quits when the back button is pressed instead of returning to the home page with updated content.
rows.Severity Reason: The app quits entirely upon back button press, making it unusable and preventing access to updated feeds and posts.
