rows.Title: Unable to connect samsung watch ultra to esim
rows.Problem: Unable to connect samsung watch ultra to esim. Tried multiple times but unable to connect. This is the error message im getting
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect their Samsung Watch Ultra to an eSIM, even after multiple attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a network connection, preventing basic functionality of the watch.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is in the websheet flow, which is operator managed; requires customer to provide watch eID, MSISDN, primary device IMEI, and plan type for resolution.

rows.Title: routine and modes and read caller name aloud functions have stopped working
rows.Problem: After new oneui update, routine and modes and read caller name aloud functions have stopped working. Not able to use modes and routine because it is not reading written statements there. This was the very useful functionality which is not working after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routine and modes functions have stopped working after the OneUI update, preventing users from using written statements in routines.
rows.Severity Reason: The functionality is completely broken, rendering a key feature of the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: System crash after update
rows.Problem: Phone becomes completely unusable after One UI 7 update, frequently freezing, restarting randomly, and entering bootloop. System UI crashes, camera and basic apps like Google fail to work. Tried soft and hard resets, clearing cache — no fix.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences severe system crashes and freezing after the One UI 7 update, rendering it unusable and causing bootloop issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unusable with frequent crashes, restarts, and bootloop, preventing basic operation and user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Patch has been applied; users need to update via Settings > Software Update.

rows.Title: User unable to enroll in OS Beta program
rows.Problem: User trying to enroll in UI 8 beta but keeps getting same message and nothing happens
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enroll in the UI 8 beta program due to missing SIM card information.
rows.Severity Reason: The system requires SIM card information to verify country for beta enrollment, and without it, users receive an error and cannot proceed, making the enrollment process unusable.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: We need SIM card information; users must insert SIM card and retry to join beta program.

rows.Title: Now Brief is not displaying on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now Brief is not displaying on Lock Screen. Technical team has checked all settings and confirmed they are correct, but the Now Brief does not appear on the Lock Screen. No call received from helpline. User is considering returning the handset.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is not displaying on the Lock Screen despite correct settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing on the Lock Screen, which is a primary user interface element, making it unusable for users to access real-time information.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Default zero doesn't stay there after entering input
rows.Problem: A type cursor appears before the zero digit when entering numbers, causing confusion and affecting typing experience
rows.Summarized Problem: A cursor appears before the zero digit when entering numbers in the calculator, disrupting the typing experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects typing flow but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only impacts input experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed in Calculator version 12.4.00.13; update via Galaxy Store

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue started after Android 15 update, persists despite troubleshooting steps
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after Android 15 update, even after troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue persists after troubleshooting and affects device usability during daily use, but does not cause complete device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Status bar goes blank
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7 with security patch level 1 May 2025, a gesture-related bug causes the notification panel to fail to open when dragging down from the status bar. When this happens, the status bar becomes completely blank.
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar becomes completely blank when attempting to open the notification panel via a gesture.
rows.Severity Reason: The status bar going blank prevents users from accessing notifications and renders the device interface unusable during this action.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to connect to WiFi
rows.Problem: Already sent sending image proof again
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to connect to WiFi, with repeated attempts leading to connection failure and possible blocklisting.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a basic network connection, preventing essential functionality such as internet access.
rows.R&D Comment: Network issue due to DNS resolution failure; countermeasure suggests customer contact internet provider for network-side resolution.

rows.Title: Upon connecting to Wifi, the cellular network get lost
rows.Problem: When connecting to Wi-Fi, the cellular network stops working temporarily, preventing calls and receiving messages. The issue appears and disappears intermittently, and has been reported by other Samsung users after a UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Connecting to Wi-Fi causes the cellular network to temporarily disconnect, preventing calls and messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent loss of cellular connectivity but does not completely disable device functionality or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Double tap not working properly
rows.Problem: Double tapping the screen to turn on the mobile doesn't actually turn on. After many attempts, double tapping also opens the device instead of turning it on.
rows.Summarized Problem: Double tapping the screen fails to turn on the device and instead opens the device instead of powering it up.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to power on via double tap, making it unusable under normal operation conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Typing doesn't work in the Chrome search bar
rows.Problem: Unable to type in Chrome search bar after Android and One UI update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot type in the Chrome search bar after the Android and One UI updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents input functionality in a key feature but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to open secure folder
rows.Problem: Unable to set up Secure Folder. The phone shows "security policy prevents use of secure folder" when trying to open it. Device has no root, official software. Previous EMI-based app was removed from a mobile shop.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set up or open the Secure Folder due to a security policy preventing its use.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder is a core security feature that is completely inaccessible, preventing users from securing their device, which renders the device functionally insecure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device Owner was created and later removed; Knox state shows DO locked. Countermeasure: Recommend factory reset to resolve DO state and allow Secure Folder setup.

rows.Title: Default zero doesn't replace
rows.Problem: When opening calculator, a zero appears on display and typing any digit replaces it without erasing the zero. Since updating to UI 7, entering a number like 100 results in 1000 unless the extra zero is manually removed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The default zero on the calculator display is not replaced when typing digits, causing incorrect input values.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect calculations, making the calculator functionally unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor position was incorrectly displayed in front of the zero, causing input to not replace it; updated to correctly position cursor after zero in version 12.4.00.13.

rows.Title: Esim not working
rows.Problem: Esim not working. Stops suddenly. Restarting fixes it, but it goes off again after some time.
rows.Summarized Problem: The ESIM functionality stops working unexpectedly and requires restarts to recover, leading to intermittent failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a core feature, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: System UI not responding
rows.Problem: My phone is continuously popping with system ui not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is continuously popping up and not responding, causing intermittent system instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI not responding leads to device instability and user inability to interact with core functions, making the device unusable in practice.
rows.R&D Comment: UFS link layer errors indicate a hardware issue; recommend checking the AP or UFS component for signal and power integrity.

rows.Title: Lag in camera
rows.Problem: After the June update, the camera performance has dropped badly. There is a lag while switching between front and back cameras (especially in portrait mode), delay in clicking photos, and now post-processing has become worse.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera experiences significant lag when switching between front and back cameras, especially in portrait mode, with delays in photo capture and worsened post-processing.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag during camera switching and post-processing severely impacts user experience and basic functionality, making the camera unusable in key scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Inadequate log-time alignment with video evidence; require CP silent logs for accurate analysis.

rows.Title: Adaptive brightness not working properly
rows.Problem: Adaptive brightness is not working properly and I'm witnessing approximately 10-15% less brightness than before after June update. I have to manually increase brightness when it becomes uncomfortable in dark environment. This was not the case before June update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Adaptive brightness is not working properly and has decreased by about 10-15% after the June update, requiring manual adjustment in dark environments.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of brightness adjustment, affecting usability in low-light conditions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Adaptive brightness configuration has been altered post-June update, leading to reduced brightness output; a recalibration of the brightness mapping strategy is needed.

rows.Title: Bluetooth connected icon not shown in notification panel
rows.Problem: Bluetooth connected icon not shown in notification panel
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bluetooth connected icon is missing from the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing visual indicator in the notification panel, which affects user awareness but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Phone overheats significantly when using 5G alone, reaching 42-43 degrees Celsius even in cool room temperatures, causing severe lag and phone freezing. Battery drains rapidly, making usage limited to 5 minutes. Issue started after ONE update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats significantly when using 5G, leading to severe lag, freezing, and rapid battery drain, making it unusable beyond 5 minutes of use.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone becomes unusable due to overheating, freezing, and rapid battery drain during 5G usage, which directly impacts core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during 5G usage is linked to system platform task cancellation; further investigation needed for root cause and silent logs.

rows.Title: ESIM not working

rows.Summarized Problem: ESIM fails to function consistently and shows no SIM card, with signal only appearing after manual intervention or device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The ESIM function is intermittently failing, preventing reliable connectivity and rendering the device unusable in certain scenarios.

rows.Title: recent app button not working properly

rows.Summarized Problem: The recent apps button is not working and shows a Knox security blocking error after upgrading to one UI7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing the recent apps functionality, which is a core navigation feature, leading to device usability problems.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect userId value being sent as '0' in device policy manager; the fix has been implemented and a request has been raised (49637).

rows.Title: Smart things app is not able to register my new device
rows.Problem: Smart things app is not able to register my new device. It is showing issue with wifi even when wifi speed is fair. With same wifi network on a different device I am able to connect my washing machine as well from smart things app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The SmartThings app fails to register new devices, showing a WiFi connection issue despite a functional network that works with other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The app has a partial malfunction in device registration, preventing new device setup but not causing full device failure or system crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bottom smart view and modes UI button overlaps

rows.Title: Emergency calls only on mobile network

rows.Title: Samsung DeX not working with wired connection on S25

rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung DeX fails to connect via wired connection on S25 due to missing C-to-VGA adapter, resulting in no signal on monitor.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work fully but works on other devices, indicating a connectivity issue rather than a device-wide malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by missing C-to-VGA adapter; users must use a C-to-VGA adapter and ensure proper connection, with a countermeasure suggesting checking each component and replacing faulty adapters or cables.

rows.Title: Esim not working
rows.Problem: Esim not working and not shown on status bar after restart; device occasionally fails to detect Esim or show mobile data, requires restart to resolve; issue started after July 1, 2025 security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The ESIM is not detected or shown on the status bar and mobile data fails intermittently, requiring device restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent network failure and requires restart, affecting usability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: UI error during swipe recent app list
rows.Problem: Bug occurs when swapping applications during a call

rows.Title: Circle to search feature not working properly
rows.Problem: Circle to search is showing a blank page when scrolling upward, though there is more content below. Content reappears when scrolling back down. This is becoming irritating and affects usability.

rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos is working with Auto profile and output matches between Android 14 and 15; further investigation needed to understand the discrepancy post-UI 7.

rows.Title: Heart rate sensors stopped working
rows.Problem: Heart rate sensors stopped working after one UI update, making the device unusable
rows.Summarized Problem: Heart rate sensors have stopped working after a UI update, rendering the device unusable for health monitoring.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue renders the device unusable for a core health function, leading to loss of primary functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: No essential logs available; users must collect GearLog via Watch Dump within 15 minutes of issue occurrence for analysis.

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device
rows.Problem: The device feels slow even with no background apps running, causing noticeable lag on an 8 GB RAM device
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag even with no background apps running, despite having 8 GB of RAM.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unresponsive under normal conditions, indicating a major performance issue that affects usability.

rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to respond to wired headphones, which is a critical audio functionality preventing basic usage.
rows.R&D Comment: It was recognized as Debug Accessory (Rd / Rd). If it is a headphone that works normally on other Samsung phones, it is necessary to check if there is a foreign object in the USB connector. Please visit the nearest service center and check it out.

rows.Title: Bottom navigation buttons overlap with editing controls
rows.Problem: Bottom navigation buttons overlap with the application's editing controls when modifying the watchlist, hindering user experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bottom navigation buttons overlap with editing controls, making it difficult to use the watchlist editing feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability during a key interaction but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: S Pen keeps on selecting whole text instead of specific text

rows.Title: Effects option showing disable while editing the lock screen

rows.Title: Fast charging not working properly
rows.Problem: My charger is genuine and official Samsung brick and wire too, and they are in perfect condition. I have tried both, one does not charge the phone at all, the other charges at fast charging speed. My phone supports super fast charging and it was working till last night but not this morning. Both chargers work on other devices, but one does not work on mine and the other works only on a specific orientation of the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging is not functioning properly on the device, with one charger failing to charge at all and the other only working under specific orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform a major function (fast charging) under normal conditions, and one charger completely fails to charge, indicating a critical hardware issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Shorts in USB connector pins detected; hardware damage likely, recommend service center inspection of USB connector.

rows.Title: Samsung Internet crashing frequently
rows.Problem: Samsung Internet is crashing frequently since evening. Restarting the phone does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Internet app crashes frequently and does not resolve after phone restart.

rows.Title: Clock style change from lock screen to AOD

rows.Title: System UI is not responding

Service center says motherboard needs replacement. User claims phone bricked within 3 years due to Samsung update.

rows.Severity Reason: The system UI is completely unresponsive, making the device unusable and potentially leading to data loss or operational failure.

rows.Title: WiFi and hotspot not turning on
rows.Problem: WiFi and hotspot not turning on after this month update
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi and hotspot are not turning on after the recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely inoperative after an update, preventing basic connectivity.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drained from 100% to 36% over 13 hours under normal usage with poor cellular signal and high TX power, despite no background app activity or CPU monopolization.

rows.Title: mobile hotspot not working

rows.Title: Back button not working
rows.Problem: When a pop-up window is enlarged, the back button appears in the middle of the screen and cannot be reduced. The pop-up remains at full size, preventing users from returning to a smaller view, which causes usability issues for all pop-ups.

rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Volume key showing headphones sign and speaker not responding
rows.Problem: After update, device gets stuck in earphone settings when wire headphones are used, even after removing them. Volume key shows headphones icon and speaker does not respond. Device occasionally switches back to speaker mode, but currently stuck in earphone setting.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device gets stuck in earphone settings after using wire headphones, causing volume key to show headphones icon and speaker to fail.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive to speaker output and gets stuck in a faulty setting, preventing normal audio usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Phone detects jack insertion and switches between earphone and speaker output; possible short circuit in jack hole or sub PBA

rows.Title: Not able to play Game
rows.Problem: After software update, phone crashes when playing Genshin Impact. Game crashes frequently, cannot open, hangs, and screen recording does not work properly. Game is fully downloaded but has severe stability issues. User has spent significant money and is emotionally distressed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone crashes and hangs frequently when playing Genshin Impact, with screen recording also failing.
rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes repeatedly, preventing user from playing, and causes data loss and emotional distress due to financial investment.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Number text input line is before the zero
rows.Problem: Once I opened calculator the number text input line is before the zero Which is very annoying for quick calculation every I need to change the position the line
rows.Summarized Problem: The number input line appears before the zero in the calculator, making quick calculations difficult and requiring users to manually adjust the cursor position.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the input functionality, affecting usability during calculations but does not prevent the device from operating or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor was displaying in front of 0, so it won't be replaced by new inputting text. We updated the condition to correctly update cursor position after 0, ensuring new input replaces the default 0 text.

rows.Title: Home button and recent button missing from navigation bar
rows.Problem: Home button and recent button missing from navigation bar after UI 7 and Android 15 software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The home and recent buttons are missing from the navigation bar after an Android 15 and UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The navigation bar is a core UI element; missing essential buttons renders the device unusable for basic navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect 'userId' value being sent as '0' in all cases, and has been fixed with a rel request raised - 49637.

rows.Title: Phone getting lag and doesn't work
rows.Problem: Phone suddenly gets lag and doesn't work when in use, even after restart. Service center software reset the phone, but issue returns after a few weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences sudden and persistent lag during normal use, affecting overall functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during normal use, making it unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no abnormal logs in the attached logs as CPU and memory usage are fine; if issue recurs, proper reproduction steps with video and logs are needed.

rows.Title: Battery drained 56% to 10% overnight
rows.Problem: My f23 is draining too much battery. Literally drained 56% to 10% overnight. Fix it ASAP.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing severe battery drain overnight after a security update.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains 56% in one night, indicating a major malfunction that renders the device unusable overnight.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is being investigated; a fix is expected in version 382.

rows.Title: Quick Recording Video Stabilization Issue
rows.Problem: Video stabilization in Quick Recording mode has completely stopped working, and now videos are shaky and unstable
rows.Summarized Problem: Video stabilization in Quick Recording mode has stopped working, resulting in shaky and unstable videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The video stabilization feature, which is essential for stable recording, is completely non-functional, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: VDIS is not working properly in QuickTake Recording due to wrong resolution size; correcting the resolution size resolves the issue.

rows.Title: Bluetooth and wifi buttons stopped functioning
rows.Problem: Bluetooth and wifi buttons stopped functioning after latest software update
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth and Wi-Fi buttons have stopped working after the latest software update, preventing users from enabling or disabling wireless connections.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from controlling essential network functions, rendering basic connectivity features unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device fails to initialize Wi-Fi driver at boot; countermeasure: Users should be guided to service center to check hardware for Wi-Fi chipset issues.

rows.Title: AI future not working properly
rows.Problem: AI future not working eyes close eyes open The hand is not getting removed
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI future feature in the Gallery does not work properly when the eyes are closed or open, and the hand is not being removed as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI feature is completely blocked, preventing proper image processing and user interaction, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by internal filters blocking the image; a time log is needed for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Front camera is not working
rows.Problem: Front camera is not working. It says camera failed after opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera fails to function and reports a camera failure after being opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera fails to work and reports a failure after opening, rendering a key feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: MIPi error in front sensor actuator module. Countermeasure: Guide user to visit a service center for replacement of the front camera actuator module.

rows.Title: Navigation buttons are invisible
rows.Problem: Navigation buttons are invisible after updated, not working even after changing or resetting settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Navigation buttons are invisible after a software update and do not appear even after resetting settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The navigation buttons are completely invisible, making core device navigation impossible, which renders the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: After enforcing password change, the navigation bar did not restore; further customer communication needed to reproduce the issue.

rows.Title: Bluetooth not working for calls
rows.Problem: Bluetooth works for media but not for calls. No call scenario logs available. Device issue likely introduced by Android 15 / One UI 7.0 on Samsung Z Fold 3.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth fails to function during phone calls but works for media playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents a core communication function (voice calls) and is device-wide, affecting usability in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Missing call scenario logs; require immediate log and video capture during call events to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Sound clarity is not good on MT side
rows.Problem: My voice is low and extra sounds around me make it difficult for the other person to hear me
rows.Summarized Problem: The call audio has low volume and background noise, making it difficult for the other person to hear the user clearly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects voice clarity, which is essential for communication during calls, leading to poor user experience and potential miscommunication.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to diagnose the audio issue.

rows.Title: Wifi not working
rows.Problem: Wifi not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The WiFi function is not working due to driver initialization failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to initialize WiFi driver and firmware, resulting in complete failure of WiFi connectivity, making the device unusable for network-based operations.
rows.R&D Comment: WiFi driver initialization failure; recommend device inspection and firmware update with verbose logging for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Secure folder once logged off is appearing in the recent apps list
rows.Problem: Secure folder once logged off is appearing in the recent apps list, which was not there previously
rows.Summarized Problem: The Secure Folder app appears in the recent apps list after being logged off, which was not the case previously.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the recent apps list behavior, where a feature appears unexpectedly after logout, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The appearance of Secure Folder in recent apps after logout is normal behavior under current lock settings and Android's multi-user concept; no action required beyond user awareness.

rows.Title: Camera vibrate while focus on subject
rows.Problem: When opening the camera and focus starts on subject, the vibration motor activates automatically, causing camera screen blur. This issue started yesterday and persists despite device restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera vibrates during focus, causing screen blur and affecting image clarity.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration during focus directly interferes with image stability and clarity, making the camera unusable for clear shots.
rows.R&D Comment: UV damper separation due to improper assembly and incorrect curing position causes driving force error in AF mechanism; improved jig and OVS inspection will mitigate the issue.

rows.Title: Not able to view live sports score on nowbar
rows.Problem: Unable to view live sports score on nowbar; no button to ping live score on Google search page; no sports and news updates in nowbar
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot view live sports scores on the Now Bar, and there is no button to trigger live score updates on Google search.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing in critical use cases (live sports updates), preventing users from accessing real-time information during games, making the device unusable in those scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Shikho app immediately crashes after opening
rows.Problem: Shikho app immediately crashes after opening. The app works perfectly on other Android 15 devices, indicating a device-specific compatibility issue. User has tried reinstalling and clearing cache/data but the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Shikho app crashes immediately upon opening due to a device-specific background process limit setting in developer options.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon opening, making it unusable for the user, which constitutes a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the user setting background process limit to 'No background processes', which triggers app closure. A countermeasure is that resetting the limit to 'Standard' resolves the issue.

rows.Title: Play tone when call ends not working
rows.Problem: The 'play tone when call ends' setting is enabled but the tone does not play after a call ends. User has tried restart, safe mode, removing smart view cover, resetting app preferences, and checking sound and DND settings, but the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not play a tone after a call ends, even when the feature is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning as the tone is not played after a call ends, but the setting is correctly enabled and other functions remain intact.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue scenario is not captured in logs; call events are not recorded, and reproduction is not successful. User is requested to capture logs immediately after the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Blue circle on screen
rows.Problem: A persistent blue circle has appeared on the screen and does not disappear regardless of actions taken such as restarting, clearing apps, or changing settings. It remains visible at all times and interferes with normal use of the device.
rows.Summarized Problem: A persistent blue circle appears on the screen and interferes with normal device use.
rows.Severity Reason: The blue circle remains visible at all times and interferes with normal device use, making it difficult to interact with the screen.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bixby turns off the phone
rows.Problem: Bixby turns off the phone without asking for fingerprints or a password
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby turns off the phone without prompting for fingerprint or password authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unexpectedly turned off without user consent, which renders the device unusable and poses a security and usability risk.
rows.R&D Comment: The behavior is normal under VoiceMatch authentication; no actual issue exists, but user perception indicates a critical malfunction.

rows.Title: Comments are not consistently displaying on YouTube
rows.Problem: Comments are not consistently displaying on YouTube
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube comments are not consistently displaying on the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from viewing comments, which is a core functionality of the YouTube experience, leading to a degraded user experience and potential loss of engagement.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is in Google's YouTube app source code, specifically in ExoPlayer's media codec flush operation; Samsung has no involvement in the app's development.

rows.Title: Call Background not working properly
rows.Problem: Same issue still persists even after updating software. This was a bug in one UI 7 update only which many million of users are facing. Samsung is so helpless that it can't find its solution.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call background fails to display correctly after software update, showing a solid color instead of contact photo when contact photo is not saved.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper visual feedback during calls and affects user experience significantly, especially when contact photos are expected.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background when contact photo is not saved; this modification will be included in the next MR version.

rows.Title: Battery % icon on the top main screen does not change even in charging state
rows.Problem: Batter percentage icon on the top main screen does not change. Even while charging it does not show charging the percentage is stuck at 50. While charging my phone the lock screen shows correct battery percentage and not the main screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery percentage icon on the top main screen remains stuck at 50% and does not update during charging, while the lock screen shows the correct battery level.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery percentage is incorrectly displayed on the main screen, causing user confusion and potentially leading to incorrect charging status perception.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Mute observe On MT Side
rows.Problem: During normal calls, the person on the other side can't hear my voice. But when I switch to speaker mode, voice goes through clearly. Microphone works fine in voice recorder. Issue occurs even in full network areas (city/work). At home, where signal is weak, voice goes through.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user's voice is not heard during normal call mode, but is clearly transmitted in speaker mode, indicating a microphone audio input issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the user from being heard during regular calls, making communication ineffective and rendering the device unusable for basic voice communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be related to microphone hardware or software handling; customer is advised to perform loopback test and check hardware if audio is not heard.

rows.Title: Internet doesn't work with 5G
rows.Problem: Internet doesn't work with 5G but works with 4G; phone shows 5G when internet is turned on, but no internet connection is established.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet connectivity fails when using 5G network, but works normally on 4G.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish internet connection on 5G, rendering a key functionality unusable despite stable network availability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: missing touch screen and camera failed
rows.Problem: camera failed and touch screen missing
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing a failure in both touch screen and camera functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera and touch screen are both essential core functions; their failure renders the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera hal is not reset during platform reset, causing sensor service death and segmentation fault; countermeasure: check sensorInstance null before calling sensor service APIs and reinitialize sensor components if needed.

rows.Title: Voice note recording application not working
rows.Problem: Voice note recording is not working properly; WhatsApp voice note recording cannot record any sound. Calling works fine. Unclear if this is a hardware or software issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp voice note recording fails to capture sound, while calling functions normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a specific feature malfunction but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: setting semi covered under search bar
rows.Problem: When swiping back from app drawer, the setting option overlaps the search bar for a second and then goes down
rows.Summarized Problem: The setting option overlaps the search bar when swiping back from the app drawer.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual overlap during navigation, affecting user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Video refreshing on jiohotstar during playback
rows.Problem: While playing video on jiohotstar, it keeps on refreshing and making unable to watch a video, to resolve this issue , i have to restart the device. After it, video plays well for some time. All these started after one up 7 update with android 15.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback on JioHotstar app keeps refreshing and becomes unwatchable, requiring device restart to resume.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents continuous video viewing and requires device restart, rendering the app unusable during playback.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient log time coverage; request for correct reproduction path and step-by-step instructions to reproduce the issue.

rows.Title: Samsung video App crash
rows.Problem: Samsung video App unfortunately crash in one ui 7 Android 15 please solve this problem
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Video Player app crashes on Android 15 devices running One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes, making the video player function completely unavailable, which prevents users from accessing media content.
rows.R&D Comment: Crash caused by outdated video library app version (1.4.20.20) incompatible with Android 15; users should delete the app and use MyFiles or Gallery as alternatives.

rows.Title: Unable to open the locked notes
rows.Problem: I am unable to open the locked notes after updating my Samsung account. I tried logging in from both accounts but the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open locked notes when using a different account than the one used to lock them.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing critical data (locked notes) and requires account-specific authentication, making it unusable without correct account access.
rows.R&D Comment: A locked note is precisely linked to the account information used when locking it. Therefore, it is naturally impossible to open it with a different account.

rows.Title: Adoptive brightness option not visible
rows.Problem: Adoptive brightness option is not visible
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive brightness option is not visible in the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the interface, preventing users from accessing a key usability function, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Mobile data not properly work
rows.Problem: Mobile data not properly work
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data is not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The mobile data function is not working, which prevents basic connectivity and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Quick Panel UI is Not proper
rows.Problem: Smart view and modes buttons are stacked on top of each other in the quick settings panel and scrolling is stuck. This has happened multiple times even after the latest security update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The smart view and modes buttons are stacked incorrectly and scrolling in the quick settings panel is stuck.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI navigation, preventing smooth interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a timing problem in layout calculation during view rendering; it has been fixed in B OS with structural modifications and is not yet applied in V OS.

rows.Title: Lagging when switching camera lenses
rows.Problem: While switching camera lenses, the device lags. Changing modes takes longer, the screen goes blurry momentarily, and pressing the shutter button takes a long time. Photo mode feels unsmooth and lacks flagship performance, resembling a budget device camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera lags significantly when switching lenses and during mode changes, with visual blurring and delayed shutter response, resulting in unsmooth photo capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag and poor responsiveness during core camera operations make the device feel unresponsive and unprofessional, especially in front of others, impairing user experience and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Members app refreshed while open from recent app list
rows.Problem: Apps are not staying in RAM and refresh every time they are re-opened, especially noticeable with One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Members app and other apps are frequently refreshed when reopened, indicating poor memory retention.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to retain apps in memory, leading to frequent app refreshes and poor user experience, which impacts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: phone went from 70-76% charge to shut down
rows.Problem: All of a sudden my phone went from 70-76% charge to shut down and when i tried to power it on, it should 0% battery. This is happening since the update and is now hindering my daily tasks. I just left it on my bed and it shut down automatically.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone shuts down unexpectedly from a 70-76% charge level, showing a 0% battery reading upon reboot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shuts down unexpectedly from a reasonable charge level, leading to loss of functionality and hindering daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Images are unsorted in recent images folder
rows.Problem: Images with March dates are still on top in the recent images folder, all images appear unsorted
rows.Summarized Problem: Images in the recent images folder are not sorted by shooting date, showing outdated or incorrect order.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of image sorting in a feature that is intended to show recently accessed content, but users perceive it as unsorted due to mismatch between entry and creation times.
rows.R&D Comment: The 'Recent' album is a virtual album based on device entry time, not shooting time; users can exclude it from essential albums to resolve confusion.

rows.Title: camera video audio quality is worst
rows.Problem: Unable to see difference in picture quality between 12mp and 50mp images; video audio quality is poor with noticeable sound disturbances
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's video and audio quality is poor, with no visible enhancement between different resolution images and audible sound disturbances.
rows.Severity Reason: The poor audio quality and lack of image enhancement significantly impair user experience and device usability during video recording.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware unit problem resolved; audio and image quality issues addressed through hardware correction.

rows.Title: Camera turns on by itself in background
rows.Problem: Phone's camera turns on by itself in the background for about 1 second, multiple times a day, even when the screen is off. This is not normal behavior and not caused by any user input. I checked in the app activity logs and found the system app: com.sec.android.app.camerasaver running at that moment.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's camera activates unexpectedly in the background for a brief period when the screen is off, indicating a privacy and security vulnerability.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera turning on autonomously without user input poses a serious privacy risk and could expose sensitive data, making it a high-severity issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Camera quality has degraded noticeably — photos look flat, lack clarity
rows.Problem: The camera quality has degraded noticeably — photos look flat, lack clarity, and even mid-range phones are delivering better output.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken with the camera appear flat and lack clarity, with inferior output compared to mid-range phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The degradation in image quality significantly impacts user experience and performance, making photos unuseable for standard purposes.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be due to sensor or image processing limitations; countermeasure suggests user comparison of image resolutions shows no defect, but further investigation needed.

rows.Title: WhatsApp Video Call Glitch
rows.Problem: WhatsApp video call shows horizontal white lines on the right side from top to bottom for a fraction of seconds before the video call starts
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp video calls display horizontal white lines on the right side before the call begins
rows.Severity Reason: The glitch occurs during a critical function (video call) and disrupts the user experience immediately upon initiation, potentially affecting usability and trust in the app's functionality
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Bixby assistant is not activating
rows.Problem: Bixby assistant is not activating. Power button or voice command is not waking up. Bixby option is not available in advanced settings. Opening the Bixby app now opens the Bix-than the Bixby settings. The voice assistant is not working on this phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bixby assistant is not activating and is not available in settings, with the app opening the camera assistant instead of settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The assistant fails to activate and does not appear in settings, rendering a core voice feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: System UI crashed
rows.Problem: The System UI crashed and the phone restarted. No user action was taken. Earlier restarts led to recurring System UI not responding errors. Logs and videos are attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI crashes and causes the device to restart, leading to repeated 'not responding' errors.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI crash causes device restart, making the device unusable and leading to instability in core system functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Blank screen appears when phone locks or unlocks
rows.Problem: Blank screen appears when phone locks or unlocks, then wallpaper comes, making the locking and unlocking experience very bad
rows.Summarized Problem: A blank screen appears briefly when the phone locks or unlocks, followed by the wallpaper, degrading the user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable disruption in the locking and unlocking experience but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Home button and recent apps button not showing
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, the home button and recent apps button are not showing. When attempting to use them, an error appears: 'Knox security restricts this action'.
rows.Summarized Problem: The home button and recent apps button are missing and fail to function due to a Knox security restriction after updating to One UI 7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic navigation and device usability, making the device functionally unusable without these controls.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incorrect userId value being sent as '0' in device policy manager; this has been fixed, and a release request has been raised.

rows.Title: Biometric prompt crashes app
rows.Problem: Biometric lock causes app crashes across all apps using biometric authentication
rows.Summarized Problem: The biometric prompt in the lock screen causes app crashes across all apps using biometric authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes crashes across all apps using biometric authentication, making the device unusable during authentication.
rows.R&D Comment: The biometric prompt in the lock screen is causing app crashes; further investigation needed to identify root cause and reproduce issue with accurate logs.

rows.Title: Modes and Routines app keeps crashing
rows.Problem: Modes and Routines app keeps crashing with "keeps stopping" error after installing system update to one UI 7.0. Already tried force stop, clear data, reinstall updates, and wipe cache. Still crashes on launch.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Modes and Routines app crashes on launch after a system update to one UI 7.0, despite attempts to resolve via force stop, data clearing, and cache wipe.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, making a core functionality unusable and preventing users from using routines, which is essential for device operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Crash occurs during metadata loading when creating a new mode due to missing conditions/actions in database; fix requires showing circular progress during metadata loading and validating wizard steps.

rows.Title: System UI, Process, OneUI, App errors occurs In device frequently
rows.Problem: Phone keeps rebooting or getting hanged, errors pop up continuously, device does not allow to end report within 3 minutes, keyboard fails to appear during writing
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently crashes, reboots, and displays errors, leading to instability in system UI and app functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly crashing and rebooting, making it unusable and preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: UFS link layer errors detected; hardware-level inspection of AP and UFS components is required for resolution.

rows.Title: Live score cricket not working on Nowbar

rows.Summarized Problem: Live score cricket functionality is not working on the Now Bar section of the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing on a key lock screen element, preventing users from accessing real-time sports data.

rows.Title: Overheating during camera use

rows.Title: Outlook app crashes
rows.Problem: Outlook app crashes once in a while
rows.Summarized Problem: The Outlook app crashes intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes intermittently, causing partial functionality failure but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Several crash logs found; no confirmed crash exists. Recommend updating the app and re-registering with new logs if crash occurs.

rows.Title: Touch not responding while taking screenshot of quick/notification panel
rows.Problem: When taking a screenshot of the notification or quick settings panel, the screen stops responding to touch except for navigation gestures. Users must go back to home screen or restart to resume normal operation.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen stops responding to touch when taking a screenshot of the quick or notification panel, except for navigation gestures.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive to touch during a common action, preventing normal interaction and requiring user intervention to recover.

rows.Title: Device getting crashed constantly
rows.Problem: My phone has been acting up lately and it crashes constantly, freezing up mid-task. A pop-up keeps appearing saying "System UI not responding," interrupting everything. This makes it hard to get anything done and seriously impacts daily life.

rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes mid-task and freezes, making it unusable during critical operations, leading to significant disruption in daily use.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor isn't responding
