rows.Title: App icons not showing in app screen
rows.Problem: Glass effect on app icons isn't working on all apps, meaning some apps aren't showing
rows.Summarized Problem: Some app icons are not displaying due to a failure in the glass effect after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects some apps but not all, resulting in partial visibility of app icons rather than full device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Cx faces not able to navigate music track
rows.Problem: Watch 6 classic doesn't let me navigate with the music track. Previously it was working, after the update it's gone. Giving and removing every feature. Very bad updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot navigate music tracks on the Watch 6 Classic after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The music navigation feature, a core functionality for user interaction, is no longer working after an update, rendering the device unusable for music control.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Black color cursor appearing on the Screen
rows.Problem: a black triangle appears when the phone is on idle condition after the new patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: A black triangle cursor appears on the screen when the phone is idle after a patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual feedback during idle state but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause and countermeasure both point to external mouse attachment; further investigation needed if user has such device.

rows.Title: Some icons are not showing at all on app screen
rows.Problem: Some icons are not showing at all. The icon colour is faded. Correction needed: fixing the icon not showing glitch and fixing the icon colour for proper glass effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Some app icons are missing and their colors are faded due to a new theme update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of app icons, which are essential for navigation, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Call and text on other device not working properly
rows.Problem: Call and text on other device not working properly with S25 Ultra. It works for some time and then stops, showing error 'Can't make call. Make sure your phone is connected to a network and call and text is on both devices'
rows.Sub-Module: Call and text on other device
rows.Summarized Problem: Call and text functionality on other devices stops working intermittently and shows an error message indicating network or feature status issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works intermittently and fails after a period of operation, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Turn off and on Call & text on other devices at PD when the error message appears to resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Wifi connection disconnecting frequently
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi connection is disconnecting frequently, even when other devices are connected. This has been happening for two months.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi connection frequently disconnects even when other devices are connected, persisting for two months.
rows.Severity Reason: The Wi-Fi disconnection occurs repeatedly and independently of other devices, leading to sustained connectivity issues that impair device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Wifi turned OFF request sent at 19:32, causing disconnection; the issue is due to system-level Wi-Fi disablement triggered by user or system actions.

rows.Title: not able to go forward from this 'Continue' page
rows.Problem: There is a problem in smartthings app. We are not able to go forward from this 'Continue' page. Please help samsung.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot proceed past the 'Continue' page in the SmartThings app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from advancing in the app flow, making it unusable to complete actions.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery life dropped drastically after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery life dropped drastically after updating to One UI 7, with over 120% battery usage in just 7 hours of normal usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drain has increased significantly after updating to One UI 7, with excessive battery consumption in normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences severe battery drain, leading to over 120% usage in just 7 hours, which makes the phone unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application; root cause cannot be identified due to lack of source code and no commercial agreement between Samsung and the app owner. Requires reporting to the app developer.

rows.Title: noise distortion muffling in sound
rows.Problem: sound distortion at certain pitches still exists after June 2025 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience sound distortion at certain pitches after the June 2025 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects specific audio frequencies but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and persists intermittently post-update.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Power saving mode triggers data saver mode
rows.Problem: When Power saving mode is turned on, Data Saver mode automatically turns on, even when no routines are set.
rows.Summarized Problem: Power saving mode automatically activates data saver mode, causing unintended data restrictions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where a feature triggers an unintended secondary function, disrupting user control.
rows.R&D Comment: It is difficult to check because the same icon is not displayed on the indicator when testing on the same terminal. So you have to let me know which app provides the indicator's icon. Or let me know where the function is provided.

rows.Title: smart setting and mode icon is getting collapsed
rows.Problem: In notification panel the smart setting and mode icon is getting collapsed. You can see in bottom this is after one ui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The smart setting and mode icon is collapsing in the notification panel after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the quick panel interface, affecting visibility of settings but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Timing issues caused layout overlap; fixed by adjusting layout to match timing and included in OS update.

rows.Title: Face issue while login google account on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic
rows.Problem: Error occurs during login to Google account on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic via wearable app, with screen recording and error logs attached
rows.Summarized Problem: Users face issues logging into Google accounts on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic during the face authentication step.
rows.Severity Reason: The login process is a core functionality required for device usability, and failure prevents access to essential features.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs, indicating a logging deficiency in the authentication flow.

rows.Problem: I have been wearing watch 8 for more than 10days. Still there is no result in vascular load.
rows.Summarized Problem: The watch 8 fails to detect or provide vascular load readings despite continuous wear for over 10 days.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to provide a critical health metric (vascular load) during prolonged use, which directly impacts user health monitoring functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Algorithm failure due to low PPG amplitude and poor signal quality; countermeasure involves user-triggered log collection, but no essential logs are available for analysis.

rows.Title: Battery drain more even at ideal condition
rows.Problem: Battery drain more even at ideal condition. No background apps, screen off time zero for 5.30 hours, yet battery drains 7%. On other Samsung devices, overnight discharge is 3-4% for 8 hours. This device drains 7% in 5.3 hours, which is higher than expected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain under ideal conditions, draining 7% in 5.3 hours instead of the expected 3-4% over 8 hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is higher than expected under ideal usage, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is higher than expected due to background services in Android 15; this behavior is normal and not a critical issue.

rows.Title: Custom colour not working for some app icons
rows.Problem: When applying custom colour to app icons, some icons do not change or show any icon at all.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons fail to update or display when custom colors are applied.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects some icons but does not prevent overall device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: When using glass or gradient effects, a shape must be selected; if not, icons will not render. A toast message is shown to guide users, and future versions will automatically select a shape in such cases.

rows.Title: Recent App view glitch
rows.Problem: Apps are overlapping and the current app is being shown on center and right side on the overview button
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps are overlapping and the current app is displayed incorrectly on the recent apps overview screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the app overview display, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Phone heated by camera use
rows.Problem: Phone heated by camera use
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone heats up significantly when using the camera, indicating a thermal management issue under high CPU load.
rows.Severity Reason: The device reaches high temperatures (38-39°C) during camera use, which may indicate a risk of overheating and potential performance degradation or safety concerns.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is caused by high CPU consumption from the camera service and elevated battery thermistor readings; countermeasure is to validate device ambient conditions and collect logs in normal environments.

rows.Title: Difference in ringtone sound between flipped open and flipped close
rows.Problem: Difference in sound between flipped open and flipped close
rows.Summarized Problem: The ringtone sound differs when the device is flipped open versus flipped close.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects sound consistency during device orientation but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Network Issue
rows.Problem: No signal capture. Poor connectivity. Wifi works intermittently. Dual SIM auto connectivity issues. Internet connection very poor.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences no signal capture, poor connectivity, and intermittent Wi-Fi and dual SIM functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish stable network connections, leading to no signal and poor internet performance, making basic usage impossible.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to download Latest SW in device
rows.Problem: I can't update software
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot download the latest software update on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The software update process fails at the download stage, preventing users from updating the device, which renders the device unable to receive critical security and feature updates.
rows.R&D Comment: Uncrypt failed because the downloaded delta file was not pinned; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Fix the shape of letters option and handwriting help option in Notes
rows.Problem: In the Samsung Notes application, the options for adjusting letter shape and handwriting help are not clickable
rows.Summarized Problem: The letter shape and handwriting help options in Samsung Notes are not clickable.
rows.Severity Reason: The options are not clickable, preventing users from adjusting handwriting settings, but the app remains functional overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Weather app showing incorrect information
rows.Problem: AQI shows 1 in India, but other websites show correct AQI data
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung weather app displays incorrect AQI data for India, showing a value of 1 when it should be higher.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of data display, where incorrect AQI values are shown, but the app remains functional and does not crash or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Black color cursor appearing on the Screen
rows.Problem: My phone shows undemanded cursor with no external mouse or keyboard connected
rows.Summarized Problem: A black cursor appears on the screen without any external mouse or keyboard being connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The cursor appears unexpectedly without user action, disrupting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor appears when a device with mouse properties is detected; future OS versions will hide the cursor to reduce user annoyance.

rows.Title: WhatsApp call ringtone inconsistent for some contacts
rows.Problem: Notifications and WhatsApp calls do not display on locked screen unless double-tapped. WhatsApp call ringtone is inconsistent across contacts and must be set individually.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp notifications and call ringtone settings are inconsistent and do not display properly on the locked screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to display notifications on lock screen, making it unusable for users to see alerts, and ringtone inconsistency affects core functionality of WhatsApp.
rows.R&D Comment: Notifications not displaying on lock screen and inconsistent ringtone settings require user interface and notification system fixes.

rows.Title: Cannot turn on dual always on option for dual sim
rows.Problem: Cannot turn on the dual always on option available for dual sim. Getting error "couldnt turn on dual sim always on". Already reset settings and network settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable the dual always on display option when using both Jio and Airtel SIMs, receiving an error message indicating failure to activate dual sim always on.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work when using dual SIMs, but the device is still usable and users can manage individual SIMs; functionality is partially broken.
rows.R&D Comment: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Samsung Finance showing new sim detected always
rows.Problem: Samsung Finance app shows 'new sim detected' even though no SIM card has been changed
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Finance app incorrectly displays 'new sim detected' despite no SIM change.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the app, leading to misleading alerts but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: ECG and Blood Pressure features not functioning
rows.Problem: ECG and Blood Pressure features are not functioning on Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Ultra. When selecting ECG, it prompts to open Samsung Health Monitor app, which displays "Service is not available in your current location".
rows.Summarized Problem: ECG and Blood Pressure features fail to function on Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Ultra due to location-based service restrictions.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work due to country-specific restrictions, but the user can still access the app and may be able to use it in approved regions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Saudi Arabia's country code restriction on the SHM app; the same restriction applies to the user's device configuration, and the countermeasure confirms the same root cause.

rows.Title: Not able to setup samsung pass
rows.Problem: Not able to setup samsung pass, it gives me error each time
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to set up Samsung Pass due to repeated errors during setup.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents successful setup but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Password authentication is not properly guided during Samsung account setup. Countermeasure: Next version will restrict authentication to password only.

rows.Title: Unable to charge device with Power Bank
rows.Problem: I can't charge Z Fold 7 from power bank, Z Fold 7 sends power to power bank, and when I switch from USB setting "To This Device" it switches to "To Connected Device". Tried lots of times, no solution found. Please help me out.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device reverses power flow when connected to a power bank, preventing proper charging and causing malfunction in USB charging settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device sends power to the power bank instead of receiving it, making charging impossible and potentially damaging the device or battery.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems necessary to obtain and analyze the auxiliary battery and the cable used for connection.

rows.Title: can't Allow permission of notification in wearable app
rows.Problem: Cannot allow notification permission in wearable app, wearable app not showing in notification list, not visible in screen recording, and Buds 3 Pro not found in app. Already reported multiple times with no resolution. If unresolved, want to return phone fold 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot grant notification permissions in the Galaxy Wearable app and the app fails to detect or show Buds 3 Pro devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from controlling notifications for wearable devices and results in loss of functionality for Bluetooth device pairing and app visibility.
rows.R&D Comment: Galaxy Wearable app does not support notification permissions; Buds 3 Pro detection is disabled in the app due to OS-level changes. Users should instead use Bluetooth Settings for device pairing and notification configuration.

rows.Title: UI Glitch in Recent App List
rows.Problem: In split screen view, selecting a window causes the same window to open and a clone window appears near the screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: A clone window appears when selecting a window in split screen view within the recent apps list.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the split screen interface, leading to unexpected duplicate window behavior.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung wallet not opening
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet is not opening after last update
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Wallet is not opening after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to open, preventing users from accessing payment functionality, which is essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Voice recording with Bluetooth mic missing in Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: Bluetooth mic recording option is missing in Samsung Notes; voice is being recorded through tablet's inbuilt mic despite Bluetooth headset being connected
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth mic recording option is missing in Samsung Notes, causing voice to be recorded via tablet's built-in mic instead.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot record voice through a connected Bluetooth headset, leading to incorrect audio input and loss of intended functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: mobile network taking much time to open and airplane mode
rows.Problem: Mobile network takes much time to open and airplane mode deactivation option becomes available only after 4-5 seconds, with background app switching showing glitch-like behavior
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile network takes too long to connect and airplane mode deactivation is delayed, causing glitchy background app switching.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay in network connection and deactivation, combined with glitchy background app behavior, severely impacts usability and device responsiveness.
rows.R&D Comment: After toggle mobile data, the SETUP_DATA_CALL command takes around 4 seconds to return; please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: unable to use vita application properly after android 15 update
rows.Problem: text box goes down every time when editing text in vita application, issue persists despite reinstalling app
rows.Summarized Problem: The text box in the Vita application drops unexpectedly when editing text after the Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent text editing but does not prevent full device operation or lead to crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a 3rd party application defect; no internal source available. Recommend reporting to app owner and closing this issue in the '3rd Party App Issue Management' folder.

rows.Title: Delay observe while Turn ON aeroplane Mode
rows.Problem: It takes too much time to turn on airplane mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes excessively long to turn on airplane mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay in activating airplane mode significantly impacts user experience and device usability, especially during critical operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Pass error
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass passkey401 error log file
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass fails with a passkey401 error when registering device with KnoxMatrix EscrowVault service.
rows.Severity Reason: The error occurs during device registration and involves overwriting of PIN/Pattern/Password with zero values, potentially causing device authentication failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incorrect PPP initialization during KnoxMatrix registration and requires CP silent logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: Unable to Uninstall App from Device
rows.Problem: This app is not uninstallable from my phone and shows a popup when performing settings actions, preventing uninstalls.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot uninstall a specific app, and the device shows a popup when accessing settings, blocking normal operations.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from removing apps and interferes with basic device functionality when accessing settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Phone application is not responding
rows.Problem: Phone application is not responding, contacts is not sync
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone application is not responding and contacts are not syncing.
rows.Severity Reason: The application is unresponsive and contacts are not syncing, which prevents core functionality from working.
rows.R&D Comment: Contacts Database size is too big to handle; user can clear data in Settings > Apps > Contacts Storage to recover, but this will erase saved contacts.

rows.Title: Unable to connect samsung galaxy smart tag 2 to samsung galaxy s25 ultra
rows.Problem: Connection screen is frozen and connect button cannot be pressed in Smart Things application, preventing setup completion
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot complete device setup because the connection screen freezes and the connect button is unresponsive in the Smart Things app.
rows.Severity Reason: The connection screen freezes and the user cannot proceed with setup, making the device pairing process unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Unable to join BETA ONE UI8
rows.Problem: getting an error while joining beta
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to join the beta version of ONE UI8 due to an error when attempting to join.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents successful enrollment in the beta, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Document closed suddenly showing file corrupted
rows.Problem: Samsung Notes app crashed while in a document, file showed as corrupted and cannot be reopened. File not found in recycle bin.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app crashed while editing a document, resulting in a corrupted file that cannot be reopened.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crash leads to data loss and a corrupted file, making the document unusable and preventing recovery.
rows.R&D Comment: We have carefully examined this issue. However, we were unable to find the root cause in the logs. For some unknown reason, the app crashed when you last saved the note. As a result, some data was not saved properly, and the file was left corrupted. Unfortunately, since some data has been lost, it seems difficult to restore this document to its normal state.

rows.Title: App icons not visible after applying glass effect
rows.Problem: After applying glass effect from Theme Park, some app icons are not visible
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons become invisible when glass effect is applied in the theme settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of app icons, which is a partial malfunction of the display functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: When using glass or gradient effects, a shape must be selected for icon rendering; users should be guided to select a shape, and future versions will automatically select a shape in such cases.

rows.Title: Screen getting pixelated while rotating
rows.Problem: what is this scam going on scamsung
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen becomes pixelated when rotating the device while using the Battleground Gaming App.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen pixelation during rotation causes a visible and disruptive display issue, impairing user experience during gameplay.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Battleground app pop-up view screen broken, DpAsyncBlitStream:: unsupported the compress format. Countermeasure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Internet stops working after a few minutes
rows.Problem: The device connects to Jio 5G SA network but internet stops working after a few minutes unless Airplane Mode or mobile data is toggled. LTE works perfectly. The APN settings are correct and VoNR is enabled. It appears to be a compatibility issue or software bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet disconnects after a few minutes on 5G network, requiring manual toggle of mobile data to restore connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unable to maintain internet connection on 5G, which is a core functionality, leading to unusability until manually reset.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely a software bug in 5G network handling; require CP silent logs to confirm root cause.

rows.Title: Jitter & Framedrop during video recording
rows.Problem: Severe jitter and frame drops observed during video recording, resulting in a very shaky and unstable video output.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording suffers from severe jitter and frame drops, causing unstable video output.
rows.Severity Reason: The video becomes unusable due to severe instability and frame drops, making the recording appear shaky and unprofessional.
rows.R&D Comment: The framedrop is likely caused by high device temperature, low battery, or memory crunch; recommend clearing cache and managing memory usage to improve performance.

rows.Title: device does not properly differentiate between two SIMs
rows.Problem: device does not properly differentiate between two SIMs and shows incorrect ringtone annotations for messages
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to correctly differentiate between the two SIMs when displaying notification sounds for messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect ringtone playback but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery percentage shows incorrect value when phone is powered off and charged
rows.Problem: Phone shows a lower battery percentage when charged after being powered off, with differences ranging from 5% to 15% on hot days, indicating inconsistent battery reading during charging.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone displays an incorrect battery percentage when charged after being powered off, with readings significantly lower than expected, especially under hot conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The inconsistency in battery percentage reading during charging affects user trust and device usability, potentially leading to incorrect assumptions about battery health.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery dumps and dumpstate logs are corrupted; battery cycle count is high (1199), suggesting battery degradation. Recommend battery replacement and capture logs on next occurrence for analysis.

rows.Title: Sluggish Observe
rows.Problem: Decline in touchscreen responsiveness and appearance of horizontal white lines on the display screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The touchscreen responsiveness is sluggish and horizontal white lines appear on the display screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significant lag in touch response and visual anomalies on the display, which can impair usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Auto brightness not working properly
rows.Problem: In a dark room, auto brightness makes it very bright when it should be at the user-set level. There is an issue with the magnetic sensor and brightness sensor during diagnostic test.
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto brightness is malfunctioning in dark environments and is not adjusting to user-set levels, with sensor-related issues detected.
rows.Severity Reason: The auto brightness function is failing to respond to environmental conditions and is not adjusting to user preferences, resulting in an unusable display experience.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no relevant light sensor logs available for analysis. If the problem continues after restarting the device, we recommend visiting a service center for further inspection and assistance.

rows.Title: navigation bar not opening when placed horizontal
rows.Problem: tab's navigation bar is not opening when it is placed horizontal
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar does not open when the device is placed in horizontal orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the navigation bar in specific orientations, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue will be fixed in OneUI 8.0; temporarily resolve by turning the taskbar off and on in Settings > Display.

rows.Title: Finance tab no longer processing messages and displaying transactions
rows.Problem: The Finance tab in the Messages app is no longer processing messages and displaying banking transactions, unlike before. The section is now empty despite having transaction messages in the All messages section.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Finance tab in the Messages app is no longer processing or displaying banking transaction messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The Finance tab fails to process and display transaction messages, rendering a key financial feature in the app non-functional and potentially impacting user trust and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by change in message recipient ID due to TRAI guidelines; resolved and applied in ONEUI 8.0.

rows.Title: Phone number not associated with Samsung account
rows.Problem: Phone number isn't associated with a Samsung account. When trying to invite a person from contacts, it shows that the number is not linked to a Samsung account. Checked in account section and website. Only find2 and auto hotspot are showing. No issue with device updates or Samsung devices. If no device problem, no need to share clip.
rows.Summarized Problem: A phone number is not linked to a Samsung account, preventing successful invitation from contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents invitation functionality from working, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and user can still use other features.
rows.R&D Comment: The error occurs when the invitee's number is not registered as a service number. Users should verify service number registration and provide logs after failed invitation if needed.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint not working after the latest OTA update
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication is not working after the latest OTA update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of biometric function, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Static pattern ratio mismatch; Countermeasure: User must provide matched video and log for analysis.

rows.Title: One UI Home keeps crashing or becomes unresponsive
rows.Problem: One UI Home keeps crashing or becomes unresponsive, especially after closing apps. The device often lags or freezes, making it impossible to restart or power off until it responds again.
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI Home crashes or becomes unresponsive, especially after closing apps, causing device lag and freezing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to become unresponsive and prevents normal shutdown or restart, making the device unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to use generative edit option
rows.Problem: Unable to use generative edit option in s24 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the generative edit feature in the Gallery app on the S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The generative edit function is completely unavailable, preventing users from using a core feature in the Gallery app.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate a network-related issue during server verification; users must ensure their network environment is operational.

rows.Title: Google Maps app is crashing frequently
rows.Problem: Google Maps app is crashing frequently when I tap on the app it exits to the home screen. Clearing cache, clearing data, and uninstalling updates have all been tried, but to no avail. I have sent a video attachment. Please look into this.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Maps app crashes frequently when launched, causing the device to exit to the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, making the navigation function completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a native graphics crash in the map rendering thread due to missing EGL extension; app developer needs to fix it, but reporting is discouraged due to low reproducibility.

rows.Title: Can't install instagram
rows.Problem: Unable to restore Instagram app after archiving; multiple attempts failed with error message
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot restore the Instagram app after archiving, despite multiple attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The app restoration function is failing completely, preventing users from accessing a core social media application.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached screenshot and logs are not in sync. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Unable to go back from app menu to homepage in landscape
rows.Problem: Cannot go back from app menu to homepage in landscape without clicking back button
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot navigate back from the app menu to the homepage in landscape mode without manually pressing the back button.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in navigation, preventing smooth user flow but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Notification panel is not opening
rows.Problem: Notification panel is not opening while using any app. Neither is split screen feature working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel fails to open when using any app, and the split screen feature is also non-functional.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification panel is a core feature for app interaction, and its failure prevents users from accessing notifications or using split screen, which renders the device unusable in common scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery percentage indicator in status bar freezes at a random value
rows.Problem: The battery percentage indicator in status bar freezes at a random value. While third party apps can read battery info, the status bar indicator stops updating. The quick settings module does not affect the indicator, and no response is seen when plugging in the charger, though settings show charging is occurring.
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery percentage indicator in the status bar freezes at a random value and does not update, despite the device showing charging in settings and third-party apps reading battery data.
rows.Severity Reason: The status bar indicator is unresponsive and fails to update, making it impossible for users to know the real battery level, which is critical for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Smartthings app freezing when connecting to TV

rows.Title: Camera Image Quality Captured image lose details after processing

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of image processing under manual settings, where details are lost during HDR processing despite auto HDR being off.
rows.R&D Comment: Auto HDR is designed to recover details in saturated scenes; manual settings may not yield optimal results due to lack of multi-frame processing, and users should use auto settings for best image quality.

rows.Title: Camera is not working
rows.Problem: Camera not working on Samsung camera app, both front and back cameras. Error appears after a few seconds when opening the app. Works fine in third-party apps like Open Camera and WhatsApp.

rows.Title: Apps Not Optimised for Latest Version of Android
rows.Problem: Apps on my device freeze after updating to the latest software and latest apps of Samsung, indicating a need for actual Samsung app updates which have not been released for the A34. See screenshots.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps freeze after Android update due to lack of proper optimization post-upgrade.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable as apps freeze after update, preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: During Android upgrade, app optimization tasks (e.g., re-creating Dalvik/ART caches and AOT) occur only during the update and not afterward, explaining the freeze post-update.

rows.Title: DigiLocker Activation Not Working in Samsung Wallet App
rows.Problem: When trying to activate DigiLocker from within the Samsung Wallet app, it redirects to a webpage showing a 404 error instead of opening the DigiLocker login or registration page, preventing successful linking or use of DigiLocker.
rows.Summarized Problem: DigiLocker activation fails in Samsung Wallet due to a 40-than error when attempting to redirect to the DigiLocker login page.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from linking DigiLocker, which is a core functionality for identity verification and access, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The URL for LINK_AADHAAR was changed by the partner; the correct URL has been updated on the server after coordination with the Digilocker team.

rows.Title: camera is not working
rows.Problem: My phone camera is not working in any app, including the default Camera app. The screen stays black and shows the message: "Security policy prevents use of camera." I have already cleared the camera cache and data, restarted the phone, checked all permissions, and updated the software, but the issue remains. Please check if there is any security policy or setting blocking the camera, and guide me on how to remove it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's camera is not functioning in any app, with the screen remaining black and displaying a security policy error.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to operate in any app, with a persistent error message indicating a security policy block, rendering the device unable to use a core functionality.

rows.Title: Pop up asking to download language for chat translation
rows.Problem: When trying to chat, a pop up appears asking to download a language pack for chat translation. The device does not detect the user's intended language, leading to incorrect language suggestions. Even after downloading, it repeatedly prompts for new language packs. This occurs across all chat apps, not just Samsung Messages.
rows.Summarized Problem: A pop-up repeatedly appears asking to download a language pack for chat translation, despite the user not intending to use that language, causing incorrect language detection and repeated prompts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction of chat translation functionality across apps, but does not prevent core chat operations or lead to data loss or device crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Language detection in chat input is misjudging user intent, leading to incorrect language suggestions and repeated prompts; further investigation needed to identify specific input patterns causing misclassification.

rows.Title: can't access my secure folder
rows.Problem: I can't access my secure folder after a reboot following the last system update. The secure folder previously used a pattern for authentication, but now it asks for a PIN. I tried my phone PIN, but nothing happened even after waiting 20 seconds. There is no error message like 'Incorrect pin'. I do not have a Samsung account linked to the secure folder. I would like to delete the secure folder and remove the persistent notification saying 'Secur'
rows.Summarized Problem: User cannot access their secure folder after a system update, as it now requires a PIN instead of a pattern, and no error message is shown when entering the wrong PIN.
rows.Severity Reason: The user is unable to authenticate and access a core security feature, which renders the secure folder inaccessible and may compromise device security or usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be caused by a change in authentication type (pattern to PIN) during the update, possibly due to AutoConfirmPin being enabled. Password recovery is not possible without a Samsung account. Further investigation needed.

rows.Title: Excessive heat during WhatsApp video call

rows.R&D Comment: The temperature rise is considered normal under video call conditions with multi-window, weak network, and fast charging; thermal management system is functioning effectively

rows.Title: Device getting overheat while playing game
rows.Problem: Device temperature reaches 43 degrees Celsius during 10 minutes of gameplay, especially in heavy gaming scenarios like jp.konami.pesam, which uses high CPU. This is within expected specifications for gaming, and temperature is managed via game booster settings. Users can reduce heat by switching to Game Booster - Game Optimization - Battery Saving.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during heavy gaming due to high CPU usage, reaching 43°C, which is within expected range but may be uncomfortable for users.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during gameplay but is within expected technical limits for gaming, and users can adjust settings to reduce heat, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during gaming is expected due to high CPU usage; users can mitigate by using battery-saving game optimization settings.

rows.Title: Camera not working warning is showing up everytime

rows.Severity Reason: The warning message appears every time the camera is opened, preventing normal camera usage and indicating a major functional failure.

rows.Title: Reminder repeated alert setting is lost during sync
rows.Problem: Reminder repeated alert setting is lost during sync. Frequency: happens always. Logs, photos/videos: NOT actually necessary, as it can be reproduced 100% of the times. Steps to reproduce: 1. Have 2 devices on One UI 7, with sync on (same account) in the Reminder app. 2. Create a repeated reminder on Device -1. Set it to repeat yearly on a date, say August 1. Tap "Select months to repeat on the 1st day", and select a few more months, say October, November. Thus this created reminder is set to
rows.Summarized Problem: The repeated alert setting in the Reminder app is lost during device sync and incorrectly modified when uploading.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of user-defined recurrence settings, leading to incorrect alarm behavior and device inconsistency.
rows.R&D Comment: The recurrence type is forcibly modified during sync; fixed by correcting the Reminder sync logic in version 12.7.02.4 or 12.7.05.4.

rows.Title: YouTube app causing device to get very hot
rows.Problem: Device getting very hot when using YouTube app
rows.Summarized Problem: Using the YouTube app causes the device to become excessively hot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device heats up significantly during YouTube use, which may affect performance or user comfort, but does not cause a crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Heat generation during YouTube playback is within normal levels under high-throughput conditions, but ambient temperature and device load contribute to elevated temperatures.

rows.Title: Sometimes it won't turn on. It stays in off position until i restart phone.
rows.Problem: Sometimes the phone's Wi-Fi won't turn on and stays in off position until restarted. This issue occurs intermittently and persists after resetting network settings. It started after the last security update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's Wi-Fi fails to turn on intermittently and requires a restart to function, indicating a software-level issue with Wi-Fi initialization.
rows.Severity Reason: The Wi-Fi failure prevents the device from connecting to networks, rendering basic connectivity unusable until a restart is performed.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Wi-Fi vendor HAL fails to start repeatedly in logs. Countermeasure: Guide users to service center to check hardware Wi-Fi chipset.

rows.Title: Camera resolution showing 7 MP instead of 12 MP
rows.Problem: Camera has 12 8 12 MP setup but every picture is captured at 7 MP in all modes
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is capturing images at 7 MP instead of the advertised 12 MP resolution across all modes.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to deliver the expected camera resolution, which directly contradicts the advertised specifications and affects core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be a resolution misconfiguration in image capture; further investigation needed to confirm sensor vs. processing pipeline behavior.

rows.Title: Waiting sound for normal call not played during dual WhatsApp call
rows.Problem: Cannot make normal voice calls while on dual WhatsApp call. Waiting sound for normal calls does not play, causing missed calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: During a dual WhatsApp call, the device does not play the waiting sound for normal voice calls, leading to missed calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Users miss incoming calls entirely due to the failure of the waiting sound, making the device unusable for basic communication during active calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Active call and user handle mismatch prevents normal call initiation; solution involves checking ongoing calls across phone account and multi-user scenarios.

rows.Title: Default "USB controlled by" option set to "Connected device"
rows.Problem: When I connect external USB C type cable for charging, default "USB controlled by" option set to "Connected device"
rows.Summarized Problem: The USB 'controlled by' option defaults to 'Connected device' when an external USB C cable is used for charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The behavior is normal under the described conditions and does not impact device usability or functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The observed behavior is due to USB hub connection and is within expected functionality; no action required.

rows.Title: Screen timeout is not working properly
rows.Problem: Samsung A34's screen timeout is not turning off after 5 seconds as expected; instead, it locks after 5 minutes like the home screen timeout, causing frustration and inconsistency in screen behavior.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen timeout on Samsung A34 is not functioning correctly and is locking after 5 minutes instead of 5 seconds, leading to inconsistent screen behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent screen behavior but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Samsung Wallet Fastag Balance Not Fetching
rows.Problem: Fastag balance not showing after August update; always gets error when fetching balance
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Wallet fails to fetch Fastag balance, consistently showing an error after August update.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access Fastag balance, which is a critical functionality for payment operations, leading to device usability issues.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Battery performance has degraded after updation
rows.Problem: Battery performance has degraded after software update, with noticeable decrease in battery percentage and increased consumption. User expects options to revert to previous version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery performance has degraded after software update, showing increased consumption and reduced runtime.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significantly reduced battery life after update, indicating a major functional failure affecting core usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery performance degradation post-update is observed; further investigation needed to determine root cause and whether it's software-related.

rows.Title: Battery has dropped from 73% to 42% in 20 minutes
rows.Problem: The phone doesn't show which app is using battery during a rapid drop from 73% to 42% in 20 minutes, with no apps open except messenger. After clearing cache and resetting, battery drains quickly and the phone doesn't charge properly after shutdown.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows no app usage during a rapid battery drop and fails to charge properly after shutdown.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly in a short period, and the device fails to charge after shutdown, indicating a major system-level issue affecting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Log file only captures short duration battery statistics; further investigation needed

rows.Title: Back camera is freezing while on video call
rows.Problem: Back camera is freezing while on video call, when I turn it to back camera it gets freeze. Facing it daily on each call
rows.Summarized Problem: The back camera freezes during video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera freezes during video calls, making it unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to app configuration with VDIS; update WhatsApp and software to resolve.

rows.Title: unable to read CGM sensor data and also not able to add my NFC enabled credit card
rows.Problem: NFC diagnostics shows normal, however I am not able to use NFC. Settings are enabled and I am unable to read CGM sensor data and also not able to add my NFC enabled credit card to samsung wallet by tapping. Looks to be some issue with NFC
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot read CGM sensor data and add NFC-enabled credit cards to Samsung Wallet, despite NFC settings being enabled and diagnostics showing normal.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents core functionality (NFC and CGM data access), which are essential for user interaction and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: We recommend that you have your hardware checked.

rows.Title: Grainy images and red skin tone in 50 mp mode
rows.Problem: Camera quality issue with grainy images and red skin tone in 50 mp mode, especially under indoor lighting and on selfie and telephoto lenses. Issue persists after latest software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 50 MP camera produces grainy images and incorrect red skin tone, especially in indoor lighting and on selfie and telephoto lenses, despite a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core photo quality and results in visible, incorrect skin tones and poor image detail, which directly impacts user experience and usability of the camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: The current noise reduction settings compromise sharpness; recommending use of Soft Photo Texture in Camera Assistant app to balance noise and detail.

rows.Title: Face system lag issue
rows.Problem: Face system lags and restarts repeatedly, making the device unusable and freezing when opening single apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The face system lags severely and restarts repeatedly, causing the device to freeze when opening apps and making it unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated freezing and restarts when using the face system, severely impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by UFS link layer errors, likely related to hardware components such as the AP or UFS board; the recommended countermeasure is to have the device checked at a customer service center for hardware integrity.

rows.Title: Taskbar option not showing
rows.Problem: Taskbar option not showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The taskbar option is not displaying on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The taskbar option is missing, which affects user interaction but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be caused by the 'Hide status and navigation bars' setting; users should disable this and reset the device to reproduce and capture logs.

rows.Title: Phone app issue with settings
rows.Problem: Mobile sim data not showing. Galaxy Ai issue in settings app
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy AI feature in the settings app is not displaying mobile SIM data.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature in the settings app, affecting data visibility but not causing device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Rear camera not working during WhatsApp video calls
rows.Problem: When I switch to rear camera during WhatsApp video calls, the video feed shows only my name or black screen instead of the camera view. The rear camera works perfectly in WhatsApp status or other camera apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera fails to display a video feed during WhatsApp video calls, showing only a name or black screen instead of the actual camera view.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents effective video communication during WhatsApp calls, rendering a core function of the device unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue appears to be app-side with outdated WhatsApp version; recommend retesting with latest app version and new logs.

rows.Title: Samsung Health Data Not Restored
rows.Problem: Samsung Health data did not come back after switching from Galaxy A53 to Galaxy A21s; the app started a new profile despite using the same Samsung account and having backed up data on the old phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health data is not restored after a phone switch, resulting in a new user profile being created.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial data restoration, where critical health data is missing but the app remains functional with a new profile.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Photos often come out underexposed or dark, especially indoors.
rows.Problem: Camera quality issue and zooming issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken indoors are frequently underexposed or dark, indicating a quality issue with the camera's image capture under low-light conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality but does not cause device malfunction or crash, and users can still use the camera for basic functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the Quality optimization setting being set to 'Minimum' in the camera's Intelligent optimization menu, and the countermeasure is to set it to 'Maximum'.

rows.Title: Wifi not working
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi is not working after update. Screen has a green line in the center after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi is not connecting after software update, and a green line appears in the center of the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to connect to Wi-Fi, a core connectivity function, and shows a visible screen anomaly post-update, rendering the device partially unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: PCIe link down causing Wi-Fi failure; recommend customer contact local service center to inspect FPCB.

rows.Title: Call and text on other device not working properly
rows.Problem: Call and text on other device does not work most of the times; it works for some time and then stops with error 'Can't make call. Make sure your phone is connected to a network and call and text is on both devices'

rows.Summarized Problem: Call and text on other device intermittently fails and displays a network-related error.

rows.Title: Always on display feature is missing

rows.Title: Network is not stable poor connectivity

rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to maintain stable 5G connectivity after a software update, automatically switching to 4G and sometimes failing completely, requiring restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot maintain 5G connectivity, which is essential for proper network function, leading to data loss and reduced usability.
rows.R&D Comment: CP modem silent log is not present; logs required to analyze the root cause and validate 5G connectivity failure.

rows.Title: Phone call and contact applications not working
rows.Problem: After latest software update phone call and contact applications not working, they like to black screen. General use causes over heating. 5G network use causes high heating. Suggestions: provide wifi and hotspot simultaneously, show network data speed on top bar, provide daily data use information in settings. Most applications hanging issue solved by new update as soon as.

rows.Severity Reason: The applications fail to function and show black screens, making the device unusable for basic communication and navigation functions.

rows.Title: Portrait studio is not working properly

rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to detect faces and produces incorrect outputs, leading to invalid results and user confusion, making the AI portrait function unusable.

rows.Title: Videos not syncing to OneDrive

User has tried clearing cache, relinking Microsoft account, granting battery access, enabling video uploads, and ensuring sufficient storage space. No error messages appear during sync. User suspects error logs may contain relevant information.
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos are not syncing to OneDrive despite user attempts to resolve the issue, with no error messages displayed during the process.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents access to user's videos, which are critical for daily use, and no feedback is provided during sync, making it difficult for users to know if a problem exists or has been resolved.

rows.Title: Camera captured blurry images Drops a Pixels

rows.Title: Device take more than 10 seconds to fully go airplane mode

This was not the case before the One UI 7 update. Processing changes were made but tuning did not improve quality.
rows.Summarized Problem: Night Mode in the camera produces softer, less detailed photos with increased noise and a warmer color tone, especially in low light, after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality in low-light conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure of the camera function, and users can still capture photos with acceptable usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is expected under low-light conditions; recommend brighter environments for better results. No changes required on the solution side; maintain current status.

rows.Title: Notification shade stuck on home screen

rows.Title: AOD always goes back to horizontal clock style

rows.Title: Unable to buy Font from Store
rows.Problem: The error changes every time I input password. After adding card, clicking download asks for identity verification, which fails even with correct password or one-time link. Unable to buy font due to server error.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot purchase fonts from the Galaxy Store due to repeated authentication failures and server errors after entering correct credentials.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from completing a core transaction (font purchase) and fails consistently despite correct input, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The price of content (contentID: 000005453877) has been revised to 54.39, but the minimum payment unit is 1, causing a mismatch that results in server errors during purchase.

rows.Title: Color gradients not rendering properly
rows.Problem: Color banding issue in rendering gradients, especially during call background.
rows.Summarized Problem: Color gradients are not rendering properly, causing visible color banding during call background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual quality during specific use cases but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Google Map App crash

rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes with a fatal signal (SIGABRT), causing the app to terminate mid-function, making it unusable.

rows.Title: Battery Drainage

rows.Title: ONE UI Home uses more Battery than other apps

rows.Title: Device keeps restarting automatically

Please check logs and confirm if it is a hardware issue (motherboard/battery). I would like to highlight that the motherboard was already replaced once after around 2 years of purchase. However, after a year of this replacement, the restarting issue has arrived. Please suggest and provide a permanent solution.

rows.Title: Empty Space show on App screen

rows.Title: Auto updating album features not working

rows.Title: System upload mode occurs while using the device

rows.Title: Camera image quality low with blur and torn pixels

rows.Title: Google Assistant not switching to Gemini

rows.Title: Camera shakes abruptly while switching from 1x to 3x or from 5x to 3x in video mode
rows.Problem: The camera shakes abruptly while switching from 1x to 3x or from 5x to 3x in video mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera shakes abruptly when switching between 1x and 3x zoom levels in video mode.

rows.R&D Comment: The camera module's AF and OIS components are sensitive to electromagnetic fields; shaking during zoom transitions may be due to electromagnetic interference, requiring further investigation on component interaction and environmental factors.

rows.Title: Phone became unresponsive
rows.Problem: Phone froze when taking a screenshot, same as previous occurrences. Issue happens during screenshot action on X or Twitter. Restarted immediately. Logs not available for analysis.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes when taking a screenshot, indicating a system responsiveness issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during a common user action, potentially leading to data loss or user frustration and device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: We analyzed each TG, but it is difficult to find the cause due to lack of log. If the problem occurs again, please upload the log. If the log is uploaded additionally, we will proceed with additional analysis.

rows.Title: Battery drain overnight without use
rows.Problem: Battery drains 11% overnight without any use, even with no network settings or background apps active, and later reaches 7% drain. User reports this after turning on device after standby.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant overnight battery drain without any usage or background activity.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs during inactivity, leading to rapid depletion and potential device unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by insufficient log capture during standby; recommend user to extract logs immediately after device turns on post-standby.

rows.Title: More options in camera app is not working
rows.Problem: The list of options isn't visible after the UI7 update. When clicking 'More' in the camera app, the options are not displayed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'More' options in the camera app are not visible after the UI7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access camera features like photo selection, which renders a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Android 14 to 15 update and system animation settings; reducing animations (e.g., in Accessibility or Developer Options) may remove UI elements, and the app needs to handle such cases by ensuring visibility of options regardless of animation settings.

rows.Title: Wifi connection automatically disconnected
rows.Problem: Wifi connection automatically disconnected
rows.Summarized Problem: The WiFi connection disconnects automatically without user intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The disconnection is caused by an abnormal AP deauthentication frame (reason code 2), indicating a critical network instability that leads to loss of connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: AP sent deauthentication frame with reason code 2, indicating abnormal behavior; countermeasure requires CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Video playing on screen turns green and gets stuck
rows.Problem: Video playing on screen turns green and gets stuck. I can hear the sound but the entire screen becomes green. This happens when playing videos in Chrome browser or on WhatsApp. Request a software fix.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback on screen turns green and gets stuck while audio continues to play.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen turning green during video playback renders the display unusable and disrupts user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Quick Panel layout misaligned
rows.Problem: Quick settings changes layout
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel layout is misaligned due to timing issues causing horizontal layout length to become zero.
rows.Severity Reason: The layout appears overlapping, which affects usability but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Timing issues caused layout overlap; fixed by adjusting layout to match timing and included in OS update.

rows.Title: Writing style not working
rows.Problem: No change in text, AI features of spelling and grammar, Writing style not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The writing style feature is not working and does not apply any changes to the text.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to apply changes to text, but does not cause device crash or data loss, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: Auto shape cannot be erased in Notes
rows.Problem: In Samsung Notes, when auto shape is turned on, drawn shapes cannot be erased
rows.Summarized Problem: Drawn shapes in Samsung Notes cannot be erased when auto shape is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot erase shapes, but the issue is not complete failure of functionality—erasure is possible via selection tool, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Shape is not a handwriting stroke, so it cannot be removed by eraser; users should use selection tool to delete shapes.

rows.Title: Phone freezes and restarting often
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and restarting often
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone frequently freezes and restarts, indicating a platform-level instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly freezes and restarts, making it unusable and suggesting a critical system malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: AP malfunction occurred 405 times, possibly due to AP/DRAM/PCB issues; hardware inspection is required.

rows.Title: File picker not working

rows.Title: Voice recording apps are not able to access microphone

rows.Title: Error or glitch in the Theme Park app
rows.Problem: When choosing icon effects like Glass or Gradient, the effects do not apply properly. Apps like Play Store, Airtel Thanks, and YONO SBI either don't get the effects or appear completely dark. Users need a proper Glass icon option and Dark Icon option.

rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot apply desired icon effects, resulting in a major malfunction of visual customization that renders the app unusable for intended functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because shape selection is required for Glass and Gradient effects; when shape is not selected, effects fail. A future update will automatically select a shape to prevent this issue.

rows.Title: Device is not detecting or connecting to any 5G networks

rows.Title: Error when making normal call on personal space

rows.Title: Quick share not working

rows.Title: Airplane mode takes time to fully activate

rows.Title: Device getting hang while playing game

rows.Title: unable to transfer my important data

rows.Problem: Huge frame shift effect while switching from 1x to 3x and 5x in video mode

rows.Title: can't send and receive any text messages

rows.Title: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth turn off automatically while using the phone

rows.Title: Call recording not working properly
rows.Problem: Call recording works only for incoming calls for excluded numbers; for outgoing calls, it randomly records excluded numbers like Pappa and Devashri, especially when they are in the excluded list. The logs are extracted with a delay, making it hard to identify the root cause. The issue occurs intermittently and is not expected on flagship phones.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent and unreliable call recording behavior, especially on flagship devices, leading to potential data loss and user confusion.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs are extracted with delay, so root cause cannot be identified; update to latest One UI 8.0 and share logs promptly if issue recurs.

rows.Title: Auto HDR Features not working properly in Expert raw app
rows.Problem: Auto HDR Features is not working properly in Expert raw app when EV is set to -0.3, but works fine at EV 0. It stopped working after UI 7.0 update and worked perfectly in UI 5.1.
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto HDR feature fails to work when EV is set below 0, after a UI 7.0 update, despite working correctly in previous versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails under specific conditions but still works in other scenarios, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Further investigation needed

rows.Title: phone heats up during normal usage
rows.Problem: Galaxy M35 overheats abnormally during normal usage like browsing, YouTube, or even when idle. The issue persists despite factory resets, software updates, and using the phone without a case. Heating worsens in sunlight.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats during normal use and when idle, especially in sunlight, despite multiple troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal and idle usage, which can lead to performance degradation, battery damage, or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app (com.lemon.lvoverseas) holding prolonged wake locks, contributing to CPU activity and overheating. Countermeasure: The app developer must be contacted to fix the issue; this is outside Samsung's control.

rows.Title: Unable to set my voice on bixby
rows.Problem: I am unable to set my voice on bixby please resolve it

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality (voice setting) and requires a specific environment to reproduce, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: speaker is not working properly that erupting sound comes from the speaker

rows.Title: battery drained for 35% after 6 hours with battery saver on

rows.Title: Bluetooth connects and disconnects from car

rows.Title: Contact doesn't open. It keeps crashing.
